name: DB_event_challenge_destroy_reward_desc_01
text:
Join forces with other adventurers during the event and conquer the Demonic Beast Lamek!

Acquire rewards upon completing the World Challenge Goal.
(*Claim condition: Clear the World Challenge Death Match at least once)

name: DB_event_challenge_destroy_reward_desc_02
text: The adventurers worked together during the event and successfully defeated the Demonic Beast Lamek!\n\nRewards will be sent to adventurers who participated in the event.

name: DB_final_boss_info_desc
text:
<Final Boss Battle>
Different bosses requiring various strategies to defeat appear each season in Final Boss Battles.
Set up a suitable team by taking into account the boss's skill patterns and attribute leverages.

<Season Points>
You can purchase items at the Season Shop with points acquired by defeating Final Bosses.
Accumulated points are reset when the season ends.

name: DB_frozen_desc_01
text:
There is an item that was not used
properly when founding the Knighthood.

You must first collect the item
in order to access the Knighthood.

Collect?

name: DB_get_stamp_desc_01
text: Available upon completing the event achievement.

name: DB_get_stamp_desc_02
text: Summer Season Event Stamp.\nAvailable from the Hawk Pass Special for a limited time.

name: DB_guild_boss_rule_01
text: Knighthood Boss Battle Info\nParticipate in the Knighthood Boss Battle for glory!\nThe most honorable Knighthood will be given a special reward.

name: DB_guild_boss_rule_02
text: 1. Aim for the highest Battle Score! - Set a team of your strongest heroes and receive a Battle Score depending on your actions in the stage.\nUse many skills to clear the stage and set new records.

name: DB_guild_boss_rule_03
text: 2. Progressing in Knighthood Boss Battles, Knighthood ranks will be determined by factors such as Check-Ins and Contributions to the Knighthood.\nBe advised, you will not be able to participate while ranks are being determined (for 30 minutes on Sunday 12:00 AM). (UTC - 7)

name: DB_monthly_story_desc_001
text: Training that will help the Trio of Troublemakers guarding Liones stronger! Cut through their defense!

name: DB_monthly_story_desc_002
text: Jericho looks like she's training hard, but she seems to be angry and looking for a way to vent.

name: DB_monthly_story_desc_003
text: It's time for service training to help increase the tavern's sales! But some aren't very happy about how Hawk demands good service for even the foulest of customers...

name: DB_monthly_story_desc_004
text: Ban is great teaching... material? He's beginning to enjoy this difficult request... Let's take him down!

name: DB_monthly_story_desc_005
text: Elizabeth has set up flying training for Hawk, who wants to soar through the skies!

name: DB_monthly_story_desc_007
text: Lillia dreams of bringing a catastrophic end to the world, but she must overcome [The Seven Deadly Sins] to do so! She decides to invite a colleague from another world to aid her in a battle that she can't win alone...

name: DB_monthly_story_desc_008
text: Valenti is fascinated with understanding and researching new worlds and environments.\nShe finds her way to a crystal mine where small Bellato work!\nThe arrival of the Crystal Golem causes mayhem for the Bellato, and Valenti makes them a deal...

text: Comes from a healthy dairy cow and tastes great.

text: A nutritious ingredient from the sea.

name: DB_item_desc_cookingmaterial_0001

name: DB_item_desc_cookingmaterial_0002

name: DB_item_desc_cookingmaterial_0016

name: DB_item_desc_hero_coin_474101
text: Coins required to enhance [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Arden's Ultimate Move.

name: DB_item_desc_item_gotcha_key_001
text: A magical key made by refining the power that flowed out from a Goddess Amber. Can be used to Draw Equipment.

name: DB_item_desc_item_gotcha_ticket_01
text: A draw ticket with which equipment can be acquired.

name: DB_item_desc_money_dia
text: A kind of gem preferred by nobles and royalty.\nIt fetches a high price, fitting for a gem that symbolizes eternity.

name: DB_item_desc_money_friend
text: A token of friendship which can be shared among friends.\nIt is acquired by including friends in your team during battle. It can be used to purchase items at the Coin Shop.

name: DB_item_desc_money_gold
text: Gold coins with the crest of the Kingdom of Liones.\nA commonly used form of currency.

name: DB_item_desc_money_pvp
text: Coins given as a reward for fighting in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival).\nIt can be used to purchase items at the Fight Festival Shop.

name: DB_item_desc_name_event_achievepoint
text: Complete event achievement to acquire points which can be used to receive great rewards.

name: DB_item_desc_option_random_01
text: A mystical hammer which randomly increases the value of bonus effects of Awakened equipment.

name: DB_item_desc_option_random_02
text: A magical anvil which randomly changes an equipment's bonus effects.

name: DB_item_desc_pass_mission_point
text: Points which can be acquired by accomplishing Hawk Pass Missions. It can be used to increase the Pass level.

name: DB_item_desc_platinum_coin_01
text: A special coin which can be used in the Platinum Coin Shop.

name: DB_item_desc_pvp_gamble_ticket_01
text: A drawing box given to Vaizel Fight Festival participants depending on their performance.\nIt's made of platinum.

name: DB_item_desc_pvp_gamble_ticket_02
text: A drawing box given to Vaizel Fight Festival participants depending on their performance.\nIt's made of sapphires.

name: DB_item_desc_pvp_gamble_ticket_03
text: A drawing box given to Vaizel Fight Festival participants depending on their performance.\nIt's made of rubies.

name: DB_item_desc_pvp_gamble_ticket_04
text: A drawing box given to Vaizel Fight Festival participants depending on their performance.\nIt's made of emeralds.

name: DB_item_desc_pvp_gamble_ticket_05
text: A drawing box given to Vaizel Fight Festival participants depending on their performance.\nIt's made of crystals.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_0003
text: A stinger that contains the insect's venom.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_0017
text: A source of roaring fire acquired by defeating a dragon.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_0018
text: A necklace made of bones.\nIt's a part of the Walker Queen Hark's item collection.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_0020
text: A key that opens the archive.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_0021
text: The remaining traces of the ex-husbands of\nthe Walker Queen Hark are stored in the box.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_0022
text: An old and tattered romance novel.\nIts writing contains letters which are not in use today.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_0023
text: An article collected from the dead.\nMaybe one of these is the one Hannah wants.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910101
text: Bread made for Mead with apologetic intent.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910103
text: A wooden figurine of a kitty.\nIt looks crude, but the creator's diligence is readily apparent.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910104
text: A wooden club carried by the thugs around town.\nIt looks like it was made from a sturdy piece of wood.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910105
text: A glass bottle filled with water from the well.\nIt's hard to not think about refreshing Vanya Ale when looking at it.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910106
text: A pleasantly fragrant leaf from a wild plant.\nIt is slightly dried and used as an aromatic in cooking.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910107
text: An old, but sturdy wooden spear.\nIt looks like it would be a suitable weapon if sharpened carefully.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910108
text: A necklace that looks similar to the lost necklace described by the girl.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910109
text: A sharp claw from a wolf. It's big and pointy.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910110
text: A small cat raised by a village girl.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910111
text: Wolf meat acquired by hunting wolves near the Fountain of Eternity.\nIt has a nice color which makes one think it's probably nutritious.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910112
text: Spider silk collected from the Forest Spider Habitat.\nIt is soft yet durable.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910113
text: A bundle of groats, the fundamental ingredient for making Vanya Ale.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910201
text: A medicine which neutralizes insect poison.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910202
text: A stinger bigger and more solid than others.\nDana says these stingers contain deadlier venom.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910203
text: Expedition logs that look like the ones Elliot lost.\nIt shows its age in its tattered state.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910204
text: A collection of things from the Ancient Warriors.\nIt doesn't look like it would fetch a lot of coin.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910206
text: A coin that brings good fortune.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910207
text: A pendant ornament that looks like it would sell for a pretty penny.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910210
text: A tool used to renovate old or damaged buildings.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910301
text: A round, reddish fruit of a Screamer. It smells foul.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910302
text: A wing from a Wyvern. It's too tough for humans to bite into.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910303
text: The tattered journal that Luigi lost.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910304
text: A juicy apple picked from a tree in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910305
text: They say that any dish can taste amazing by seasoning it with powdered bat claws.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910306
text: Screamer roots are known to have reinvigorating effects.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910307
text: A spider silk that produces light. It shines brightly in the dark.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910308
text: A potion from the medicine merchant. Its effects are unknown.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910309
text: A sleep medication sold by the medicine merchant which is fraudulently sold\nas a way to enter the Capital of the Dead.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910402
text: All organic matter has decomposed,\nleaving only the old headgear.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910403
text: A cut of tenderloin from a wolf. It is known as the finest cut of meat.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910405
text: Seasoned wolf tenderloin grilled over open flames. It smells and tastes amazing.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910408
text: An old notepad. The paper is so worn that it could crumble at any moment.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910409
text: A wedding band weathered by time.\nIt looks like there are initials and text engraved on the inside of the ring.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910411
text: A faulty whetstone.\nIt looks fine, but looks can be deceiving.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910412
text: A rock that fell off the body of a golem.\nIt's been said that it contains mysterious powers.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910413
text: A claw stained with the blood of wolves.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910414
text: Heart taken from a werewolf.\nOften referred to as Black Hearts due to a dark red color.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910415
text: High-quality flour that is sure to make any dish amazing.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910416
text: A broken pendant. It's impossible to tell whose it is.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910417
text: The roots of a white evening primrose which is incredibly dangerous to obtain.\nIt looks very similar to a Screamer Root, however.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910418
text: The absolute best top-shelf Vanya Ale.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910419
text: A bundle of books from Yoos's werewolf research.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910502
text: The mushroom cap of a Chicken Matango.\nIt has a wonderfully chewy texture.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910503
text: Ban's new dish contending for a spot on the menu.\nA simple dish made by skewering Chicken Matango mushroom caps.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910504
text: The meat is a bit tough, but its juices are said to be some of the best.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910505
text: The heart of a dragon which stopped beating not long ago.\nIt's hot to the touch and feels like it will start beating again.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910506
text: A freshly-baked cookie. Children can't get enough of this stuff!

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910507
text: A flyer from a competing establishment which makes Hawk incredibly wary.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910601
text: A flower petal that fell from the Wishing Tree.\nIt can often be found in the [00D8FF]Forest Path[-].

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910602
text: A paper to hang on the Wishing Tree. It's decorated with a flower petal.\nIt can often be found at [00D8FF]The Tree Which Grants True Love[-].

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910603
text: A ring worn by the members of [Gilthunder's Guards].\nIt is their exclusive symbol.\nIt can often be found on [00D8FF][Gilthunder's Guards][-].

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910604
text: A fang from the wolves that often appear near the South Gate of Liones.\nIt looks like it was broken off.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910605
text: A letter written with love.\nIt's been said that hanging such things on the Wishing Tree will grant love.\nIt can be found in [00D8FF]all Event Stages[-].

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910606
text: The most popular children's toy in all of Liones.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910607
text: An ingredient required to make a reinvigorating potion.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910608
text: An ingredient required to create high-quality glue.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910609
text: A meatpie that highly resembles Hawk.\nIt's made with scraps and grass, and contains no meat whatsoever.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910610
text: A sturdy hammer used by carpenters.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910611
text: Bricks used to rebuild the West District.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910612
text: A three-layer mochi ordered for the Hinamatsuri.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910613
text: A white, opaque wine.\nIt's sourced from the mysterious spring which turned to wine.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910614
text: Thin, clear, and shiny spider silk.\nKing processed it himself strand by strand.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910615
text: A piece of cloth found in a pile of things left out by people.\nIt's pretty big and looks like it could be used for other purposes.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910616
text: Adorable clothes for a doll, made with extreme craftsmanship.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910617
text: A plant specimen which mutated after exposure to the blood of a demon.\nIts twitching movements can be seen upon closer observation.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910618
text: Handicraft which was probably beautiful when it was intact.\nIt might sell after some refurbishing.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910619
text: Items stolen from the Boar Hat tavern.\nWhat were they planning to do with these?

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910620
text: A magic-infused flower which emanates mystifying light and fragrance.\nIt feels dangerous for some reason...

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910621
text: A potion that looks like it may cause terrible things. No way this thing grants love.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910622
text: A stone that has a reddish color like it was immersed in blood.\nIt doesn't look like it was originally this color.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910623
text: Research material which Merlin has collected over a long period of time.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910624
text: An ordinary toy found in the Broken Lodging.\nIt doesn't look like it belongs here, but there's probably a story behind it.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910625
text: A gift prepared for Slater by the members of the [Roars of Dawn].\nWas it prepared with Slater's tastes in mind?

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910626
text: These are leftover scraps whichever way you look at it.\nThey don't look suitable as cooking ingredients, but maybe...?

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910627
text: Grass which looks like it was pulled from the streets.\nWhether it's edible or not is not known until eaten.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910629
text: Embers created with magic.\nIt can't be put out by ordinary means.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910632
text: A ticket used to spin the wheel for rewards.\nGather and use them to acquire the rewards you want.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910634
text: The colorful masks help liven up\nthe mood of the festival.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910635
text: It really feels like a festival when one waves this flag.\nThe symbol of the Fireworks Festival is printed on it.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910636
text: Fireworks for the festival's finale.\nIt is the main attraction that will fill the sky with beautiful lights.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910637
text: A celebratory medal with Elizabeth's face stamped onto it.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910638
text: It's hard to tell what the block is used for on its own.\nLet's see if there are other blocks.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910639
text: It's hard to tell what the block is used for on its own.\nLet's see if there are other blocks.

text: It's hard to tell what the block is used for on its own.\nLet's see if there are other blocks.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910647
text: A special ticket which can be used to reset the roulette reward list.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910654
text: Score acquired from the Halloween Event Boss Battle.\nBuild up your score to acquire rewards.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910660
text: A box filled with bottles of fresh Vanya Ale.\nThe green bottles are packed neatly inside.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910661
text: A box containing Mead's special gift.\nIt's heavier than expected.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910662
text: A shiny bundle of coins favored by Epicure Julie.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910664
text: Fresh honey which can only be found in the Forest of Nightmares.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910665
text: Fresh Fairy's Sprout which can only be found in a secret area within the Forest of Nightmares.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910666
text: A box containing a special gift from Momo.\nIt's heavier than expected.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_910668
text: A shell acquired from eliminating Demonic Beast Lamek. Use it at the Exchange Shop.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_drink_0001
text: Ale delivered to taverns from Vanya.

name: DB_item_desc_quest_waterbottle
text: A glass bottle filled with the pure water of Vanya.

name: DB_item_desc_rank_exp
text: A beneficial energy which helps adventurers become stronger, faster.

name: DB_item_desc_rank_max

name: DB_item_desc_selected_exchange_ticket_01
text: A ticket which can be used to select an SSR Equipment to acquire.

name: DB_item_desc_silver_coin_01
text: A special coin which can be used in the Silver Coin Shop.

name: DB_item_desc_training_ticket
text: A key that opens the Training Grotto.

name: DB_item_desc_upgrade_stone_01
text: A mineral acquired from salvaging equipment.\nUsed as an ingredient to enhance equipment.

name: DB_item_desc_week_key
text: A key which is used to access the Gold Dungeon in the SP Dungeon (Fort Solgres).\nIt can be purchased at the Coin Shop and Item Shop.

name: DB_item_desc_week_key_01
text: A key which is used to access the Event Dungeon in the SP Dungeon (Fort Solgres).\nIt can be purchased at the Coin Shop and Item Shop.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900001
text: It looks like the seal of a knighthood.\nA mountain cat is engraved onto it.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900002
text: A fang from an ordinary wolf. The wolf was likely in pain.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900003
text: A nametag.\nIt's a necklace with a metal plate that has a name stamped onto it.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900004
text: A silver-colored armor fragment.\nIt's gilded nicely.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900006
text: A stinger that contains the insect's venom.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900007
text: A paper scrap with illegible scribbles\nand poorly drawn routes.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900009
text: A metal fragment that has rusted over time.\nIt looks like it was from a suit of armor.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900010
text: A broken fragment of a chess piece.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900101
text: A bracelet made of carved wood.\nIt's worn as a sign of friendship.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900102
text: A comb that is a little too small.\nUsed almost exclusively for facial hair.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_900108
text: A spine from an insect.\nIts tip is covered in venom.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901027
text: Stringy spiderwebs bunched into a tetrahedron shape.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901029
text: A broken fragment of a horn.\nA strange energy can be felt from the broken side.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901032
text: A rose stained with red blood.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901036
text: A knighthood insignia so cracked and dented\nthat its pattern is unrecognizable.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901038
text: A piece of cloth with a visible stink trail.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901043
text: A bottle with a mysterious liquid inside.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901044
text: A warrior's emblem made of wood.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901046
text: A fighter's emblem made of wood.\nItâ€™s more elaborate than other emblems.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901047
text: A tribal chieftain's emblem made of wood.\nIt's a crudely made, gold-colored board adorned with gems and feathers.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901049
text: A glass bottle containing a mysterious red liquid.\nAn ominous energy can be felt from it.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901052
text: A sawed off horn. It may be an Etinâ€™s.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901053
text: A black orb from which an ominous energy can be felt.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901055
text: A small fragment of a dragon's scale.\nIt's hard to the touch.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901059
text: A piece of paper promoting the Fight Festival.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901063
text: An untouched bottle of alcohol.\nThey say it's pretty good.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901066
text: A small and simple silver coin pouch made of cloth.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901068
text: A long, black ribbon used to tie long hair.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901076
text: A Demon Sprout which was found from the body of a New Generation Mutant who went berserk from the effects of drinking demonâ€™s blood.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901077
text: Viscous blood from a chimera that Vivian created.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901078
text: A small wild flower which blossomed in the fields.\nChildren pick these flowers to decorate their homes.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901083
text: The Soul Crystal is no longer shining.\nIt looks like it lost its power.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901084
text: A bone that does not look easy to break.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901086
text: A battle helm stained with someone's blood.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901088
text: A charm made with teeth. Casting magic comes easy with this charm around.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901090
text: A totem which feels like it grants wolf-like powers.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901092
text: A fragment which broke off from a double-edged sword.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901097
text: A fragment from a really old suit of armor.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901102
text: A mysterious power can be felt when wearing this robe.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901103
text: A mask worn by high-ranking mages to conceal their identity.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901105
text: A strange magic can be felt from the dark orb.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901108
text: An emblem signifying the status of a knight of Liones.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901110
text: A gift bestowed by the king for the recipient's service to the kingdom.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901111
text: A token which shows the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights's recognition of the recipient's courage.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901113
text: Blood used as a fundamental ingredient for magic. It's still warm, making one wonder how it was stored.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901116
text: A sauce that can make even Meliodas's cooking tasty! Maybe.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901118
text: A beautifully decorated bowl for scraps.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901120
text: A doll which a little girl lost.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901127
text: A relic of the ancient Giants.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901131
text: Pulse of Darkness, Memories of the Dark, and Her Justice.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901138
text: A chessboard that is useful when one needs to kill time. No chess pieces, though.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901139
text: A powerful magic which was extracted and refined into a liquid. The magic continuously separates and fuses within the test tube.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901142
text: A chessboard is all you need to have fun.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901144
text: A bunch of gold coins.\nSelling price: 500 Gold

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901151
text: A mask of unknown origin.\nIt looks like it was modeled after the face of a dying person.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901152
text: A special belt for the truly powerful.\nIt's a little embarrassing to wear in public.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901153
text: A high-quality pelt with no blemishes. It was skinned well and the fur is very soft.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901154
text: A textbook detailing the training methods for knights.\nIt's a beloved must-read of both knights and Holy Knights.

name: DB_item_drop_desc_901155
text: A document filled with details of magic research.\nIt's weathered too much to know what it was about.

text: Seal of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat]

text: Use the Sapphire Box\nto draw an item.

name: DB_set_1_attack_desc
text: Equipment favored by aggressive types.\nIt's probably the most popular equipment around.

name: DB_set_10_recovery_desc
text: It's been told that the equipment was made in cooperation with magic experts at a famous forge in Liones.

name: DB_set_11_chance_defence_desc
text: Equipment with a vintage look created using ancient methods.\nSuitable for heroes who are tired of using crude equipment.

name: DB_set_12_life_steal_desc
text: This equipment is the definition of schadenfreude.

name: DB_set_13_alchemi_desc
text: Created by a lunatic who claimed he could turn stones into gold.\nThis equipment is said to bring wealth to its wearer.

name: DB_set_14_training_desc
text: It was created by a practitioner who believed that unfocused efforts are a waste of time.

name: DB_set_15_luck_desc
text: Was it by sheer luck? It is said that the many people who wore this into battle performed better than usual.

name: DB_set_2_life_desc
text: It was created in an unknown monastery\nin reverence and awe of life.

name: DB_set_3_chance_desc
text: Any equipment made from amethysts is naturally beautiful.\nHowever, the real value of this equipment does not come from its aesthetics.

name: DB_set_4_endure_desc
text: This equipment is strangely uncomfortable to wear,\nwhich may be why it helps the wearer learn to be patient.

name: DB_set_5_penetration_desc
text: Equipment which strangely calms its wearer.\nThere are many who swear by its effects which enhance fighting ability.

name: DB_set_6_resist_desc
text: Only a select few know the methods required to create this equipment.\nThe cold energy within the gem is said to increase the wearer's resistance.

name: DB_set_7_defence_desc
text: It was created with steel of high purity.\nMade by a skilled artisan, it's sure to be sturdy.

name: DB_set_8_chance_dmg_desc
text: The modern look of this equipment set the market ablaze with excitement when it was first released. The hype has not died down.

name: DB_set_9_regenerate_desc
text: Equipment rumored to have been made by the Fairies.\nWounds seem to heal faster when wearing this gear.

name: DB_set_weapon_desc_50
text: You can check the event equipment.

name: DB_stamp_desc_2
text: Stamps to assist you in battle.

name: DB_destroy_rule_01
text:
1. Death Match Info
Death Match is a game mode in which players drive out bosses that invade villages.
Players can participate in real-time 2-player battles.
Invite friends or Knighthood members and play together.

name: DB_destroy_rule_02
text:
2. Death Match Occurrence
Death Match is unlocked during Chapter 5.
After Death Match is unlocked, each chapter's cleared Boss Battle increases the Death Match Rate, with the Death Match Boss appearing in the village at 100%.
You may not enter villages where the Death Match Boss has appeared.

name: DB_destroy_rule_03
text: 3. Death Match Time Limit\nThe time limit for a Death Match is 60 minutes.\nIf the boss is not defeated within the time limit, Death Match will result in failure.

name: DB_destroy_rule_04
text: 4. Fighting in Death Match\nDeath Match Bosses each have unique abilities.\nUse different combinations of heroes to defeat bosses.

text: [FFE809][Fairy King's Forest] Guardian Elaine[-] and [FFE809]"Snatch" Brawler Ban[-] are inseparable by fate.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_204103
text: [FFE809][Fairy King's Forest] Guardian Elaine[-] and [FFE809][Outlaw] Brawler Ban[-] are destined lovers who cannot be kept apart.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_204111
text: [FFE809][Harlequin] King the Fairy King[-] is the king of all fairies and [FFE809][Fairy King's Forest] Guardian Elaine[-] is the saint guarding the Fountain of Youth.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_204112
text: [FFE809][Fairy King's Forest] Guardian Elaine[-] waits for [FFE809][Forest Guardian] King the Fairy King[-], who left to find his friend 700 years ago.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_204113
text: [FFE809][Fairy King's Forest] Guardian Elaine[-] and [FFE809][b]The Grizzly Sin of Sloth[/b] King the Fairy King[-] finally meet in the Capital of the Dead.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205102
text: [FFE809][King of Prophecies] Adventurer Arthur[-] wants to learn many things from [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Captain Meliodas[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205103
text: To [FFE809][King of Prophecies] Adventurer Arthur[-], [FFE809][Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas[-] is a great hero of legend.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205104
text: [FFE809][Collector] Great Mage Merlin[-] is helping [FFE809][King of Prophecies] Adventurer Arthur[-] become a benevolent ruler of Britannia.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205105
text: [FFE809][King of Prophecies] Adventurer Arthur[-] and [FFE809][b]The Boar Sin of Gluttony[/b] Great Mage Merlin[-] are companions with a shared goal.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205106
text: [FFE809][King of Prophecies] Adventurer Arthur[-] and [FFE809]"Infinity" Great Mage Merlin[-] place absolute trust in each other.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205202
text: [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Captain Meliodas[-] and [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [/b]Truth[b][-] are enemies who were once comrades.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205203
text: [FFE809][Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas[-] and [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] are now like oil and water.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205211
text: [FFE809][b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Holy Knight Gowther[-] can't understand why [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-] places importance in camaraderie.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205212
text: Both [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-] and [FFE809][Wanted Man] Young Villager Gowther[-] have been on the run from Holy Knights for 10 years.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205213
text: [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-] and [FFE809][Liones's Hero] Holy Knight Gowther[-] keep an eye on each other for different reasons.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205221
text: [FFE809][Collector] Great Mage Merlin[-] is like a ray of sunshine to [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205222
text: [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-] recites poems of adoration whenever he sees [FFE809][b]The Boar Sin of Gluttony[/b] Great Mage Merlin[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205223
text: [FFE809]"Infinity" Great Mage Merlin[-] is [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-]'s only weakness.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205231
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] was the one who started Galland Game, but the winner was [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205301
text: Though they'll never be together, [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-] will only love [FFE809]"Thunderbolt" Guardian Gilthunder[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205302
text: [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-]'s love for [FFE809][Chivalrous] Holy Knight Gilthunder[-] is closer to a crazy obsession.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205303
text: [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-] mistakenly believes that [FFE809][Star of the Kingdom] Holy Knight Gilthunder[-] will fall for her one day.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205304
text: [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-] is an apprentice of [FFE809][Collector] Great Mage Merlin[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205305
text: [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-] wants to surpass [FFE809][b]The Boar Sin of Gluttony[/b] Great Mage Merlin[-], but she is nothing more than a bad student to Merlin.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205306
text: [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-] hates pigs because [FFE809]"Infinity" Great Mage Merlin[-]'s mark is a crimson boar.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205307
text: [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-] and [FFE809]"Melt" Grandmaster Hendrickson[-] joined forces to achieve the same goal.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205308
text: [FFE809][Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian[-] and [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Druid Hendrickson[-] are conspiring to bring the Demons back to life.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205401
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] bravely challenged [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Captain Meliodas[-] to a fight, but was no match for him.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205402
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] is too proud to accept his loss against [FFE809][Halloween] Captain Meliodas[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205403
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] underestimated [FFE809][Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas[-] and was humiliated.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205404
text: [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Druid Hendrickson[-] is an unforgivable traitor in the eyes of [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205405
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] and [FFE809]"Melt" Grandmaster Hendrickson[-] are Holy Knights of Liones.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205406
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] and [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] are Holy Knights of Liones.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205407
text: To [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-], [FFE809]"Break" Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] is a despicable traitor who fooled everyone for too long.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205408
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] always wanted to challenge [FFE809][b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Holy Knight Gowther[-] to a fight if they ever met.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205409
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] never met and doesn't know anything about [FFE809][Wanted Man] Young Villager Gowther[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205410
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo[-] cannot accept the fact that a medal was given to [FFE809][Liones's Hero] Holy Knight Gowther[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205501
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] and [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Captain Meliodas[-] may be in different groups, but they're both Holy Knights of Liones.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205502
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] acknowledges and respects [FFE809][Halloween] Captain Meliodas[-]'s extraordinary power.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205503
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] and [FFE809][Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas[-] both have unique companions, an invisible Fairy and a talking pig.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205504
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] and [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Druid Hendrickson[-] have a strained relationship.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205505
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] dislikes [FFE809]"Melt" Grandmaster Hendrickson[-] for sending him and others to the border.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205506
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Deathpierce[-] is appalled learning the truth of [The Ten Commandments] from [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Grandmaster Dreyfus[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205507
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] believes he will never be able to trust [FFE809]"Break" Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] no matter how he changes.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205508
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] loves music and [FFE809][b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Holy Knight Gowther[-] loves to read.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205509
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] was driven away to the frontier and [FFE809][Wanted Man] Young Villager Gowther[-] is chased by the Holy Knights.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205510
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce[-] and [FFE809][Liones's Hero] Holy Knight Gowther[-] first met at the medal bestowment ceremony.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205601
text: [FFE809][Earthshaker] Weapon Researcher Valenti[-] is displeased about the fact that [FFE809][Kungfu Master] Fighter Diane[-] can shrink to human size.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205602
text: [FFE809][Earthshaker] Weapon Researcher Valenti[-] has no plans of changing her displeased attitude towards [FFE809]"Creation" Fighter Diane[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205603

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205611

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_205612
text: [FFE809][Earthshaker] Weapon Researcher Valenti[-] dreams of bringing destruction to the world alongside [FFE809][Master of Secrets] Mage Lillia[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70011
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deldry[-], Denzel's follower, dislikes [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Grandmaster Dreyfus[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70012
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deldry[-] dislikes [FFE809]â€œBreakâ€ Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] for exiling [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] to the border.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70021
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deldry[-] thinks [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Arden[-] is a bothersome pipsqueak but takes care of him nonetheless.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70111
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Arden[-] follows the orders [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] gives only because he is the captain.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70112
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Arden[-] believes that [FFE809]"Break" Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] exiled [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] to the kingdom outskirts.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70113
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] once failed to use a skill because of insufficient magic when hit by [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Arden[-]'s arrow.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70121
text: [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Arden[-] is cheeky towards [FFE809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deldry[-] but still worries a little.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70211
text: [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-] and [FFE809][b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Holy Knight Gowther[-] are a bit distant.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70212
text: [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-] and [FFE809][Wanted Man] Young Villager Gowther[-] both lived perfectly undetected for 10 years.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70213
text: [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-] and [FFE809][Liones's Hero] Holy Knight Gowther[-] tend to think differently, but they rely on each other as colleagues.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70221
text: [FFE809][Collector] Great Mage Merlin[-] is an irreplaceable and precious person to [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70222
text: To [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-], [FFE809][b]The Boar Sin of Gluttony[/b] Great Mage Merlin[-] isnâ€™t just a comrade. Sheâ€™s more special to him than that.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70223
text: No matter how conceited [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-] gets, the one person he always respects is [FFE809]"Infinity" Great Mage Merlin[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70231
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] played a game with [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-], ultimately leading him to destruction.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70522
text: [FFE809][The Six Knights of Black] Captain Bellion[-] harbors great hatred for [FFE809][New Legend] Demon Meliodas[-] for not choosing him to join [The Ten Commandments].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70612
text: [FFE809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-] and [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Captain Meliodas[-] are always respectful, putting each other first.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70613
text: [FFE809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-] and [FFE809][Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas[-] are always respectful, putting each other first.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70621
text: [FFE809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-] and [FFE809][Heart of the Land] Mercenary Diane[-] both wish to be with the one they love.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70622
text: [FFE809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-] and [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Holy Knight Diane[-] both wish to be with the one they love.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70623
text: [FFE809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-] and [FFE809][b]The Serpent Sin of Envy[/b] Holy Knight Diane[-] both wish to be with the one they love.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70631
text: [FFE809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-] and [FFE809]"Disaster" Old Fart King[-] can work together to overpower enemies quickly.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70632

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70721
text: [FFE809][New Legend] Guardian Jericho[-] and [FFE809]"Explosion" Guardian Guila[-] are close friends and rivals.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70811
text: [FFE809][Sweet Temptation] Druid Jenna[-] has been alive for a long time, and she knows the secret behind [FFE809][Mobile Tavern] Hawk & Elizabeth[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70812
text: [FFE809][Sweet Temptation] Druid Jenna[-] sensed that [FFE809][Mascot] Hawk & Elizabeth[-]'s magic is similar to that of the Druids.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70813
text: [FFE809][Sweet Temptation] Druid Jenna[-] knows that her sister Zaneri has complicated feelings for [FFE809][Reverse] Guardian Hawk & Elizabeth[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70821
text: [FFE809][Sweet Temptation] Druid Jenna[-] advised [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Druid Hendrickson[-] to never give up on himself.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70822
text: As the head of the Druids, [FFE809][Sweet Temptation] Druid Jenna[-] has known [FFE809][Omen of Chaos] Druid Hendrickson[-] since his childhood.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_70823

name: DB_finalboss_phase01_desc_101
text: The Final Boss's Defense and Resistance increase per orb of Personas' Ultimate Move Gauges. The Final Boss attacks with skills with Petrify and Shatter effects.

name: DB_finalboss_phase01_desc_201
text: Final Boss Gowther uses Rank Up Skills on himself every 2 turns and uses Attack Disable and Rank Down Skills.\nProtectors use Taunt to defend Gowther, and greatly increase his Attack and Defense when they die.

name: DB_finalboss_phase01_desc_301
text: Merlin's illusions inflict Weak Point damage on Debuffed heroes. Final Boss Merlin protects allies with a barrier skill and attacks with a skill which depletes Ultimate Move Gauges.

name: DB_finalboss_phase02_desc_101
text: The Final Boss's Crit Damage and Crit Chance increase per orb of Personas' Ultimate Move Gauges. The Final Boss attacks with skills with Spike, Ruin, and Shatter effects.

name: DB_finalboss_phase02_desc_201
text: Final Boss Gowther uses skills which decrease Attack and HP of all enemies and Debuff Disable skills every 3 turns. He also uses skills which decrease Ultimate Move damage, Weak Point Skills, and Rank Down Skills. If there is a monster that has not taken damage, all monsters are healed for 100% of their HP.

name: DB_finalboss_phase02_desc_301
text: At the end of every turn, Final Boss Merlin uses a skill which has the Freeze effect on one enemy. Merlin's illusions apply effects on Final Boss Merlin which increase Attack and Pierce Rate.
