text: Increases Attack by [FFAE00]10%[-] if the sum of the enemies' Ultimate Move Gauges is less than [FFAE00]{buff_1_val} orb(s)[-].\n[00D5FF](Can be stacked)[-]

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_910002
text: Increases all allies' Regeneration Rate by [FFAE00]{buff_1_val}[-].

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_910006
text: Removes Debuffs from the hero during the allies' turn.

name: DB_skill_passive_name_611345
text: Increased Damage Taken from Unknown Races

name: DB_skill_passive_name_611355
text: Increased Damage Dealt to Unknown Races

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1004001
text: [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas's stance skill is effective against attack-type enemies as it even counters all-target attacks.\nAn evasion effect is added upon reaching Rank 3.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1005001
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] Captain Meliodas's stance skill counters harder as his HP depletes.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1015001
text: [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b] Demon Meliodas's skills ignite enemies to increase damage taken and infect them to suppress recovery-related abilities.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1015002
text: [Knight of Wrath] Demon Meliodas has a skill which inflicts Pierce damage on all enemies and another skill which inflicts Corrosion damage based on HP.\nCorrosion is effective against enemies with high HP.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1024001
text: [Mascot] Hawk & Elizabeth's skill is broadly effective against all enemies and suppresses their defense-related effects while inflicting damage.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1024002
text: [Mobile Tavern] Hawk & Elizabeth's skills have the charge effect which is strong against enemies with a high defense.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1025002
text: "Transpork" Guardian Hawk & Elizabeth has a skill which depletes enemies' ultimate move gauges.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1034001
text: [Boar Hat] Tavern Hostess Elizabeth has a skill which can stop enemies from using their attack skills and another skill which heals all allies' HP and fills their ultimate move gauges.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1035001
text: [Liones] Princess Elizabeth's attack skill removes buffs when ranked up. When ranked up once more, it removes buffs and stances.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1035002
text: [A New Adventure] Princess Elizabeth has a skill which disables the enemy's Debuff Skills and another skill which grants Debuff Immunity to allies.\nShe is most effective when facing enemies with Debuff Skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1044001
text: [Heart of the Land] Mercenary Diane has a skill which decreases all enemies' defense-related effects.\nIt is most effective when used against multiple enemies with high defense stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1045001
text: [b]The Serpent Sin of Envy[/b] Holy Knight Diane's skill has a Rupture effect which inflicts great damage on buffed enemies. It is effective against enemies who have buff skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1045002
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] Holy Knight Diane has skills that can attack all enemies, which is effective against a large group of enemies.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1055001
text: [Matrona] Fighter Diane inflicts greater damage on enemies with buff effects and can be used to strategically fight against enemies by interrupting their buff and debuff skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1055002
text: [Kungfu Master] Fighter Diane has a skill which suppresses enemies' defense-related abilities and prevents enemies from using their attack skill, disabling enemies to great effect.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1055003
text: "Creation" Fighter Diane's Buff Skill Taunts enemies and increases Defense-related stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1064001
text: [Undead] Prisoner Ban has a skill which depletes an enemy's ultimate move gauge, interrupting its use.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1065001
text: [Outlaw] Brawler Ban's skill diminishes an enemy's attack-related skills and is useful against enemies with high attack stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1065002
text: "Snatch" Brawler Ban has a skill which extorts stats and is useful in boss battles with high attack or defense stats and in death match.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1075001
text: [Ale Collector] Adventurer Ban has a skill which can be used effectively against enemies with stance skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1075002
text: [b]The Fox Sin of Greed[/b] Adventurer Ban has a skill which adds lifesteal to a portion of damage dealt and is very good at staying alive.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1075003
text: [Nunchaku] Adventurer Ban has a skill which can inflict a great amount of damage on enemies affected by debuff effects.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1095001
text: [b]The Grizzly Sin of Sloth[/b] King the Fairy King's skill becomes a powerful petrification skill when ranked up.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1095002
text: [Forest Guardian] King the Fairy King has a skill which removes an enemy's debuff and increases his attack for each debuff that was removed.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1095003
text: [Harlequin] King the Fairy King has a skill which inflicts damage on all enemies.\nHe has a skill which disables recovery skills and another skill which inflicts additional damage on the enemy, making him a tricky target to deal with.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1105001
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] Old Fart King's stance skill activates even when all allies are attacked.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1105002
text: "Disaster" Old Fart King's recovery skill has a rejuvenating effect which continuously heals all allies.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1105003
text: [Protector of Dolls] Old Fart King has a skill which can harass enemies by poisoning them for additional damage.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1114001
text: [Wanted Man] Young Villager Gowther has a skill which depletes an enemy's ultimate move gauge, delaying the enemy's use of ultimate moves.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1115002
text: [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Holy Knight Gowther has a skill which can increase an ally's skill rank, providing great support.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1115003
text: [Liones's Hero] Holy Knight Gowther can inflict great damage when using an attack skill after using a debuff skill.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1135001
text: [Collector] Great Mage Merlin's skill can freeze enemies to disable them. It inflicts additional damage when the skill rank is increased.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1135002
text: [b]The Boar Sin of Gluttony[/b] Great Mage Merlin has a skill which creates a protective barrier around all allies, making her useful in all battles.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1135003
text: "Infinity" Great Mage Merlin has a skill which makes enemies use only attack skills and another skill which decreases the ranks of enemy skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1144001
text: [Star of the Kingdom] Holy Knight Gilthunder's attack skill can inflict great damage when a critical hit occurs.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1144002
text: [Chivalrous] Holy Knight Gilthunder has a buff skill which increases allies' attack-related skills, making him useful in a team composed of heroes with high attack stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1145001
text: "Thunderbolt" Guardian Gilthunder has a taunting stance skill which is effective against enemies using single-target attacks.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1154002
text: [Rapier] Holy Knight Guila has a debuff attack skill and a recovery skill, making her invaluable in combat.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1155001
text: "Explosion" Guardian Guila has a skill which removes buff effects and stances, making her versatile and useful in many different situations.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1164001
text: [Liones Royalty] Ranger Howzer's stance skill counters when all allies are attacked and proves to be effective against enemies using all-target attacks or single-target attacks.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1164002
text: [Star of the Kingdom] Ranger Howzer has a skill which diminishes defense-related stats, making him effective against enemies with high defense stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1165001
text: "Tempest" Holy Knight Howzer has a skill which is broadly effective against all enemies.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1174001
text: [Champion] Ranger Griamore has a skill which can protect all allies to great effect. His protective barrier becomes stronger as his attack increases.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1174002
text: [Adventurer] Ranger Griamore's stance skill increases the number of turns taunted when skill rank is increased.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1175001
text: [Iron-wall Knight] Guardian Griamore's stance skill increases HP-related stats and damage dealt.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1184001
text: [New Generation] Holy Knight Jericho has a skill which doubles critical chance and can become stronger when using critical hit-related equipment.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1184002
text: [Adventurer] Holy Knight Jericho's skill has a Rupture effect which inflicts great damage on buffed enemies.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1185001
text: [Godspeed Knight] Guardian Jericho's skill can inflict great damage on its own to a single enemy when used at the right moment.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1195001
text: [Reincarnation of Revenge] Fairy Helbram has a skill which disables an enemy to petrify them and another skill which depletes an enemy's ultimate move gauge.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1195002
text: [Forest Guardian] Fairy Helbram's buff skill is most effective when teamed up with heroes with strong attack skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1195003
text: [Royalty] Fairy Helbram can stay alive for a long time in battle on his own with his recovery skill and lifesteal skill.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1203001
text: [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Member Allioni's stance skill taunts an enemy and decreases the amount of damage taken when attacked.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1213001
text: [Confirmation] Apprentice Holy Knight Twigo's skills don't have additional effects, but they deal a lot of damage.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1223001
text: [Weird Fangs] Holy Knight Golgius is most effective when teamed up with heroes with debuff effects.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1233001
text: [Weird Fangs] Holy Knight Ruin is useful in battles against enemies with buff effects and high attack stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1243001
text: [Weird Fangs] Holy Knight Jude's skill, which removes buff effects, is a source of fear for enemies with buff skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1254001
text: [Weird Fangs] Holy Knight Freesia's skill, which increases all enemies' damage taken, makes heroes with attack skills more effective.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1264001
text: [Burning Ember] Knight of Danafor Cain's skills all have igniting effects and can be continuously stacked.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1273001
text: [Boom Boom Pow] Holy Knight Marmas disables all enemies' buff and debuff skills, disrupting their skill use management.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1284001
text: [Knight of Ice] Holy Knight Gustav has a skill which makes an enemy's recovery skill unusable and is very useful against enemies who have a recovery skill.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1294001
text: [Roars of Dawn] Captain Slater has a nettlesome ability which diminishes attack-related skills while only allowing the use of attack skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1295001
text: "Overpower" Hunter Slater has a skill that is effective against enemies with stance skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1303001
text: [Roars of Dawn] Holy Knight Simon's skills have a severing effect which is effective when critical damage is increased.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1314001
text: [Roars of Dawn] Holy Knight Weinheidt has a skill which disables an enemy's stance skill and attack skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1323001
text: [Roars of Dawn] Holy Knight Hugo's skill is most effective when used against enemies with buff effects or when teaming up with a hero with debuff effects.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1334001
text: [Roars of Dawn] Holy Knight Jillian has a skill which removes stances from all enemies, making her a feared opponent for enemies with stance skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1344001
text: [Reincarnation of Obsession] Mage Vivian has a skill which disables enemies' Ultimate Moves, making her effective at disrupting the enemies' most powerful skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1354001
text: [Omen of Chaos] Druid Hendrickson has a skill which can either remove an enemy's buff effects or recover all allies' HP.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1355001
text: "Melt" Grandmaster Hendrickson has a skill which lifesteals a portion of damage dealt and another skill which ignites an enemy.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1364001
text: [Omen of Chaos] Grandmaster Dreyfus has a skill which infects an enemy to inhibit their recovery-related stats and another skill which diminishes an enemy's attack-related stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1364002
text: "Break" Grandmaster Dreyfus has a skill which disables all enemies' buff and debuff skills and another skill which removes buff effects and stances, making him useful in various situations.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1373001
text: [Vaizel Fight Festival] Champion Taizoo has a skill which increases defense and reflecting a portion of damage received.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1385001
text: [Fairy King's Forest] Guardian Elaine has a skill which interrupts enemies' use of Ultimate Moves.\nShe has a skill which depletes the enemy's Ultimate Move Gauge and another skill which decreases skill ranks and depletes the Ultimate Move Gauge by that amount.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1404001
text: [King of Prophecies] Adventurer Arthur can deal massive damage using a skill with the Detonate effect and disables all enemies' Recovery Skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1405001
text: [Camelot's Sword] New King Arthur has a skill which disables Recovery Skills of all enemies and another skill which removes Debuffs from allies and increases basic stats.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1425002
text: [Reverse] Guardian Hawk & Elizabeth have a skill which changes a hero's Debuffs into Buffs.\nUse this knowledge strategically to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1455001
text: [Doombringer] Lillia has a skill which decreases enemies' Attack-related stats and another skill which increases enemies' damage taken, making her a valuable asset on the battlefield.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1455002
text: [Master of Secrets] Mage Lillia has a skill which decreases all enemies' Ultimate Move Gauges and another skill which heals all allies' HP, making her useful in various situations.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1475001
text: [b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor keeps enemies in check with a skill which decreases enemies' Ultimate Move Gauges and inflicts massive damage on a single enemy using a skill with the Amplify effect.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1475002
text: "Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor has a skill which fills an additional orb in his Ultimate Move Gauge when used and another skill which removes Buffs and Ignites the target.\nHis Ultimate Move inflicts great damage on one enemy.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1505001
text: When [The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b] uses his Ultimate Move, he receives a Buff which greatly increases his basic stats.\nChaining it with a skill with the Amplify effect deals tremendous damage.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1515001
text: [The Ten Commandments] Melascula of [b]Faith[/b] has a skill which inflicts Detonation damage for each orb in the target's Ultimate Move Gauge.\nIt can inflict great damage on enemies with filled Ultimate Move Gauges.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1525001
text: [The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b] can fill up his Ultimate Move Gauge faster than other heroes thanks to a skill which grants an additional orb when used.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1535001
text: [The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b] has a skill which makes one enemy bleed and another skill which applies Attack Disable effects on all enemies, continuously disrupting their flow.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1605001
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deathpierce's Ultimate Move has an effect which decreases all enemies' Attack-related stats, making him effective against enemies that deal great damage.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1614001
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Dogedo has a skill which inflicts damage on one enemy and prevents them from filling up the Ultimate Move Gauge, making him effective at disrupting their timing.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1645001
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Deldry has a skill which applies Taunt on an ally and increases their HP-related stats.\nShe is best paired with heroes with Stance skills or high Defense.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1654001
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Holy Knight Arden has the Break effect which inflict additional damage on enemies who use Stance skills.\nIt's less effective against Stance skills which decrease damage taken but effective against other Stance skills.

name: DB_combine_loading_character_desc_1665001
text: [Earthshaker] Weapon Researcher Valenti has a skill which decreases an enemy's Defense-related stats, allowing the entire team to inflict great damage on the enemy.

name: DB_contents_passive_name_101101
text: Friendship Coin Gain upon sending Friendship Coins {0}% Increase

name: DB_contents_passive_name_101102
text: Free Stage Hero EXP Gain {0}% Increase

name: DB_contents_passive_name_101106
text: [All Areas] Death Match Active Duration {0}-Minute Increase

name: DB_contents_passive_name_101107
text: SP Dungeon (Fort Solgres) Enhancement Dungeon Reward Gauge {0}% Increase

name: DB_fate_monster_desc_6010110
text: The real culprit behind the razing of the\nFairy King's Forest. Killed at the hands of Ban.

name: DB_fate_monster_desc_6010200
text: A Demon ranking higher than the Red Demon.\nIt was used in Hendrickson's research.

name: DB_fate_monster_desc_6010300
text: A Demonic Beast with a violent nature. Its roar strikes terror in the hearts of those who hear it.

name: DB_fate_monster_desc_6010600
text: A Demonic Beast which collects heads while moving at incredible speed with its six legs.

name: DB_hero_desc_1004001
text: He is the tavern master of the Boar Hat.\nHe is also the captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins], pursued by the Holy Knights over a conspiracy to overthrow the kingdom.

name: DB_hero_desc_1005001
text: Meliodas naturally became the captain\nwhen [The Seven Deadly Sins] formed as a group.\nHe was the founder of [The Seven Deadly Sins] after all.

name: DB_hero_desc_1015001
text: Meliodas's demonic powers overwhelm him when he feels immense anger, giving him the title of [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b].

name: DB_hero_desc_1015002
text: He claims to have caused the fall of the Kingdom of Danafor\nbecause he could not control his wrath. What sort of power does he possess\nthat enables him to destroy an entire Kingdom?

name: DB_hero_desc_1024001
text: The two mascots in charge of Boar Hat!\nTogether, they can probably accomplish anything.

name: DB_hero_desc_1024002
text: Elizabeth and Hawk have joined forces!

name: DB_hero_desc_1025002
text: Elizabeth is working together with Hawk and his "Transpork" ability.

name: DB_hero_desc_1034001
text: Elizabeth has joined the Boar Hat.\nSheâ€™s somehow the new face of the tavern.

name: DB_hero_desc_1035001
text: The third princess of the Kingdom of Liones.\nThough unrelated by blood, she is greatly\nloved by her father and sisters.

name: DB_hero_desc_1035002
text: She began searching all of Britannia for [The Seven Deadly Sins] in order to stop the tyranny of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_hero_desc_1044001
text: Diane draws her immense strength from the earth with her connection to nature.\nPeople witnessing her harness the power of the earth gave her a title,\nHeart of the Land.

name: DB_hero_desc_1045001
text: A Giant and one of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. She was branded [b]The Serpent Sin of Envy[/b] when her jealousy led to the death of a friend.

name: DB_hero_desc_1045002
text: Diane hid in the Forest of White Dreams when she became a wanted criminal.\nTogether with Meliodas, who came to find her,\nDiane sets off on a journey to find her scattered comrades.

name: DB_hero_desc_1055001
text: A mysterious warrior-woman who suddenly appeared in Vaizel.\nShe turned out to be a shrunken Diane.

name: DB_hero_desc_1055002
text: Diane does not find it difficult to learn new martial arts as she is incredibly athletic.

name: DB_hero_desc_1055003
text: Diane possesses the power of "Creation." She exhibits immense strength with her fists even when she doesn't have her Sacred Treasure, Gideon.

name: DB_hero_desc_1064001
text: The man who refused to die after countless executions.\nHe came to be called Undead Ban.

name: DB_hero_desc_1065001
text: Ban grew up in a rough environment.\nAll he has are his two fists, but that\ndoes not make him an easy opponent.

name: DB_hero_desc_1065002
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins]\nwho takes down his opponents with\nfast movement and even faster strikes.

name: DB_hero_desc_1075001
text: Ban has a habit of collecting the labels of different ales in a book after he gives a concise review.\nOne could say he's a true ale collector.

name: DB_hero_desc_1075002
text: He was branded as [b]The Fox Sin of Greed[/b]\nafter murdering the saint guarding the Fountain of Youth\nand stealing the power.

name: DB_hero_desc_1075003
text: Drinking from the Fountain of Youth gave him immortality,\nbut he became a wandering nomad, unable to settle down in one place.

name: DB_hero_desc_1095001
text: He was once the Fairy King. He served as a Holy Knight of\nthe Kingdom of Liones after he was branded [b]The Grizzly Sin of Sloth[/b].

name: DB_hero_desc_1095002
text: The Fairy King's Forest is north of Britannia and contains\nthe Sacred Tree and the Fountain of Youth. The guardian of this place is King, the Fairy King.

name: DB_hero_desc_1095003
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins] who has a crush on Diane. He feels strangely competitive against Howzer whom also has similar feelings for Diane.

name: DB_hero_desc_1105001
text: Everyone complains about his smell when King changes his appearance\nto that of a middle-aged man. However, King himself believes that\nhis older look is the one that fits him best.

name: DB_hero_desc_1105002
text: He can accelerate his opponent's status for various purposes\nusing his power, "Disaster." However, his\nappearance makes the power seem less cool.

name: DB_hero_desc_1105003
text: King came to be called the Protector of Dolls after he returned\nthe dolls Ban stole from the children of the capital to their\nrightful owners during the night.

name: DB_hero_desc_1114001
text: Gowther changed his appearance in order to lose the Holy Knights\nin pursuit, but could not give up his\ntrademark glasses. In truth, he's quite blind without them.

name: DB_hero_desc_1115002
text: He became [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] after causing the death of a royal with his maddening lust. Strangely, no human emotion can be detected from him.

name: DB_hero_desc_1115003
text: He used to be a criminal in the past, but is now heralded as the hero of Liones. But none of that really matters to Gowther.

name: DB_hero_desc_1135001
text: Merlin desires all the knowledge in the world.\nIn order to achieve her goal,\nshe collects interesting research subjects.

name: DB_hero_desc_1135002
text: No amount of research provides everything.\nMerlin is always hungry for knowledge.

name: DB_hero_desc_1135003
text: The greatest mage in Liones.\nShe has the ability to make magic persist forever\nwith her power, "Infinity."

name: DB_hero_desc_1144001
text: The son of the first Grandmaster of the Holy Knights.\nHe possesses both the skills and blood relations necessary to be the kingdom's rising star.

name: DB_hero_desc_1144002
text: Gilthunder was taught the Knight's Code in his youth under\nMeliodas's guidance. He has not forgotten\nwhat he was taught.

name: DB_hero_desc_1145001
text: Gilthunder came to be called the Lightning King due to his\nmagical power of "Thunderbolt." He is a terrifying presence to enemies,\nbut a dependable guardian to his allies.

name: DB_hero_desc_1154002
text: She became a Holy Knight to protect her little brother,\nZeal, and to find the whereabouts of her father, Holy Knight Dale.

name: DB_hero_desc_1155001
text: Guila always has a smile on her face.\nHer power of "Explosion"\nis self-explanatory.

name: DB_hero_desc_1164001
text: Howzer maintains his loyalty even when numerous Holy Knights have defected. Everyone deems him trustworthy.

name: DB_hero_desc_1164002
text: Howzer may look easy-going, but he possesses every quality needed by a Holy Knight. Those who fight with him trust and follow him.

name: DB_hero_desc_1165001
text: A Holy Knight of Liones who uses the power\nof the wind. He's somewhat aggressive, but has the\nchivalrous mindset of helping the weak.

name: DB_hero_desc_1174001
text: Griamore swore his loyalty to Princess Veronica instead of the royal family.

name: DB_hero_desc_1174002
text: Veronica likes being on the move. Griamore prefers wearing loose-fitting clothes so he can always chase after her whenever she moves.

name: DB_hero_desc_1175001
text: His determination to protect Princess Veronica is as strong\nas his ability, "Wall." His endless training and experience\nled him to be the the Iron Wall Knight.

name: DB_hero_desc_1184001
text: Her inferiority complex stemming from her brother led her to make the wrong decision. Jericho drank the blood of a demon and gained the power she always wanted.

name: DB_hero_desc_1184002
text: One man gets on her nerves. Curious about what he does\nand where he's going, Jericho is prepared to follow him\nand endure all hardships.

name: DB_hero_desc_1185001
text: Jericho is skilled in the art of confusing her enemies\nand swiftly striking their weak points.

name: DB_hero_desc_1195001
text: The one behind the human massacres which stemmed from\nhis hatred for humanity. He used worry others long ago\nwhen he loved humans dearly.

name: DB_hero_desc_1195002
text: Helbram the Fairy has an open mind,\nprotects the forest, and is a friend to all humans.\nHe is infatuated with humans since they are quite unlike his fellow Fairies.

name: DB_hero_desc_1195003
text: Helbram received an outfit as a gift for protecting a noblewoman in danger.

name: DB_hero_desc_1203001
text: A member of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat], hailing from Cain's village.\nHe witnessed the gruesome scene firsthand 10 years ago.

name: DB_hero_desc_1213001
text: An Apprentice Holy Knight with a mustache.\nHis hobby is confirming things.

name: DB_hero_desc_1223001
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison.\nHe uses his power of "Invisibility" to trick his opponents.

name: DB_hero_desc_1233001
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison.\nHe is skilled at hypnotically confusing his enemies.

name: DB_hero_desc_1243001
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison.\nHe was Ban's longtime torturer.

name: DB_hero_desc_1254001
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison.\nShe uses poisonous insects she has bred as weapons.

name: DB_hero_desc_1264001
text: A knight of Danafor who can control\nthe power of fire. He used to be called Barzard the Flame\nwhen he was a Holy Knight. He always wore a suit of armor.

name: DB_hero_desc_1273001
text: A Holy Knight with funny-looking armor.\nDespite his appearance, he is a fairly skilled Holy Knight\nwho manipulates gravity to neutralize even the fastest opponents.

name: DB_hero_desc_1284001
text: A Holy Knight of Liones who uses the power of "Ice Fang."\nHe is the brother of the New Generation Knight, Jericho.

name: DB_hero_desc_1294001
text: Captain of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king.\nHe has the utmost loyalty to the king.

name: DB_hero_desc_1295001
text: Slater can take down opponents easily with his ability, "Overpower." He does not abuse his power unless he is facing an incredibly tough opponent.

name: DB_hero_desc_1295002
text: The captain of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. He always wears a mask during missions.

name: DB_hero_desc_1303001
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king.\nHis sword is bigger than he is.

name: DB_hero_desc_1314001
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king.\nHe is a skilled bowman who can hit targets accurately from afar.

name: DB_hero_desc_1323001
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king.\nHis weapon is an axe.

name: DB_hero_desc_1334001
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king.\nShe is the only female Holy Knight of the group and uses a sword as her weapon.

name: DB_hero_desc_1344001
text: The best mage in the Kingdom of Liones.\nShe claims she loves Gilthunder, but her actions\nresemble the behavior of an obsessed person.

name: DB_hero_desc_1354001
text: He used to be a druid who worshipped nature and goddesses. He now accepts the power of demons, shaming his legacy.

name: DB_hero_desc_1355001
text: Grandmaster of the Holy Knights of Liones.\nHe obtained the power to truly influence the kingdom along with Dreyfus.

name: DB_hero_desc_1364001
text: The second Grandmaster of the Holy Knights of Liones alongside Hendrickson.\nHe obtained power in the kingdom and is busy preparing for the Holy War, but his true intentions are unclear.

name: DB_hero_desc_1364002
text: Dreyfus is old-fashioned and a workaholic, but sometimes\nleaves the castle when he needs a break.

name: DB_hero_desc_1373001
text: The three-time defending champion of the Vaizel Fight Festival.\nHe takes great pride in the event.

name: DB_hero_desc_1384001
text: The saint guarding the Forest of the Fairy King.

name: DB_hero_desc_1385001
text: She protects the Fairy King's Forest in place of her brother who left 700 years ago. She is the saint heard to be guarding the Fountain of Youth.

name: DB_hero_desc_1395001
text: Meliodas clothing reveals how much time has actually passed. One person claims to have seen him having a drink looking exactly the same a long time ago.

name: DB_hero_desc_1395002
text: Meliodas cleared his name and became the hero of the kingdom.\nHe is wearing the clothes Elizabeth gave him as a gift.

name: DB_hero_desc_1404001
text: Arthur appeared one day and pulled out the sword no one else could. The people began to tell the stories of the new, foretold king of Camelot.

name: DB_hero_desc_1404002
text: A young king who does not fear hardship in order to surpass his limits.\nHe is Arthur, the new king of Camelot.

name: DB_hero_desc_1405001
text: The king rumored to have removed the sword which no Holy Knight could.\nHe is the new king of Camelot.

name: DB_hero_desc_1425002
text: The kind Elizabeth and playful Hawk\nshow completely different sides\nwhen their friends are in danger.

name: DB_hero_desc_1455001
text: She was once an apprentice mage under Merlin.\nShe is skilled at making a getaway and has the ability to summon things from other dimensions.

name: DB_hero_desc_1455002
text: Lillia has revealed her darkness within. The fact that she wants to destroy this world might indicate a slight problem in her nature.

name: DB_hero_desc_1475001
text: Escanor becomes immensely powerful and unrivaled at noon, making him arrogant and prideful as well. That is why his title is [b]The Lion Sin of Wrath[/b].

name: DB_hero_desc_1475002
text: Escanor gains more and more power as midday approaches. This is because he wields the power of "Sunshine."

name: DB_hero_desc_1505001
text: A Demon associated with [The Ten Commandments], a group under the direct orders of the Demon King. He is bestowed with the commandment of [b]Truth[/b], a power which turns anyone who tells a lie in his presence to stone.

name: DB_hero_desc_1515001
text: A Demon of [The Ten Commandments], a group under the direct orders of the Demon King. She is bestowed with the commandment of [b]Faith[/b], a power which sets the eyes ablaze of those who show faithlessness in her presence.

name: DB_hero_desc_1525001
text: A Demon of [The Ten Commandments], a group under the direct orders of the Demon King. He is bestowed with the commandment of [b]Reticence[/b] and is always seen next to Derieri of [b]Purity[/b].

name: DB_hero_desc_1535001
text: A Demon of [The Ten Commandments], a group under the direct orders of the Demon King. He is bestowed with the commandment of [b]Repose[/b]. Though he was the first Fairy King, he is now with [The Ten Commandments] for reasons unknown.

name: DB_hero_desc_1585001
text: A Demon of [The Ten Commandments], a group under the direct orders of the Demon King. He is bestowed with the commandment of [b]Love[/b]. He is a skilled member of [The Ten Commandments] who looks like the person in Meliodas's wanted poster.

name: DB_hero_desc_1605001
text: A member of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] led by Denzel, the younger brother of King Bartra. He possesses the magical power of "Melody." He can freely control the ebb and flow of magic.

name: DB_hero_desc_1614001
text: A member of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] led by Denzel, the younger brother of King Bartra. He possesses the magical power of "Boost." He's always confident in his abilities and always steps up to the plate.

name: DB_hero_desc_1625001
text: The captain of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] and the younger brother of King Bartra. He is an incorruptible man who fully devoted to his duty of protecting Liones and aiding Bartra.

name: DB_hero_desc_1634001
text: A member of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] led by Denzel, the younger brother of King Bartra. He possesses the magical power of "Hustle." He constantly professes his love for Deldry.

name: DB_hero_desc_1645001
text: A member of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] led by Denzel, the younger brother of King Bartra. She possesses the magical power of "Love Drive." She succeeds in capturing Dreyfus with her magical power.

name: DB_hero_desc_1654001
text: A member of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] led by Denzel, the younger brother of King Bartra. He possesses the magical power of "Vain." He has a love-hate relationship with Deldry.

name: DB_hero_desc_1665001
text: A brilliant scientist who was stuck in endless research in another world before she agreed to be summoned by Lillia. She, too, wants to see the world end.

name: DB_hero_group_name_1015001
text: [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b] Demon Meliodas

name: DB_monster_desc_2010201
text: Diane draws her immense strength from the earth with her connection to nature. People witnessing her harness the power of the earth gave her a title, Heart of the Land.

name: DB_monster_desc_2010301
text: A member of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat]. He wants to capture [The Seven Deadly Sins] to make a name for himself.

name: DB_monster_desc_2010302
text: An Apprentice Holy Knight who can cut through mountains with his swordsmanship. His catchphrase is "Confirmed!" and likes to jump to conclusions.

name: DB_monster_desc_2010303
text: Twigo coincidentally met Meliodas, [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b]. He went berserk with the sole objective of arresting Meliodas.

name: DB_monster_desc_2010304
text: A Holy Knight whose ability can manipulate thunderclouds. Though he respected Meliodas in his youth, Gilthunder now points his sword in Meliodas's direction.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020201
text: Something is strange with Diane. She seems to be mistaking her allies for enemies.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020301
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. He uses his power of "Invisibility" to trick his opponents.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020302
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. She uses poisonous insects sheâ€™s bred as weapons.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020303
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. He is skilled at hypnotically confusing his enemies.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020305
text: A guard working at Baste Prison. She tries to act like a tough man, but her skills have not yet been acknowledged.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020306
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins] locked up in Baste Prison. No amount of torture will kill him as he is immortal.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020307
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. He is skilled at hypnotically confusing his enemies.

name: DB_monster_desc_2020308
text: A guard working at Baste Prison. She tries to act like a tough man, but her skills have not yet been acknowledged.

text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. He uses his power of "Invisibility" to trick his opponents.

name: DB_monster_desc_2030301
text: She used to be an average Apprentice Holy Knight until she gained a tremendous power like other New Generation knights undergoing a certain process.

name: DB_monster_desc_2030302
text: She used to be an average Apprentice Holy Knight until she gained a tremendous power like other New Generation knights undergoing a certain process.

name: DB_monster_desc_2030401
text: He was branded as [b]The Grizzly Sin of Sloth[/b] for failing to notice one Fairy's long-term massacres against humans and letting the incidents play out.

name: DB_monster_desc_2030402
text: He was branded as [b]The Grizzly Sin of Sloth[/b] for failing to notice one Fairy's long-term massacres against humans and letting the incidents play out.

name: DB_monster_desc_2030403
text: He was branded as [b]The Grizzly Sin of Sloth[/b] for failing to notice one Fairy's long-term massacres against humans and letting the incidents play out.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040101
text: Meliodas has broken free from the Goddess Amber. The power of the Demons within has gone berserk and have turned Meliodas into someone entirely different.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040202
text: Diane has borrowed Elizabeth's tavern clothes and signed up for the Vaizel Fight Festival. Sheâ€™s somehow shrunk to human size, but her Giant strength has not.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040203
text: A mysterious woman wearing a Boar Hat uniform. She is so strong that it's strange how her name doesn't ring any bells.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040301
text: A merchant who used to be a mountain bandit. Heâ€™s won the fight festival three years running and has great pride in the event.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040302
text: A Holy Knight who swore his allegiance to Princess Veronica. He hid his identity as a Holy Knight and signed up for the fight festival in order to find the missing Elizabeth.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040303
text: An old man who looks like he's had a few drinks. Despite how he may look, it feels like he would make a formidable fighter.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040305
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. He signed up to the fight as "Vaan," but theres no fooling anyone that he's Ban of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_monster_desc_2040306
text: A Holy Knight who especially likes the fight festival. He sports a dashing regent's hairstyle. It took a lot to get to the festival, so he seems prepared to enjoy it to the fullest.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040307
text: A Holy Knight who shakes his maracas to exhibit immense power. He hates being called a roly poly.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040308
text: A New Generation Holy Knight who gained immense power by drinking the blood of a Demon.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040309
text: A New Generation Holy Knight who gained immense power by drinking the blood of a Demon.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040310
text: A Holy Knight who especially likes the fight festival. He sports a dashing regent's hairstyle. It took a lot to get to the festival, so he seems prepared to enjoy it to the fullest.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040311
text: He can create an impenetrable barrier with his power, "Wall." He firmly believes his barrier is as impenetrable as his principles.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040312
text: A New Generation Holy Knight who gained immense power by drinking the blood of a Demon.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040313
text: A New Generation Holy Knight who gained immense power by drinking the blood of a Demon.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040401
text: A suspicious Cardinal whose intentions are unknown. He seems to have some sort of history with King.

name: DB_monster_desc_2040402
text: A suspicious Cardinal whose intentions are unknown. He is deeply angry with King as if they have some sort of history.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050102
text: A man who used to be a Holy Knight. He turned into a gruesome figure due to Hendrickson's experiments. A mutant in pain, he met Gowther and momentarily found peace.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050103
text: A man who used to be a Holy Knight. He turned into a gruesome figure due to Hendrickson's experiments. A mutant in pain, he met Gowther and momentarily found peace.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050104
text: Dale is in pain because Gowther's broken armor could not contain the demonic power. It doesn't look like he can be pacified anymore.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050301
text: Captain of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. He has the utmost loyalty to the king.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050302
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. She looks graceful even in battle.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050303
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. His sword is bigger than he is.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050304
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn] covered in durable armor. He is prepared to give up a limb if it means the battle can be won.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050305
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. His marksmanship is a sight to behold.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050306
text: Captain of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. He has the utmost loyalty to the king.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050307
text: A Holy Knight of Danafor who can control the power of fire. He seems to want to challenge Meliodas.

name: DB_monster_desc_2050308
text: Someone important to Meliodas. She requested that Meliodas take her thoughtfully prepared sword if she were to win in a duel against him.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060101
text: She gained immense strength by drinking the blood of a Demon, but went berserk due to Hendrickson's power.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060102
text: Hendrickson has finally shown his true self after many dangerous situations. He is beginning to show the incredible power of the Demons.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060103
text: Hendrickson gained an incredible power after obtaining the blood of a Demon. He believes no one could possibly defeat him now.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060104
text: Hendrickson has become a full-fledged Demon after acquiring the blood of a Gray Demon. There are no traces of humanity left in him.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060105
text: Hendrickson has finally shown his true self after many dangerous situations. He is beginning to show the incredible power of the Demons.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060301
text: She is a Holy Knight like her brother Gustav to whom she feels a strong sense of inferiority. She is trying to become stronger than he is by becoming a high-ranking Holy Knight.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060303
text: Howzer uses "Tempest" to conjure fierce winds and sweeps away enemies on the battlefield in an instant. He may not be a Diamond rank Holy Knight, but no one in Liones doubts his outstanding skills.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060304
text: A Holy Knight of Liones who uses the power "Thunderbolt." He is the son of the former Grandmaster of the Holy Knights, Zaratras.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060305
text: The second Grandmaster of the Holy Knights of Liones alongside Hendrickson. He obtained power in the kingdom and is busy preparing for the Holy War, but his true intentions are unclear.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060307
text: The Royal Mage who is in love with the Holy Knight of Liones, Gilthunder. The problem lies in the fact that her love has become more of an obsession.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060308
text: He will do anything necessary in order to resurrect Elaine, his love. Even if it means betraying his only friend.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060309
text: He is Grandmaster of the Holy Knights alongside Dreyfus. His power is "Melt."

name: DB_monster_desc_2060313
text: A Holy Knight of Liones. After observing [The Seven Deadly Sins] - and especially Diane - at the Vaizel Fight Festival, he begins to question the reason he needs to fight them.

name: DB_monster_desc_2060314
text: The second Grandmaster of the Holy Knights of Liones alongside Hendrickson. He obtained power in the kingdom and is busy preparing for the Holy War, but his true intentions are unclear.

text: Gowther has done something he shouldn't have while trying to learn human emotions. It seems like he is unable to stop it himself.

text: A member of the [Pleiades of the Azure Sky] who takes great pride in his skills.

name: DB_monster_desc_2065302
text: Howzer wants Diane to notice him one way or another. He seems to want to dazzle her with this opportunity.

text: Ban has waited for the promise he made with Meliodas. Uncharacteristically sincere, he wants to settle the matter once and for all with this fight.

text: A type of Golem. They are weapons created by the Demons in a war during ancient times.

name: DB_monster_desc_2070103

name: DB_monster_desc_2070106
text: A creepy Demon who ranks higher than Red Demons. It uses techniques that manipulate the power of death.

name: DB_monster_desc_2070107
text: Gowther has erased Diane's memories. He doesn't seem the least bit regretful.

text: A Giant who came to be called the "Great Trembling Mountain." He was hired by humans for his strength.

name: DB_monster_desc_2070202
text: A Giant Warrior Chief who came to be called the "Fang of the Land." She was hired by humans for her strength.

name: DB_monster_desc_2070203
text: Diane has forgotten everyone except Meliodas. Just like when they met in the Forest of White Dreams, Diane becomes furious when she sees Elizabeth next to Meliodas.

name: DB_monster_desc_2070301
text: A Fairy who served generations of Fairy Kings. She can't stand the fact that others started calling Ban the Fairy King.

name: DB_monster_desc_2070401
text: A Holy Knight of Liones. He prioritizes making a name for himself instead of faithfully carrying out his duties.

name: DB_monster_desc_2080101
text: One of [The Ten Commandments] bestowed with the commandment of [b]Truth[/b].\nThose who tell a lie in his presence turn to stone.

name: DB_monster_desc_2080103
text: An evil spirit which suddenly appears out of nowhere to take the souls of the living.\nIt is unknown whether it really takes souls away.

name: DB_monster_desc_2080301
text: The leader of the Druids who are known as the sages of the forest who worship Goddesses. She protects the holy shrine of the Druids with her older sister Jenna.

name: DB_monster_desc_2080302
text: The leader of the Druids who are known as the sages of the forest who worship Goddesses. She protects the holy shrine of the Druids with her younger sister Zaneri.

name: DB_monster_desc_2080303
text: Theo is the dependable guardian priest protecting the leader of the Druids. He just turned 15 and enjoys taking naps.

name: DB_monster_desc_2080304
text: A man who used to be a Grandmaster of the Holy Knights of Liones along with Dreyfus.

name: DB_monster_desc_2080402
text: Elaine has been revived by Melascula's spell. Resentment and anger has distorted even her feelings for Ban.

name: DB_monster_desc_2190107
text: Lillia has gained an incredible power by using Orc Disaster. She can now summon a giant storm strong enough to end the world.

name: DB_monster_desc_2190301
text: She was an apprentice to Merlin long ago. She desires to see the world end, researching a way to summon a giant storm to that end.

name: DB_monster_desc_2210101
text: A knight who was infamous for his viciousness. He tortures and exploits other souls in search of his disembodied head.

name: DB_monster_desc_2220201
text: A knight with an enormous physique incomparable to those of regular folk. The power stemming from his size surpasses most weapons.

name: DB_monster_desc_2230303
text: A knight who has reached his ultimate form. It seems no one can survive his sharp and heavy attacks.

name: DB_monster_desc_2240402
text: A Fairy who has been alive for an incomprehensible amount of time. The knowledge she acquired through the ages has become a powerful ability.

name: DB_monster_desc_2250501
text: A dragon famous for its ferocity even among the wild dragons. It goes on a rampage capable of destroying everything in the vicinity when angered.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260101
text: A low-ranking Demon. It suddenly appeared and destroyed the Fairy King's Forest in the past.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260102
text: It is a fearsome entity to human beings, but is low-ranking among other Demons.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260103
text: A low-ranking Demon which is difficult to defeat due to its high defense. It attacks beings other than Demons with its destructive instincts.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260104
text: Though a low-ranking Demon, it possesses incredible power. It reigns as a fearsome entity to humans who have never witnessed a Demon in person.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260106
text: A creepy Demon who ranks higher than Red Demons. It uses techniques that manipulate the power of death.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260111
text: A blue-colored Demon that resembles a bird. It may be easy to take down when alone, but becomes stronger when joined by others.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260116
text: A Demonic Beast which moves quickly on six legs and collects human heads. One should not let down their guard because they are out of the scythes' reach. The demonic beast's poison spreads quickly and melts flesh in the blink of an eye.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260121
text: A middle-ranking demonic beast resembling a heavy, destructive animal. Many lives are often sacrificed when attempting to capture one.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260126
text: The black markings covering its body are the healed injuries from thousands of battles. Coming close to dying hundreds of times, the surviving Demonic Beast has become an entity that makes other races fear death.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260141
text: A Demonic Beast of darkness which exists beyond this dimension. Its roar strikes terror in the hearts of those who hear it. The beast, born of the dark abyss, desperately wants the world to be filled with darkness and agony.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260142
text: A Demonic Beast of darkness which exists beyond this dimension. Its roar strikes terror in the hearts of those who hear it. The beast, born of the dark abyss, desperately wants the world to be filled with darkness and agony.

name: DB_monster_desc_2260191
text: A raging demonic beast which exists in a different dimension. It displays great power by swinging its giant claws. Born of darkness, this demonic beast only yearns to chop and slash everything in its sight.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310106
text: Hendrickson gained an incredible power after obtaining the blood of a Demon. He believes he is the strongest person in the kingdom.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310107
text: Hendrickson gained an incredible power after obtaining the blood of a Demon. He believes he is the strongest person in the kingdom.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310108
text: Hendrickson gained an incredible power after obtaining the blood of a Demon. Having long forgotten his original intentions, he now seems to obsess over gaining more power and authority.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310301
text: Allioni is a member of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] who maintains the areas near Cain's Village, but this Allioni doesn't seem to be the real one.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310302
text: Twigo has a habit of saying "Confirmed!" whenever he speaks, but this Twigo doesn't seem to be the real one.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310304
text: Gilthunder is revered as the greatest Holy Knight in Liones, but this Gilthunder doesn't seem to be the real one.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310305
text: An illusion met in a state of hypnosis. Though an illusion, he uses his power of "Invisibility" to move like he does in reality.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310306
text: An illusion met in a state of hypnosis. The insects controlled by the illusion of Freesia don't feel like they are illusions.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310307
text: An illusion met in a state of hypnosis. What would it feel like to be hypnotized from within a hypnotic state?

name: DB_monster_desc_2310309
text: An apparition cursed to forever wander. Gustav's evil thoughts stemming from his shock over being betrayed by his trusted Holy Knight Grandmasters manifested as a cursed apparition which roams the fields of Liones Castle.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310310
text: An illusion met in a state of hypnosis. Perhaps due to the source's desires, the illusion of Jericho seems to be much stronger than when Ban humiliated her.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310312
text: An illusion met in the Crystal Cave, the border between the world of the living and the dead. It resembles Holy Knight Guila, but it seems stronger than she is.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310313
text: An illusion created by the sand storm. The "Wall" created by the illusion is as tough as the real "Wall."

name: DB_monster_desc_2310314
text: An illusion created by the sand storm. He is stumbling with drunkenness, but he is just as strong as the real Cain.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310316
text: An illusion created by the sand storm. The storm created by the illusion is also powerful.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310319
text: The Mountain God went berserk after being covered in the Armor Giant's blood and turned into [Roars of Dawn] Slater.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310320
text: The Mountain God went berserk after being covered in the Armor Giant's blood and turned into [Roars of Dawn] Jillian.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310321
text: The Mountain God went berserk after being covered in the Armor Giant's blood and turned into [Roars of Dawn] Simon.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310323
text: The Mountain God went berserk after being covered in the Armor Giant's blood and turned into [Roars of Dawn] Weinheidt.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310324
text: An apparition cursed to forever wander. Dreyfus's evil thoughts stemming from the abandonment of his beliefs has manifested as a cursed apparition which roams the fields of Liones Castle.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310325
text: An apparition cursed to forever wander. Vivian's evil thoughts stemming from her obsession over Gilthunder has manifested as a cursed apparition which roams the fields of Liones Castle.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310326
text: An illusion created by the sand storm. It seems to be created from Taizoo's grief of having his 4th consecutive championship title taken away by [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_monster_desc_2310401
text: Elizabeth and Hawk were always close, but now they seem closer than ever. Why does it feel like they aren't real?

name: DB_monster_desc_2310406
text: An illusion met in the Crystal Cave, the border between the world of the living and the dead. Though an illusion, it harbors strong animosity towards King for some reason.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310407
text: An illusion met in the Crystal Cave, the border between the world of the living and the dead. Though an illusion, it seems obsessed and angry with Ban.

name: DB_monster_desc_2310408
text: An illusion met in the Crystal Cave, the border between the world of the living and the dead. Just like its counterpart, it seems to only want to fight.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320101
text: A being that lives in deserted forests. They get a read on passersby or travelers, changing into what they desire most to lure them in.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320102
text: A being that lives in deserted forests. They get a read on passersby or travelers, showing them illusions of what they desire most to lure them in.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320103
text: A soul, tethered to the world of the living by resentment. It will never make it to the other world if this resentment goes unresolved.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320104
text: A soul that was hurt too many times while it was alive. It now possesses a power that will prevent it from being hurt.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320105
text: A weeping soul that wanders the land of the living, never at rest because of the despair it felt at death. It will never make it to the other world if this resentment goes unresolved.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320106
text: A lamenting soul that wanders the lands, plunged in sadness. The depth and intensity of this sadness cannot be understood by the living.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320107
text: A weeping soul that wanders the land of the living, never at rest because of the despair it felt at death. It will never make it to the other world if this resentment goes unresolved.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320108
text: A lamenting soul that wanders the lands, plunged in sadness. The depth and intensity of this sadness cannot be understood by the living.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320201

name: DB_monster_desc_2320202

name: DB_monster_desc_2320203

name: DB_monster_desc_2320204

name: DB_monster_desc_2320301
text: Howzer is one of the three who are responsible for the safety of Liones. His storms are always fierce.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320302
text: Gilthunder is one of the three who are responsible for the safety of Liones. His lightning pursues his enemies unto their end.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320303
text: Griamore is one of the three who are responsible for the safety of Liones. His barriers reliably protect his allies.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320304
text: Guila deeply cares for her little brother. Her fire blaze burns for someone very important.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320305
text: Jericho wants her crush to like her back. Her attacks are almost invisible to the naked eye.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320306
text: Diane is helping out at the tavern. The rudest customers become gentle as a lamb when shes' around.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320307
text: Elizabeth is helping out at the tavern. It's always nice to see her working hard.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320308
text: Gowther is helping out at the tavern. He seems to have taken a liking to the tavern uniform.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320309
text: Ban cannot be killed by any attack. Finding a way to kill him seems to be a tall order.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320310
text: Helbram is trying to teach Hawk how to fly. He secretly thinks it's impossible.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320311
text: King is trying to teach Hawk how to fly. He is concerned by the fact that he never grew wings.

name: DB_monster_desc_2320312

name: DB_monster_desc_2330103

name: DB_monster_desc_2330401
text: King of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. He seems to be bothered by the girl who appeared next to Lillia.

name: DB_monster_desc_2340201
text: A being created from magic seeping through a giant boulder. Though most golems are said to have masters, this particular one does not.

name: DB_monster_desc_2340202
text: A being created from magic seeping through a giant crystal. Though most golems are said to have masters, this particular one does not.

text: Diane of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. She came to Bellatona Plateau to investigate the events that took place at the request of the Bellatina.

name: DB_monster_desc_2340301
text: Merlin of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. She came to Bellatona Plateau to investigate the events that took place at the request of the Bellatina.

text: A young Bellato boy that plays the mandolin. He is troubled by Valenti's unreasonable request.

name: DB_monster_desc_2340402
text: An elderly Bellato who plays the flute. They are troubled by Valenti's unreasonable request.

name: DB_monster_desc_2340403
text: An elderly Bellato who plays the drums. They are troubled by Valenti's unreasonable request.

name: DB_monster_desc_2340404

name: DB_monster_desc_2340405
text: King of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. He came to Bellatona Plateau to investigate the events that took place at the request of the Bellatina.

text: A strange, shapeshifting matter found in the Temple of Belenus has taken on Gowther's form. Take down this "Gowther" and prove your strength yet again.

text: A Werebear Shaman who has the ability to turn into a bear. They can use spells different from those of humans.

name: DB_monster_desc_2350202
text: A Werebear Hunter who has the ability to turn into a bear. They are in charge of protecting their territory as well as hunting for the tribe.

text: A mysterious being created by King's Final Boss.

text: A mysterious being created by King's Final Boss.

name: DB_monster_desc_2350407
text: A mysterious being created by King's Final Boss.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410101
text: He is the tavern master of the Boar Hat. He was the captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins] and is pursued by the knights for his conspiracy to overthrow the kingdom 10 years ago.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410102
text: A different Meliodas who appeared in his own nightmare. His appearance and personality are different from those of the real Meliodas.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410103
text: He used to be a criminal in the past, but is now heralded as the hero of Liones. But none of that really matters to Gowther.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410104
text: The Demon within Meliodas went berserk at a critical moment. He is completely different from his normal self.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410105
text: Galland of [b]Truth[/b] of the [Ten Commandments]. Anyone who tells a lie in his presence turns to stone.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410205
text: Diane draws her immense strength from the earth with her connection to nature. People witnessing her harness the power of the earth gave her a title, Heart of the Land.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410206
text: Diane doesn't agree with Hawk's statement that Elizabeth would never get angry under any circumstances. She is now trying to make Elizabeth angry any way she can.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410207
text: A member of [The Ten Commandments] who is preparing for the Great Fight Festival with Gloxinia.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410302
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. He was Ban's longtime torturer.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410303
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. He is skilled at hypnotically confusing his enemies.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410304
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. He uses his power of "Invisibility" to trick his opponents.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410306
text: Howzer uses his magical power of "Tempest" to conjure fierce winds and sweeps away enemies on the battlefield in an instant. For now, he is merely a participant in a match against his friend Griamore.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410307
text: He can create an impenetrable barrier with his power, "Wall." He firmly believes his barrier is as impenetrable as his principles.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410308
text: A Holy Knight who shakes his maracas to exhibit immense power. He hates being called a roly poly.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410310
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn] covered in durable armor. He is prepared to give up a limb if it means the battle can be won.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410316
text: A Holy Knight of Liones who uses the power "Thunderbolt." He is the son of the former Grandmaster of the Holy Knights, Zaratras.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410317
text: A member of the [Weird Fangs] who maintains Baste Prison. She uses poisonous insects sheâ€™s bred as weapons.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410318
text: A guard working at Baste Prison. She acts tough like a man, but her skills have not yet been acknowledged.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410319
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. He came to be called [b]The Fox Sin of Greed[/b].

name: DB_monster_desc_2410321
text: An old man who looks like he's had a few drinks. Despite how he may look, it somehow feels like he would make a formidable fighter.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410324
text: Captain of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. He has the utmost loyalty to the king.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410325
text: A member of the [Roars of Dawn], a group directly attached to the king. His sword is bigger than he is.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410327
text: A Diamond rank Holy Knight, the highest rank. However, he does not take pride in his skills and always trains to improve his techniques.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410328
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins] who uses the power of "Snatch." He may seem simple and selfish, but his inner thoughts are complex and unknowable.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410329
text: He is Grandmaster of the Holy Knights alongside Dreyfus. His power is "Melt."

name: DB_monster_desc_2410332
text: Merlin is the greatest mage in all of Britannia. One must be determined in order to become her apprentice.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410334
text: A Holy Knight of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky]. He brought up the events at the medal bestowment ceremony and got in a fight with Dogedo.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410335
text: A Holy Knight of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky]. He brought up the events at the medal bestowment ceremony and got in a fight with Dogedo.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410336
text: She was an apprentice to Merlin in the past. She desires to see the world end, so she looks for allies who will join her cause.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410337
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. He came to be called [b]The Fox Sin of Greed[/b].

name: DB_monster_desc_2410338
text: Howzer may look easy-going, but he possesses every quality needed by a Holy Knight.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410401
text: No matter what anyone says, the best mascots for the Boar Hat are Elizabeth and Hawk, by far!

name: DB_monster_desc_2410402
text: A suspicious Cardinal whose intentions are unknown. He is deeply angry with King as if they have some sort of history.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410405
text: A member of [The Seven Deadly Sins] who has a crush on Diane. He feels strangely competitive against Howzer whom also has similar feelings for Diane.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510301
text: A member of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] who has much more to learn.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510302
text: A member of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] who has much more to learn.

text: A member of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] who has much more to learn.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510305
text: A forest ranger who oversees the mountains near Vanya.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510306
text: A simple and honest forest ranger who believes anything Captain Dillon says. He takes care of two wolves named Jack and Finn.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510307
text: The leader of the forest rangers who wishes to attain a higher title by winning Captain Dillon's favor.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510308
text: The captain of the forest rangers who takes care of his wolf, Anabelle. He colludes with the knights in the area and commits vile acts such as extorting money from travelers and herbalists.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510309
text: A timid young man who has a hard time voicing his complaints. He remains silent even regarding the tyranny of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510310
text: A young man enraged by the tyranny of the Holy Knights. His lengthy patience is of no use now.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510311
text: An average village boy who knows how to fight a little.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510312
text: He appears wherever fights breaks out and is gifted when it comes to escalating them.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510313
text: He appears wherever there are fights and booze and never fights fair. He believes fighting dirty is a must in order to win.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510314
text: A soldier stationed in Vanya who uses a sword.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510315
text: A soldier stationed in Vanya who uses a spear.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510316
text: A soldier stationed in Vanya who uses his bare fists.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510317
text: A knight of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] who stepped up to fight against Meliodas and his party in the contest to decide the next captain of the order.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510318
text: A knight of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] who stepped up to fight against Meliodas and his party in the contest to decide the next captain of the order.

text: A member of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] who has much more to learn.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510321

name: DB_monster_desc_2510401
text: A wolf that lives in the plains. Its agility allows it to take down its prey with ease.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510402
text: A wolf that lives in the moor. It runs in a pack.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510403
text: A wild wolf that has not been tamed by humans. It considers humans prey, so it is dangerous to meet one in the wild.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510404
text: A wolf that rose from the dead somehow. Like when it was alive, it is hostile against all living creatures.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510405
text: A wolf with fangs as long and sharp as swords. It has a lot of meat which makes it good for roasting. Its pelt also sells for a pretty penny.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510406
text: A giant wolf that lives in the plains. Its agility allows it to take down its prey with ease.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510407
text: A giant wolf that lives in the moor. It runs in a pack.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510408
text: The male wolf that Forest Ranger Marco keeps as a pet. Extremely vicious but very obedient towards his master.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510409
text: The female wolf that Forest Ranger Marco keeps as a pet. Extremely vicious but very obedient towards her master.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510410
text: Captain Dillon's favorite female wolf. Her plentiful and soft fur is the best thing about her, but that's just Dillon's claim.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510411
text: A Dusk Bison that lives in the plains. A preferred hunt animal due to its high quality meat.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510412
text: A Dusk Bison that lives in the plains. A preferred hunt animal due to its high quality meat.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510413
text: A giant rabbit that lives in grassy forest areas. It tastes great prepared in any manner and the broth rendered from its flesh is famous for promoting healthy skin.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510414
text: They live in groups in deserted forests. They are quick to mimic the appearance or voices of any intruders to scare them away.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510415
text: The fake Hawk from Forest of White Dreams. The differences between the real and fake can't be spotted by the naked eye.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510418
text: A spider that uses its venom to hunt prey. Its venom isn't the strongest, but it does cause a nasty headache.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510419
text: A spider that uses its venom to hunt prey. It possesses powerful venom so care is needed when facing off against it.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510420
text: A giant spider that uses its venom to hunt prey. Do not fear its venom, fear its massive and formidable size.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510421
text: A giant spider that uses its venom to hunt prey. It possesses powerful venom that poses a great threat.

name: DB_monster_desc_2510501
text: A bat that drinks the blood of travelers. It can find prey with precision even in the dark.

name: DB_monster_desc_2520503
text: The insect queen that lays poisonous insect eggs. Insect guards protect her.

name: DB_monster_desc_2520504

name: DB_monster_desc_2520505

text: Lives in deserted forests or ruins because it loves dark places.

name: DB_monster_desc_2520511
text: A giant bat that lives in deserted forests or ruins because it loves dark places.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530101
text: A reanimated corpse. New life has been granted, but its gruesome appearance is a reminder that it will never have its old life back.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530102
text: A mage that summons and controls souls of the dead for their own purposes. It is unclear why they choose to use forbidden magic.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530103
text: A decapitated knight that yearns for his head. Finding it would matter little, however, since he lacks the means to reattach it.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530104
text: A decapitated knight still wearing the black suit of armor he cherished before death. People have come to call him the Dark Skull Knight.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530105
text: A knight who died an unjust death while guarding the Village of Vengeful Spirits. He still wanders the village, with unresolved resentment tethering him to the world of the living.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530106
text: A decapitated knight that started off looking for his own head, but now wanders around the village seeking vengeance upon the living.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530107
text: A being that lives in deserted forests. They get a read on passersby or travelers, changing into what they desire most to lure them in.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530108
text: A being that lives in deserted forests. They get a read on passersby or travelers, showing them illusions of what they desire most to lure them in.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530109
text: The leader of beings that live in deserted forests. They get a read on passersby or travelers, changing into what they desire most to lure them in.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530110
text: The leader of beings that live in deserted forests. They get a read on passersby or travelers, showing them illusions of what they desire most to lure them in.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530111
text: A soul, tethered to the world of the living by resentment. It will never make it to the other world if this resentment goes unresolved.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530112
text: A soul that was hurt too many times while it was alive. It now possesses a power that will prevent it from being hurt.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530113
text: A weeping soul that wanders the land of the living, never at rest because of the despair it felt at death. It will never make it to the other world if this resentment goes unresolved.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530114
text: A lamenting soul that wanders the lands, plunged in sadness. The depth and intensity of this sadness cannot be understood by the living.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530115

name: DB_monster_desc_2530118
text: A soldier who lost their life on the battlefield. Attacks all living things indiscriminately after their mysterious reanimation.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530303

name: DB_monster_desc_2530401
text: A plant so disheartened by its stubby legs that it lashes out. Uses its long arms like whips. Its boiled down roots are good for colds.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530402
text: A cute plant that hops around everywhere. Tends to be loud. Its boiled down roots are good for colds.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530403
text: A lightweight plant that floats around gracefully. It has a terrifying scream that none can withstand.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530404
text: A lightweight plant that floats around gracefully. It screams with rage.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530405
text: A spider that is said to live in the Ebony Forest. It's larger than most spiders already, but it appears to have not reached full-size.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530406
text: A giant spider that lives in the Ebony Forest. Sightings of this spider are rare as chance encounters with the creature usually result in death.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530407
text: A wolf that rose from the dead somehow. Like when it was alive, it is hostile against all living creatures.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530408
text: A reanimated Sword Wolf. Its sharp canines are now even sharper.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530409
text: A reanimated Plains Wolf, slower than it was in life but more powerful than ever.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530410
text: A reanimated Moor Wolf. It no longer travels in packs but is more dangerous than ever.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530501
text: A reanimated bat that tracks its enemies through darkness. No one knows how it was reanimated.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530502
text: A reanimated bat that has trouble handling sunlight. No one knows how it was reanimated.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530503
text: A giant reanimated bat that tracks its enemies through darkness. No one knows how it was reanimated.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530504
text: A giant reanimated bat that has trouble handling sunlight. No one knows how it was reanimated.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530505
text: Mysterious beings that can tame wild dragons. They are training armies as they await the return of demons that have been sealed away for 3,000 years.

name: DB_monster_desc_2530506
text: A Fierce Dragon rider. Their speediness makes them hard to deal with.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540101
text: A monster that moves using shadows, found only in the depths of forests. Itâ€™s said that the forests where these shadows appear eventually end up becoming swamplands.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540102
text: A being that is stronger than the Shadows who move through the darkness. It is also much faster at corrupting its surroundings than other Shadows.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540201

name: DB_monster_desc_2540202

name: DB_monster_desc_2540203
text: A large and ferocious walker who runs indiscriminately at a target.

text: A large and ferocious walker who gives off a daunting aura.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540205
text: A large and ferocious walker who happens to be a magic-wielding shaman.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540206
text: A large and ferocious elite walker who runs indiscriminately at a target.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540207
text: A vice chief who assists the queen of the walkers, Queen Harke. Though large and ferocious, he faithfully helps the queen rule over their tribe.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540208
text: The large and ferocious queen of the walkers. She is well-trusted within the tribe, even if her relationship history has been awfully bumpy.
