name: DB_monster_desc_2540408
text: A passionate, crimson-hued Chicken Matango that seems faster compared to other members of its species.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540409
text: An azure-cap Matango that is hard to spot when it is in a forest.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540410
text: A black-cap Matango that tends to blend in with the forest that surrounds it.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540411
text: A bright-hued, eye-catching yellow Chicken Matango.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540412
text: A Chicken Matango with a blood red cap. They say that brightly colored mushrooms are poisonous, and this one is no exception. One bite will send you to the land of the dead.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540413
text: A Chicken Matango with a chaotically patterned cap. The unappetizing pattern on its cap may be a reason why it's not very popular.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540501
text: The leader of mysterious beings, followers of the demons, that train Wild Dragons to form an army.

name: DB_monster_desc_2540502
text: A tamed Wild Dragon, adept in its movements thanks to its training.

name: DB_monster_desc_2550101

name: DB_monster_desc_2860501
text: A Fierce Dragon rider. Their speediness makes them hard to deal with.

name: DB_monster_desc_2860502

name: DB_monster_desc_2870101
text: An Elite Skull Warrior Chief that appeared from a Blue Amber. It chose a fate of unending struggles, rejecting peaceful slumber of its own volition.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870102
text: A Skull Warrior Chief that appeared from a Blue Amber. It rejected eternal slumber in order to stay true to its vow.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870103
text: A Skull Soldier that appeared from a Blue Amber. It harbors hatred for everything because it may never rest in peace.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870104
text: A Skull Soldier that appeared from a Blue Amber. It harbors hatred for everything because it may never rest in peace.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870105
text: A Headless Specter that appeared from a Blue Amber. It is under someone's control and has no will of its own.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870106
text: A Dark Skull Specter that appeared from a Blue Amber. It is under someone's control, robbed of its restful slumber.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870107
text: A Nightmare that appeared from a Green Amber. It shapeshifts to something desired by its prey and seduces them.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870108
text: A Nightmare that appeared from a Green Amber. It shapeshifts to something desired by its prey and seduces them.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870201
text: A Barbarian Chieftain who appeared from a Red Amber. His strength and endurance is second to none.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870202
text: A Barbarian Warrior who appeared from a Red Amber. His brute strength is beyond imagination.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870203
text: A Barbarian Warrior who appeared from a Red Amber. His spear pierces all it is thrust into.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870204
text: A Barbarian Vice Chief who appeared from a Red Amber. His fighting techniques differ from other barbarians.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870205
text: A Walker Warrior who appeared from a Red Amber. His gigantic physique is truly intimidating.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870206
text: A two-headed Giant named Etin who appeared from a Red Amber. The two heads never see eye to eye.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870207
text: A Giant Common Mercenary who appeared from a Red Amber. One swing of the club is sure to send several human soldiers flying.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870208
text: A Giant Elite Mercenary who appeared from a Red Amber. One swing of the club is sure to send several human soldiers flying.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870209
text: A Giant Mercenary Captain who appeared from a Red Amber. Always fights on the frontlines.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870210
text: A Werewolf Warrior who appeared from a Green Amber. He can shapeshift between wolf and human forms, and his bravery is second to none.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870211
text: A Werewolf Hunter who appeared from a Green Amber. His sharpened arrows pierce through his prey.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870212
text: A Werewolf Shaman who appeared from a Green Amber. Uses magic different from that of humans.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870213
text: A Werewolf Chieftain who appeared from a Green Amber. Leads the pack with great animosity toward humans.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870214
text: A frenzied Giant who appeared from a Red Amber. The Giant's entire body is a weapon, flailing around without restraint.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870301
text: A Demon Follower who appeared from a Blue Amber. Blinded by a false belief.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870302
text: A Demon Believer who appeared from a Blue Amber. Cannot be persuaded by truth.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870303
text: A Demon Priest who appeared from a Blue Amber. Preaches delusional sermons to followers.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870304
text: A Demon Worshipper who appeared from a Blue Amber. Abandoned everything for a false belief.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870305
text: A Shadow Guard who appeared from a Blue Amber. Unable to forget what he tried to protect in life.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870306
text: A Shadow Sentry who appeared from a Blue Amber. Tormented by endless repetition of its actions before death.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870307
text: A Forgotten Mage who appeared from a Blue Amber. Searches for a place to return to. Controls specters.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870308
text: A Forgotten Guardian Knight who appeared from a Blue Amber. No longer remembers what it was protecting.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870309
text: A Forgotten Guardian Knight Captain who appeared from a Blue Amber. Doesn't remember much other than having been a captain of the knights.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870310
text: A Lost Holy Knight who appeared from a Blue Amber. Believes that it is still alive and wanders endlessly.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870311
text: A Lost Holy Knight who appeared from a Blue Amber. Believes that it is still alive and wanders endlessly.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870401

name: DB_monster_desc_2870402
text: A flute-playing Bellato youth who appeared from a Red Amber. The music from the flute makes tree vines grow.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870403
text: A drum-playing Bellato girl who appeared from a Red Amber. The rhythm of the drums makes tree vines grow.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870404
text: A Stump Spirit Warrior who appeared from a Red Amber. Becomes stronger upon hearing Bellato music.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870405
text: A Stump Spirit Captain who appeared from a Red Amber. Becomes stronger upon hearing Bellato music.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870406

name: DB_monster_desc_2870407
text: A Giant Moor Wolf that appeared from a Red Amber. Its size makes it tough to deal with.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870408
text: Junk Armor that appeared from a Blue Amber. It dances endlessly under someone's control.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870409
text: A Gale Owl that appeared from a Green Amber. It can tear soft flesh with a flap of its wings.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870410
text: A Whirlwind Owl that appeared from a Green Amber. It can sweep up anything with a flap of its wings.

name: DB_monster_desc_2870411

name: DB_monster_desc_2870412

name: DB_monster_desc_2870501

name: DB_monster_desc_2870502

name: DB_monster_desc_2870504

name: DB_monster_desc_2870506

text: A being created from magic seeping through a giant crystal. Though most golems are said to have masters, this particular one does not.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910207
text: A werewolf - a man who has the ability to turn into a wolf.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910306

name: DB_monster_desc_2910309
text: Sonya, the enforcer of [Gilthunder's Guards]. Asserts that anyone who takes Gilthunder from her will never be forgiven, and she is often seen by the Wishing Tree rumored to make unrequited love reality.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910310
text: A timid young man who has a hard time voicing his complaints. He remains silent even regarding the tyranny of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910311
text: A young man enraged by the tyranny of the Holy Knights. His lengthy patience is of no use now.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910312
text: An average village boy who knows how to fight a little.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910313
text: Howzer wants Diane to notice him one way or another. He seems to want to dazzle her with this opportunity.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910314
text: Ban is locked up in Baste Prison. He somehow seems to be enjoying his stay.

name: DB_monster_desc_2910315

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910001
text: Boar Hat Tavern Master's basic uniform.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910002
text: Boar Hat Tavern Master's basic uniform. For some reason, his sword is not strapped to his back as it usually is.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910003
text: Boar Hat Tavern Master's basic uniform. It's tattered from intense fighting.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910004
text: Holy Knight outfit from a country that perished long ago.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910005
text: A gift from the princess to commemorate the medal bestowment.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910006
text: An outfit that can be worn casually and comfortably.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910007
text: A long, white coat worn while searching for new recruits a long time ago. The red strap and yellow button decorations are quite eye-catching.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910008
text: An outfit given by Elizabeth as a gift to commemorate the medal bestowment, equipped with the Sacred Treasure Lostvayne which Merlin found.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910009
text: Clothes worn by Meliodas when he entered the Training Grotto of the Druids.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910101
text: Clothes worn inside the armor while searching for the [Seven Deadly Sins]. It's tattered from Twigo's attack.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910102
text: Boar Hat tavern uniform given by Meliodas. It's a look he prefers.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910103
text: Comfortable pajamas that do not accentuate curves.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910104
text: Clothes Hawk made using his mouth without thread or needle. Truly outstanding.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910105
text: Clothes borrowed in a hurry from Veronica. They're a little small for Elizabeth.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910106
text: Clothes with beautifully shimmering decorations on light fabric. It would look incredibly beautiful to dance in these clothes.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910107
text: An extravagant dress made from a beautiful yellow fabric. Everyday clothes of a princess.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910108
text: A blue dress matching the color of Elizabeth's eyes. It's quite suitable to wear to important events.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910109
text: Clothes made with mobility in mind. It could be useful when waiting tables at the tavern.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910110
text: Elizabeth's new clothes which emphasize free movement. It's was a gift from Zaneri.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910111
text: A beautiful dress which took a famous designer a hundred days and nights to complete.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910201
text: A rusty suit of armor that is still good enough to use. It was made for humans, but it fits Hawk nicely too.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910202
text: A simply designed tag with the words "STAR BOAR" embossed on it.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910203
text: He strapped a barrel full of brew on his back to make a killer sale. Hope it goes well.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910204
text: A well-roasted Hawk. Smells delicious and mouthwatering.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910205
text: Hawk became a combat class nerd starting from the day he began wearing Balor's Evil Eye on his ear.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910206
text: Hawk's new look after eating a Tyrant Dragon.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910207
text: An outfit perfect for showing the dignity and status of the Captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910301
text: Clothes someone made for Diane. It's made of Dusk Bison leather.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910302
text: Clothes given by Merlin as a gift. The recipient is especially fond of the creased folds.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910401
text: Clothes worn while held captive. It's old and worn out.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910402
text: Clothes that caught Ban's attention. He didn't get consent from the owner.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910403
text: Every hygiene-conscious person wears one of these aprons.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910404
text: Clothes that Ban used to wear when he was known as Bandit Ban. It's similar to the clothes someone else used to wear long ago.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910405
text: A long, maroon coat. The coat would drag on the floor if a short person were to wear it.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910501
text: Clothes made after observing a human making their own. Not bad for a first try.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910502
text: Blue clothes that look comfortable. It would work nicely as sleepwear.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910503
text: A gift from a friend attached to the clothes so they may never be lost.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910504
text: Clothes worn by King when he entered the Training Grotto of the Druids.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910601
text: Large and very comfortable clothes. Suitable for traveling and sleeping outdoors.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910602
text: The clothes' appearance resembles that of a snowman with buttons on its body.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910603
text: Mascot outfit which Gowther put on of his own accord. It was a "no" from everyone for some reason.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910604
text: Clothes handpicked by Gowther's lover for the medal awards ceremony.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910605
text: A necktie matching his hair color and shorts so the legs could see some sun. A good outfit for a date.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910606
text: An outfit that was chosen when there was absolutely nothing to wear.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910607
text: Clothes worn by Gowther when he entered the Training Grotto of the Druids.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910701
text: No one can tell if the wearer is feeling hot or cold in this outfit.

name: DB_costume_story_skin_desc_9910702
text: The Boar Hat tavern uniform worn to return the captain's favor. Quite captivating.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91460010
text: Valenti goes to the Black Magic Research Hall to take the remaining data with Lillia when she hears that there are mages who can't return to their homes despite their wish to do so.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91510010
text: Deldry is in charge of capturing Leo, the leader of the band of thieves. Arden's supposed to accompany her on this mission but is nowhere in sight.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91510010
text: Deldry goes alone to apprehend Leo, the leader of a thieves guild, because Arden is late to the job. She attempts to use her magical power to subdue him, but is interrupted by the other thieves. Deldry tries to increase the intensity of the magic cast on Leo, but he doesn't seem to be affected. They enter close quarters combat.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91510020
text: Arden shows up after the mission is over. He has fun teasing Deldry, who had to apprehend the leader of the thieves guild without using her magic. This annoys Deldry greatly.

name: DB_lobby_escanor_hello_01
text: I'm g- glad everyone looks healthy...

name: DB_lobby_escanor_talk_01
text: Ms. Merlin is as beautiful as ever...

name: DB_lobby_escanor_talk_03
text: You have something to give me?

name: DB_lobby_escanor_talk_04
text: Something like this for m- me? Thank you!

name: DB_lobby_escanor_talk_05
text: Do you happen to be interested in poetry?

name: DB_lobby_galand_hello_01
text: I wanted to fight with you.

name: DB_lobby_galand_talk_01
text: Humans haven't changed one bit in 3,000 years.

name: DB_lobby_galand_talk_02
text: Seems their ale has gotten better, though.

name: DB_lobby_galand_talk_03
text: Are you really giving me a gift?

name: DB_lobby_galand_talk_04
text: I hope you know you're not supposed to lie when I'm around!

name: DB_lobby_galand_talk_05
text: I never take back what I say.

name: DB_lobby_melascula_hello_01
text: Hmm, I wonder if your soul would be tasty.

name: DB_lobby_melascula_talk_01
text: You should take care not to show distrust in my presence.

name: DB_lobby_melascula_talk_02
text: If you want to keep your eyes intact, anyway.

name: DB_lobby_melascula_talk_04
text: If you're in the giving mood, your soul makes the better gift.

name: DB_lobby_melascula_talk_05
text: Just remember - I have my eye on your soul.

name: DB_lobby_valenty_talk_01
text: This world is full of mysterious things!

name: DB_lobby_valenty_talk_02
text: I came here to measure how fast my body breaks down alcohol!

name: DB_lobby_valenty_talk_03
text: Oh, are you going to give me a research specimen?

name: DB_lobby_valenty_talk_04
text: Thanks! This will make great research material!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10105060
text: Meliodas and crew arrive at Fort Solgres and ask the soldiers about Jaz, who has gone missing.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10150010
text: The Tricolored Herb is an unusual plant whose petals change color according to its condition. They say each color produces a different effect. Now that Hawk's eaten a blue petal, what kind of effect will it have?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10150030
text: The Forest Ranger Captain Dillon claims that a high and mighty figure has his back. Who is this mysterious patron?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10151010
text: The Knights of the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] are so preoccupied, they barely cared when [The Seven Deadly Sins] showed at their stronghold. What's keeping them so busy?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10151030
text: When they are without a captain, the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] has a tradition of selecting a new one through combat. Upon hearing this, Meliodas announces he'll put his name in the running.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10151050
text: The [Beard of the Mountain Cat] is on the verge of becoming the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal. Will the final Mountain Cat Knight, Dyson, be able to defend his Knighthood's name and honor?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10152010
text: People in the plains suddenly begin attacking Meliodas and his group when they ask for directions to the Fountain of Eternity.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10152030
text: Villagers describe soldiers forcibly drafting residents of their town to Meliodas and the crew. A group of Knights who'd been following the villagers suddenly appear.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10152050
text: The Liones Holy Knights that were hunting the runaway villagers have been defeated. Something one of the Knights said upset Elizabeth, however.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10153010
text: Meliodas and crew find the Fountain of Eternity, the source of Vanya Ale. Suddenly, a pack of wolves appears and attacks.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10153030
text: Following the wolves' defeat, Forest Ranger Marco appears and demands payment for the fountain's water.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10153050
text: Forest Ranger Dillon appears, accompanied by his wolf Annabel. He speaks highly of Annabel's charms. What could they be?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10250010
text: The forest brims with insects, and their numbers only increase the farther one goes. These aren't ordinary bugs. They're actually...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10250030
text: The bugs turned out to be Freesia's poisonous insects! The watchmen guarding the area say that Freesia forced them to raise the insects.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10251010
text: The watchmen guide Meliodas and crew to the Insect Queen's domain lives. Upon their approach, the elite insects that protect her attack.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10251030
text: Meliodas and crew defeat the Insect Queen after an arduous battle. Too bad a new queen will inevitably appear in the near future...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10252010
text: Meliodas and crew encounter Specters in some ancient ruins. Meliodas says they're the ghosts of ancient warriors who died fighting Demons 3,000 years ago.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10252030
text: Meliodas and crew come across a looter who was hiding in the ruins. He says some of his colleagues are trapped further inside.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10253010
text: The looters have been found and returned to their village. All that's left is to put the awakened Specters back to sleep.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10253030
text: The leader of the ancient warriors attacks Meliodas, mistaking him for a Demon. What awakened these ancient Specters from their long slumber?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10254010
text: Meliodas and crew receive a strange invitation, and arrive to find themselves before a Giant Chessboard. The soldiers there challenge the group to a game of Human chess.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10254030
text: Meliodas decides to use his most inconsequential piece as bait to lure out the Knight protecting his opponent's king. Which piece does he find the most disposable?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10254050
text: Meliodas finally declares checkmate! He also reveals how skilled the King of Liones is at chess. Just how good is he?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10305010
text: Mysterious screams fill the air as soon as Meliodas and crew step into the forest. Where are they coming from?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10305030
text: Screams echo throughout the forest again. These screams are somehow different from Screamer shrieks, however. What is the source of these screams?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10351010
text: It turned out that the abductees were being taken to a Screamer farm! Meliodas and crew encounter soldiers who used to guard Ban in Baste Prison.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10351030
text: Bruno, leader of the deserters, considers the [The Seven Deadly Sins] a ragtag group of nobodies. Who will emerge victorious between [The Seven Deadly Sins] and Bruno?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10352010
text: The forest is shrouded by fog, greatly reducing visibility. King says he can feel someone gazing at him through the mist.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10352030
text: When the fog recedes, Meliodas is all alone. He's realized that something's wrong with this forest.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10352050
text: The Nightmare of Illusion finally shows itself. It puts Meliodas to sleep, with plenty of sweet dreams to go with it.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10353010
text: The Nightmare of Temptation has lulled King and Ban to sweet slumber. What kind of dreams are King and Ban having?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10353030
text: Hawk dreams he's seduced by scraps. How will he react when he wakes from this dream?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10353050
text: The Nightmare of Illusion puts Diane and Elizabeth to sleep, providing them with sweet dreams. But it seems like they're having very similar dreams...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10354010
text: Meliodas and crew head over to the Village of Vengeful Spirits after a voice in the Capital of the Dead tells them to go there. What kind of story does this place hold?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10354030
text: Specters of the dead wander the village, but the group sees no sign of Boris.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10354050
text: Boris's Specter finally appears, but talking to him is proving to be impossible. What needs to be done so that he can be told about Melia?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10355010
text: Meliodas and crew encounter dogs guarding a graveyard. They sense a strange power emanating from these dogs.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10355030
text: Boris appears before Meliodas and crew once again. Elizabeth tries to talk to him, but he turns out to merely be soulless shell.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10355050
text: The strange power that was animating the dead turned out to be the work of the Ruler of Greed! Meliodas and crew must take Boris's body from this creature.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10450010
text: Meliodas and crew are searching a large forest for Basti, a master of hiding. Who's that behind a rather suspicious barrel of ale?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10450030
text: Basti refuses to trust Humans. The other Gorra tell Basti to seek forgiveness from the chieftain and to return to the tribe.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10450050
text: The Gorra chieftain lost his siblings to the Walkers in the past. However, he now provides them with members of his race to use as slave labor.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10451010
text: The group travels deep into the forest and sets foot in Walker territory. There, they find King's wanted poster!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10451030
text: The Walker Queen says she fell in love with King when she saw his image on the wanted poster, and has been searching for him to make him her husband.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10451050
text: At last, Walker Queen Hark meets King. When King returns to his normal form, however, she goes on a rampage and demands the return of her husband.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10452010
text: This place was once a dense forest, but it became tainted by darkness and turned into a gloomy marsh. Who's responsible for this?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10452030
text: Shadows are demonic beings that can exist anywhere, as they live and hide in the shade. Is there any way to restore the corrupted Shadow Marsh?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10453010
text: Meliodas and crew receive a tip about a Fierce Dragon and decide to eliminate it. There's something strange about this dragon, though. It seems like it already knows what the team is planning.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10453030
text: A dragon that understands Human language?! It turns out someone's tamed this dragon and is controlling it. Who could it be?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10453050
text: Since the Demons were sealed away, the creatures that worshipped them long ago have been assembling an army. Why have they resurfaced?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10454010
text: Hawk complains that the team is called [The Seven Deadly Sins], but all they do is carry out minor tasks. Will a worthy opponent appear to truly challenge them as Hawk wishes?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10454030
text: Meliodas and crew discover a flock of Huge Owls in the valley. Suddenly, something enormous and unexpected makes an appearance.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10550010
text: Meliodas and crew enter the forest and run into a plethora of aggressive wolves.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10550030
text: Meliodas and crew discover suspicious men whispering to each other in the forest. Who could these people be?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10550050
text: While in pursuit of Yoos, Meliodas and crew end up in a fight against his protective friends.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10550070
text: Meliodas finally finds Yoos after a long search. How will Yoos react when he discovers that Meliodas knows his secret?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10551010
text: A Werewolf is being chased by his own kind. Why is he running away?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10551030
text: Luther and his friends somehow managed to escape and are on the run. How did they get away?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10551050
text: The Werewolf chieftain, Haku, wants to punish the Werewolves who helped Luther and his friends.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10552010
text: Meliodas and crew meet a kid ghost in the Forgotten Village. The ghost demands they leave the town immediately.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10552030
text: The kid ghost makes another appearance. He proudly announces that he brought his nineteenth father with him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10552050
text: Meliodas and crew find the kid ghost after searching high and low, but they come upon someone threatening him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10552070
text: Meliodas finds out that the kid ghost is the spirit of Old Hardin's dead son, and wants to tell the ghost about this.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10552080
text: Unable to cross over to the other side, Gina's spirit wanders the Forgotten Village. What will help her move on?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10552100
text: A few children have gone missing after going to the Forgotten Village. Will they return home safely?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10553010
text: Elric the Blind's lover, Illia, went missing long ago. Meliodas and crew head to Buruka Cave to search for her.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10553030
text: Illia was revealed to be a Werebear named Buruka.\nWhat's her story?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10554010
text: Meliodas and crew head to Garthum's Residence. How will the Werebears react to their presence?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10554030
text: Garthum finally makes an appearance. What are his thoughts about the events of 10 years ago?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10555010
text: Meliodas and crew go to the Altar of the Mountain God after hearing strange sounds coming from the area, and discover Mutants when they arrive.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10555030
text: Countless Mutants have taken over the Altar of the Mountain God. Will the battle against them ever end?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10651010
text: The Knights lounge around the Training Grounds instead of working hard on their drills. Meliodas and Ban decide to train these Holy Knights themselves.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10651030
text: The Holy Knights argue that training should be optional since everyone is so busy working on restoring the capital. How will Ban respond?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10651050
text: Meliodas goes to see a merchant who's said to sell anything and everything that has to do with [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10652050
text: Meliodas encounters a girl who is about to be abducted by a mysterious man. Why is he trying to kidnap her?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10652070
text: The mysterious man says he's in search of a sacrifice to help him attain his ambitious goals. What could he want?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10653010
text: The rebel forces insist that [The Seven Deadly Sins] are the true insurgents, not them. Gilthunder's trying to convince them of their folly, but he isn't having much success.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10653030
text: Ban suggests getting rid of all of the rebels. Gilthunder objects, saying the rebels are also Holy Knights of Liones.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10653050
text: There's a rumor going around that Trader Moore is selling off everything he's got so he can make a run for it in the dead of night.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10654010
text: The Watchtower is a wreck, but the chimeras watching Margaret are still inside. Merlin says the creatures were made by combining various monsters.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10654030
text: Gilthunder is shocked by the existence of chimeras. It's a relief that they were discovered before they could escape from the tower.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10654050
text: Vivian says her research into the Red Demon was almost complete, and asserts there are countermeasures that can be taken even if the Demons were to return.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10655070
text: A Holy Knight has run away from home, causing his mother to worry. Meliodas and crew go on a search to find him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10655090
text: The runaway Holy Knight refuses entertain any ideas of going back home. What will make him go back to his worried mother?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10655110
text: The Holy Knight said he was going to go back home, but is still out and about.\nWhat in the world has he been up to?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10655130
text: The runaway Holy Knight still hasn't returned home! Meliodas and crew set out to find him once more.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10656010
text: Where have the missing children gone?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10656030
text: Meliodas was out searching for a particular stone the Medicine Merchant wanted, but finds something else upon arriving at his destination.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_10657010
text: Everyone thought all of the New Generation Mutants were exterminated, but it seems a number of them are still around! What's going on?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1114
text: The gigantic Albion seems to be reacting to\nMeliodas and crew's Combat Class\nand begins to show its violent side.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1115
text: The Albion is trying to destroy Merlin's barrier with its powerful attacks. Will they be able to stop the Albion?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1116
text: The Albion still stands even after a "Full Counter" from Meliodas. How will they take it down?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1117
text: Meliodas's sword breaks. Just then, Merlin throws something in his direction.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1118
text: Meliodas and crew manage to defeat the Albion. What caused it to appear all of a sudden?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1119
text: Everyone thought this battle would be the end. Turns out, it was all an illusion created by Gowther.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1120
text: Everyone thought Merlin had turned to stone.\nThankfully, it was only her physical being that was calcified.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1121
text: Merlin says everyone must increase their Combat Class if they are to face against [The Ten Commandments]. How will they achieve this goal?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1122
text: The Trio of Troublemakers come across a strange sight on their journey to find the truth of the incident.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1123
text: Diane is continuing to lose her memories. The only thing left in her memory is her time at the Giant's Village of Megadozer.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1124
text: Meliodas and crew avoid Monspeet's "Hell's Phoenix" with Hawk's Mama's help. Merlin then suggests a change in destination.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1130
text: 10 years ago, around the time of Zaratras's murder, Merlin separated Meliodas from his power as he was about to go berserk from seeing his lover's grave injuries. She now plans to give it back to him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1131
text: Meliodas and crew meet with the leader of the Druids in Istal who already seems to know the purpose of their visit.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1132
text: Meliodas and Elizabeth follow Zaneri to the Tower of Trials.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1133
text: Meliodas's trial has begun. His test: The death of Liz.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1134
text: Meliodas witnesses Liz's death over and over again, losing himself to his wrath each time. Will he be able to pass the test?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1135
text: Worried Meliodas may be overexerting himself, Zaneri suggests he give up. Meliodas won't back down, however.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1136
text: The group follows Jenna to the Training Grotto where they have an unexpected encounter.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1137
text: After meeting with Hendrickson, the group discovers something else and hurriedly heads for the entrance to the Training Grotto.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1138
text: After parting ways with King at the Fairy King's Forest, Ban encounters his long lost past.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1139
text: Training finally begins under Jenna's guidance. Everyone is pumped up, but King says he's not in the mood and stays out of it.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1140
text: The group heads into the Training Grotto. What sort of training awaits them?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1141
text: The group must form teams of two, each team taking down one enemy. Howzer and Gilthunder are paired up once again. Will they be able to win this time?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1142
text: Gowther is paired with Arthur. How will the king and doll perform?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1143
text: King changes his mind and decides to enter the Training Grotto. He objects when told that only groups of two may enter.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1144
text: King is suspicious of Meliodas. The cracks begin to show, perhaps more so because of the time they spent together as [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1145
text: The group safely finishes their training. Meliodas requests Jenna return his power.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1146
text: After regaining his power, Meliodas asks Merlin to send him to where [The Ten Commandments] are for a brief moment.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1147
text: Meliodas returns safely after saying hello. Elizabeth also finishes her training and rejoins the group.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1148
text: Having accomplished their goal, Meliodas and crew prepare to leave Istal.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1149
text: Elizabeth is sad that her training hasn't amounted to much. Thanks to Meliodas's words, Elizabeth cheers up.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1150
text: Meliodas has regained his power and everyone else has become stronger too. What is their new objective?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_800000
text: Seven days of each other's company made Ban and Elaine forget 700 years of loneliness. What was their first encounter like?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_800001
text: Ban and Elaine spend some quality time together. Suddenly, a Red Demon appears, even though they were supposed to have been sealed away long ago.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_800002
text: They say Elizabeth bears great resemblance to Liz. Liz and Meliodas have quite a story.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_800004
text: Arthur, King of Camelot, is heading to the capital of Liones. He's not traveling alone, however. Who is the mage by his side?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_800005
text: King clearly remembers what happened 700 years ago. What lies at the end of this tale for the trio involved?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_800006
text: King and Jericho follow Ban, who left [The Seven Deadly Sins]. They eventually arrive in the Fairy King's Forest.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_800007
text: What memories from his past does [b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Escanor, the last member of [The Seven Deadly Sins], remember?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91010110
text: Meliodas meets Gilthunder in the Forest of White Dreams. Gilthunder readies his sword, claiming Meliodas is responsible for the death of the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91010210
text: Meliodas, the captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins], meets the criminal Ban for the first time. How was Ban, a man bored by everything, convinced to join [The Seven Deadly Sins]?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91010310
text: Meliodas appears amongst some mercenaries checking out a recruitment ad. They take one look at Meliodas's size and mock him, calling him a child.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91010410
text: Diane and King are curious as to why Meliodas received the mark of [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b]. Why was he given that title?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91010510
text: Meliodas is in the throes of a nightmare. The one he is faced against is none other than himself.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91020110
text: Protective of his status as the tavern mascot, Hawk is unhappy with Diane for wanting to take his title.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91020210
text: Elizabeth and Hawk are looking after the tavern while Meliodas is away. Too bad they're faced with a drunk customer who refuses to pay his bill.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91020310
text: Dismayed by the tavern's falling profits, Hawk wants the right to run the tavern himself. Meliodas and Hawk decide to fight each other for the privilege.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91020330
text: The sweet and kind Elizabeth is always bothered by rude customers!\nWhat measures will Hawk take to fix this?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91030110
text: Diane ends up in the Forest of White Dreams after [The Seven Deadly Sins] disband. There, she meets the Hide and Seeks.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91030130
text: Hawk begs Diane to teach him how to dance like a Giant. Will he be able to master those moves?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91030210
text: Diane asks Meliodas who he would save first if she and Elizabeth were drowning. What will Meliodas say?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91030310
text: Meliodas and Diane are fighting an enraged Dragon. Ban is supposed to be part of this mission, but he's nowhere to be seen. Where could he be?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91040110
text: Gilthunder, who'd been training the Knights, encounters a bit of hostility from the so-called New Generation.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91040130
text: While training with Howzer, Gilthunder becomes aware of a meddlesome presence.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91040210
text: Gilthunder and Howzer are out to get rid of the southbound Northern Barbarians. Their longtime friendship allows their skills to work together in perfect harmony.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91040310
text: Howzer and Griamore are happily reminiscing about the last Vaizel Fight Festival, but Gilthunder seems to disapprove.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91050110
text: When Ban breaks out of his cell in Baste Prison, Apprentice Holy Knight Jericho decides to deal with him. Ban was subjected to a great deal of torture during his long imprisonment. Who will win?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91050130
text: Ban pilfered one man's clothes a number of times. But one day, Ban's "supplier" is nowhere to be seen!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91050211
text: It's time for the Vaizel Fight Festival Preliminaries! Bored by dull battles, Ban's eyes are drawn to a man and his clothes. What will he do next?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91050310
text: 10 years ago, Ban discovered Knights discussing Meliodas and the negative rumors surrounding him. How did Ban react?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91050510
text: Ban stands in line overnight to purchase a bottle of limited-edition ale, but gets angry when he hears a passerby make some disparaging comments.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91050610
text: Ban gets curious about the broken sword Meliodas always carries. He attempts to get his hands on it without Meliodas's permission.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91050710
text: A group of mercenaries are out to defeat a dragon, but they're reluctant to begin their job because it's so dangerous. It appears they're waiting for someone to arrive.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91070110
text: Apprentice Holy Knights Twigo and Jericho let [The Seven Deadly Sins] slip through their fingers. Helbram comes to them and says he wants to see how skilled they are.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91070230
text: Gustav stops Jericho right as she's sneaking out of the house. He doesn't seem happy about where she's going.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91070310
text: Jericho seems to have trouble focusing after returning from shadowing the [Roars of Dawn]. What did she see during their mission?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91080130
text: Golgius is working hard, practicing his "Invisibility" skill. However, his training is interrupted by a misunderstanding...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91090130
text: Ruin asserts that people with strong bodies don't need any armor. Could it be true?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91100110
text: Freesia commands the villagers of Dalmally to raise poisonous insects for her, but they try to resist.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91110110
text: It's a peaceful day in the Fairy King's Forest, and Helbram challenges King to a race. Who will win?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91110210
text: The Gorra invade the Fairy King's Forest, and the Fairy King makes preparations to defend the forest.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91110310
text: Ban always shows up to missions drunk and King has a tough time taking care of things all on his own.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91120130
text: Gustav and Guila both have younger siblings, so it's no surprise that they worry about the same things.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91120210
text: Zeal, Guila's little brother, is tormented by neighborhood bullies. Guila is willing to do anything for her sibling, and she's not in a forgiving mood.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91130110
text: Gowther, who put on Diane's hostess uniform without her permission, refuses to return it to her. This kicks off a brawl between Gowther and Diane!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91130210
text: Howzer takes action to defend Diane against a young man who's hitting on her.\nHowzer comes to her rescue, but Diane doesn't seem all too happy about it.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91130310
text: Diane has shrunk down to human-size. Does that mean her strength has diminished as well?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91140130
text: Howzer's heading somewhere dressed to the nines. Someone is closely watching Howzer as he makes his way.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91140210
text: Howzer gets news that the Fight Festival is finally underway! But Gilthunder comes along and puts a damper on Howzer's excitement.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91140310
text: Howzer doesn't understand why Griamore would do anything for Veronica, and starts arguing with him about it.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91150110
text: Howzer, Griamore, and Cain were defeated during the Vaizel Fight Festival. The three start trash-talking each other's skills, and begin a completely meaningless consolation match of their own.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91150130
text: Griamore is showing off the outfit he was awarded when he won a tournament in the Arena, but Howzer seems a bit doubtful of Griamore's skills.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91150310
text: Griamore overhears some soldiers speaking ill of Veronica, and he's not about to let them get away with their crude jokes.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91160130
text: One day, Cain dozes off and has a dream that the Kingdom of Danafor is still whole.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91170110
text: Alan comes across some Holy Knights as he's making a run for it with the Armor Giant.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91170310
text: Gowther and Guila run into a thug in the middle of their date. Guila says it's a gentleman's duty to deal with disruptive hooligans.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91170410
text: Gowther receives some new armor and wants to put its strength to the test.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91180110
text: Slater believes Gilthunder doesn't deserve the king's favor and ends up picking a fight with him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91180130
text: What's the story behind\nSlater's devotion to Bartra?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91190130
text: Does Simon have a baby face, or is he actually just very young?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91200110
text: Fed up with Simon underestimating his archery skills, Weinheidt makes a bet with him to prove how well he can shoot.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91210110
text: Other Holy Knights dismiss Jillian just because she's a woman. Jillian decides to show them what she's got.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91210130
text: A man who seems to know a great deal about Jillian appears one day. Who is this man?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91220110
text: The easygoing Simon and hardheaded Hugo are frequently at each other's throats. Why did Slater assign those two to go on a mission together?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91220130
text: Hugo visits Slater to see if he can join the [Roars of Dawn], a group of Knights he admires.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91220150
text: The [Roars of Dawn] leave to carry out a mission without Slater. Will they be successful?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91230110
text: Elizabeth is minding the tavern on her own and King happens to drop by. They end up having to face some Gorra who launch a surprise attack on the tavern.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91230210
text: Gowther is proving to be of no help on a mission he and King were sent on. Who in the world told him that nonsense about heroes only appearing in the hour of need?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91230310
text: Now that she's smaller, Diane declares she'll be sleeping inside the tavern like everyone else. Unfortunately, there are only two rooms, and a battle breaks out among [The Seven Deadly Sins] to figure out who they'll be sharing a room with!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91240110
text: Elizabeth is a server at the tavern, but frequently makes mistakes because she's still learning the ropes. A few customers finally express their frustrations.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91240130
text: Veronica decides to take on Elizabeth's work for a day while she's sick. Will she do a good job?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91240210
text: When the Holy Knights confine the royal family to the castle, Elizabeth attempts to make an escape to look for [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91240310
text: Elizabeth is always kind. Does she ever get angry? Hawk and Diane make a bet to see if she can.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91250110
text: Merlin begins to experiment on her guinea pigs in the lab.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91250210
text: What does Merlin wants so badly that she's willing to split away in the middle of a mission?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91250310
text: Tired of Merlin's arrogance, the mages under Merlin's command begin to rebel.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91250410
text: Mages after Merlin's research materials sneak into Merlin's Laboratory while she is away.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91260110
text: Helbram and his Fairy friends fall into crisis when they follow a merchant who promises to take them sightseeing around the Human world.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91260210
text: Helbram hears about trees that are too tainted by darkness to sprout and heads out to resolve the situation.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91260310
text: Helbram tries to explain humanity's hierarchical society, but other Fairies don't really seem to get it.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91270110
text: Gustav harbors doubts about Jericho's new powers. He believes there's something suspicious about Helbram and goes to see him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91280110
text: A surprise attack by the Barbarians lands the Holy Knights of Liones in hot water, but Hendrickson appears when all seems lost.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91280210
text: Hendrickson is pushing the Holy Knights hard during training, saying they must prepare for the holy war. Those displeased with Hendrickson's approach rebel against him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91290110
text: Dreyfus is Hendrickson's friend and rival, but they argue about how the Knighthood should be run.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91290210
text: Dreyfus takes a short vacation, but the workaholic in him won't let him rest.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91300130
text: Someone forgot to take their book when they left the tavern. What's it about?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91310150
text: Twigo has imbibed the blood of a Demon. Will he be able to acquire its powers?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91320030
text: Jude's gotten bored with everyday routine and wants to hunt something. Good thing [The Seven Deadly Sins] are here.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91330050
text: It's an emergency! Marmas's maracas aren't sounding quite right, so he's hurried to someone who can repair it.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91340030
text: One of the Fight Festival participants is causing a ruckus in Vaizel. Taizoo has been disdainfully watching his antics. What will he do?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91350050
text: Vivian becomes the head Mage, and people have a lot to say about that behind her back. How will Vivian respond?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91360010
text: Arthur keeps asking Meliodas to teach him his skills.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91360030
text: Arthur is making his way to Camelot using a map. A gang of bandits appears before him and demand that he hand over his money.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91370010
text: Lillia, a student of Merlin, wants to learn more powerful magic. Merlin seems to have other ideas, however.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91370030
text: A man and a woman are walking down the dark forest path. What is their story?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91380010
text: Elaine misses her brother who has not returned for 700 years. Just then, she is visited by some Fairies.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91390010
text: Galland and Melascula are on their way to find Human souls to consume when Holy Knights of Liones appear before them. Galland proposes they play his signature "Galland Game."

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91400010
text: A bored Ban with nothing to do finds a notebook by chance.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91400030
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] set out to eliminate the barbarians who are causing trouble in Northern Liones. Seeing that it's almost noon, Meliodas makes a suggestion.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91410010
text: Galland and Melascula set off on a journey together. The two have a small argument over the souls Melascula gathered.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91420010
text: Monspeet and Derieri are going around absorbing Human souls. Derieri seems tired of hunting down defenseless Humans.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91430010
text: Waillo asked Deldry to marry him. Arden warns that Waillo was wrong to ask her.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91440010
text: Arden hears about what happened at the medal bestowment ceremony. He ends up unintentionally upsetting Dogedo.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91450010
text: Deathpierce and Dogedo head out to stop the barbarian ambush along the borders following intel from Deathpierce's invisible Fairy, who is aptly named "Invisible."

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91480010
text: In the midst of preparing for the Great Fight Festival, Gloxinia suggests to Drole that they spar for fun.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91490010
text: Arden starts to suspect Deldry, who quickly disappears, claiming that she has an appointment. Deldry meets a suspicious man who tricks and leads her into danger...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91560010
text: Melascula and Galland get into a petty argument. Derieri chimes in after observing for a bit.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_990001
text: The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross PV!

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001101
text: Sidria takes over Fort Solgres to get revenge on Humans for taking the Fairy King. She guards the fort so no Humans can get near it.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001102
text: They say Sidria lost her mind from worry when Humans took the Fairy King long ago. She's become so deranged that she no longer recognizes him. Sidria must be stopped before she becomes any stronger.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001111
text: No matter how many enemies they take out, there seems to be no end in sight. Hawk suggests they just destroy Fort Solgres and build a new one.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001112
text: Fort Solgres is a place steeped in history which was used as a training facility. The fort is full of grimoires that helped with the soldiers' training, meaning destroying the place is out of the question.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001121
text: Elizabeth wonders why the Northern Barbarians are so hostile toward Liones. Meliodas tells her it must be that they want to leave their cold, harsh homeland, but don't want anyone to rule over them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001122
text: The Barbarians have been defeated for now, but it's too soon for relief. Constant vigilance will be necessary to keep them at bay.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001131
text: Hawk wonders how long the gang will need to keep their guard up. He tries to guess, but Meliodas tells him the war won't be over anytime soon.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001132
text: The Northern Barbarians are known to do anything to make themselves stronger. It would be bad if they got their hands on the grimoires. Meliodas thinks it would be smart to retrieve any grimoires the crew sees.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001141
text: Hawk is so busy digging through the wreckage that he fails to notice a monster coming at him from behind.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001142
text: Someone reported seeing a Dragon in the area when Fort Solgres collapsed. If it's not dealt with, it will present a danger not just to the fort, but to the entire region.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001151
text: With so many monsters causing trouble, Hawk wants to postpone all investigations and restoration efforts. Elizabeth and Meliodas disagree.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001152
text: They say there are monsters that devour grimoires. They will need to be exterminated on a regular basis to prevent such dangers from occurring.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001161
text: Saras, the fort's spire, is where most of the enhancement materials are stored. Meliodas and Elizabeth want to reclaim it first, so that the soldiers can use the material inside for quick growth.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001162
text: A Solgres soldier approaches Meliodas and crew who had just eliminated a swarm of enemies. They expect him to thank them for their help, but he came to demand they stay until every enemy is exterminated. They sigh at the soldier's audacity.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001171
text: There must be some kind of magic present in gold as it captivates people and monsters alike. Completely bewitched by its allure, Hawk wants all the Gold he can get his hooves on.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001172
text: Hawk and Meliodas get some Gold from some foes they defeated. Elizabeth wants to return the gold to its rightful owner or put it towards restoring Fort Solgres, but she probably won't get her way.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001181
text: Fort Solgres Knights use Evolution Pendants to evolve when their power level is high enough. Meliodas says these pendants cannot fall into enemy hands, and Hawk says they should go find one right away.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001182
text: When they find an Evolution Pendant, Hawk uses it on himself right away. When nothing happens, he's taken aback. Meliodas tells him off, saying the pendant can only be used when an individual feels they've reached their limit.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001191
text: Meliodas says he felt compelled to come to this place. This was partly because of all the gold, but he also wanted to meet Wantwalker, a Knight who has been building his sphere of influence.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1001192
text: It's unclear why the Knights and soldiers of Liones decided to follow Wantwalker. Whatever their reasons, they cannot be allowed to continue.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10100014
text: The tavern's customers begin talking about the battle between the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights and [The Seven Deadly Sins] that occurred 10 years ago.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10100017
text: The customers say the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights put his life on the line to stop [The Seven Deadly Sins] on that fateful day 10 years ago.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10100018
text: After defeating the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights, [The Seven Deadly Sins] trample him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1010091
text: The gang has decided which village to visit first!\nThey're on their way to Vanya, a town famous for its ale.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10101000
text: The Rust Knight walks through a deserted forest in the dark of night.\nWho is this Knight?

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10101010
text: The Boar Hat is busy with customers, all discussing the rumors regarding [The Seven Deadly Sins].\nAs if on cue, the Rust Knight appears before them in the tavern.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10101011
text: The [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Knights are chasing a girl on the run.\nExcited at the prospect of proving himself, Allioni doesn't realize Hawk is right behind him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10101020
text: The girl says the Holy Knights imprisoned the royal family and are forcibly drafting villagers in preparation for war.\nShe also says that [The Seven Deadly Sins] are the only ones who can stop them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10101030
text: After ambushing the tavern master and the girl, Twigo recognizes the girl as Elizabeth, the third princess of Liones.\nHis orders are to capture the princess alive, but he tries to kill her and make it look like an accident.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10101031
text: The tavern master defeats Apprentice Holy Knight Twigo in a matter of seconds.\nHe is in fact Meliodas, [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b], captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins].\nThe Boar Hat suddenly descends from the sky and takes Meliodas and Elizabeth away.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10101050
text: Gilthunder launches his spear at Vanya when he receives a report saying that [The Seven Deadly Sins] are there.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10105010
text: In Vanya, Meliodas and crew notice some villagers struggling to pull a Holy Knight's sword from the ground. They're all angry at Mead and blame him for their predicament.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10105020
text: Angry at Gilthunder for insulting Vanya Ale, Mead drops a bug into his mug.\nGilthunder drives his sword into the ground to block the village's water source.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10105030
text: Mead and the villagers try their best to pull out Gilthunder's sword, but it won't budge.\nGilthunder's subordinates watch them struggle, mocking their efforts.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10105031
text: Meliodas steps forth and effortlessly pulls out the sword.\nAfter he does, the villagers apologize to Mead.\nMead, who was adamant about not accepting their apology, bursts into tears and makes up with the villagers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10105060
text: Meliodas and crew arrive at Fort Solgres and ask the solders about Jaz who has gone missing.\nUnfortunately, no one seems to know what happened to him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10105070
text: Mead makes fun of Elizabeth who is trying to get used to her job.\nA woman threatens to toss him into the Forest of White Dreams if he continues to be a nuisance.\nMead immediately stops.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10105080
text: Meliodas and crew manage to escape Gilthunder in the Forest of White Dreams and decide to head to Baste Prison.\nMeliodas collapses, perhaps from the injuries he sustained during battle.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1011002
text: Gilthunder scoffs when Meliodas asks if he's okay with fighting.\nGilthunder has never won a fight against Meliodas.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1011003
text: Gilthunder asks Meliodas if he has any last words. Meliodas asks him where the rest of [The Seven Deadly Sins] are. Gilthunder tells him King is in the Capital of the Dead and Ban in Baste Prison.\nHowever, it turns out Meliodas feigned defeat to find out where his allies were.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110030
text: Meliodas and crew are wandering the Forest of White Dreams where monsters are rumored to appear. Suddenly, they come across a bunch of Hawk clones.\nEach of these copies insists that he is the real Hawk.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110040
text: Once all the fake Hawks have been eliminated, a group of Elizabeths appear and insist that they're the real Elizabeth.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110050
text: Meliodas employs his wit to find the true Elizabeth.\nThe creatures who impersonated Hawk and Elizabeth turn out to be the impish Hide and Seeks.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110060
text: Once revealed, the Hide and Seeks run away, and Meliodas and crew chase them deep into the Forest of White Dreams.\nThey find a Giant girl asleep on the ground.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110070
text: The Giant girl wakes up when the Hide and Seeks call her name.\nDiane tries to attack Meliodas and crew, mistaking them for Holy Knights.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110080
text: The Giant turns out to be Diane, [b]The Serpent Sin of Envy[/b], one of [The Seven Deadly Sins].\nDiane recognizes Meliodas and is overjoyed to see him, but isn't too happy to see that he's accompanied by Elizabeth. She attacks Meliodas, saying he hurt her feelings.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110090
text: There's something ominous about the Forest of White Dreams. Suddenly, lightning magic surrounds Meliodas and crew. A man appears before them in a thundercloud.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10110100
text: The moment Gilthunder lunged his sword at Meliodas's throat, Diane grabs Gilthunder and throws him far away.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1012000
text: Meliodas and crew arrive in Vanya. They find all the herbs have shriveled up and the stream is completely dry.\nWhat in the world happened?

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1012001
text: After Fort Solgres's sudden collapse, the villagers are worried monsters will swarm the fort while its defenses are down.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10150010
text: Without thinking, Hawk ate a Tricolored Herb, an unusual plant that changes color according to its condition. When a villainous Forest Ranger appears and demands money from some herbalists, Hawk says he will eliminate all of the Forest Rangers using the power surging within him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10150020
text: Hawk defeats the Forest Rangers with the power he gained from the Tricolored Herb. Shortly after, he learns the blue Tricolored Herb causes vomiting and diarrhea.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10150030
text: Hawk endures great suffering for eating the blue Tricolored Herb. Forest Ranger Captain Dillon appears, saying he'll teach everyone a lesson they won't soon forget.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10150040
text: Forest Ranger Captain Dillon boasts that Twigo's watching his back. However, he becomes terrified when he hears Twigo's already been defeated.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10151010
text: A [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Knight comes across Meliodas and crew, but has no idea that Meliodas is one of [The Seven Deadly Sins].\nIt turns out he's been on vacation the past few days.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10151020
text: The [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Knight wants Meliodas and crew to just go away. He says there's bigger fish to fry.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10151030
text: The [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Knights currently lack a captain. They have a tradition of picking a new captain by battling each other. Meliodas suddenly announces that he'll be participating in the process.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10151040
text: The [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Knights are stunned to have lost so quickly. Meliodas taunts them, saying a pig will end up being their new captain.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10151050
text: After everyone else loses to Meliodas Dyson steps up to the plate. He says he'll fight to the very end for the sake of the kingdom, even if he loses.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10151060
text: Dyson loses to Meliodas and feels ashamed. Meliodas tells him he should be ashamed of something else.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10152010
text: Meliodas and crew are lost in the plains looking for the Fountain of Eternity. When they ask for directions, they are immediately attacked.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10152020
text: The villagers sincerely apologize for attacking Meliodas and his friends. They thought they were soldiers here to take them away. The villagers say Knights from the capital of Liones have been taking young men in preparation for the holy war.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10152030
text: To hide from the Holy Knights who came to draft the young men, the villagers decided to stay here until the Knights return to the capital. Unfortunately, the Holy Knights manage to track down the runaway villagers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10152040
text: The soldiers out to get the villagers have all been eliminated. One of them insists that these are the king's orders. Elizabeth dismisses this, saying it cannot be true.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10152050
text: A Holy Knight from Liones has personally mounted the search for the runaway villagers. This Knight is so cruel and merciless that he doesn't hesitate to attack his own subordinates for failing to capture the villagers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10152060
text: Defeated, the Holy Knights make a hasty retreat. The villagers are no longer subject to the Knights' compulsory drafting.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10153010
text: Meliodas and crew find the Fountain of Eternity, the source ingredient of Vanya Ale. Suddenly, a pack of wolves appears and attacks.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10153020
text: Meliodas and crew eliminate some wolves. It appears they'd been guarding the Fountain of Eternity under someone's orders.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10153030
text: Just as Meliodas and crew are about to take a sip of water from the Fountain of Eternity, Forest Ranger Marco appears and demands a fee for the privilege. Meliodas refuses, saying that no one owns the fountain. Marco orders his wolves, Jack and Finn, to attack him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10153040
text: When Meliodas and crew easily overwhelm Jack and Finn, Marco stands between the party and his wolves, asking them to spare the animals and attack him instead.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10153050
text: Forest Ranger Captain Dillon appears with his wolf Annabel. When Meliodas doesn't seem too impressed, Dillon begins extolling the virtues of his beloved Annabel.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10153060
text: Dillon says he resorted to crime because he had no other choice. Meliodas suggests he ask the villagers for forgiveness and work for them by guarding the fountain for real.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201010
text: Diane goes around Dalmally looking for a doctor who can treat Meliodas, but the villagers run, frightened by the presence of a Giant. Hawk scolds her and tells her to stay put.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201020
text: Dana, doctor from Dalmally, gives the unconscious Meliodas medicine that he specially prepared. Meliodas's wounds are so deep that the doctor is amazed that he's still alive. Diane declares that she'll go to Baste Prison alone.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201040
text: Fortified by her love for Meliodas, Diane destroys the poisonous insects by herself. She asks Elizabeth and Hawk to look after Meliodas, and heads to Baste Prison alone to rescue Ban.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201050
text: The medicine Dr. Dana gave Meliodas turns out to have been lethal poison. It was all a dastardly plan hatched up by Golgius, a member of the [Weird Fangs]. Golgius tries to take Meliodas's broken blade, but Meliodas shakes off the poison and wakes up.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201060
text: Dr. Dana asks Golgius to return his daughter, since he poisoned Meliodas as asked. Golgius brutally attacks Dr. Dana and vanishes.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201080
text: Meliodas and crew take refuge in an abandoned house to escape Golgius. This turns out to be a trap Meliodas set when he realized that Golgius uses the "Invisibility" skill.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201090
text: Fatally wounded, Dr. Dana confesses he poisoned Meliodas because it was the only way to save his daughter. Elizabeth is shocked by Dana's death and blames herself, saying none of this would've happened if she didn't set out to find [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201091
text: After he was defeated by Meliodas, Golgius gets on a horse and flees toward Baste Prison.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201110
text: Everyone thought Dr. Dana died, but he miraculously survived. Dr. Dana reunites with his daughter Sennett.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201120
text: Dr. Dana recites a line from an old Britannian poem as he gazes at the shooting stars lighting up the sky.\n"A great threat shall fall upon Britannia when the whole sky is lit by a blazing cross."\nIt is an omen from ancient times that a holy war is nigh.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10201140
text: Dalmally is soon restored with the help of Meliodas and crew.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10202010
text: Meliodas and crew run into Diane who set off for Baste Prison earlier. There's something odd about her though, and she attacks them when she is struck by illusions that show her friends as Holy Knights.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10202020
text: Meliodas and crew are taken aback by Diane's attack. They come across some shepherds crossing the Dalmally Plains, and advise them to run if they want to live. After talking to the shepherds, Meliodas also begins to hallucinate that Diane is a Holy Knight.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10202030
text: Diane and Meliodas battle each other, both believing the other to be a Holy Knight. Holy Knight Freesia of the [Weird Fangs] suddenly appears with her poisonous insects and attacks Elizabeth and the shepherds.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10202040
text: Elizabeth manages to save a shepherd boy from Freesia's attack, but the boy turns out to be Holy Knight Ruin of the [Weird Fangs].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10202050
text: Elizabeth goes after Ruin, demanding he return Diane and Meliodas to normal, only to be thoroughly beaten by him. This was all part of Elizabeth's plan, however, to steal the illusion-producing bell from Ruin's staff.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10202060
text: Thanks to Elizabeth, Diane and Meliodas snap out of it, but Elizabeth sustained severe injuries from Ruin's attacks. However, she stubbornly insists on accompanying them to Baste Prison. Diane acknowledges her determination and puts Elizabeth in her backpack so they can go together.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10203010
text: Meliodas sends Ruin flying all the way to Baste Prison. Ruin brags about his rock-hard physique, but Meliodas defeats him with a single strike for hurting someone dear to him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10203020
text: Meliodas and crew reunite at the entrance to Baste Prison. However, no one seems to be there, as if everyone has run away.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10203030
text: After wandering inside Baste Prison, Meliodas and crew finally find Ban, [b]The Fox Sin of Greed[/b]. Ban charges Meliodas with a barrage of attacks as a way of saying hello.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10203040
text: Meliodas and crew are inside Baste Prison. Golgius, who'd been watching them, uses the Eternal Seal Spell to seal [The Seven Deadly Sins] within Baste Prison.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10203050
text: Ban and Meliodas fight a fierce battle to express how happy they are to see each other. Hawk is bewildered, but Diane isn't surprised by their antics.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10203060
text: Baste Prison collapses due to Meliodas and Ban's fierce battle, and the shock from the collapse breaks the "Eternal Seal Spell" as well.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10250010
text: Meliodas and crew find more and more bugs as they go deeper into the forest. The number of insects is simply unfathomable.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10250020
text: Meliodas and crew realize the bugs in the forest aren't just any bugs. They're Freesia's insects, the creatures that attacked Dalmally.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10250030
text: The forest may be an ideal habitat for insects, but there are too many around for it to be natural. [The Seven Deadly Sins] are having trouble with this, because no matter how many they get rid of, there always seem to be more. Then the Watchmen who are responsible for the poisonous insects appear.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10250040
text: The watchmen say they had no choice but to breed the poisonous insects because Freesia threatened them. They're shocked to hear that their bugs were used to attack Dalmally, where their families live.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10251010
text: Meliodas and crew travel deeper into the forest, and arrive at the Insect Queen's home. Elite insects that protect the queen appear before the crew.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10251020
text: Hawk manages to keep the poisonous bugs' toxins from melting Elizabeth's skirt off. Meliodas looks a bit disappointed for some reason and scolds Hawk.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10251030
text: The Insect Queen propagates her race by laying tens of thousands of eggs each day. Despite sounding weak, the queen appears quite formidable.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10251040
text: Meliodas says a new Insect Queen will appear after this one is eliminated. That said, he's sure the poisonous insects will be completely eradicated one day if the Insect Queen is regularly dealt with.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10252010
text: Mysterious structures suddenly appear in the plain after a landslide. Elizabeth says their architecture style is from ancient times. Could the landslide have uncovered some ancient ruins?

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10252020
text: Meliodas and crew are thoroughly surprised to come across skeleton warriors. Meliodas says they're Specters of warriors that were killed during a war with the Demons 3,000 years ago.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10252030
text: Meliodas and crew meet an actual living Human being in the ancient ruins, but he's frightened out of his wits.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10252040
text: The man claims he was exploring the ruins, but it turns out he was really there to loot the place. The looter pleads with Meliodas and crew to save his friend, but the they decide to head back to the village first.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10253010
text: After hearing the looter talk of treasure, Hawk enthusiastically digs at the ground. Sadly, all he uncovers is a skull. The group finally finds the looter's missing friend.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10253020
text: Meliodas and crew rescue the looter and return him to the village. They then try to come up with a way to put the ancient warriors back to sleep.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10253030
text: Another landslide rocks the ruins, awakening the grave's true master. The ancient warrior leader mistakes Meliodas for a Demon and launches a series of formidable attacks.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10253040
text: When the Demons were sealed away after the ancient war, the ancient warriors were laid to rest as well. Why have they awakened?

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10254010
text: Diane believes the ancient warriors were awakened by accident. To put them back to sleep, she stomps on the ground to cause another landslide.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10254020
text: Meliodas and crew receive a strange invitation, and arrive to find themselves before a Giant Chessboard. The soldiers there challenge the group to a game of Human chess.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10254030
text: Meliodas makes a mistake that almost costs Hawk his life. Fortunately, Elizabeth uses her wits to keep Hawk alive.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10254040
text: To defeat the king, the knights must be drawn away. Meliodas tells Hawk that they should use their most useless piece to lure the Knights away. It turns out the useless piece was Hawk.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10254050
text: Meliodas's plan goes off without a hitch, and they get rid of the Knights. Hawk asks if the queen is the strongest chess piece, and Meliodas answers that there is no such thing as a strongest piece in chess.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10254060
text: Elizabeth played a great game of chess. She says King Bartra taught her how to play.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_10301010
text: Backed into a corner, the soldier suddenly asks Meliodas for a one-on-one match, but Meliodas rejects his request. He then declares checkmate.
