text: Jenna leads the remaining members of the group to the Training Grotto. King sees Hendrickson and is shocked.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008190
text: Jenna asks that the group lower their hostility toward Hendrickson for her sake. King's anger isn't so easily calmed, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008191
text: Something is at the entrance of the Training Grotto. It's hard to tell what it is, but it smells kind of delicious like something's been roasted.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008200
text: Jenna urges to group to begin the training. King still doesn't seem to be in the mood, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008201
text: Gilthunder and Howzer are paired up again. Their bickering lasts only a short while before fighting to the fullest in the Training Grotto.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008202
text: Jenna leads the ones who are prepared into the Training Grotto.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008203
text: Gowther and Arthur are paired up in the Training Grotto.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008210
text: The two prepare for combat when they discover the enemy.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008220
text: King says he'll go into the Training Grotto too. Jenna tells him that only groups of two may enter the Training Grotto and suggests entering with Hendrickson. Seeing King flustered, Meliodas says he'll be his partner.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008221
text: Meliodas says not everything can be revealed right now. King declares that he'll be watching Meliodas.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008230
text: When Jenna asks why they fought, Meliodas avoids answering with a silly joke. He then tells Jenna to give him his power back.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008240
text: Meliodas asks Merlin to send him to the location of [The Ten Commandments] for a brief moment. Merlin warns him that there will be a delay before she can bring him back again.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008250
text: Gilthunder asks King where Ban is, but King doesn't know his whereabouts either.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008260
text: In the harbor town of Ivanloch, Ban hears rumors of someone who came back from the dead. He heads for Ravens, the city of thieves.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008261
text: Ban is annoyed by Jericho since she keeps following him. On the other hand, Jericho tells Ban that she'll continue following him, claiming things will be easier with her than without.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008270
text: Jericho seems thoroughly annoyed by the endless appearance of monsters.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008280
text: Learning that more Demons have been appearing more and more frequently, the two begin to get worried about the others.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008290
text: Thinking it will be difficult to gather information from a tavern, Ban gets up to leave. This was to avoid trouble, but such a thing is not so easy in Ravens.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008300
text: Ban takes down his opponents in the blink of an eye and is disappointed by the unsatisfying fight. As Ban was about to recall memories of the best sparring partner he's had, he shakes it off and hurriedly continues on his way.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008310
text: Ban rescues the vagrant who was surrounded by bandits. Jericho is surprised by the fact that the vagrant is a Werefox.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008320
text: The defeated bandits returned with their gang in tow and begin causing trouble. Ban can't stand that his reunion is interrupted by loud commotion.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008330
text: Meliodas taunted [The Ten Commandments] in order to separate them from one another to handle them one by one. While Meliodas is explaining the strategy, the rest of the group emerge from the Training Grotto.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008340
text: Meliodas cheers Elizabeth up after she fails to pass Zaneri's test.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3008350
text: Everyone checks the results of their training through their Combat Class. They decide to look for the final member of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_3010090
text: Arthur and Meliodas are eating a mysterious and delicious meal.\nWhile the two argue about who will recruit the chef, someone appears before them.\nIt was none other than Ban.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010010
text: Elizabeth has prepared a special training regimen\nfor the Trio of Troublemakers, the trusted protectors of Liones.\nThe trio begin their training to block attacks by combining their powers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010020
text: Fed up with just defending,\nHowzer recklessly tries to attack.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010030
text: Gilthunder says attacking is not the only option.\nThey try to come up with a more solid plan this time around.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010040
text: The Trio of Troublemakers are exhausted by the continued training.\nThis time, Griamore resolves to protect everyone.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010050
text: The Trio of Troublemakers perfect their teamwork.\nTheir sense of accomplishment makes them forget they were ever tired.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010110
text: Jericho is angry because Ban left her without saying a word.\nShe tries to calm her nerves with a training session.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010120
text: Jericho sees Guila walking by and asks her to help out with the training.\nThis confuses Guila, but she agrees to help her.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010130
text: In the midst of their training, Guila asks Jericho if she is broken-hearted. Jericho strongly denies it, but everyone wishes her well.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010210
text: Diane and Gowther begin their training in order to increase tavern profits. The continued training turns to complaining, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010220
text: Diane is upset because she's dealing with a rude customer.\nShe announces that she will kick out any and all bad customers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010230
text: Elizabeth suggests changing up their training instead of repeating the same routine.\nComing up with new ideas is not easy, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010310
text: Elizabeth and Hawk want to see Ban's power of immortality.\nBan is confident any attackers will always tire themselves out first.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010320
text: Ban says he wants to have fun and fight instead of just taking the attacks.\nThis time, he's demonstrating his skills.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010330
text: Ban's wounds heal quickly, but it does tire him out.\nYet, he still has enough energy left to fight.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010340
text: To someone like Ban who loves a good brawl,\na little dizziness is not really an issue.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010410
text: Hawk has brought Merlin's secret plans that could make Hawk fly.\nWanting to help Hawk, Elizabeth asks the Fairies, King and Helbram, to help him learn to fly.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010420
text: King tries to teach Hawk how to fly.\nMeanwhile, Helbram looks on with complicated thoughts.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80010430
text: King, Hawk, and Elizabeth are looking for\na way to make Hawk fly properly.\nHelbram thinks it's hopeless, but agrees to help out for now.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020010
text: Valenti suddenly appears in front of the Bellato that are having a hard time from the mine collapse. She suggests that they make a deal, saying that she'll be able to solve their problems.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020020
text: Valenti fells the Crystal Golem and saves the Bellato. She requests 300 wheelbarrows full of crystals as payment.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020030
text: The Bellato are having a difficult time due to Valenti's excessive request, but Valenti claims that the price is fair.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020040
text: Valenti faces difficulties when the Bellato want to cancel their deal. She argues that if the deal is off, she must return their lives back to the conditions they faced before she helped them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020050
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] arrive at the Bellatona Plateau at Valenti's call for help. They find Valenti and immediately start to deal with the situation.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020060
text: Valenti says that she'd only been conducting research and that she made a deal with the Bellato. She requests that they not meddle.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020070
text: Valenti goes further into the mine to escape [The Seven Deadly Sins], who are in hot pursuit.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020080
text: Valenti learns that the crystals from the mine possess a special power. Lillia chooses that moment to come to her rescue.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020090
text: Valenti suggests to Lillia that they call for a new ally with the crystals in the area.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_80020100
text: The summoning spell succeeds but the new colleague is nowhere in sight. Merlin must have other intentions, as she's let Lillia and Valenti escape.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010110
text: Meliodas and Gilthunder reunite in the Forest of White Dreams after 10 years, but Gilthunder is hostile towards Meliodas.\nGilthunder tells him why the Holy Knights are after [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010120
text: Gilthunder says Meliodas is his father's murderer.\nMeliodas tries to explain what happened the day the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights died, but Gilthunder refuses to listen.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010210
text: Ban lived a life of getting executed over and over, every day.\nMeliodas's eventual appearance is little more than a nuisance to him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010220
text: When Ban goads Meliodas into dragging him out by force, Meliodas does just that. Ban is intrigued and delighted by his fascinating new opponent.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010310
text: Meliodas walks up to a group of mercenaries gathered around a recruitment post.\nThe mercenaries take one look at him and judge him based on his appearance.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010320
text: The mercenaries who belittled Meliodas are taken down a peg by his awesome strength.\nThe mercenary captain who watched all of this unfold laughs and says that this happens every time.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010410
text: Diane and King want to know how Meliodas was given the mark of [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b].\nBased on old rumors, they assume it's probably because he's capable of being extremely scary when enraged.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010420
text: King and Diane observe Meliodas and Ban's petty bickering and are confused how Meliodas ever received the mark of [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010510
text: Meliodas has a nightmare.\nHe meets his double, who pours salt on his wounds and enrages him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91010520
text: Elizabeth wakes Meliodas from his nightmare.\nHe can't shake his sense of unease, however...

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020110
text: Hawk belittles Diane over her desire to be the tavern mascot. Eventually, a fight breaks out between the two.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020120
text: Hawk gets walloped by Diane. Diane wants Meliodas to decide who the mascot should be, and Meliodas tries to appease the two by saying Diane is the mascot of the tavern's exterior and Hawk is for its interior.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020210
text: Elizabeth and Hawk are looking after the tavern while Meliodas is away. A drunk customer refuses to pay his bill.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020220
text: Hawk and Elizabeth succeed in getting the drunk customer's money. Just in time, Meliodas returns and asks if anything happened while he was gone. Hawk and Elizabeth smile knowingly at each other and say everything was just fine.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020310
text: Profits are taking a nosedive and the tavern's in danger of getting shut down. Hawk demands that Meliodas hand him the tavern deed. Meliodas has no intention of doing that, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020320
text: Meliodas shuts Hawk down for demanding ownership of the tavern and promises to hire a new chef to oversee the tavern's cooking.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020330
text: Hawk is concerned that Elizabeth's kind personality brings in the rudest customers. He comes up with a special plan to change her personality.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91020340
text: Elizabeth successfully stops the knights from fighting each other and heads back to the tavern with boosted confidence. Meliodas thanks the knights for their brilliant acting and pats his own back for coming up with the idea.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030110
text: After the disbandment of [The Seven Deadly Sins], Diane wanders alone until she meets the Hide and Seeks in the Forest of White Dreams.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030120
text: Diane dominates the Hide and Seeks and settles down in the Forest of White Dreams. She orders them to keep guard and prevent any Holy Knights from entering the forest, and she then promptly falls asleep.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030130
text: Hawk begs Diane to teach him the sacred Giant dance that interacts with the earth. Diane gives in, but her attempts to show him inadvertently angers the neighboring dragons.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030140
text: Diane and Hawk deal with the dragons. Hawk gives up on his dream of learning the dance of the Giants.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030210
text: Diane asks Meliodas who he would save first if she and Elizabeth were drowning.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030220
text: Meliodas tries to evade Diane's persistent questioning by saying how important they both are to him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030310
text: Meliodas and Diane are on a mission to eliminate the brutal dragons. Taking on a bunch of riled-up dragons proves harder than expected, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91030320
text: Ban only has excuses when he shows up long after Meliodas and Diane have already defeated the dragons.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040110
text: While training some Knights, Gilthunder clashes with members of the New Generation. The Apprentice Holy Knights are disrespectful to Gilthunder, their superior. Gilthunder says they will pay the price for their insolence.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040120
text: The New Generation Apprentice Holy Knights get clobbered by Gilthunder. When they suddenly gain strength after the fight, Gilthunder becomes suspicious.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040130
text: While sparring with Howzer, Gilthunder notices his attacks are being subtly deflected. After realizing Vivian is to blame, he becomes incredibly irritated.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040140
text: Vivian claims that everything she does is for Gilthunder, but Gilthunder is sick and tired of her suffocating him with acts of so-called love.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040210
text: A horde of Barbarian warriors descend from the north to invade Britannia. The Barbarian Chieftan rallies the warriors to push forth and capture the capital of Liones. Sent from capital, Gilthunder and Howzer arrive at the battlefield to stop the Barbarians.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040220
text: The Barbarian horde falls into a state of panic after a mere two people bring them to their knees. Gilthunder wants to return to the capital immediately, but Howzer tries to convince him otherwise. Gilthunder accepts his orders and gets ready to head back.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040310
text: Due to their disparate origins, Gilthunder and Howzer frequently butt heads in spite of their friendship. Another petty argument breaks out between the two.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91040320
text: Gilthunder gains the upper hand on Howzer. Feelings start to get tense between the two. Griamore shows up and forces them to make up.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050110
text: Ban slips out of prison when he hears about the emergence of [The Seven Deadly Sins]. The Apprentice Holy Knight Jericho confronts him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050120
text: Ban cries out in pain when Jericho attacks. It turns out to have been an act, and Ban is completely unscathed. In fact, Ban used Jericho's attacks to trim his unruly beard and hair. He humiliates her by complimenting her talents as a barber.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050130
text: Whenever his stolen clothes get ruined, Ban goes to the original owner to rob him again. Finally, the poor man decides he's had enough and moves to a different village. Ban is forced to rely on himself and seek out materials to make clothing.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050140
text: Ban secures the materials he needs to make clothes, but he doesn't know how to sew. He asks the mother of the man he robbed to make some for him, but it seems unlikely that she'll accept.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050211
text: Meliodas and crew join the preliminaries of the Vaizel Fight Festival. Since they're just tryouts, they decide not to take them too seriously. Suddenly, Ban sees someone wearing an outfit that fits his criteria.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050220
text: Ban succeeds in robbing a Fight Festival participant of his clothes. He seems extremely pleased with himself.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050310
text: 10 years ago, Ban was on a mission and ended up brawling with some people speaking ill of Meliodas.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050320
text: Meliodas shows up and mediates the conflict. He asks how the fight got started, but Ban shrugs this off and leaves.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050510
text: A passerby provokes Ban, who stayed up all night for the chance to buy a limited edition ale. This starts a massive fight.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050520
text: Ban runs into Meliodas on his way back with his precious limited edition ale. Meliodas shakes his head at him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050610
text: Ban is fascinated by the broken blade Meliodas keeps on him at all times. He wants to hold it, but Meliodas stops him in his tracks. This only stokes Ban's curiosity, and he makes a grab at it.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050620
text: Meliodas wounds Ban. Strangely, the wound doesn't instantly heal.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050710
text: The dragons pose a big problem for the mercenaries. It seems like they're waiting for someone.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91050720
text: After helping out the mercenaries, Ban says it's time for him to go. He parts with the disappointed mercenary captain.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91070110
text: Apprentice Holy Knights Twigo and Jericho await sentencing for the crime of letting the treasonous [Seven Deadly Sins] slip through their fingers. Cardinal Helbram offers them a very special opportunity.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91070120
text: Jericho and Twigo barely pass Cardinal Helbram's test. Twigo proclaims he will go eliminate [The Seven Deadly Sins] immediately, but Cardinal Helbram has something else in mind for him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91070230
text: Jericho intends to covertly pursue Ban away from prying eyes. When Gustav protests, she responds by saying she just wants to keep an eye on troublemakers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91070240
text: Jericho leaves in hot pursuit of Ban, despite Gustav's misgivings. Gustav calls out to her with his voice full of regret...

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91070310
text: Jericho returns after following the [Roars of Dawn] incognito. She finds herself unable to focus on her training, even while sparring with Guila.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91070320
text: Jericho describes the monster alleged to be the Armor Giant. The monster supposedly radiated  with the force of a Demon and a Holy Knight. This force was remarkably similar to that of the New Generation Jericho and Guila.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91070410
text: Jericho has been hard at work training alone, focusing while yelling at herself to attack faster. Howzer happens to witness it all and attempts to encourage her further.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91080130
text: Golgius has the power of "Invisibility." He gets mistaken for a pervert after practicing his powers without regarding his surroundings.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91080140
text: The patrolman apologizes to Golgius for not recognizing him as a Holy Knight. Ordinarily Golgius would exact punishment for such an offense, but he decides to let it go since it was a misunderstanding. He then promptly vanishes.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91090130
text: Ruin maintains that a strong physique is just as valuable, if not more so, as a suit of armor. Hugo gets upset about this, as his armor is especially strong and heavy.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91090140
text: Hugo and Simon attack Ruin as though they're trying to obliterate him. Too bad they're actually attacking a training scarecrow.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91100110
text: Freesia orders the residents of a village to raise poisonous insects for her, but they refuse to perform such a dangerous task.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91100120
text: The villagers are seriously injured for rejecting Freesia's orders. In the end, they're left with no choice but to raise the poisonous insects.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91110110
text: Helbram wants to race King and see who can fly faster. King doesn't see the point in competing, but he gives in to Helbram's persistent urging.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91110120
text: King wins the race despite his lack of wings. Helbram lavishes him with praise, saying he expected as much from a king.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91110210
text: The peaceful Fairy King's Forest is invaded by the greedy Gorra. The Fairy King orders the Fairies to prepare for battle and transforms to look unlike his usual self in anticipation.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91110220
text: King and the Fairies successfully fight off the Gorra and protect the forest. Helbram applies some medicine given to him by Humans. Seeing this, King warns him that Humans are not to be trusted.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91110310
text: As usual, Ban shows up to his mission completely drunk. King is aggravated by how Ban never helps out on missions.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91110320
text: Fed up with Ban's incompetence, King tells Meliodas he wants to skip missions where he has to work with Ban.\nMeliodas thinks the two make a good pair in spite of this.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91120130
text: Gustav and Guila talk about their younger siblings, but they accidentally hurt each other's feelings when their pride gets in the way.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91120140
text: Gustav apologizes to Guila for crossing the line.\nGuila lets him know she appreciates his maturity.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91120210
text: Guila's little brother, Zeal, is being targeted by neighborhood thugs.\nThey conspire with each other to set fire to Zeal's house.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91120220
text: Guila brutally slaughters the thugs who bullied her brother.\nShe swears she would do anything for him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91130110
text: Gowther dresses up in Diane's hostess uniform\nwithout her permission. Diane chews him out,\nbut he still refuses to hand the uniform over.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91130120
text:
Gowther doesn't get why Diane is so attached to her uniform.
She explains it's because she doesn't always get to wear it,
especially when she's at full size. This helps Gowther understand,
but he still refuses to take it off.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91130210
text:
Diane shrinks in size and goes around looking like a cute,
ordinary girl. A young man in the village asks her out for tea,
and Howzer sets out to protect Diane
from such a good-for-nothing scoundrel
who would harass a woman in the middle of the day.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91130220
text:
Howzer expects Diane to shower him with praise
for scaring the young man away,
but she tells him off instead.
Apparently Diane actually wanted to go out for tea with him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91130310
text: Diane's small size tricks Hawk\ninto thinking he can get away with being cheeky.\nHawk quickly learns how wrong he is.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91130320
text: Hawk thinks it's unfair Diane is still so strong\nwhen she's the size of a regular Human.\nShe smiles and says shrinking in size doesn't equal a loss in power.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91140130
text: Howzer is on his way out dressed to the nines\nwhen King blocks his way,\ngrilling him on whether he's about to go on a date with Diane.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91140140
text: As it turns out, Diane went out with Elizabeth\nto have some girl time. King feels guilty\nabout jumping to conclusions and harassing Howzer.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91140210
text: Howzer gets some intel about the Fight Festival.\nHe vows to participate this year, but Gilthunder tries to deter him\nbecause there's an out-of-town mission.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91140220
text:
Gilthunder suddenly gives up.
Overjoyed that he got his way,
Howzer heads to the Fight Festival.
Gilthunder looks on, sighs, and shakes his head.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91140310
text: Howzer doesn't understand why Griamore is so loyal to Veronica.\nHe gets into a fight with Griamore\nwhile talking about Veronica's personality.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91140320
text: The fight ends when Gilthunder intervenes.\nGilthunder reproaches Howzer, and Howzer responds\nby saying it especially hurts to be insulted by a friend.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91150110
text:
Howzer, Griamore, and Cain get crushed at the Fight Festival.
Though they lost to [The Seven Deadly Sins],
the three men are still confident in their skills
and decide to hold their own consolation match
to pick a winner amongst themselves.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91150120
text: The fight drags on, and a winner has yet to emerge.\nThe three keep fighting and fighting until they achieve an outcome.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91150130
text: Griamore receives a new outfit for his victory in the Arena,\nbut Howzer chides him instead of offering congratulations.\nThis hurts Griamore's feelings and he lashes out at Howzer.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91150140
text:
Howzer tells Griamore he didn't mean to be hurtful.
He says he feels like he doesn't stand a chance in a fight
when he looks at the tremendous strength of those around him.
This causes Griamore to feel a little down for similar reasons.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91150310
text:
Griamore overhears some soldiers speaking ill of Veronica
while gossiping about her attractiveness.
He furiously punishes the soldiers himself
for the crime of insulting the royal family.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91150320
text:
Veronica chastises Griamore
for cracking down on the soldiers yet again,
instructing him to just let it go next time.
Griamore insists he will do no such thing.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91160130
text: Cain has dreams where Danafor hasn't been destroyed and he serves the kingdom as the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91160140
text:
Cain knows he's dreaming,
but enjoys his fake life in Danafor nonetheless.
In reality, he's just an old drunkard
watching from the sidelines at the Vaizel Fight Festival.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91170110
text: Alan and the Armor Giant flee from the Holy Knights,\nbut the Holy Knights catch up with them faster than they expected.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91170120
text: After defeating all of the Holy Knights,\nAlan and the Armor Giant take off in search of a place\nwhere the Holy Knights won't find them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91170310
text: Gowther and Guila's date is interrupted by a thug.\nApparently, dealing with disruptive hooligans\non a date is a man's job...

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91170320
text: After dealing with the thug,\nGuila and Gowther pick up where they left off\nas if nothing happened.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91170410
text: Gowther gets a new suit of armor.\nHe questions its small size and seeks out Ban,\nhaving decided further testing is needed.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91170420
text: Gowther successfully subdues Ban.\nSatisfied with the results of his test,\nhe makes a speedy return to Merlin.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91180110
text:
One of the king's favorites, Gilthunder,
is a constant thorn in Slater's side.
His jealously finally gets the better of him,
and he snaps and picks a fight with Gilthunder.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91180120
text:
Bartra appears when he hears about the fight
between Gilthunder and Slater.
After stressing that he trusts and favors them both equally,
he requests that they work together for the good of Liones.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91180130
text:
Despite having become one of the highest ranking
Holy Knights based purely on skill,
Slater doesn't get along with people well.
This causes some friction with the other Knights.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91180140
text:
Bartra intervenes and de-escalates the situation.
Touched by how highly Bartra thinks of him,
Slater swears to live the rest of his life
serving as the shadow of the king.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91190130
text: Simon stops at a tavern to get a drink.\nThanks to his baby face,\nhe's taunted by the tavern's owner and customers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91190140
text: Simon finally blows a gasket and wrecks the tavern.\nWhile watching this unfold,\nWeinheidt admits he's surprised that Simon isn't an actual child.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91200110
text: Simon makes a dig at Weinheidt's archery skills.\nWeinheidt suggests they make a bet.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91200120
text: Simon bets Weinheidt he can guess the number of arrows he fired.\nSimon guesses Weinheidt fired 8 arrows, but he actually fired 10.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91210110
text:
The Holy Knights ridicule Jillian for being a woman,
even though she's a member of the [Roars of Dawn].
Jillian decides to set the record straight
and show them what she's got.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91210120
text: Jillian subdues the Holy Knights who belittled her for being a woman.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91210130
text: Slater visits Jillian and seems to know almost everything about her.\nShe demands to know who he is,\nbut he refuses to answer any of her questions.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91210140
text: Slater finally tells Jillian who he is after concluding their fight.\nHe then inducts her into the [Roars of Dawn] against her will.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91220110
text: Simon is carefree and unruly, but Hugo is stubborn and inflexible.\nThe two of them butt heads constantly on missions.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91220120
text: Jillian asks Slater why he paired Hugo and Simon.\nSlater explains the two will make up for each other's shortcomings.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91220130
text: Hugo hears that the [Roars of Dawn] are recruiting and shows up to apply. He offers to go through their test to become a member of the Knighthood.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91220140
text: Hugo passes the test with flying colors.\nHe earns the respect of his hero, Slater,\nand becomes a member of the [Roars of Dawn].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91220150
text: The Knights of the [Roars of Dawn] are sent on a mission\nto deal with a group of bandits\npretending to be [The Seven Deadly Sins] without Slater.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91220160
text: The [Roars of Dawn] only need an instant\nto complete their mission. They want a chance\nto go toe-to-toe with [The Seven Deadly Sins] for real.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91230110
text: Elizabeth greets King while minding the tavern on her own.\nThey're ambushed by a group of Gorra that snuck in behind King,\nand the two join forces to protect the tavern.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91230120
text:
King and Elizabeth successfully fight off the Gorra together.
King has a tendency to transform into a hefty,
haggard form in times of stress.
Elizabeth seems to get uncomfortable when King looks like this.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91230210
text:
King and Gowther of [The Seven Deadly Sins]
are on a mission to eliminate Werebears.
Gowther holds back from engaging.
When King says something about it,
he finally springs into action and makes a heroic entrance.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91230220
text:
King takes a breather after defeating the Werebears,
but is surprised when Gowther says something
about showing up at the last minute and taking
all the credit. This was another impractical insight
Gowther gained from reading books.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91230310
text: Diane wants to start sleeping inside since she's shrunk.\nThis starts a fight between the group\nabout which rooms they're going to occupy.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91230320
text: Hawk inserts himself into the fight over room assignments.\nHe suggests splitting the boys and girls into separate rooms.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240110
text: Elizabeth keeps making mistakes while waiting tables.\nHer customers lose their patience,\nbut Hawk steps in and sides with Elizabeth.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240120
text:
Hawk and the customers almost come to blows,
but the tavern's other patrons side with Elizabeth.
Having been shamed by the other patrons,
the rude customers leave.
Elizabeth gives her heartfelt thanks to the rest of the tavern patrons.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240130
text: Elizabeth is feeling under the weather, so Veronica fills in for the day.\nUnfortunately, Veronica is terrible at her job.\nAll she does is start a fight with the customers.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240140
text:
Elizabeth and Hawk send Veronica and Griamore back
for arguing with customers.
It's probably for the best to not have them work
in the tavern ever again.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240210
text: When the Holy Knights imprison the royal family\nin their own castle, Elizabeth escapes\nin an attempt to find [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240220
text: Elizabeth evades the Holy Knights.\nShe dons an enormous suit of armor to hide her identity.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240310
text:
Hawk and Diane make a bet to see if Elizabeth
is capable of getting mad. They pretend to fight in front of Elizabeth,
and she tries to reason with the two
before finally getting... kind of angry?

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91240320
text: Hawk is crestfallen by Elizabeth's anger.\nElizabeth sooths him tenderly.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250110
text: Merlin enters her laboratory where she keeps\nthe guinea pigs she's collected over time.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250120
text: Merlin studies her guinea pigs' magic\nby fighting them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250210
text:
Merlin breaks from formation while on a mission.
King criticizes her behavior as a partner,
but that doesn't stop her from acting on her own.
Merlin's sights are set on the ancient book a Dragon is sitting on.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250220
text: Merlin and King goad the dragon into getting up from its spot.\nMerlin gains the knowledge she sought,\nbut it comes at the expense of wiping a village off the map.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250310
text: Merlin goes to her laboratory where she keeps all the guinea pigs\nshe's collected over the years.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250320
text: Merlin studies her guinea pigs' magic by battling them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250410
text:
Merlin leaves her laboratory unattended.
A group of suspicious mages break in.
Instead of stealing research materials from the lab like they hoped,
they end up getting collared by Merlin when she returns.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91250420
text:
Meliodas had been on Merlin's tail,
and he arrives after themages are scared off.
He asks her what she'd been doing,
and she smiles and says she was giving a "test of courage."

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91260110
text: Helbram and the other Fairies go with the One-Eyed Warrior,\nwho offers to show them the Human world.\nLittle do they know they're being set up to lose their Fairy wings.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91260120
text: Helbram attacks the One-Eyed Warrior\nwith all the strength he can muster, but he still fails to defeat him.\nHe has no choice but to flee, leaving his dying friends behind.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91260210
text: Helbram learns the trees in the western part of the forest\nare unable to sprout, suffocated by the darkness.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91260220
text: Helbram goes to the trees with a group of Fairies\nto drive out the darkness.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91260310
text:
Helbram explains that the Human world is hierarchical.
When his friends have trouble understanding the concept,
he suggests he behave like an aristocrat and accidentally ends up
hurting their feelings. When King returns and sees this,
he misunderstands what's going on.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91260320
text: Helbram explains the situation to King.\nKing struggles to understand why the Humans\nwould implement a hierarchy in their world.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91270110
text:
Gustav ponders Jericho's explosive growth in power.
He fears what Helbram might have done to his sister.
Gustav demands an explanation,
but Helbram treats this like an insult and becomes enraged.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91270120
text: Gustav is confronting Helbram when Jericho returns.\nHe is forced to back down when his irritated sister breaks the two apart.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91280110
text: Hendrickson is pushing the Holy Knights\nhard during training to prepare for a holy war,\nand the Holy Knights push back.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91280120
text: The rebelling Holy Knights soon admit defeat\nwhen confronted with Hendrickson's tremendous power.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91280210
text: The Barbarians have pushed their way through\nto the border of Liones. They have the upper hand\non the Holy Knights until Hendrickson appears.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91280220
text: The Liones Holy Knights achieve victory\nthanks to Hendrickson's performance.\nThe Knights shower him with praise.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91290110
text: Dreyfus is Hendrickson's friend and rival.\nThe two of them bicker over how the Holy Knights\nshould be run as an organization.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91290120
text: Dreyfus suddenly lowers his guard in the middle of combat,\nsaying this isn't what his late brother would have wanted.\nHendrickson sneers at him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91290210
text:
Dreyfus goes on vacation, but he can't stop worrying
about the Holy Knights the entire time.
Howzer asks why he doesn't return if he's going to keep worrying,
but Dreyfus insists on taking his holiday.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91290220
text: When Dreyfus sees how lazy the Holy Knights have become during his absence, he returns to the castle.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91300130
text: Someone left a book behind at the tavern.\nIt's titled "The Legend of Allioni."

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91300140
text: The book seems to have been written in praise of Allioni.\nIt's not very entertaining, but everyone's very curious about how it ends.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91310150
text:
Twigo feels his powers grow
after drinking the Demon's blood Hendrickson gave him.
He's thrilled at the prospect of exacting revenge
against [The Seven Deadly Sins] when Meliodas appears before him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91310160
text:
Twigo makes short work of Meliodas.
He then realizes that he's not experiencing reality.
Unfortunately, what he doesn't realize
is that he's actually on the verge of death.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91320030
text: The group gets scattered and Ban wanders about on his own.\nHe runs into Jude of the [Weird Fangs].

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91320040
text: Ban lets Jude capture him.\nIt doesn't look like he's planning on going anywhere for awhile.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91330050
text:
Marmas's maracas aren't sounding quite right,
so he takes them to a technician.
The technician says the little balls inside the maracas
have worn down and need to be replaced.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91330060
text:
Marmas gets his hands on the fangs of a dragon
to craft maraca balls. After going through hell and back to get them,
he's dispirited when he learns
he could've used something other than dragon fangs.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91340030
text:
Taizoo comes across one of the Vaizel
Fight Festival participants causing a scene.
Taizoo is so turned off by this unsportsmanlike behavior
that he decides to teach him a lesson.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91340040
text: Taizoo teaches the participant a lesson\nand orders him to pay his outstanding bills.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91350050
text: Vivian loses her temper when she overhears\nthe Mages of Liones gossiping about her twisted personality\nand her obsession with Gilthunder...

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91350060
text: No matter what anyone else says or thinks,\nall Vivian cares about is Gilthunder, Gilthunder, Gilthunder...

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91360010
text: Arthur keeps asking Meliodas to teach him sword skills.\nMeliodas refuses at first, but eventually\nends up sparring with him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91360020
text:
Meliodas says they should wrap it up,
but Arthur wants to keep training.
Meliodas acknowledges Arthur's enthusiasm
and resumes training.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91360030
text: Arthur is making his way to Camelot using a map.\nA gang of bandits stops him and demand that\nhe hand over his money.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91360040
text:
Arthur successfully defeats the bandit guild.
When he was about to ask the cowering bandits
the way to Camelot, Merlin appears out of nowhere,
scaring the bandits away. Merlin tells Arthur not to worry
because she knows the way.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91370010
text:
Lillia, a student of Merlin, wants to
learn more powerful magic.
Merlin tells her off, citing her impatience.
This angers Lillia greatly, causing her to declare
the end to her apprenticeship.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91370020
text:
Merlin praises Lillia for the incredible
progress she's made in her summoning magic,
but is quick to point out the things she's doing incorrectly.
The lack of acknowledgement angers Lillia,
and she vanishes from sight.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91370030
text: Lillia is climbing a mountain rumored to be dangerous in recent times\nwith a forest ranger. The forest ranger gets a bad feeling\nfrom the gloomy mountain path.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91370040
text: Lillia makes a sacrificial offering with the forest ranger,\nbut she does not achieve her goal. She uses\na different passerby to make another offering.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91380010
text:
Elaine misses her brother who has not returned for 700 years.
Fairies who had been driving out the monsters outside the town
come to ask Elaine for help. She heads to
the monsters' location after brief hesitation.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91380020
text: After driving the monsters away and returning to the Fountain of Youth,\nElaine fatefully meets Ban, a Human who came\nto steal from the fountain.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91390010
text: Galland is displeased with the fact that Humans currently rule Britannia, unlike 3,000 years ago. Melascula tells him all they need to do is devour their souls. At that moment, Liones border guards show up. Galland proposes his signature "Galland Game" to see who can eat more souls of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91390020
text: Galland narrowly loses to Melascula. He doesn't like how the game turned out, but accepts the defeat because of his commandment's curse.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91400010
text: Ban picks up a random notebook and reads the poem written inside to Meliodas and Escanor with glee. Suddenly, Escanor becomes angry.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91400020
text: It turns out that it was Escanor's notebook. Ban hands him back the notebook, but Escanor leaves, saying he can no longer use the notebook. Ban is stupefied.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91400030
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] set out to eliminate the Barbarians causing trouble in Northern Liones. Seeing that it's almost noon, Meliodas lures Escanor by telling him that he'll be paired up with Merlin on his next mission.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91400040
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] return to the kingdom after their mission. Escanor is enraged that there are no more missions like Meliodas had promised. Sensing that the evening is drawing nearer, Escanor says that he'll forgive Meliodas just this once.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91410010
text: Melascula and Galland are currently traveling together. Melascula is upset that Galland keeps stealing the souls she gathered bit by bit, but he laughs it off like it's nothing. When Galland swipes another soul from her, Melascula explodes.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91410020
text: Melascula, who had been arguing with Galland, decides that wasting their energy in a fight is not worth it. Galland playfully laughs off her grumbling and the two make up.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91420010
text: [The Ten Commandments] have decided to split up to cover more ground. Monspeet and Derieri are going around absorbing human souls. However, Derieri seems to have gotten tired of hunting down defenseless humans. Monspeet tells her to relax for a bit while he goes to see if there are any humans left.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91420020
text: Monspeet absorbs the souls he gathered, but the hunger remains. Monspeet remembers the Giant girl Diane who slipped away, but decides it's spilled milk. They decide to relocate and leave the town.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91430010
text: Waillo's wish is to marry Deldry, but her response is lukewarm. Seeing this, Arden tells Waillo that a ring is absolutely mandatory for marriage proposals. He tells Waillo to find a blue teardrop crystal to set on the ring.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91430020
text: Waillo says he wasn't able to find a blue teardrop crystal anywhere, but Arden encourages him to keep looking for it. Arden doesn't tell Waillo that it will never be found, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91440010
text: Arden taunts Dogedo over the event at the medal bestowment ceremony. When even Waillo joins in, Dogedo's feeling of humiliation reaches a boiling point and they get into a scuffle.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91440020
text: Deldry shows up at the fight between the three men. After hearing them out, Deldry tells Dogedo that he's being childish for getting into a fight over others recalling something that actually happened.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91450010
text: Deathpierce and Dogedo head out to stop the barbarian ambush at the borders following intel from Deathpierce's aptly named Fairy, "Invisible." Dogedo seems to be fascinated by Deathpierce's unseen friend.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91450020
text: Deathpierce and Dogedo successfully repel the barbarian attack. "Invisible" seems worried that Deathpierce might look like a crazy person when talking to her, but he doesn't seem to mind much.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91460010
text: Valenti goe to the Black Magic Research Hall to take the remaining data with Lillia. Upon hearing that there are mages who can't return to their homes despite wanting to do so, Valenti decides to destroy the place.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91460020
text: Lillia calms Valenti who was about to cause a ruckus. Lillia tells a distressed Valenti that they will destroy this place as soon as their plan comes to fruition.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91480010
text: Drole and Gloxinia are busy preparing Vaizel's Great Fight Festival. Tired of the long wait, he suggests to Drole that they fight to beat their boredom.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91480020
text: Drole wants to know what Gloxinia truly wants. Gloxinia says that the only fitting end for the Humans is destruction.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91490010
text: Arden is suspicious of Deldry, who suddenly left saying she had a prior engagement. Before she is put in danger by a mysterious man trying to trick her, Arden appears.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91490020
text: After saving Deldry, Arden expresses his anger. Deldry is confused by Arden's fit, and he himself is confused by his own actions.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91560010
text: Derieri chimes in after observing Melascula and Galland's petty argument.\nThe two are enraged by Derieri's words and attack her to teach her some manners.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91560020
text: Monspeet steps in to stop the fight and things begin to simmer down.\nDerieri doesn't seem all that interested in having a longwinded conversation, either.

name: DB_guild_boss_mission_082
text: Clear with a Team Combat Class of {0} or higher

name: DB_replay_name_1027
text: [b]The Grizzly Sin of Sloth[/b] Enters the Fray!

name: DB_replay_name_1069
text: The Vanished Coffin of Eternal Darkness

name: DB_replay_name_1087
text: Should I Stay or Should I Go

name: DB_replay_name_1100
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Retreat

name: DB_skip_cutscene_01
text: Closing story replay. You can view them again in the [Replay Story] menu.

name: DB_stage_cut_ch_no_10151010
text: [Sub] [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Main Force

name: DB_stage_cut_name_800001
text: Invader of the Fairy King's Forest

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1001
text: Customers gathered at the Boar Hat trade stories about [The Seven Deadly Sins]. Suddenly, the Rust Knight enters the tavern...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1002
text: Meliodas and Hawk rescue Elizabeth, who was being chased by the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Knights. However, another figure stands in their way...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1003
text: Meliodas and his crew arrive in Vanya. The town is famous for its water and groats, but they are nowhere to be seen! What could've happened to the village?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1004
text: The villagers have branded Mead as the boy who lied. It doesn't seem like he lied about anything in particular though. What could've happened?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1005
text: Mead placed a bug in a Holy Knight's ale out of anger, as the Knight cruelly mocked the villagers. Now the town is in crisis because of his actions. Could there be a way to resolve this?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1006
text: The Holy Knight's subordinates are threatening to raise taxes if the villagers don't pull the Knight's sword from the ground by sunset. Meliodas finally steps forth to help.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1007
text: Peace returns to Vanya when Meliodas pulls out the Holy Knight's sword. Grateful to Meliodas, the villagers decide to celebrate at the Boar Hat.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1008
text: The Boar Hat is packed with Vanya's celebrating villagers. Little do they know, something ominous hurtles through the air towards them...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1009
text: Meliodas has decided it's time to move on from Vanya. He heads to the Forest of White Dreams in search of an ally he last saw 10 years ago.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1010
text: Diane has joined the team! It's time to decide where to go next. Where will Meliodas choose to go?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1011
text: Meliodas collapses after his battle with Gilthunder.\nThe group decides to go to a nearby village to get Meliodas some medical attention.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1012
text: A suspicious shadow approaches the village from afar.\nWhat in the world could it be?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1013
text: Meliodas's caretaker, Dr. Dana, is looking urgently for Elizabeth. Could something have happened to Meliodas?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1014
text: Meliodas is finally awake! But Golgius of the [Weird Fangs], who tried to kill him earlier, has already fled.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1015
text: Golgius threatens Meliodas by popping up all around him. Does he truly have teleportation powers?! There's something fishy about this, especially after what Hawk said. What is Meliodas's plan?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1016
text: Meliodas has successfully lured Golgius into a trap. He questions the cornered Golgius. Will Meliodas get the answer he's looking for?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1017
text: Meliodas and crew successfully defeat Golgius. However, instead of heading to Baste Prison, Elizabeth runs toward the dying Dr. Dana.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1018
text: Elizabeth promises to fight to protect the kingdom and its people.\nThe group heads to Baste Prison\nto rescue Dr. Dana's daughter.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1019
text: Everyone thought Dr. Dana died, but he miraculously survived.\nDr. Dana reunites with his daughter Sennett, who was rescued from Baste Prison.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1020
text: Shooting stars suddenly light up the sky, like in the old Britannian poem that reads "A great threat shall fall upon Britannia when the whole sky is lit by a blazing cross."

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1021
text: After the insect attack, the town of Dalmally was in a bad state. Thanks to everyone's efforts, however, the village slowly returned to its old self.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1022
text: Meliodas proposes visiting the Capital of the Dead, where he suspects the gang might be able to find King. What will the Capital of the Dead be like?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1023
text: Luigi, Ellen's brother, mistakenly believes Ban is to blame when he comes upon him by a collapsed Ellen. Just when it seems Luigi might understand, he attacks Ban. Who is he?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1024
text: Everything's been cleared up between Ban, Luigi, and Ellen. Ban offers to cook something for the two, who look like they haven't had anything to eat in ages.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1025
text: Ban asks the siblings to tell him how to get into the Capital of the Dead as payment for the food he made. Ellen says cherished memories shared with the deceased will lead one to the Capital of the Dead.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1026
text: They're not sure how, but Meliodas and crew managed to get into the Capital of the Dead. Too bad it looks like they weren't the only ones who did!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1027
text: King joins the group after realizing he was wrong about Ban. What's next? Time to get some food and rest!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1028
text: A customer tells Meliodas about a giant hammer in Vaizel that no one can wield. Could this hammer be Gideon, Diane's Sacred Treasure?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1029
text: Vaizel is packed to the gills with people. Meliodas and crew decide to start gathering some intel.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1030
text: Meliodas and crew decide to participate in the Vaizel Fight Festival when they discover Gideon will be awarded to the festival's champion.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1031
text: Fighters have begun drawing lots for the quarterfinals! Now the Fight Festival truly begins for the disguised members of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1032
text: The quarterfinalists have been decided. It looks like one of them is a Holy Knight! Why would a Holy Knight take part in a festival like this?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1033
text: Matrona, the mysterious, powerful fighter, turned out to be a tiny Diane! How did Diane get so small?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1034
text: King will be fighting Cain in the quarterfinals. What kind of skills does this mysterious old man have?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1035
text: The quarterfinalists are so powerful that each of these matches would've been a final in any other year! Who will win this time?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1036
text: Diane makes quick work of Griamore and advances to the semifinals, where she faces the Holy Knight Howzer.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1037
text: Cain advances to the semifinals after defeating King. He seems to be very angry with Meliodas for some reason.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1038
text: The finals at last! It appears Diane doesn't want to fight Meliodas at all. Just when it looks like the finals will end uneventfully, something unexpected happens.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1039
text: Holy Knights have suddenly ambushed Vaizel. Can Meliodas and crew defeat the powerful Knights and overcome this crisis?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1040
text: Meliodas may have lost his broken sword, but he says that all that matters is Elizabeth's safety.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1041
text: With the Holy Knights ferociously chasing him, Meliodas knows he must find the other Deadly Sins. If only he knew where they were! Finally, he decides to head out without any particular destination in mind.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1042
text: The tavern needs cooking ingredients to open up shop. Meliodas suggests that he, King, and Ban compete to see who can bring in the best ingredients.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1043
text: Strange howls can be heard from the far-off Woods of Ordan. What is making these sounds?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1044
text: To celebrate Gowther joining the team, Meliodas and crew set up a campfire. Time for a tasty dinner!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1045
text: Meliodas tries to convince the other members of [The Seven Deadly Sins] to help him recover his stolen sword. Suddenly, a mage appears out of nowhere in the middle of the tavern.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1046
text: Elizabeth has been kidnapped!\nTo make matters worse, the capital is incredibly far away. How can the gang reach the capital as soon as possible?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1047
text: Meliodas and Hendrickson finally meet again after ten years. The man brandishing his sword at Hendrickson introduces himself as Arthur Pendragon, King of Camelot.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1048
text: Gilthunder joins the battle between Meliodas and Hendrickson. Gilthunder levels his sword at Meliodas and tells him that he hasn't forgotten the Knight's Code he heard on "that day."

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1049
text: A woman watches the fight unfold between Gilthunder and Meliodas. She is Margaret, the first princess of Liones.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1050
text: Gilthunder has finally broken free of the curse! Gilthunder imbues his attacks against Hendrickson with his pent-up rage.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1051
text: Unable to accept Gilthunder's betrayal, Vivian becomes enraged. Who will be able to stop her frenzy?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1052
text: Vivian reveals Elizabeth's whereabouts to Meliodas and crew. Will they be able to rescue her?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1053
text: Dreyfus appears in the king's chambers. He weeps, confessing to the crime he committed 10 years ago.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1054
text: Jericho, who'd been writhing in pain, suddenly turns into a grotesque monster. What in the world is going on?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1055
text: Diane sustained severe damage from her fight against Dreyfus. Helbram's additional attacks plunge her deeper into crisis.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1056
text: Just when things look hopeless, Guila and Howzer stand against Dreyfus and Helbram. Will they be able to defend Diane?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1057
text: Gowther suddenly appears and calmly launches himself at Dreyfus.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1059
text: King stands against Helbram to prevent him from killing Diane. King is especially upset by Helbram's actions, as they'd been good friends in the past.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1060
text: Helbram speaks up about how he feels betrayed by King, and vows to show him how it feels to lose someone he holds dear.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1061
text: 700 years ago, when King was known as Harlequin, Helbram was a Fairy who trusted and befriended Humans. But no longer...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1062
text: King attends to Diane after dealing with the situation at hand. Suddenly, the city is shook by tremors and an intense roar.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1063
text: Jericho and Guila writhe on the ground, seemingly in pain. What is happening to them?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1064
text: The New Generation Knights have turned into Mutants and gone berserk, wreaking havoc in the capital of Liones. Will Meliodas and crew be able to contain the chaos?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1065
text: Everyone believed Hendrickson to be dead, but he has somehow revived! And he somehow seems different from before...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1066
text: Ban appears before a thoroughly wounded Meliodas. Meliodas asks him for his help in rescuing Elizabeth, but Ban's response is lukewarm.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1067
text: Seeing the pain on Ban's face, Meliodas tells Ban to kill him. Will Ban really be able to kill Meliodas?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1068
text: Meliodas asks Hawk to take him to where Elizabeth is. Will Meliodas be able to rescue Elizabeth?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1069
text: There's no trace of Hendrickson anywhere in the kingdom. Where in the world is he?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1070
text: After Meliodas left, King and Diane head to the capital. King comes up with a way to reach the capital faster.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1071
text: Meliodas is backed into a corner, facing against Hendrickson, Gilthunder, and Vivian's cooperative attacks. Will he be able to defeat them?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1072
text: Now that the dust has settled, Diane and King begin to worry about Meliodas, who is on a mission to rescue Elizabeth.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1073
text: Life returns to normal after Hendrickson's defeat. Peace at last.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1074
text: There's a meat pie in the shape of a pig. It looks just Hawk, but what does it taste like?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1075
text: Elizabeth is worried about Hawk, who has run off in his tiny form. Meliodas finally gathers everyone and comes up with a plan to capture Hawk.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1076
text: Everyone's working together to capture Hawk, but it's proving to be difficult.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1077
text: An entire day has passed, but Hawk still hasn't been caught. Where could he be?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1078
text: Meliodas tells Ban that he'll keep the promise he made when they were fighting Hendrickson.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1079
text: Meliodas goes to see The Trumpet of the Goddess. It appears the Goddess dwelling in the horn knows who Meliodas is.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1080
text: Ban heads to the Mountain Peak to fulfill his promise. What awaits him there?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1081
text: The battle between Ban and Meliodas begins at last. Who will emerge victorious? Numerous spectators watch on as this epic fight commences!

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1082
text: Diane leaves the tavern early in the morning.\nWhere is she going?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1083
text: Diane says she wants to help the people in the capital however she can. She's willing to do anything in her power to help.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1084
text: Diane challenges King to a game of tag. Who will win?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1085
text: A New Generation Mutant suddenly appears! King and Diane decide to work together to defeat the creature.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1086
text: Elizabeth comes to the tavern, saying she has good news. What could it be?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1087
text: One rowdy evening when everyone was enjoying their meals, Ban asks Meliodas if he can have a word with him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1088
text: It's time for the medal bestowment ceremony for [The Seven Deadly Sins]. It seems not everyone in the crowd approves of them receiving this honor, however.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1089
text: Meliodas announces that anyone who has a problem with him should say so to his face. [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] step forward to voice their displeasure.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1090
text: On their way back from the medal bestowment ceremony, Meliodas and crew run into the Trio of Troublemakers.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1091
text: The [Ten Commandments] have been revived! Meliodas makes preparations to go on a journey to stop them.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1092
text: Meliodas tells Merlin about the return of the [Ten Commandments].

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1093
text: Meliodas tails Gowther to the West District. What's going on?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1094
text: Gowther confesses that he used Guila and Zeal to understand what Humans think and feel. Diane is furious with him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1095
text: Gowther finally goes berserk. Will Diane be able to stop him?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1096
text: After the chaos Gowther caused, Merlin determines he's too dangerous and removes the magic that had been cast on him. What is Gowther's true identity?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1098
text: Merlin senses something amiss in Camelot, the kingdom down south. What's going on in Camelot?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1099
text: Gowther is now officially part of the team. It looks like there's something he wants to say.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1100
text: The West District is in shambles. What in the world happened there?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1101
text: Now that the truth about Gowther has come to light, Diane finally grasps why he was so obsessed with understanding Human emotions.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1102
text: Meliodas and crew decide to return to the tavern and recount the day's events.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1103
text: Meliodas and crew leave the Capital of the Dead, and decide the first thing they want to do grab a bite.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1104
text: Diane reaches the capital of Liones using Oslo, but Dreyfus and the Holy Knights already stand in her path.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1105
text: Merlin asks Meliodas to shadow Gilthunder in order to catch a mysterious individual who's following him.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1106
text: Little accidents keep happening to two of the Trio of Troublemakers. Only Gilthunder escapes unscathed. There's something strange going on here...

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1107
text: A little boy named Pelio asks Gowther to play with him, but only if he's not a bad guy. What kind of game does Pelio want to play with Gowther?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1108
text: A mysterious figure pursues Gilthunder, and Meliodas finally decides to intervene.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1109
text: Gilthunder's stalker turned out to be Vivian. What was she trying to do to him?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1110
text: Merlin successfully captures her apprentice, Vivian. How will Merlin punish her for her deeds?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1111
text: Merlin decides to keep the promise she made to Meliodas. Will she be able to successfully pull off being the Boar Hat's mascot?

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_1112
text: Elizabeth runs to the tavern early in the morning, excitedly announcing that she has some good news.

name: DB_replay_name_1099
text: [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Joins Up

name: DB_quest_info_1
text: Clear the main stage [[b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b] Appears] near Cain's Village.

name: DB_quest_info_11001
text: Mead, a troublemaker who lives in Vanya, says he hates the villagers and runs into the tavern. Follow him.

name: DB_quest_info_11002
text: Mead demands you give him some food before asking him any questions. Search the tavern for ingredients to cook with.

name: DB_quest_info_11003
text: Use [High-quality Chicken] and [Milk] to make [Fried Chicken].

name: DB_quest_info_11004
text: Give Mead [Fried Chicken] and talk to him.

name: DB_quest_info_11005
text: Mead firmly believes [The Seven Deadly Sins] may be able to save the village from the crisis. Follow him to Vanya Square.

name: DB_quest_info_11006
text: Villagers in the square are trying to free a Holy Knight's sword. Pull the sword out for them.

name: DB_quest_info_11007
text: The villagers are grateful and promise to spend a great deal of money at the tavern. Purchase cooking ingredients at the shop, then talk to Hawk at the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_11008
text: Elizabeth, discouraged by her frequent mistakes, goes outside. Pretend to go to the restroom and follow her.

name: DB_quest_info_11009
text: Clear the main stage The Lightning King's Pursuit in the Forest of White Dreams to find allies.

name: DB_quest_info_11101
text: The lady's worried about her son who was conscripted. Go to the mayor of Vanya to see if any news has come from the fortress.

name: DB_quest_info_11102
text: The lady believes Jaz is somewhere inside the fort waiting to be rescued. Go to Fort Solgres to clear the stage and return to the lady in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11201
text: Take the girl's bread, along with her apology, over to Mead in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11204
text: Clear the Forest Ranger's Hut quest stage Corrupt Collusion and return to the young man in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11205
text: The young man is concerned about a [Beard of the Mountain Cat] member snooping around the village, and asks you to see what they're up to. Talk to the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] member in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11206
text: Clear the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Main Force quest stage [A True Insult] and return to the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Member in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11207
text: The mayor has been looking rather worried as of late, according to Mead. Talk to the mayor of Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11209
text: Gather the [Vanya Ale for distribution] from the numerous Vanya Ale storage boxes in the village and take them to the Mayor.

name: DB_quest_info_11210
text: The mayor says there aren't enough people to make Vanya Ale. Get water from the well for the ale and return to the mayor.

name: DB_quest_info_11301
text: Clear the Forest Ranger's Hut quest stage The Forest Ranger's Shack and return to the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] member in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11302
text: Clear the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Main Force quest stage Hidden Byway and return to the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] member in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11303
text: Speak with the villager who went to the Vanya Plains with Luke, who's gone missing. Ask the villager what's going on.

name: DB_quest_info_11304
text: Clear the Vanya Plains quest stage The Holy Knights Are Here and return to Mead in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11305
text: As Mead requested, ask the young man in the village if he's worried about something.

name: DB_quest_info_11306
text: Clear the Fountain of Eternity quest stage Beautiful Annabel and return to the young man in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11307
text: Clear the Forest Ranger's Hut quest stage The Forest Tyrant and return to the young man in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11308
text: Collect the [Shoddy Training Spears] from the [Beard of the Mountain Cat] Main Force quest stage The Knights' Equipment and take it to the young man in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11310
text: Hawk is hungry for scraps, so cook something up for him. Anything will do. Gather ingredients from around the village, including the Materials Shop, then cook something in the tavern. Deliver it to Hawk in Vanya when it's ready.

name: DB_quest_info_11311
text: Hawk is hungry for scraps, so cook something up for him. Anything will do. Gather ingredients from around the village, including the Materials Shop, then cook something in the tavern. Deliver it to Hawk in Vanya when it's ready.

text: Clear the Forest Ranger's Hut free stage Ridding the Remaining Rangers (Easy) and return to Blacksmith Hans in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11360

name: DB_quest_info_11401
text: Clear the Vanya Plains quest stage Vanya Plains Outskirts to find the girl's necklace. Afterwards, return to her in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11402
text: Find the [Girl's Necklace] from the Vanya Plains quest stage Habitual Thief and take it to her in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11403
text: The mayor's curious how the lady with the missing son is doing. Go to Vanya and speak with her.

name: DB_quest_info_11404
text: Clear the Fountain of Eternity quest stage Roaming Wolves and return to the lady in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11405
text: Gather [Sharp Wolf Claws] from the Fountain of Eternity quest stage Despot of the Forest Depths and take them to the lady in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11406
text: Go see the lady in Vanya who is said to be a magnificent chef.

name: DB_quest_info_11407
text: Gather [Caraway Leaves] from the Forest Ranger's Hut quest stage Deep Mountain Paths and take it to the lady in Vanya so that she can cook something for her son.

name: DB_quest_info_11409
text: Mead believes his missing [Wooden Kitty] is in the hands of the Materials Merchant. Ask the merchant in Vanya if that's true.

name: DB_quest_info_11410
text: The Materials Merchant praised Mead's sculpting abilities and returned the [Wooden Kitty]. Take it back to Mead in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11411
text: Collect the [Thugs' Wooden Clubs] from the Vanya Plains quest stage Small Grove on the Outskirts and take them to Mead in Vanya.

text: The construction to expand the Vanya Ale Brewery has halted due to a lack of funds. Make a donation with the mayor of Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11501
text: Find the cat hiding in a box at the village entrance and take it to the girl in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11502
text: Gather [Nutritious Wolf Meat] from the Fountain of Eternity quest stage Searching for Nutrition and take it to the girl in Vanya.

name: DB_quest_info_11509
text: Clear the Vanya Plains quest stage The Streets Wagons Travel to get rid of the wolves. Afterwards, return to the mayor of Vanya.

name: DB_quest_name_11205

name: DB_title_worldmap_chapter_10
text: Decisive Battle in the Giant Labyrinth

name: DB_quest_info_12001
text: Despite being heavily injured in a ferocious battle against Gilthunder, Meliodas actually seems unfazed. Based on the information obtained from Gilthunder, head to Dalmally to find the others.

name: DB_quest_info_12002
text: Meliodas suddenly collapses and is in dire need of treatment. Dalmally is just up ahead. Hurry to the village and find a doctor.

name: DB_quest_info_12003
text: A massive swarm of poisonous insects is headed towards Dalmally. Eliminate the insects.

name: DB_quest_info_12004
text: Go to Dana's house in Dalmally to check on Meliodas's condition!

name: DB_quest_info_12005
text: A Holy Knight by the name of Golgius is working with the doctor to go after Elizabeth and the sword. Chase after Golgius, who's darted through Dalmally Square, and repel him.

name: DB_quest_info_12006
text: There's something questionable about Golgius's teleportation abilities. Lure him to the abandoned house in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12007
text: Golgius has been backed into a corner in Dalmally. Finish him off once and for all.

name: DB_quest_info_12008
text: Elizabeth was going to go to Baste Prison to find Ban, but she can't stop worrying about the wounded doctor, Dana. Pay a short visit to Dana of Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12009
text: Now that Elizabeth is settled, all that's left is to storm Baste Prison and save Ban. Pass the Dalmally Plains to get to Baste Prison and clear main stage A Touching Reunion.

name: DB_quest_info_12010
text: Take Sennett and Elizabeth and go to Dana's house in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12011
text: Introduce Ban to Elizabeth recovering at the tavern, then share a meal with Dana and his daughter.

name: DB_quest_info_12012
text: Meliodas and company are preparing to leave Dalmally when they decide to help restore the ruined village. Find Dana of Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12013
text: Diane offers to clear out the stone pillars she used to crush the insects. Remove the pillars in Dalmally, then talk to Dana.

name: DB_quest_info_12014
text: Sennett wants to do a lot of work to rebuild the village. Take on three requests for the villagers of Dalmally, then return to Sennett.\nTIP: Clear 3 village quests (Friendship Lv. 1).

name: DB_quest_info_12015
text: The villagers are touched by Meliodas and company's efforts to help rebuild the village.

name: DB_quest_info_12016
text: Help out the Dalmally villagers a little more.

name: DB_quest_info_12017
text: Head to the entrance to the Capital of the Dead in Post Town Tala in search of King.

name: DB_quest_info_12101
text: Search boxes to find tools required to make repairs around the village and take them to Sean in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12102
text: Get rid of the horrid insect carcasses scattered throughout the village, then talk to Dana's Assistant in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12103
text: There's a certain coin you can throw in the village fountain for good luck. It's kind of an odd request, but make a lucky coin for the Dalmally girl who wants one.

name: DB_quest_info_12202
text: Clear the Poisonous Insect Habitat quest stage The Insect Keepers and return to Insect Researcher Nick in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12203
text: Clear the Nest of the Insect Queen quest stage Eradicate the Insect Queen! and return to Insect Researcher Nick in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12207
text: Gather [Non-stick Spider Silk] from the Poisonous Insect Habitat quest stage Wanted: Spider Silk and take it to Dana's Assistant in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12208
text: Find antidotes from first aid kits scattered throughout the village and take them to Dana's Assistant in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12209
text: Clear the Giant Chessboard quest stage Checkmate! and return to the Suspicious Messenger in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12302
text: Cook [Bread and Cheese with Pepper] and take it to Dana in Dalmally. [Materials]: Organic Animal Milk, Pepper, Glamorous Mountain Goat Milk.\nTIP: Visit the Dalmally Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_12303
text: Gather [Ancient Warrior Armor Fragments] from the Dalmally Plains free stage [Cooking] Home on the Range (Easy) and take them to Hawk in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12304
text: Gather [Expensive Pendant Ornaments] from the Dalmally Plains quest stage Protectors of the Plains and take them to Hawk in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12305
text: Clear the Broken Ruins quest stage Dangerous Guardians and return to Sean in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12306
text: Clear the Catacomb of the Ancient Warrior quest stage Waking Menace and return to Sean in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12307
text: Gather [Ancient Warrior Armor Fragments] from the Broken Ruins quest stage Back from the Dead and take them to Sean in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12309
text: Dana is concerned about the sudden appearance of a suspicious Knight in the village. Find Knight William in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12310
text: Clear the Nest of the Insect Queen quest stage The Remaining Nest and return to Insect Researcher Nick in Dalmally.

name: DB_quest_info_12311
text: The Insect Queen strikes again! Gather [Firm Poison Stingers] from the Nest of the Insect Queen quest stage Rebirth of the Insect Queen and take them to Insect Researcher Nick in Dalmally.
