name: DB_quest_name_12304
text: What a Pig Really, Really Wants

name: DB_quest_info_13001
text: A girl collapsed without warning upon reaching Post Town Tala. Check to see if she's alright.

name: DB_quest_info_13002
text: A mysterious boy suddenly appeared out of nowhere and attacked Ban. Fight the boy in Post Town Tala and find out who he is.

name: DB_quest_info_13003
text: Ban wants to cook something for Ellen and Luigi, who haven't eaten in days. Ask Ban what he's planning to make in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13004
text: Gather [Organic Fruits and Vegetables], [Honey], and [Fairy's Sprout] and return to Post Town Tala.\nTip: Search Post Town Tala for the ingredients, or purchase them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_13005
text: Make [Honey Salad] using the [Organic Fruits and Vegetables], [Honey], and [Fairy's Sprout]. Take the dish to the siblings waiting in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_13006
text: It's said that sharing a priceless memory with the dead will open the path to the Capital of the Dead. Go to the Capital of the Dead.

name: DB_quest_info_13007
text: A precious memory has opened the path to the Capital of the Dead. Clear the Capital of the Dead main stage Fairy King Harlequin.

name: DB_quest_info_13008
text: Return to the tavern for now and listen to Hawk's complaints.

name: DB_quest_info_13009
text: It's well past mealtime. Even a barebones meal is better than none, so discuss the dinner menu with Elizabeth in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_13010
text: Gather [Organic Fruits and Vegetables], [Sugar], and [Assorted Grapes] and return to Elizabeth in the tavern.\nTip: Search Post Town Tala for the ingredients, or purchase them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_13011
text: Make [Raisins with Sugar] with the [Organic Fruits and Vegetables], [Sugar], and [Assorted Grapes]. Take the dish to Hawk in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_13012
text: Take care of the minor issues in Post Town Tala before leaving, then go find Elizabeth. Clear 3 Post Town Tala village quests (Friendship Lv. 1).

name: DB_quest_info_13013
text: Help the villagers of Post Town Tala with their problems while gathering information.

name: DB_quest_info_13014
text: There've been rumors of a giant hammer in Vaizel. Could it be Diane's Sacred Treasure? Go to Vaizel to look.

name: DB_quest_info_13101
text: Ellen was in the Capital of the Dead, watching recent events unfold. She asked you to inform her older brother of her thoughts. Tell King what Ellen said in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13102
text: Ellen's words comforted King, so he wants to repay her somehow. Pick a [Sweet Apple] from a tree in Post Town Tala and take it to King.

name: DB_quest_info_13103
text: King says he struggles to even look at Ellen, since she reminds him of Elaine. Take the [Sweet Apple] to Ellen in Post Town Tala for King.

name: DB_quest_info_13201
text: After seeing how Ellen and Luigi enjoyed his cooking, Ban wonders if the dead still have their palates. Ask Ellen about it in Post Town Tala for Ban.

name: DB_quest_info_13203
text: Hawk predicted a steady flow of customers, so plenty of ingredients were stocked in anticipation. Now Ban's saying they're all about to go to waste. Talk to Hawk in Post Town Tala about tavern management.

name: DB_quest_info_13206
text: Hawk believes the reason business has slowed is rooted in the Forest of Illusions, east of Post Town Tala. Clear the Forest of Illusions quest stage Tavern Nuisance and return to Hawk in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13207
text: The Traveler says the Medicine Merchant sold him an expensive potion that will allow him to enter the Capital of the Dead. Does the potion truly work as advertised? Talk to the Medicine Merchant in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13208
text: The potion for entering the Capital of the Dead turned out to be simple sleep medication! Go around the village and smash up the boxes containing more, then talk to the Medicine Merchant in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13209
text: Elizabeth says she heard a strange voice in the Capital of the Dead. Clear the Village of Vengeful Spirits quest stage Rest in Peace and go see Ellen in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13301
text: Hawk claims that he's the Boar Hat's mascot. Make [Raisins with Salt] using [Organic Fruits and Vegetables], [Salt], and [Assorted Grapes], and take it to Hawk in Post Town Tala.\nTip: Search Post Town Tala for the ingredients, or purchase them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_13302
text: Luigi says he lost his journal. What could be written inside? Find the [Tattered Journal] from the Forest of Nightmares quest stage Luigi's Journal and take it to Luigi in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13303
text: Gather [Screamer Fruit] from the Forest of Screams quest stage Food or Poison? and take it to Ban in Post Town Tala for his new dish.

name: DB_quest_info_13305
text: Hawk is disappointed with Ban's cooking skills, saying they don't meet his expectations. Ban was a great chef ten years ago, so ask Ban what happened to his cooking abilities in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13307
text: Orders began pouring in after Ban started adding Devil's Seasoning to his dishes, so much that he's run out of it. Gather [Sharp Bat Claws] from the Forest of Illusions quest stage Bat Haven and take them to Ban in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13308
text: Hawk says there's a rotten stench everywhere he turns. Ask Luigi about the source of the smell in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13309
text: It turns out the Dark Grave wolves had been digging up graves, unearthing the stink. Clear the Dark Grave quest stage The Source of the Foul Smell and return to Luigi in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13310
text: It turns out the Dark Grave wolves had been digging up graves, unearthing the stink. Clear the Dark Grave quest stage Smelly Culprit and return to Luigi in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13351
text: Clear the Forest of Screams free stage The Screams (Easy) and return to Explorer Sheik in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13352
text: Clear the Secret Farmland free stage Illegal Labor Exploitation (Easy) and return to Explorer Sheik in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13353
text: Clear the Forest of Nightmares free stage Never-ending Dream (Easy) and return to Explorer Sheik in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13354
text: Clear the Forest of Illusions free stage Your Desire (Easy) and return to Explorer Sheik in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13355
text: Clear the Village of Vengeful Spirits free stage Holding Grudges (Easy) and return to Explorer Sheik in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13356
text: Clear the Forest of Nightmares free stage [Cooking] Farm-Fresh Veggies (Easy) and return to Peddler Gale in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13360
text: Clear the Dark Grave free stage [Cooking] Hidden Ingredients (Easy) and return to Peddler Gale in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13401
text: Luigi saw the Medicine Merchant selling his scam potion again. It seems like he hasn't learned his lesson. Go to the Medicine Merchant in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13402
text: It appears the Medicine Merchant hid his sleep medication in the village once more. Smash the suspicious boxes around town and talk to the Medicine Merchant in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13403
text: Clear the Dark Grave quest stage Luigi's Grave and return to Luigi in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13405
text: Clear the Forest of Screams quest stage Memory Lane and return to Luigi in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13406
text: The Medicine Merchant gave everyone who bought his fake potion a refund, but he says he wants to do more for the Traveler. He wants you to deliver the [Invigorating Potion] along with an apology to the Traveler in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13408
text: Clear the Secret Farmland quest stage Dangerous Kidnapper and return to the Traveler in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13451
text: Clear the Forest of Screams free stage The Screams (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_13452
text: Clear the Secret Farmland free stage Illegal Labor Exploitation (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_13471
text: Ellen is taking donations to keep Post Town Tala running. Place a donation in the collection box to help out.

name: DB_quest_info_13501
text: Ban learned that the Medicine Merchant had been selling fake potions to people who wanted to get into the Capital of the Dead, and now he's furious. Go to the Medicine Merchant in Post Town Tala and deliver Ban's warning.

name: DB_quest_info_13503
text: Gather [Screamer Root] from the Forest of Screams quest stage Give Me Strength! and take it to the Medicine Merchant in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13504
text: Elizabeth found the Traveler at the entrance of the village last night suffering from a leg injury. Visit the Traveler in Post Town Tala and inquire about his health.

name: DB_quest_info_13505
text: Gather [Luminous Spider Silk] from the Forest of Nightmares quest stage Nighttime Traveler Woes and take it to the Traveler in Post Town Tala to help him travel safely in the dark.

name: DB_quest_info_13507
text: The resentment of the dead in the Village of Vengeful Spirits will never be sated. Clear the Village of Vengeful Spirits quest stage Somber Tranquility and return to Elizabeth in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_13508
text: The resentment of the dead in the Village of Vengeful Spirits will never be sated. Clear the Village of Vengeful Spirits quest stage Till We Meet Again and return to Elizabeth in Post Town Tala.

name: DB_quest_info_14001
text: Tour Vaizel and listen in on the village gossip about the Sacred Treasure.

name: DB_quest_info_14002
text: The gigantic hammer is at the Vaizel Arena. Go to PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival) to learn more about Gideon and the Vaizel Fight Festival.

name: DB_quest_info_14003
text: The prize of the Fight Festival is none other than Gideon! The Vaizel Fight Festival must be won in order to regain possession of Gideon. Find Love Helm in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival) to sign up for the preliminaries.

name: DB_quest_info_14004
text: The Fight Festival lineup has finally been announced! What kind of opponents will you face? Go to Love Helm in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival) and find out.

name: DB_quest_info_14005
text: King is worried that Howzer may have recognized him. Go to Howzer in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival) and try to find out if he's noticed anything.

name: DB_quest_info_14006
text: Matrona is one of the Fight Festival's most mysterious, enigmatic participants. Will she become the festival's first quarterfinal winner? Talk to King in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival).

name: DB_quest_info_14007
text: Unbelievable! Turns out Matrona is actually Diane, except she's been shrunk. Find out what happened from Diane in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival).

name: DB_quest_info_14008
text: The quarterfinal between Old Fart and Cain begins! Defeat Cain in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival), advance to the semi-finals, win the final fight, and bring Gideon to Diane!

name: DB_quest_info_14009
text: It's the quarterfinal match between Meliodaf and Vaan! Defeat Vaan in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival) and advance to the semi-finals.

name: DB_quest_info_14010
text: The semi-final match between Matrona and Howzer begins! Gideon is just within reach. Defeat Howzer in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival) and advance to the finals.

name: DB_quest_info_14011
text: One last step until the finals. Cain's up after knocking King out with a single attack. Meet Cain in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival).

name: DB_quest_info_14012
text: The semi-final match between Meliodaf and Cain begins! Defeat the raging Cain in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival).

name: DB_quest_info_14013
text: The finals between Matrona and Meliodaf begins! Whoever wins gets Gideon, so get ready for a competition of pure skill in PVP (Vaizel Fight Festival).

name: DB_quest_info_14014
text: The Holy Knights have launched an ambush. Clear the Vaizel Plains main stage The Captain's True Colors and finish them off.

name: DB_quest_info_14015
text: Elizabeth is still reeling from what happened in the Vaizel Plains. Talk to Elizabeth in the Vaizel Plains.

name: DB_quest_info_14016
text: The Holy Knights are intensifying their pursuit. Find the rest of the group and continue on your journey. This time get to Ordan Village!

name: DB_quest_info_14050
text: Hawk's being cagey about competing with other taverns for business during the Fight Festival. Get rid of the competing taverns' flyers in the village and return to Hawk in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14051
text: The Fight Festival Planner is worried the trash in the village gives festival-goers a bad impression. Collect the trash in the village and return to the Fight Festival Planner in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14101
text: After losing the shirt off his back to Ban, a Fight Festival Participant wants to take his anger out on Meliodas. Subdue the Fight Festival Participant and hear him out.

name: DB_quest_info_14102
text: Vaizel Merchant Goph needs help making cookies. Gather [Delicious Cookies] from the cookie cart in Vaizel and take them to Goph.

name: DB_quest_info_14202
text: The fluid used by Walker Shamans is worth a pretty penny. Gather [Ominous Spellcasting Fluid] from the Hark's Residence free stage The Queen's Storage (Easy) and take it to Goph in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14204
text: The real money lies elsewhere, according to Vaizel Merchant Menti. Gather [Hark's Bone Pendant] from the Hark's Residence quest stage The Queen's Collection and take it to Menti in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14205
text: Clear the Forest of Essen quest stage Separate Ways to find Basti and Chieftan Gorra, then return to the Runaway Gorra.

name: DB_quest_info_14206
text: The [Warrior's Emblem] represents the bravery of the Gorra. Gather Warrior's Emblems from the Forest of Essen free stage Secret Logistics Base (Easy) and take it to the Runaway Gorra in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14207
text: A young villager suspects that the recent disappearances have something to do with the Gorra. Ask the Runaway Gorra at the edge of Vaizel and find out if there's any truth to this.

name: DB_quest_info_14208
text: The Runaway Gorra says that the Walker Queen, Hark, is involved with the recent disappearances. Clear the Hark's Residence quest stage I Found You, My Love and return to Holly in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14301
text: Vaizel Merchant Goph might be unable to complete a delivery, and is about to tear his hair out over it. Gather [Wind Feathers] from the Darby Cliffs quest stage Guardian of the Cliff and take them to Goph in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14303
text: Holly insists on apprenticing under Meliodas to learn a thing or two. Fight Holly in Vaizel and teach a lesson that won't soon be forgotten.

name: DB_quest_info_14305
text: The Runaway Gorra and his band of likeminded cohorts intend to return home to the Forest of Essen, but there are still traitors to be dealt with. Clear the Forest of Essen quest stage Traitor Gorra and return to the Runaway Gorra in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14306
text: Vaizel Merchant Menti's in a bad spot because some goods he ordered haven't shown up. Gather [Ominous Dark Orbs] from the Shadow Marsh quest stage Light Engulfed in Darkness and take them to Menti.

name: DB_quest_info_14307
text: The Fight Festival Planner wants to ignite an everlasting flame that will last until next year's Fight Festival. Gather [Dragon Breath] in the Hidden Nest quest stage Grey Eminence and take it to the Fight Festival Planner in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14309
text: The Fight Festival Planner says more materials are required to create an everlasting flame. Gather a [Sharp Horn] from the Hidden Nest free stage The Possessor of Flames (Easy) and take it to the Fight Festival Planner in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14351
text: Clear the Forest of Essen free stage Secret Logistics Base (Easy) and return to Retired Knight Vamon in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14352
text: Clear the Hark's Residence free stage The Queen's Storage (Easy) and return to Retired Knight Vamon in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14353
text: Clear the Shadow Marsh free stage Darkness Which Engulfs Light (Easy) and return to Retired Knight Vamon in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14354
text: Clear the Hidden Nest free stage The Possessor of Flames (Easy) and return to Retired Knight Vamon in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14355
text: Clear the Darby Cliffs free stage The Prince of the Skies (Easy) and return to Retired Knight Vamon in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14356
text: Clear the Darby Cliffs free stage [Cooking] Hunting the Skies (Easy) and return to Tourist Abigail in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14360
text: Clear the Hark's Residence free stage [Cooking] The Queen's Food Storage (Easy) and return to Tourist Abigail in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14401
text: Holly asks that you bring back keepsakes to the surviving families of the deceased. Gather [Signs of Ex-husbands] from the Hark's Residence quest stage Abandoned Husbands and take them to Holly in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14402
text: Hawk wants to completely redo the tavern's menu to help boost sales. Go to Ban in Vaizel to discuss the new menu.

name: DB_quest_info_14403
text: Ban wants to use Chicken Matango, a local Vaizel specialty, to develop the new menu. Gather [Chicken Matango Mushroom Caps] from the Forest of Essen quest stage A Vaizel Specialty and take them to Ban in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14404
text: Ban successfully created a new dish using Chicken Matango! Take Ban's new culinary creation [Chicken Matango Skewers] to Hawk in Vaizel for a taste test.

name: DB_quest_info_14405
text: Hawk maintains that a combination of meat and vegetables is the foundation of any truly gourmet dish. Gather [Owl Meat] to complement Ban's dish from the Darby Cliffs quest stage Culinary Masterpiece and take it to Ban.

name: DB_quest_info_14406
text: Holly's most unique interest is rock climbing. Clear the Darby Cliffs free stage The Prince of the Skies (Normal) to ensure this hobby can be enjoyed safely, and return to Holly in Vaizel.

text: Clear the Forest of Essen free stage Secret Logistics Base (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_14463
text: Clear the Hark's Residence free stage [Cooking] The Queen's Food Storage (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_14471
text: Disaster has struck the Vaizel Fight Festival, with barely enough funds to sustain its annual schedule. Take any donations to the Vaizel Fight Festival Planner to help out with next year's festivities.

name: DB_quest_info_14501
text: The Runaway Gorra says that the [Warrior's Emblem] won't be enough to convince the Gorra. Gather the [Fighter's Emblem] from the Forest of Essen free stage Secret Logistics Base (Hard) and take it to the Runaway Gorra in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14502
text: Bookstore Owner Yed has lost the key to his archive of vintage books. Collect the [Archive Key] from the Hidden Nest quest stage The Missing Archive Key and take it to Yed in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14504
text: Bookstore Owner Yed is bothered by a customer who visits daily. Collect the [Old Romance Novel] from the Shadow Marsh quest stage Old Archive and take it to Yed in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14505
text: The Fight Festival Planner wants to check up on the goods he ordered from Vaizel Merchant Menti, since they haven't come in yet. Talk to Menti in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14506
text: Vaizel Merchant Menti stowed his wares in the Hidden Nest, but now a dragon prevents him from retrieving them. Clear the Hidden Nest free stage The Possessor of Flames (Hard) and return to Menti in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_14507
text: The dragon's been slayed, but Vaizel Merchant Menti says he's far too busy to retrieve his merchandise himself. Gather the [Burning Dragon's Heart] from the Hidden Nest quest stage Hidden Goods and take it to Menti in Vaizel.

text: The Shadow in the Black Swamp

name: DB_quest_info_15001
text: The Boar Hat set up shop in the vicinity of Ordan Village, a town known for its windmills. The tavern needs customers so that you can earn money for travel expenses. Ask Hawk and Elizabeth to promote the tavern in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15002
text: One needs ingredients to cook a dish. Hunt Sword Wolves in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15003
text: Strange howls are coming from the Woods of Ordan. Clear the Woods of Ordan main stage Trust and Repayment and find out what's making the noise.

name: DB_quest_info_15004
text: Cain carefully brings up the events that occurred long ago. He requests to pass on his thanks to Elizabeth. Talk to Cain in Ordan Village one more time before he leaves.

name: DB_quest_info_15005
text: Ban wants the ingredients for a [Herb Ciabatta] so that he can make it over the campfire. Talk to Elizabeth in Ordan Village and ask her about the ingredients that go into the dish.

name: DB_quest_info_15006
text: Gather [Ordan Flour], [Herbs], and [Dried Fruit] and return to Elizabeth in Ordan Village.\nTip: Search Ordan Village for the ingredients or purchase them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_15007
text: Make an [Herb Ciabatta] using the [Ordan Flour], [Herbs], and [Dried Fruit]. Take the dish to Elizabeth waiting in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15008
text: Gowther has officially joined the team! It seems he still has more to say. Go to Gowther in Ordan Village and listen to what he has to say.

name: DB_quest_info_15009
text: Elizabeth is a bit taken aback by what Gowther said. Try to calm Elizabeth down in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15010
text: When the preparations for upcoming fights are complete, talk to Hawk in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_15011
text: You need your allies' help to recover your stolen sword. Try to convince King in the tavern to help.

name: DB_quest_info_15012
text: Hawk, who's been listening in a corner of the tavern, seems to have something to say. He's not looking too well, so listen to what he has to say.

name: DB_quest_info_15013
text: Go rescue the abducted Elizabeth! It'll take too long to go after her on foot, so ask for Diane's help in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15014
text: Meliodas and group are out to rescue Elizabeth. Clear the Liones Castle North Gate main stage Clash with the North Gate Garrison and repel the Holy Knights to gain entry into Liones!

name: DB_quest_info_15015
text: The capital of Liones boasts a considerable security force. You can only hope Diane and King, who left after you did, are making their way without too much trouble. Clear the Black Magic Research Hall quest stage Holy Knights Pincer Attack to try and trace their movements.

name: DB_quest_info_15016
text: Dreyfus strikes Diane, sending her crashing into town. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and check to see how Diane is doing.

name: DB_quest_info_15050
text: Wanderer Jin has been roaming around the world all his life. He has never experienced what others call the taste of home, as he never had a home. Tell Ban in Ordan Village about Wanderer Jin.

name: DB_quest_info_15101
text: Ban wants to cook something tasty for Wanderer Jin. Gather [Evening Primrose Root] from the Howlers Plateau quest stage Moonview Plateau and take it to Ban in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15201
text: Make the Ordan Village specialty [Seafood Hot Pot] using the [Ordan Flour], [Salt], and [Assorted Clams]. Take the dish to Gossiper Momo in Ordan Village.\nTip: Search Ordan Village for the ingredients or purchase them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_15202
text: Take the [Grilled Wolf Tenderloin] that's been cooking over Ban's campfire and give it to Wanderer Jin in Ordan Village who's been surreptitiously eyeing it.

name: DB_quest_info_15203
text: Leah says there's something suspicious about the man she's about to marry. Clear the Bascus Forest quest stage The Man's Situation and return to Leah in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15204
text: Leah wants you to get rid of all the werewolves in Bascus Forest as well as Yoos, who lied to her. Clear the Bascus Forest quest stage The Line Between Truth and Lies and return to Leah in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15205
text: Gather [Bloody Claws] from the Howlers Plateau quest stage Howling Wolves and take them to Merchant Ollie in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15207
text: Gather a [Black Heart] from the Howlers Plateau quest stage Dark Echo and take them to Merchant Ollie in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15301
text: Hannah wants to recover her parents' keepsakes that were left behind in the Forgotten Village. Gather Hannah's [Parents' Keepsakes] from the Forgotten Village quest stage Faded Memories and take them to Hannah in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15302
text: Hannah believes Old Hardin knows something about the ghost child you met in the Forgotten Village. Talk to Hardin in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15303
text: Clear the Forgotten Village quest stage Forever Waiting to tell the ghost child about his family and return to Hardin in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15304
text: Gossiper Momo says after the werebears wiped out the Forgotten Village, Elric the Blind was instrumental in clearing them out back when he was young man. Ask Elric in Ordan Village if what Momo says is true.

name: DB_quest_info_15305
text: Elric speaks sadly of Illia, his lover from the past that he never got to see again. Clear the Buruka Cave quest stage Hidden Secrets to find her whereabouts and return to Elric in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15306
text: You told Elric about the death of his past lover Buruka. Place white flowers on a small tombstone located under a secluded tree in northern Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15307
text: Momo learns about the love that bloomed between Elric and Buruka long ago. She says she cannot forgive Garthum, who opposed their relationship and attacked the village, and asks you to slay him. Clear the Garthum's Residence quest stage The Cold-Hearted Father and return to Momo in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15308
text: Hannah wants you to go to Vaizel to obtain some Vanya Ale for her parents' memorial ceremony. Talk to Vaizel Merchant Goph.

name: DB_quest_info_15309
text: Take out the [High-quality Vanya Ale] from the box that Vaizel Merchant Goph has in storage, and deliver it to Hannah in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15310
text: Gather [Wolf Tenderloin] from the Bascus Forest quest stage Dark Wolves and take it to Ban in Ordan Village so he can cook up a tasty, sizzling dish over the campfire.

name: DB_quest_info_15311
text: Merchant Ollie isn't too happy with the man his daughter is dating. Clear the Bascus Forest quest stage Driven by Instinct to meet this man, and return to Ollie in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15312
text: Yoos is overjoyed to have received permission to marry his beloved. He asks you to deliver his journals to Ollie, which contain the results of research that he has conducted over the years. Take [Yoos's Bundle of Books] to Ollie in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15313
text: Take the [High-quality Flour] that Old Hardin milled to Merchant Ollie in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15314
text: Take the [High-quality Flour] that Old Hardin sent to Merchant Ollie over to Merchant Menti in Vaizel.

name: DB_quest_info_15351
text: Clear the Forgotten Village free stage Forgotten Beings (Easy) and return to Adventurer Henry in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15352
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage Brave Fighters (Easy) and return to Adventurer Henry in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15353
text: Clear the Bascus Forest free stage Shadow in the Moonlight (Easy) and return to Adventurer Henry in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15354
text: Clear the Howlers Plateau free stage Crimson Fang Mountain Path (Easy) and return to Adventurer Henry in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15355
text: Clear the Altar of the Mountain God free stage Soughing Winds (Easy) and return to Adventurer Henry in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15356
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Easy) and return to Recipe Researcher Nien in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15360
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage [Cooking] The Ingredient War (Easy) and return to Recipe Researcher Nien in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15401
text: Momo is afraid that werebears would launch an ambush Ordan Village. Clear the Garthum's Residence quest stage Black Tree Forest to eliminate werebears, and return to Momo in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15402
text: Peddler Royde doesn't have time to collect the [Faulty Whetstones] that his customers placed in boxes around town. Gather the [Faulty Whetstones] by going through the boxes in Ordan Village and take them to Royde.

name: DB_quest_info_15404
text: Gather [Golem Fragments] to be used as whetstone material from the Garthum's Residence free stage Black Cairn (Normal) and take them to Peddler Royde in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15405
text: Gossiper Momo says some children have gone missing recently, and the village is still unsettled from the incident. She thinks Old Hardin knows something about it. Go see Old Hardin in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15406
text: Old Hardin says he saw the children go toward the Forgotten Village to test their nerves and courage. Clear the Forgotten Village quest stage Crossroads to the Cave and return to Hardin in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15408
text: Kellan is scared of the unidentified howls that began emanating from the Altar of the Mountain God. Clear the Altar of the Mountain God quest stage The Mountain God's Identity to ensure the forest's safety, and return to Kellan in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15409
text: Kellan says she can still hear strange noises coming from the forest. Clear the Altar of the Mountain God quest stage Overflowing Mutants and return to Kellan in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15451
text: Clear the Forgotten Village free stage Forgotten Beings (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15452
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage Brave Fighters (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15453
text: Clear the Bascus Forest free stage Shadow in the Moonlight (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15454
text: Clear the Howlers Plateau free stage Crimson Fang Mountain Path (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15455
text: Clear the Altar of the Mountain God free stage Soughing Winds (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15456
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15457
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15458
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15459
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15460
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage [Cooking] The Ingredient War (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15461
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage [Cooking] The Ingredient War (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15462
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage [Cooking] The Ingredient War (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15463
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage [Cooking] The Ingredient War (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_15471
text: Old Hardin laments the high costs required to maintain the windmills of Ordan Village. Donate money toward the cause to Fortuneteller Olla in Ordan Village, and return to Old Hardin.

name: DB_quest_info_15501
text: Kellan is worried that the ghost she saw around the Altar of the Mountain God was that of her husband, and is asking you visit Fortuneteller Olla. Go see Fortuneteller Olla in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15502
text: Collect the [Broken Pendant] from the Altar of the Mountain God quest stage Suspicious Activity and take it to Fortuneteller Olla in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15503
text: Clear the Altar of the Mountain God quest stage Tormented Mutant and return to Fortuneteller Olla in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15504
text: Hannah suggests talking to Old Hardin walking around town to hear a story about the Forgotten Village. Go see Hardin in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15505
text: Collect [Atin's Head] by searching the undead in the Forgotten Village quest stage Forgotten Village Outskirts and take it to Old Hardin in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15506
text: Atin is still wandering around looking for his head. Clear the Forgotten Village Quest Stage [Center of Town] and return to Old Hardin in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15507
text: Collect the [Tattered Notepad] from the Forgotten Village quest stage Former Site of Ashen Village and take it to Fortuneteller Olla in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15508
text: Collect the [Wedding Ring] from the Forgotten Village quest stage Former Site of Ashen Village and take it to Fortuneteller Olla in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15509
text: Clear the Forgotten Village quest stage Graveyard by eliminating the ghost of Gina and return to Fortuneteller Olla in Ordan Village.

name: DB_quest_info_15551
text: Clear the Forgotten Village free stage Forgotten Beings (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15552
text: Clear the Garthum's Residence free stage Brave Fighters (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15553
text: Clear the Bascus Forest free stage Shadow in the Moonlight (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15554
text: Clear the Howlers Plateau free stage Crimson Fang Mountain Path (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15555
text: Clear the Altar of the Mountain God free stage Soughing Winds (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15556
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15557
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15558
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_15559
text: Clear the Buruka Cave free stage [Cooking] What Do We Need? (Hard).

name: DB_quest_name_15008
text: [Episode 45] [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Joins Up

name: DB_quest_name_15471
text: A Request That Cannot be Denied

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10502025
text: [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b], Gowther Appears

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10550070
text: The Line Between Truth and Lies

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10553010
text: One Who Shall Not Be Named

name: DB_stage_cut_name_3005040
text: [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Joins Up

name: DB_quest_info_16001
text: The West District is collapsing. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and protect Guila's younger brother, Zeal, so he doesn't get crushed in the wreckage.

name: DB_quest_info_16002
text: Guila has sided with Diane. Help her fight against Dreyfus in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16003
text: Gowther has ascertained the situation by looking into Guila's memories. Talk to Dreyfus in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16004
text: Gowther has trapped Dreyfus in a nightmare. Eliminate Dreyfus in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16005
text: Helbram is preparing to launch a final attack on Diane. She must be protected. Fight Helbram in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16006
text: Helbram's hate for Humans rages on. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and fight Helbram again.

name: DB_quest_info_16007
text: It was 700 years ago that Helbram asked for an end to his rampage. Travel through King's memory to clear the Warm Memories main stage Absence of the Fairy King, and go to the Knighthood (West District) for the final battle!

name: DB_quest_info_16008
text: What happened to Meliodas after he went looking for Elizabeth? Go to Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16009
text: Hendrickson and Arthur are fighting tooth and nail at Liones Castle. Hendrickson appears to have no intention of handing Elizabeth over without a fight. Defeat Hendrickson.

name: DB_quest_info_16010
text: As he did in the Forest of White Dreams, Gilthunder declared himself stronger than [The Seven Deadly Sins] and leveled his sword at Meliodas. Defeat Gilthunder at Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16011
text: Meliodas is in the middle of an intense battle at Liones Castle! Vivian joined Hendrickson, and their combined attacks proved troublesome. Defeat them, and survive this crisis.

name: DB_quest_info_16012
text: Margaret told Gilthunder to stop what he's doing, and is ready to throw herself off a tower. Go to the Liones Castle wall below the tower to rescue Margaret.

name: DB_quest_info_16013
text: The seal is finally broken! Fight Hendrickson at Liones Castle to take revenge on the murderer of Gilthunder's father.

name: DB_quest_info_16014
text: Vivian, enraged by Gilthunder's betrayal, has entered a frenzy. Subdue the frenzied Vivian at Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16015
text: Elizabeth is said to be in the king's chambers. Go to the entrance of Liones Castle and search for the king's chambers.

name: DB_quest_info_16016
text: Dreyfus has surrendered in the king's chambers. He seems surprised by Hendrickson's death. Listen to what Dreyfus has to say about what happened ten years ago.

name: DB_quest_info_16017
text: Liones Castle appears to be on the verge of collapse. Take Elizabeth and get away from the castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16018
text: It feels like something's wrong in the West District. Go to the Knighthood (West District) to see if anything's going on.

name: DB_quest_info_16019
text: Jericho and Guila are writhing on the ground, as if in pain. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and check to see if Jericho is all right.

name: DB_quest_info_16020
text: The West District is overrun by the frenzied New Generation Mutants. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and eliminate them to keep the townspeople safe.

name: DB_quest_info_16021
text: Hendrickson appeared in the West District and demanded Elizabeth be handed over. Face off against Hendrickson in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16022
text: When Ban's help was called upon, he seemed to react oddly to the request. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and talk to Ban.

name: DB_quest_info_16023
text: Ban attacked, saying the Goddesses promised they'd bring Elaine back to life if he killed Meliodas. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and fight Ban.

name: DB_quest_info_16024
text: There's still hope, the chance for a miracle! Eliminate Hendrickson, then clear all main stages from the Black Magic Research Hall to the Liones Castle Field to save Elizabeth.

name: DB_quest_info_16025
text: The Coffin of Eternal Darkness has vanished, and there's word that a strange creature flew down south after Hendrickson's defeat. Go to Merlin's Laboratory in Liones Castle and talk to Merlin.

name: DB_quest_info_16026
text: Some upstanding citizens are planning to create a new group of Knights. Go to the Knighthood (West District) to join them, then return to Merlin's Laboratory in Liones Castle to talk to Merlin.

name: DB_quest_info_16101
text: Gilthunder says the Holy Knights are doing some self-reflection given what's happened. Clear the Training Grounds quest stage The Fruits of Labor to improve the Holy Knights' abilities, then return to Gilthunder in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16102
text: The Holy Knights have gained a hefty appetite thanks to their daily training. Make three dishes for the Holy Knights and deliver them to Gilthunder in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16103
text: Everyone's working hard to restore Liones Castle. The Holy Knights are doing their best with repairs, but they're shorthanded. Restore the central fountain of Liones, then return to Bartra in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16105
text: Margaret wants to return the Black Magic Research Hall to Merlin. Clear the Black Magic Research Hall quest stage Messy Black Magic Research Hall, then return to Margaret in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16107
text: The Barbarians took the chaos in the capital as an opportunity to come south. Clear the Liones Castle North Gate quest stage Southbound Northern Barbarians, then return to Bartra in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16202
text: Zeal says he lost the [Glass Marble] Guila gifted to him. Look through the debris to find the [Glass Marble] and take it to Zeal in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16203
text: Zeal is worried about a man named Brown, who's been too anxious to get a good night's sleep since the New Generation Mutants showed up. Talk to Brown in Liones Castle to ease his mind.

name: DB_quest_info_16204
text: A Mutant showed up just as Brown started to take his mind off them! Quick, eliminate the Mutant, then try to soothe Brown's nerves once more in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16205
text: Brown wants Meliodas to tell the Holy Knights to take security a bit more seriously. Relay his message to Gilthunder in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16206
text: Margaret is worried about Bartra's health, as his long imprisonment has taken a toll on his health. Go to Merlin's Laboratory in Liones Castle and ask Merlin to check up on Bartra's condition.

name: DB_quest_info_16207
text: Gather a [Black Moon Petal] from the Southern Part of Town quest stage Quality Ingredients for Quality Medicine, then take it to Merlin in Merlin's Laboratory at Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16208
text: Take the medicine Merlin made to Bartra in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16210
text: It appears there is a group of Holy Knights who still see Hendrickson as their leader. Clear the Liones Castle South Gate quest stage Homecoming Allies, then return to Gilthunder in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16211
text: Hendrickson's followers seem to be planning a revolt. Clear the Liones Castle South Gate quest stage Signs of Rebellion, then return to Gilthunder in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16301
text: Margaret is sure Vivian's related to the plot to resurrect the Demons, and insists she must be found. Go to the Watchtower, Vivian's former living quarters, clear the Watchtower quest stage A Mage's Curiosity, then return to Margaret in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16302
text: The Holy Knights are working hard to restore the capital. Bartra wants to encourage them, but isn't sure how. Encourage Holy Knight Jeff, the foreman of the restoration, in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16303
text: Holy Knight Jeff asked for help, since the Knights are having difficulty finding materials for their work. Gather [Wolf Pelts] from the Black Magic Research Hall quest stage Restoration Materials and take them to Jeff in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16304
text: Relay Holy Knight Jeff's message to King Bartra in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16305
text: People delivering materials to the tavern were mugged in the Southern Part of Town. Clear the Southern Part of Town quest stage District Pillagers to keep the area safe, then return to Elizabeth in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16306
text: Gather a [Small Wild Flower] in the Mountain Peak quest stage Perilous Mountain Path for Gilthunder, and take them to Margaret in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16308
text: Word is Hawk asked Merlin to come up with a scheme to increase the tavern's profits. This definitely sounds a bit dangerous. Go to Merlin's Laboratory in Liones Castle and ask Merlin about this.

name: DB_quest_info_16309
text: Gather a [Demon Sprout] from the Demon's Grave quest stage The Core of the Mutant for Merlin's research, then bring it to Merlin in Merlin's Laboratory at Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16351
text: Clear the Liones Castle North Gate free stage North Liones Garrison (Easy), then return to Holy Knight Paolo in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16352
text: Clear the Watchtower free stage A Monster Created by Curiosity (Easy), then return to Holy Knight Paolo in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16353
text: Clear the Black Magic Research Hall free stage Rampaging New Generation Holy Knight (Easy), then return to Holy Knight Paolo in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16354
text: Clear the Training Grounds free stage Everyday Training (Easy), then return to Holy Knight Paolo in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16355
text: Clear the Southern Part of Town free stage Continued Appearance of Mutants (Easy), then return to Holy Knight Paolo in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16356
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Easy), then return to Chef Allo in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16360
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Easy), then return to Chef Allo in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16401
text: The capital of Liones lies in disarray. Reconstruction requires a great deal of money, so make a donation through Margaret in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16402
text: Gilthunder says the Holy Knights are starting to neglect their training due to the repetitive nature of their drills. Clear the Training Grounds quest stage The Return of the Drill Instructor to whip the Holy Knights back into shape, then return to Gilthunder in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16403
text: Margaret wants to cook something for Bartra that will restore his energy. Discuss which dish would be best with Elizabeth in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16404
text: Make the rejuvenating [Dragon Skewer with Pepper] using [Smoked Jerky], [Pepper], and [Dragon Fruit], then take the dish to Bartra in Liones Castle.\nTip: Search Liones Castle for the ingredients, or purchase them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_16405
text: Jericho says she saw some Holy Knights talking about Elizabeth on their way up to the Mountain Peak. Clear the Mountain Peak quest stage An Overlook of the Tavern, then return to Jericho in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16406
text: Jericho is angry at the guys who were peeping on Elizabeth. Clear the Mountain Peak quest stage An Overlook of the Tavern, then return to Jericho in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16407
text: After the big fight, the Demon blood that once raged within Jericho lost all traces of magic. Guila remains unchanged, however. Go to Liones Castle and ask Guila why this is.

name: DB_quest_info_16408
text: Guila blurted out that the power of love kept her powers intact. Tell Jericho in Liones Castle what Guila said.

name: DB_quest_info_16409
text: Merlin says the animals near the Demon's Grave drank the blood of a Gray Demon and transformed into bizarre creatures. Clear the Demon's Grave quest stage Effects of the Demon's Blood, then return to Merlin in Merlin's Laboratory at Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16451
text: Clear the Liones Castle North Gate free stage North Liones Garrison (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16452
text: Clear the Watchtower free stage A Monster Created by Curiosity (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16453
text: Clear the Black Magic Research Hall free stage Rampaging New Generation Holy Knight (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16454
text: Clear the Training Grounds free stage Everyday Training (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16455
text: Clear the Southern Part of Town free stage Continued Appearance of Mutants (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16456
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16457
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16458
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16459
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16460
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16461
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16462
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16463
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Normal).

name: DB_quest_info_16502
text: Cookie Merchant Roonie says he's completely out of ingredients thanks to all the people who buy his wares after a hard day's work. Get some [Sugar] and take it to Roonie in Liones Castle.\nTip: Search Liones Castle for the ingredients, or purchase them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_16505
text: Gather [Chimera Blood] from the Watchtower quest stage Vivian's Laboratory for Merlin's research, and take it to Merlin in Merlin's Laboratory at Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16506
text: Gilthunder says Margaret's been busy lately, and is curious what she's up to. Go to Liones Castle and ask Margaret if something's going on.

name: DB_quest_info_16507
text: Margaret wants to cook something for Bartra herself, but she'll need a lot of ingredients to practice her cooking. Gather [Caviar] from the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Hard) and take it to Margaret in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16509
text: Griamore is concerned about Princess Veronica, who's been suffering from nightmares. Go to Liones Castle and ask Veronica if something's worrying her.

name: DB_quest_info_16510
text: Veronica revealed why she's not getting much sleep. Clear the Southern Part of Town quest stage The Cause of the Nightmares and return to Griamore in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16551
text: Clear the Liones Castle North Gate free stage North Liones Garrison (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16552
text: Clear the Watchtower free stage A Monster Created by Curiosity (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16553
text: Clear the Black Magic Research Hall free stage Rampaging New Generation Holy Knight (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16554
text: Clear the Training Grounds free stage Everyday Training (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16555
text: Clear the Southern Part of Town free stage Continued Appearance of Mutants (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16556
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16557
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16558
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16559
text: Clear the Liones Castle South Gate free stage [Cooking] Rebel Supplies (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16560
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16561
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16562
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Hard).

name: DB_quest_info_16563
text: Clear the Mountain Peak free stage [Cooking] Revitalizing Ingredients (Hard).

name: DB_quest_name_16025
text: [Episode 73] The Vanished Coffin of Eternal Darkness

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10601040
text: Clash with the North Gate Garrison

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10607170
text: The Vanished Coffin of Eternal Darkness

name: DB_stage_cut_name_3006230
text: The Vanished Coffin of Eternal Darkness

name: DB_quest_info_16030
text: Things are finally back to normal! Speak with Merlin in Liones Castle and head to the Boar Hat tavern to prepare for business!

name: DB_quest_info_16031
text: Meliodas wants to try out his newly developed recipe. Let's find the ingredients in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_16032
text: Make Gilthunder and Howzer eat the [Mini Hawk Meatpie].

name: DB_quest_info_16033
text: Look for, Hawk who ran away from the tavern, in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16034
text: Found Hawk! Pursue Hawk in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16035
text: Hear out Diane's plans to capture Hawk in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16036
text: Things are heating up in the competition to capture Hawk. Give up and return to the tavern and talk to Ban.

name: DB_quest_info_16037
text: Ban doesn't seem too happy. Speak to Ban, who is sulking in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_16038
text: It's getting late. Let's escort Elizabeth back to Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16039
text: There are still things left to do. Clear the Black Magic Research Hall Quest Stage [The Trumpet of the Goddess].

name: DB_quest_info_16040
text: A promise is a promise. Go to the Mountain Peak to keep the promise.

name: DB_quest_info_16041
text: Promises must be kept. Leave the spectators behind and clear the Mountain Peak Quest Stage [Just Because].

name: DB_quest_info_16042
text: King and Elizabeth are having a chat in the tavern. Sneak up on King.

name: DB_quest_info_16043
text: Follow Diane to the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16044
text: Find [Bricks] in the Knighthood (West District) wreckage and deliver them to the Carpenter.

name: DB_quest_info_16045
text: The Carpenter misplaced his hammer. Search the boxes near the Knighthood (West District) for a [Hammer] and return it to the Carpenter.

name: DB_quest_info_16046
text: Diane wants to play a game at the Knighthood (West District). Follow Diane.

name: DB_quest_info_16047
text: The wedding is thrown into disarray when the New Generation Mutants attack. Team up with Diane to eliminate the New Generation Mutants that appeared in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16048
text: It seems like something happened between Diane and King, but neither will say a word. Let's go back to the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_16049
text: A brilliant idea to bring in more customers! Talk to Merlin in her laboratory about becoming a hostess for the Boar Hat tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_16050
text: Tail the Trio of Troublemakers in the Knighthood (West District) to fulfill Merlin's request.

name: DB_quest_info_16051
text: Someone is secretly watching the Trio of Troublemakers. Find out where and who it is at the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16052
text: A little boy found out about the tail. Become [The Seven Deadly Sins] with Pelio.

name: DB_quest_info_16053
text: Do something nice for Pelio, who misses his mother.

name: DB_quest_info_16054
text: The Trio of Troublemakers made their way to a street with many cafes within Liones Castle while Gowther played with Pelio. Follow them and take care of the situation.

name: DB_quest_info_16055
text: The mysterious stalker was successfully provoked in the cafe streets of Liones Castle. Take care of this pain in the neck and find out who it is!

name: DB_quest_info_16056
text: Merlin's request has been fulfilled. Talk to Merlin in her laboratory in Liones Castle while also checking up on Vivian.

name: DB_quest_info_16057
text: Open up the tavern with Merlin, joining as a new hostess!

name: DB_quest_info_16058
text: Elizabeth says she has something important to say. Talk to her in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_info_16059
text: Ban says he has something to say and wants to talk outside. Go to the tavern entrance.

name: DB_quest_info_16060
text: Go to the Medal Bestowment Hall in Liones Castle to attend the ceremony.

name: DB_quest_info_16061
text: It looks like some of the Holy Knights aren't too happy about [The Seven Deadly Sins] being awarded medals. Fight against Dogedo of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky].

name: DB_quest_info_16062
text: Deathpierce of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] seems to be surprised by Meliodas's display in the fight. Speak with him.

name: DB_quest_info_16063
text: Now that the medal bestowment ceremony is over, let's head to the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16064
text: It looks like the Trio of Troublemakers are worried about a lot of things. It also looks like Merlin has something to say to them, so go speak with her in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16065
text: It's time to tell the gang to prepare for another journey. Find Gowther, who headed for Merlin's Laboratory, in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16066
text: Gowther is in front of Merlin's Laboratory in Liones Castle. Let's tell Gowther to prepare for a journey.

name: DB_quest_info_16067
text: The other members need to be convinced since Gowther refused. Talk to Merlin in her laboratory in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16068
text: Something seems to be happening in the town. Go to the Knighthood (West District) Entrance and check it out.

name: DB_quest_info_16069
text: Talk to Zeal, who is crying in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16070
text: Guila needs to know what's going on with Zeal! Look for Guila somewhere in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16071
text: Guila doesn't recognize her brother, whom she loves more than anyone. It's strange that Gowther is staying silent. Talk to Gowther in the Knighthood (West District).

name: DB_quest_info_16072
text: Gowther says he manipulated memories to try to get Guila to love him, and nullify her relationship with her brother, Zeal. Go to the Knighthood (West District) and convince Gowther through the use of force.

name: DB_quest_info_16073
text: Unsurprisingly, things are a mess. Meet up with Diane in the Knighthood (West District) and talk to her.

name: DB_quest_info_16074
text: Go to the Knighthood (West District) and wake the unconscious Guila.

name: DB_quest_info_16075
text: What could Merlin be asking Slater to do? Find Merlin in the Knighthood (West District) and ask her directly.

name: DB_quest_info_16076
text: Now that Gowther's issues have been resolved, return to the tavern and talk to Hawk.

name: DB_quest_info_16077
text: Hawk is fuming when Elizabeth runs out of the tavern. Talk to Hawk.

name: DB_quest_info_16601
text: Clear the Mountain Peak Quest Stage [Reasons for Wandering] and send the Holy Knight back home, then return to Molly in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16602
text: Clear the Mountain Peak Quest Stage [It's the Thought That Counts] and send the Holy Knight back home, then return to Molly in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16603
text: According to Elizabeth, something strange is happening with Slater. Go to Liones Castle and ask Slater what's going on.

name: DB_quest_info_16604
text: Slater wants clothes for a naked Gowther in his doll form. Find [Usable Pieces of Cloth] and give them to Slater in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16605
text: Hearing that Slater wants to make clothes for Gowther, Elizabeth wants to do something nice for him. Take the [Adorable Doll Clothes] that Elizabeth made to Slater in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16606
text: Some children have gone on an adventure to the Demon's Grave. Clear the Demon's Grave Quest Stage [No Children Allowed] and return to Mage Solen with the rescued children.

name: DB_quest_info_16608
text: Delmon says he needs seed capital to return home. Collect [Damaged Handicraft] from the Southern Part of Town Quest Stage [An Unexpected Treasure Storage] and return to Delmon.

name: DB_quest_info_16609
text: Eliminate all mutated plants in the Demon's Grave Quest Stage [The Cradle of Ominous Plants] and collect [Research Samples], then return to Mage Solen in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16701
text: Holy Knight Gustin mumbles there's a weird trend going around. Go meet up with Apprentice Holy Knight Mills in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16702
text: Clear the Training Grounds Quest Stage [Knight Resting Area] and find Trader Moore, then return to Apprentice Holy Knight Mills in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16703
text: Trader Moore is planning on running away after fencing his stolen goods that he claims are from [The Seven Deadly Sins]. Clear the Liones Castle South Gate Quest Stage [Dark Byway] and capture Trader Moore, then return to Mills in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16704
text: Retrieve the [Stolen Tavern Items] from a hidden box in the Liones Castle cafe streets, then return to Apprentice Holy Knight Mills in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16705
text: Meet up with Holy Knight Anith, who almost died from taking strange medicine, in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16706
text: Clear the Liones Castle North Gate Quest Stage [Scene of the Trafficking] and return to Mage Solen in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16707
text: Meet up with the Medicine Merchant in Liones Castle and find out what's going on.

name: DB_quest_info_16708
text: Collect [Red-stained Stones] in the Demon's Grave Quest Stage [Destroyed Cemetery] and return to Mage Solen in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16709
text: Collect [Magic-infused Flowers] from the Black Magic Research Hall Quest Stage [Traces of the Goddess] and deliver them to the Medicine Merchant in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16710
text: Lois says the Elixir of Love she bought seems like an ordinary bottle of perfume. Grab the [Elixir of Love] and talk to the Medicine Merchant in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16711
text: Collect [Research Materials] from the Black Magic Research Hall Quest Stage [Waste Disposal] and deliver them to Mage Solen in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16801
text: Simon is saddened by the loss of his comrade. Find a [Memento] for him in the Southern Part of Town Quest Stage [Collapsed Dwelling] and deliver it to Simon in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16802
text: Simon wants to give Slater a [Small Gift] that everyone prepared. Give the gift to Slater in Liones Castle for Simon.

name: DB_quest_info_16803
text: Holy Knight Gustin says he saw suspicious individuals in the Southern Part of Town. Clear the Southern Part of Town Quest Stage [Dark Shadow] and return to Gustin in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16804
text: With the intel from the Southern Part of Town, Gustin found out that there is a military base of rebelling factions. Clear the Liones Castle South Gate Quest Stage [Forest East of Liones Castle South Gate] and return to Gustin in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16805
text: The rebelling factions have set up a logistics base in the forests near the Liones Castle South Gate and are preparing for war. Clear the Liones Castle South Gate Quest Stage [Secret Logistics Base] and return to Gustin in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_info_16806
text: Howzer feels sorry for Diane, who feels down after King's departure. He says he'll do whatever it takes to cheer her up. Find some [Smoked Jerky], an [Egg], and a [Potato] to make [Egg and Chips], then give it to Diane in Liones Castle.\nTIP: Acquire ingredients by searching around Liones Castle or purchasing them from the Materials Shop.

name: DB_quest_info_16807
text: Diane is even sadder after receiving the meal, saying she wishes she could share it with King. Though it was an unexpected response, return to Howzer in Liones Castle and tell him how she felt about it.

name: DB_quest_info_16808
text: Holy Knight Gustin is requesting the Watchtower be cleared of dug-in rebels. Clear the Watchtower Quest Stage [The Traitor's Dwelling] and subdue the rebel forces, then return to Gustin in Liones Castle.

name: DB_quest_name_16059
text: [Episode 96] Should I Stay or Should I Go

name: DB_quest_name_16062
text: [Episode 99] [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Retreat

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10608020
text: Should I Stay or Should I Go

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10608050
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Retreat

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10655070
text: Never Seen a Lost Holy Knight Before?

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10655130
text: Going Home for Real This Time

name: DB_stage_cut_name_10656030
text: I May Not Be an Excavation Master

name: DB_stage_cut_name_3006520
text: Should I Stay or Should I Go

name: DB_stage_cut_name_3006532
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Retreat

name: DB_quest_info_16078
text: Slater has joined in place of Ban and King, but it's too soon to feel safe! Merlin seems to have sensed something, so let's go talk to her.

name: DB_quest_info_17001
text: The gang has reached the lands to the south, where the kingdom of Camelot is located! A giant monster can be seen attacking Camelot. Save Camelot!

name: DB_quest_info_17002
text: The ancient weapon Albion boasts incredible power! It's dangerous, but let's move closer.

name: DB_quest_info_17003
text: The Albion is about to break Merlin's protective barrier. It can only last two more strikes! Camelot will be in danger at this rate. Let's hurry and take down the Albion!

name: DB_quest_info_17004
text: It was struck by its own attack due to the "Full Counter," but it's still standing strong. Attack the Albion once more.

name: DB_quest_info_17005
text: Meliodas's sword broke while trying to save Arthur, but the enemy is still standing. Keep attacking the Albion!

name: DB_quest_info_17006
text: With the Sacred Treasure Lostvayne back in Meliodas's hands, the Albion is defeated. Go to the Urban District in Camelot and continue the conversation.

name: DB_quest_info_17007
text: Meliodas and crew realize the true strength of [The Ten Commandments]. Can the gang take on [The Ten Commandments]? Clear the Camelot Urban District Main Stage [Excessive Violence].

name: DB_quest_info_17008
text: Everyone is injured pretty badly. Take the injured to Camelot Castle with Gowther.

name: DB_quest_info_17009
text: Fortunately, Merlin is okay too. The gang must accept the bitterness of defeat and prepare for the upcoming battle. Clear the Camelot Castle Main Stage [Traces of Albion].

name: DB_quest_info_17010
text: Let's tell Diane the plans for the future. Clear the Camelot Castle Main Stage [Reasons for Memories].

name: DB_quest_info_17011
text: Meliodas and crew set off to find Diane. Before that, let's find the missing Troublemakers. Clear the Adventures of the Trio of Troublemakers Main Stage [Return of the Transformed].

name: DB_quest_info_17012
text: Diane has gone missing and the gang must find her. Let's start with where she used to live before she joined the crew. Clear the Amnesiac Girl Main Stage [Dearly Missed].

name: DB_quest_info_17013
text: Meliodas and crew have narrowly avoided danger. Merlin suddenly suggests a change in destination. Let's hear what Merlin has to say in the tavern.

name: DB_quest_name_17001
text: [Episode 110-1] Camelot, the New Nation to the South

name: DB_quest_name_17006
text: [Episode 115] The Power of the Sacred Treasure

name: DB_stage_cut_name_20701010
text: Camelot, the New Nation to the South

name: DB_stage_cut_name_20702000
text: The Great Tree of the Fairy King's Forest

name: DB_stage_cut_name_3007000
text: Camelot, the New Nation to the South

name: DB_stage_cut_name_3007040
text: The Power of the Sacred Treasure

name: DB_quest_info_17014
text: The most important thing right now is to get stronger to fight against [The Ten Commandments]. Talk to Hawk in the tavern and head to the Druid Sacred Lands, Istal, to retrieve the power Merlin took from Meliodas.

name: DB_quest_info_18001
text: The group arrives at Sacred Land Istal for Meliodas to regain his power. The leaders of the Druids wish to test their determination. Pass Jenna's test in Sacred Land Istal and prove your determination!

name: DB_quest_info_18002
text: Zaneri, the leader of the Druids, tells Elizabeth to follow her. Follow Zaneri to the Tower of Trials on the right side of Sacred Land Istal.

name: DB_quest_info_18003
text: The Tower of Trials is dark inside, making it difficult to see. Accept the test in order to retrieve the power that was sealed away.

name: DB_quest_info_18004
text: Zaneri gives Elizabeth a test as well. Will the two be able to pass their tests safely? Clear the Endless Trial Main Stage [Reasons for the Rampage] in Danafor in the Past.

name: DB_quest_info_18005
text: Meliodas is not giving up. Clear the Endless Trial Main Stage [Mutual Feelings] in Danafor in the Past.

name: DB_quest_info_18006
text: While Meliodas undergoes his test, King finds an enemy from his past in Sacred Land Istal. Confront Hendrickson.

name: DB_quest_info_18007
text: Follow the toasty smell to the Training Grotto on the left side of Sacred Land Istal.

name: DB_quest_info_18008
text: Ban leaves on a journey to find a way to resurrect his lover. Follow him to Ravens and clear In My Father's Name Main Stage [Father's Will].

name: DB_quest_info_18009
text: No amount of strengthening is ever enough to go against [The Ten Commandments]. Talk to Jenna in Sacred Land Istal to use the Training Grotto.

name: DB_quest_info_18010
text: Follow Jenna's instruction and enter the Training Grotto on the left side of Sacred Land Istal.

name: DB_quest_info_18011
text: Select a Goddess Amber inside the Training Grotto on the left side of Sacred Land Istal, then defeat the enemy together with Howzer.

name: DB_quest_info_18012
text: Goddess Ambers float inside the Training Grotto on the left side of Sacred Land Istal, and various monsters are contained inside. Select a Goddess Amber to start the training.

name: DB_quest_info_18013
text: Meliodas has to warm up before accepting his power. Train with King inside the Training Grotto on the left side of Sacred Land Istal.

name: DB_quest_info_18014
text: The fight is over, but a deep suspicion remains. It can't be resolved right now, so exit the Training Grotto and regroup with the others in Sacred Land Istal.

name: DB_quest_info_18015
text: Jenna has summoned a Goddess Amber in front of the Training Grotto on the left side of Sacred Land Istal.

name: DB_quest_info_18016
text: After regaining his power, Meliodas says he has a message for [The The Ten Commandments]. Go to Edinburgh and clear Declaration of War Main Stage [Taking on [The Ten Commandments!]]

name: DB_quest_info_18017
text: It looks like Elizabeth's test is over since Zaneri has come back outside. Ask Elizabeth about the results of her training in Sacred Land Istal.

name: DB_quest_info_18018
text: The group has done everything they needed to do in Istal. Go to Jenna and Zaneri in Sacred Land Istal to say goodbye.

name: DB_quest_info_18019
text: The group can't slow down now! Preparations for the upcoming fight against [The Ten Commandments] are underway. Go to Sacred Land Istal to achieve your next goal.

name: DB_quest_info_18020
text: The next objective is to find Escanor, [b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b]. Return to the tavern to make preparations before heading to the next destination.

name: DB_quest_info_1001
text: Many things are needed to become powerful. Go to [SP Dungeon (Fort Solgres)] and clear the Attribute Dungeon (Enhancement).

name: DB_quest_info_1002
text: Now that you have the materials, it's time to become stronger. Enhance SR [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas to max level.

name: DB_quest_info_1003
text: Increase Skill Ranks by changing the position of a skill. Move a skill and increase its rank in a Free Stage, then clear it. Keep in mind, you must move the skill yourself to make it count.

name: DB_quest_info_1004
text: If you wish to make your heroes more powerful, it's time to evolve them. Evolve SR [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas to SSR.

name: DB_quest_info_1005
text: [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas's main ability is his Stance Skill which Counters attacks. Defeat an enemy with the Counter Stance Skill in the Near Cain's Village Quest Stage [Practical Countering Practice].

name: DB_quest_info_1006
text: There are times when inaction is a viable strategy. Use Skill Lock and clear a Free Stage.

name: DB_quest_info_1007
text: Enhancement and Evolution aren't the only ways to become stronger. Wearing Equipment powers up heroes. Have 6 pieces of equipment on [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas.

name: DB_quest_info_1008
text: Equipment can be made stronger through Enhancement. Enhance Equipment to +5. Keep in mind, owned equipment that is already at +5 does not count.

name: DB_quest_info_1009
text: Equipment can be Awakened when enhanced 5 times. Awaken Equipment to Tier 1 and check out the special effect! Keep in mind, higher Tier Awakenings do not count.

name: DB_quest_info_1010
text: Fight smart and strategically! Target an enemy and attack. Target an enemy in a Free Stage and clear it.

name: DB_quest_info_1011
text: Special materials used to Awaken heroes can be acquired from Boss Battles. Clear a Boss Battle Stage.

name: DB_quest_info_1012
text: If you lack the required materials for hero Awakening or Evolution, you may be able to exchange other materials for them. Exchange Materials to acquire the necessary items.

name: DB_quest_info_1013
text: There is a way to revert mistakes made when moving or selecting skills. Use the Reset button in a Free Stage and clear it.

name: DB_quest_info_1014
text: Heroes can become even more powerful when they are Awakened. Awaken [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas to Tier 1.

name: DB_quest_info_1015
text: Move skills in order to create a Rank 3 Skill. Use the strong Rank 3 Skill in a Free Stage and clear it.

name: DB_quest_info_1016
text: One must diligently gather Evolution Materials in order to prepare for the next step. Clear the Attribute Dungeon (Evolution) in [SP Dungeon (Fort Solgres)].

name: DB_quest_info_1017
text: Time for the next step: make heroes even more powerful. Evolve SSR [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas to UR.

name: DB_quest_info_1018
text: The simplest way to make heroes more powerful is to Enhance them. Enhance the evolved UR [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas to max level.

name: DB_quest_info_1019
text: Awaken and become even more powerful. Awaken [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas to Tier 2.

name: DB_quest_info_1020
text: Find out the opponent's weakness and seize victory. Tap and hold on an enemy or ally to use Balor's Evil Eye. Check an enemy's info in a Free Stage and clear it.

name: DB_quest_info_1021
text: Death Match may occur when repeatedly clearing Boss Battles. Clear Boss Battles 5 times to see for yourself.

name: DB_quest_info_1022
text: Special materials which allow heroes to surpass their limits can be found in Death Matches. Join forces with other adventurers and clear a Death Match.

name: DB_quest_info_1023
text: Evolution isn't over yet. Limit Break UR [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas and become even more powerful.

name: DB_quest_info_1024
text: Becoming physically stronger is crucial, but one must not forget the importance of equipment. Awaken a piece of equipment to Tier 3.

name: DB_quest_info_1025
text: The higher the hero's Awakening Tier, the stronger they are. Awaken [Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas to Tier 3.

name: DB_quest_name_1002
text: Reach Max Level with SR Meliodas!

name: DB_quest_name_1003
text: Move a Skill to Rank Up!

name: DB_quest_name_1007
text: Have 6 Pieces of Equipment on Meliodas!

text: The Tree Which Grants True Love

text: The Most Popular Man in the Kingdom

text: Entrance to the Fairy King's Forest

name: DB_stage_cut_name_12010203
text: Why He Doesn't Carry a Sword

text: The Reason for a Sixth Rule

name: DB_stage_cut_name_1400730
text: More Important Than Ale and Food

name: DB_stage_cut_name_1401110
text: A King Put to the Test

name: DB_stage_cut_name_1401410
text: Medicine to Bring Back the Dead

text: The Demonic Beast of Ruin Appears

text: The Trio of Troublemakers' Defensive Training

text: Sudden Emergency Training with the Fairies!

text: In the Forest of White Dreams

text: Give Me a Nanny or Give Me Death

text: Even Though I'm Making Mistakes Today

name: DB_stage_cut_name_91490010
text: The Heart is Quicker Than the Mind

name: DB_quest_info_111
text: Elizabeth is requesting the removal of monsters from Fort Solgres. Let's clear Fort Solgres.

name: DB_quest_info_112
text: Elizabeth is requesting the removal of monsters from Fort Solgres. Let's clear Fort Solgres.

name: DB_quest_info_113

name: DB_stage_cut_name_2002010
text: Wrath of the Hide and Seeks

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_02_1
text: That's because it's a very special scar.

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_02_2
text: Want a matching one on the other side?

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_03_1
text: Brawl with you once a day.

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_03_2
text: You can drink as much Vanya Ale as you want.

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_03_3
text: You can eat my cooking to your heart's content.

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_04_3
text: Why can't we just get along?

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_06_1
text: The concept I have in mind is a naked chef with just an apron.

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_06_2
text: Want to wear the hostess uniform?

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_06_3
text: I don't have anything like that.

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_07_1
text: Want to have a hunting contest?

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_07_2
text: Then we'll close for the day!

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_09_1
text: The incident when we first met?

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_09_2
text: The incident where you stole all the dolls in the kingdom?

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_09_3
text: The incident where you blew off that mission?

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_13_1
text: That's why you and I get along.

name: DB_ban_player_storyanswer_13_2
text: You're even weirder than I am.

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_01
text: Captain, out of the 720 brawls we fought, I won 361 times, right?

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_02
text: The scar you gave me is really aching.

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_03
text: If I'm your chef, what will you be doing for me?

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_05
text: What do you look for in a significant other?

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_06
text: You don't have a chef's uniform?

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_07
text: Captain, I don't have enough ingredients to cook with.

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_08
text: Captain, what kind of food do you like to eat?

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_10
text: I wonder how my favorite person is doing.

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_11
text: Captain, you're not hiding anything from me, are you?

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_12
text: Man, I'm bored. What's there to do around here?

name: DB_ban_storyquestion_13
text: You're kind of a weirdo, Captain. You know that?â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_001_normal_1
text: *sniff sniff* Something smells fishy around here...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_001_normal_2
text: I heard there's a pig that eats all the scraps. Is that true?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_001_normal_4
text: These villagers really ruined Gilthunder's mood.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_001_talk_5
text: I'll just have a bit of bread for dinner tonight.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_002_normal_1
text: Allioni said to be careful of the talking pig...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_002_normal_2
text: There's nothing in this village. It's so boring...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_002_normal_3
text: Hey, you there! Come over here for a sec.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_002_normal_4
text: I bet I'm the strongest Knight in all of Liones!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_002_talk_5
text: Have you heard the rumors about the Forest of White Dreams?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_normal_1
text: I've yearned for a peaceful town like this one...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_normal_2
text: I wouldn't mind settling down here...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_normal_4
text: Okay, I'll perform an honorable deed and return to the Knighthood!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_normal_5
text: I'm sick of living in this village with my head down, walking on eggshells around everyone...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_normal_6
