text: I gave up on returning to the Knighthood. I'm just going to settle down here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_talk_1
text: Oh, don't worry about me. Actually, it'd be great if you pretended I don't exist.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_talk_2
text: Th- they're not here to get me, are they?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_talk_3
text: I won't go until I get some help! I mean it!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_003_talk_4
text: They have good Vanya Ale... Anyway, I just really like it here!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_normal_1
text: Why is Mead acting like this?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_normal_2
text: How can I apologize to Mead?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_normal_3
text: My dad makes Vanya Ale, too.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_normal_4
text: My necklace... He gave it to me for my birthday...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_normal_5
text: That talking pig is so cute!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_normal_7
text: I'm going to take real good care of Mary from now on!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_talk_1
text: Mead really made things tough for our village.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_talk_2
text: I shouldn't have gotten mad at Mead.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_talk_3
text: I wish I were a grownup already so I could try Vanya Ale...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_talk_4
text: What if it's gone forever? Waahh!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_talk_5
text: I want a talking pig for my next birthday!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_talk_6
text: It's all my fault. I shouldn't have left the window open...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_004_talk_7
text: Oh, little Mary must've been so scared all on her own!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_005_normal_1
text: Any tasty food scraps around here?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_005_normal_2
text: I want some scraps with a bit of Vanya Ale in them!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_005_normal_3
text: I'm Sir Hawk, captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_005_talk_1
text: I'm sleepy, talk to me later.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_005_talk_2
text: Do your best in all things, and one day you'll become a great pi... I mean, Human, like me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_005_talk_3
text: I don't like the look you're giving me. You're not after some roast pork, are you?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_006_normal_1
text: I used to like pork... but I probably shouldn't eat it anymore.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_006_normal_2
text: Every friendship, every connection, is precious.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_006_normal_3
text: I'm still a bit clumsy, but I hope I can assist the tavern better in the future.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_006_talk_1
text: Sir Meliodas, I... I'm always grateful.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_006_talk_2
text: Um... hello? Is there something on my face?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_006_talk_3
text: Maybe I should learn how to cook. I think I'd do a pretty good job.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_normal_2
text: That Elizabeth lady sure is pretty...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_normal_3
text: You take care of yourself, you hear?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_normal_4
text: We need to get stronger if we want to defend the village!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_normal_5
text: I started exercising to get stronger.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_talk_1
text: If we can't produce Vanya Ale, this village is finished.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_talk_2
text: Does the Boar Hat give out any discount coupons or anything?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_talk_3
text: I'm sorry... but I can't tell you any specifics.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_009_talk_4
text: They might not look like much, but I worked hard for these muscles.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_normal_1
text: That strangely gets on my nerves...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_normal_2
text: He's not out there making trouble, is he?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_normal_3
text: Our family has been making Vanya Ale for generations.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_normal_4
text: Apples from Cain's Village are top notch.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_normal_5
text: Have you heard of Dalmally, the far-off village?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_normal_6
text: I don't know what's going to happen to the village at this rate...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_talk_1
text: The village is troubled enough as it is, so what's that rascal doing here?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_talk_2
text: My dream is to make the tastiest ale in the world.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_talk_3
text: Have you tried this year's Vanya Ale? It's out of this world!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_010_talk_4
text: I wonder if I should look into moving to another village.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_normal_2
text: What should I do about this?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_normal_3
text: Haha, I didn't know you were so strong.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_normal_4
text: Let me know if anything's bothering you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_normal_5
text: I thought I'd seen everything, but a talking pig certainly is new to me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_normal_6
text: Our town is very proud of the Vanya Ale we produce.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_talk_1
text: I don't want to blame Mead for anything.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_talk_2
text: Not even ten strong men can pull out that one sword...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_talk_3
text: How old are you, exactly? You look like a little kid...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_talk_4
text: I'll be sure to visit your tavern soon.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_011_talk_5
text: Elizabeth? Is she your older sister?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_1
text: What was he trying to achieve by upsetting the Holy Knight? Tsk, tsk.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_2
text: I'd be able to pull out that sword no problem if my hardships had made me stronger.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_3
text: I feel bad for being so mean to Mead.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_4
text: Where can I get a talking pig?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_6
text: I hope nothing bad happened to my Jaz...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_7
text: Jaz will be back in one piece. I have faith.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_8
text: I had a good dream last night. I somehow got the feeling that Jaz would return today.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_normal_9
text: I'm going to make Jaz's favorite dish today.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_talk_1
text: I'm worried about the depressing mood that's settled over the village.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_talk_2
text: I'm concerned about the mayor, he looks like he's having a hard time these days.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_talk_3
text: I wouldn't mind having Elizabeth as my daughter-in-law, haha.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_talk_4
text: Jaz is the only light of my life, my one hope.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_talk_5
text: If you get the chance, try a loaf of my bread. It's quite delicious, I promise you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_012_talk_6
text: I'm certain my Jaz is alive.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_016_normal_1
text: Geez, why did that guy have to show up all of a sudden?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_016_normal_2
text: They might just kill us if we go back like this.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_016_normal_3
text: If I'd known this was going to happen, I would've drunk all the ale I could get my hands on.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_017_normal_1
text: At the very least, our reports will have to be flawless to avoid getting punished...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_017_normal_2
text: Could it be some kind of trickery?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_017_normal_3
text: How did he pull out the Holy Knight's sword?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_018_normal_1
text: Darn it, I'll put that stupid sword out myself.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_018_normal_2
text: I bet [The Seven Deadly Sins] could pull the sword out...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_018_talk_1
text: Holy Knights should be protecting villages, not making people suffer!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_018_talk_2
text: How did you do it? Hmm? How?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_021_normal_1
text: Oh, it's the Boar Hat tavern master!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_021_normal_2
text: I sell all manner of equipment that can assist you in so many ways.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_021_normal_3
text: Do you need equipment, by any chance?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_021_normal_4
text: Maybe I should've gone to another village...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_021_talk_1
text: Worry not. Whatever you don't need, I can take off your hands.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_021_talk_2
text: You can rest assured that I don't deal in stolen goods. Just let me know if you need anything.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_027_normal_1
text: Anyone looking for something to buy?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_027_normal_2
text: I'll also buy items from you if you've got something good!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_027_normal_3
text: I have everything you could ever want! Except whatever's not in my inventory, of course.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_027_talk_1
text: You can buy better items with a higher village Friendship level.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_028_talk_1
text: I didn't do it on purpose...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_029_normal_2
text: You took care of those soldiers in a flash!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_029_talk_1
text: How can I be strong like you? You can tell me!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_030_normal_2
text: I won't make any trouble from now on! I swear!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_030_normal_4
text: When I grow up, I'm going to make the best Vanya Ale in the world.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_030_talk_1
text: Thank you for helping our village.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_030_talk_2
text: I'm going to be awesome like you when I grow up, Meliodas.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_030_talk_3
text: This village is very important to me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_031_normal_1
text: So what's that kid's true identity?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_031_talk_1
text: H- how did a little kid pull out the Holy Knight's sword?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_032_normal_1
text: No way... This can't be happening!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_032_talk_1
text: I- I better report this to Gilthunder right away! It's a monster!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_033_normal_1
text: I wonder how that lady makes such tasty dishes...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_033_normal_2
text: You need to use good ingredients in every dish you cook!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_033_talk_1
text: I never use seasoning! Emphasizing the ingredients' natural flavors is what's important!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_034_normal_1
text: I'm from Vaizel. It's my hometown.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_034_normal_2
text: I haven't been in this village long, but I can tell it's a good town.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_034_talk_1
text: There's a famous, big-time merchant in Vaizel named Taizoo. He's a good friend.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_037_normal_1
text: My Pop-up Shop isn't something that opens every day!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_037_normal_2
text: Now's your chance to buy! You'll regret it if you miss out!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_037_talk_1
text: The shop appears in a flash, then blows away like the wind.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_038_normal_1
text: Those idiots. Do they expect to free a sword a Holy Knight drove into the ground? Hahaha.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_038_talk_1
text: How dare you defy a Holy Knight? Don't you know how serious of a crime that is?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_039_normal_1
text: You thinking of disobeying him too?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_039_talk_1
text: We won't let you go just because you're a kid. Get ready to be taught a lesson!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_042_talk_1
text: (A village bulletin board. All sorts of flyers are posted on it.)

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_055_normal_1
text: Get me another tankard of ale over here! No, bring me a whole keg!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_055_normal_2
text: Drink up! Today's the kind of day to drink until you can't see straight!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_055_talk_1
text: We're in your debt! Thank you so much!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_055_talk_2
text: I think the best drink in your tavern is the Vanya Ale we produced! Hahaha!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_056_normal_1
text: It's like a huge burden has been lifted from my shoulders, I feel grrrreat!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_056_normal_2
text: I'll never forget those Knights turning pale and hightailing out of here. What a hoot!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_056_talk_1
text: We'll make sure your tavern makes a neat sum tonight, so bring out all the drinks you've got!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_056_talk_2
text: That girl makes a lot of mistakes but she doesn't bother me at all. Interesting!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_057_normal_1
text: So who are you really, tavern master? You're incredible.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_057_normal_2
text: Alright now, let's drink! Come on over and have a drink with us, tavern master!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_057_talk_1
text: Drop by the village more often, alright? We promise you'll make good money. Hahaha!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_057_talk_2
text: Where did you get that talking pig? Every time I see him, I'm so intrigued.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_058_normal_1
text: Things turned out well, thanks to you. I appreciate what you've done for us.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_058_normal_2
text: I wish my Jaz was here with us...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_058_talk_1
text: What's the name of the young lady that works here?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_058_talk_2
text: Looks like you don't have enough hands on deck. Could I help out with the cooking, perhaps?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_normal_10
text: I'm glad we were able to come here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_normal_5
text: What happened between you and King?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_normal_7
text: We can take our time a little.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_2
text: Won't you go inside, Sir King?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_3
text: I'm going to hone my concentration this time!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_4
text: How was the test? Have you regained your power?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_5
text: What in the world happened inside?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_6
text: You're finally getting your power back!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_7
text: You can't just waltz into enemy territory! That's suicide!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_8
text: Have you seen him? G- Griamore...?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_1002_talk_9
text: We are ready to depart, Meliodas.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_101_talk_1
text: What in the world happened to this village?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_102_talk_1
text: You were pretty amazing there for a second.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_103_normal_1
text: Oh, have I been discovered already?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_105_normal_1
text: I'm so relieved you're awake, Sir Meliodas.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_106_normal_1
text: When are you going to wake up, Meliodas?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_106_normal_2
text: I can't believe a doctor poisoned his patient...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_106_talk_1
text: I hate being worried, Meliodas. I'm gonna give you a nice smack in the head when you wake up.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_106_talk_2
text: You were sleeping like a dead man... Wait, how did you wake up?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_107_normal_1
text: I'm the only doctor in the village.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_107_talk_1
text: Miss, did you come here with that Giant?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_108_normal_1
text: I poisoned him like you asked me to! Please give me back my daughter!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_108_talk_1
text: You promised you'd return Sennett once I gave him the poison!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_109_normal_1
text: I wonder if the captain is all right.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_109_normal_2
text: I'll protect the captain no matter what.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_109_normal_3
text: The princess is just the tavern hostess, nothing more.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_109_normal_4
text: I wonder if I would've been more help if I was smaller...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_109_talk_1
text: I don't want to talk to you. Go away.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_110_normal_2
text: I wonder when I'll get a raise.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_110_normal_3
text: The doctor dotes on his daughter.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_110_normal_4
text: The best parts of my shift are when the doctor goes out on house calls!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_110_normal_6
text: Where did the insects come from?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_110_talk_1
text: Are you hurting anywhere? Oh, just wondering.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_111_normal_1
text: Ahh, nothing like a good drink!â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_111_normal_2
text: Hurry up and let's have some fun!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_111_normal_4
text: No way... The pig can talk?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_112_normal_1
text: I'm a merchant who sells anything and everything.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_112_normal_2
text: I don't take any stolen goods because I'm honest.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_112_talk_1
text: Have you heard about the old ruins northwest of the village?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_113_normal_2
text: Baste Prison is a terrible place.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_113_normal_3
text: I'm so glad my father is safe.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_113_normal_4
text: Something like this should never happen again.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_113_talk_2
text: The village suffered greatly under the Holy Knights' despotism.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_113_talk_3
text: I'll always be grateful for what you've done.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_114_normal_2
text: I need to deliver this quick...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_114_normal_3
text: Not sure if they match the description...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_114_normal_4
text: Warrior, hurry over to the Giant Chessboard!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_114_talk_1
text: Why am I always in charge of stuff like this?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_114_talk_2
text: What are you waiting for? Go to the Giant Chessboard.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_114_talk_4
text: This is a trick, isn't it? Isn't it?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_115_normal_3
text: Must be alive... Yeah, I'm sure everything's fine.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_115_normal_5
text: The heavens must've smiled down upon us, because the three of us got out alive!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_115_normal_6
text: What matters is that I'm still alive. Haha!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_115_talk_1
text: What were those creatures, anyway? Brr... They give me the chills.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_115_talk_2
text: He's not the sort to be easily killed. I'm certain he's hiding somewhere, waiting to be rescued.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_115_talk_3
text: Oh, don't worry. The ruins scare me so much that I'll never go near them again.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_116_normal_1
text: There were so many bugs... It was horrifying!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_116_normal_2
text: My mom told me to thank someone properly when I'm grateful for something.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_116_normal_3
text: I wonder if I should give her a gift...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_116_normal_4
text: She's quite big, but I think she's beautiful.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_116_talk_1
text: The insects are all gone, right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_116_talk_2
text: It won't be easy to make friends with that Giant sis over there, will it?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_117_normal_2
text: What miraculous power brought me back to life?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_117_normal_3
text: It's such a relief that Sennett is safe.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_117_normal_4
text: From now on, I will never forsake a doctor's responsibilities.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_117_talk_1
text: I will honor this second chance I've gotten at life.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_117_talk_2
text: We will help you resist the oppression of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_118_talk_1
text: Is it here? Or over there? Ugh, I'm so confused!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_119_talk_1
text: If I hadn't met you, this wouldn't have...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_120_normal_2
text: Follow me, the captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_122_normal_1
text: I wonder if I can skip the formalities and just call her Elizabeth.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_122_normal_2
text: I'll protect the captain no matter what.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_122_normal_3
text: The Capital of the Dead? Did King die?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_122_talk_1
text: Captain, are you really all right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_123_talk_1
text: What you did to Dr. Dana was horrible...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_124_normal_1
text: *sniff sniff* I smell danger in the air...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_124_talk_1
text: What's with that guy? I can't track him because of this metallic smell.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_124_talk_2
text: Get him, Meliodas! Show him he's messed with the wrong guy!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_130_normal_1
text: The village is a mess thanks to those darn Holy Knights.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_130_normal_2
text: They're why I have zero customers.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_130_normal_3
text: Let's take a look at my inventory...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_130_talk_1
text: Looks like I'll be in the red again this month. Tch.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_139_normal_1
text: Let me tell you about my last adventure...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_139_normal_2
text: Adventure and romance go hand in hand!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_139_talk_1
text: Are you an adventurer as well?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_140_normal_1
text: Is there anything in particular you want to eat?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_140_normal_2
text: The best food in Dalmally can be found right here!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_140_talk_1
text: Have you heard? They say a tavern by the name of Boar Hat is very popular these days.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_141_normal_1
text: Ah, I want to eat something tasty!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_141_normal_2
text: The world is full of so many scrumptious dishes!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_141_talk_1
text: Johnny's cooking is pretty good... but I wonder if there's something better out there.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_142_normal_1
text: I heard of a Holy Knight around here who can control insects...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_142_normal_2
text: I wonder if they communicate with the bugs somehow.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_142_talk_1
text: If the rumors are true, then this is a subject worthy of research!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_143_normal_1
text: I wish I had a colleague to help me...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_143_talk_1
text: If those Weird Fangs, Weird Bangs, or whatever come back here, I'll teach them a hard lesson.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_144_normal_1
text: The most exciting expeditions are also the most dangerous.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_144_normal_2
text: Where should I explore this time?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_144_talk_1
text: I hear there are lots of delightful places to explore around here...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_150_normal_2
text: Please don't worry. Dr. Dana will give him the best care possible.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_150_talk_1
text: Why did a Giant come to our village?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_150_talk_2
text: I've realized that not everyone can be a doctor.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_151_talk_1
text: This is the first time I've actually seen a Giant. I didn't know they were that big...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_152_normal_1
text: I can't believe a Giant has appeared...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_152_talk_1
text: The... you-know-whats were scary enough, but now a Giant? Is the world about to end?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_153_talk_1
text: Hey, are you friends with the Giant lady? Ooh, I'm so jealous!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_154_talk_1
text: You should run away too, young lady! Giants are known to be violent!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_169_normal_1
text: Ehehehe! You can't run any more!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_169_talk_1
text: Your past notoriety is just a delusion. You're no match for me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_normal_1
text: How far is Baste Prison from here?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_normal_2
text: Follow me, the captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_normal_4
text: I hope Elizabeth gets better soon...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_normal_5
text: That blasted Holy Knight! Wait till I get my hooves on him!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_normal_6
text: It's nice not seeing any bugs around!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_talk_1
text: You've been resting for so long. It's about time you got up.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_talk_2
text: How dare you upset me... Hmph...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_176_talk_3
text: I, the captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal, will deal with any problems that arise!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_177_normal_1
text: It's a miracle that Dr. Dana managed to survive.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_177_normal_2
text: I have to get better soon, so I'm not a burden to anyone...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_177_normal_3
text: We found three of them already... I want to hurry up and head to our next destination...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_177_talk_1
text: I'm fine, really. I'm sorry I made you worry...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_177_talk_2
text: Are you really okay, Sir Meliodas?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_177_talk_3
text: I think Dalmally is a very nice place.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_normal_1
text: This... doesn't look like a place where you'd get much business.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_normal_2
text: Do you think you'll find any info in a deserted village like this?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_normal_3
text: How do you get to the Capital of the Dead?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_normal_4
text: Maybe my obsession with all the food scraps I never got to eat will get us inside.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_normal_5
text: Are we really going to the Capital of the Dead?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_normal_6
text: Don't you die if you go to the Capital of the Dead?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_talk_1
text: There's no way we'd get any customers in a run-down village like this.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_talk_2
text: Even if the City of the Dead really exists, we can't go there if it exists in the afterlife.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_201_talk_3
text: I can't die yet, there are so many kinds of scraps I haven't tried yet...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_normal_1
text: I wonder what we have to do to get into the Capital of the Dead...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_normal_2
text: The Capital of the Dead... It scares me, but I'm also curious about it.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_normal_3
text: Sharing cherished memories the dead will lead us to the capital... I wonder what qualifies...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_normal_4
text: The gate into the Capital of the Dead has opened!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_normal_5
text: I wonder whose memory opened the way into the Capital of the Dead.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_talk_1
text: I'm all better now. Thanks for your concern!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_talk_2
text: I want to see my mother. She passed away when I was so little that I don't remember.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_202_talk_3
text: I've never been to the Capital of the Dead before... I'm a little nervous!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_204_normal_1
text: I- I'm going to protect my little sister!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_204_talk_1
text: I'm not scared, I'm not scared, I'm... scared!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_205_normal_1
text: Growing children need to eat well!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_205_normal_2
text: Now what would be a good dish for them?â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_205_normal_4
text: Memories shared with the deceased, huh...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_205_talk_1
text: You need quality ingredients for a quality meal.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_205_talk_2
text: I wonder if you can really meet dead people here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_206_normal_2
text: I will never forgive you, Ban.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_206_normal_3
text: I have a reason to go to the Capital of the Dead too.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_206_talk_1
text: I'm happy to see you again.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_206_talk_3
text: You agree with me, right, Captain?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_normal_1
text: This potion is all I need...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_normal_2
text: It looks like getting into the Capital of the Dead is a walk in the park!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_normal_5
text: I want to go back to my hometown now...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_normal_6
text: *sigh* I don't know if I can go back home in this condition...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_normal_7
text: They say only trouble awaits you once you leave home...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_talk_1
text: So I'll definitely get into the Capital of the Dead if I drink this potion, right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_talk_2
text: I was a fool. I was completely conned by the Medicine Merchant...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_207_talk_3
text: I miss my family more than usual today...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_normal_1
text: Take a gander, my friend! My wonderful apothecary has practically everything!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_normal_2
text: Back pain? Try this ointment. Arm aches? Apply this patch to the sore spot. Upset stomach? Take this...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_normal_3
text: I've got huge discounts, but only for today! Once the day's over, my wares will be gone!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_normal_4
text: Well, I didn't mean to swindle anyone...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_normal_5
text: I only had the purest of intentions. I just wanted to help people...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_normal_6
text: From now on, I'd like you to consider me an inventor of new medicines!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_normal_7
text: I'm no longer the cheating Medicine Merchant I once was!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_talk_1
text: I can show you every secret you wanted to know about health and longevity!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_talk_2
text: To get into the Capital of the Dead, take a bunch of this sleep medication...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_208_talk_3
text: I hope you're looking forward to seeing how much I've changed!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_209_normal_1
text: King and Ban seem to make a good team.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_209_normal_3
text: I hope King isn't trying to steal my food scraps.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_209_talk_1
text: Hmm, I wonder if I should make him a member of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_210_normal_1
text: I'm sure everyone has someone dear to their heart that they'd love to see.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_210_normal_2
text: I'm so lucky to have already met four of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_210_normal_3
text: I wonder where we're going next.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_210_talk_1
text: I never knew there was a place like this in the kingdom.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_211_normal_2
text: This is the first time I've seen a moving tavern...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_211_talk_1
text: Are you really going to give me something good to eat?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_212_normal_2
text: It's amazing. The tavern doesn't get damaged even when it's moving...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_213_normal_1
text: Will I... finally get to see her?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_213_normal_2
text: The gate into the Capital of the Dead has opened.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_213_normal_3
text: One day, I'll take what's mine. I promise.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_213_normal_5
text: I'm the one and only chef of the Boar Hat!â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_213_normal_6
text: Where did their parents go? Why are they just letting their kids starve?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_213_talk_2
text: Don't make me your cook if you're gonna call me names like Chef Jailbreak!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_213_talk_3
text: Little kids need to eat up to grow big and strong!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_214_normal_2
text: Ooh, it was so hard to hold back everything I wanted to say.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_214_normal_3
text: Everyone, you can do it, hehe!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_214_talk_1
text: My name is Ellen, not Elaine.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_215_normal_2
text: I wanted to protect Ellen, but I couldn't.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_215_normal_3
text: That lady with the long hair was so scary...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_215_talk_1
text: The Capital of the Dead isn't the kind of place you just waltz into.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_216_normal_3
text: So everyone's Sacred Treasures were lost, sold, or stolen? Oh, boy...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_216_normal_4
text: Diane... Sh- she's as cute as always.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_216_normal_5
text: You guys, what happened to your Sacred Treasures?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_216_talk_1
text: I still haven't forgiven Ban. But Elaine asked me to, so I'm trying...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_216_talk_2
text: The Holy Knights are different from before.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_221_normal_1
text: Do you want to... buy some equipment?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_221_talk_1
text: Sorry, it's just that I'm very awkward with strangers...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_227_normal_1
text: I wonder if the tall guy is okay...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_227_normal_2
text: My brother Luigi is such an idiot.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_227_talk_1
text: Please tell the tall guy I said I'm sorry...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_231_normal_1
text: I think Ellen's a bit shocked...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_231_normal_2
text: I wonder why that kid attacked the tall guy.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_231_talk_1
text: That kid attacked the tall guy. There was so much blood...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_232_normal_1
text: This is the best shop in Post Town Tala! Come on in!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_232_normal_2
text: I have stuff even the dead are dying to get their hands on! Take a look!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_232_normal_3
text: Just let me know if you need anything!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_232_talk_1
text: Is there something you're looking for? I'll get it, even if it means scouring the world.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_233_normal_1
text: Why's it so empty here? Where is everyone?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_233_normal_3
text: What in the world happened here?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_233_talk_1
text: I wonder if this is the rumored access point to the Capital of the Dead.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_234_normal_1
text: Oof, my legs hurt from all the walking I did.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_234_normal_2
text: I better rest up in this village before heading any further.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_234_normal_3
text: I'll start getting ready to leave now...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_234_talk_1
text: I'm heading for Dalmally next. Is something going on in Dalmally, by any chance?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_301_normal_1
text: This town looks like it'd be good for business!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_301_talk_1
text: This is a great opportunity for us to make some money!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_302_normal_1
text: Here it is, friends! The ale you've all been waiting for!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_302_normal_2
text: You can't have a festival without ale.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_302_normal_3
text: I'm gonna go and bring in some money!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_302_normal_4
text: The prize money will be ours!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_302_normal_5
text: We're going straight to the top!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_302_talk_1
text: A Fight Festival? I bet they give out a lot of prize money.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_302_talk_2
text: You guys aren't here to play. Don't forget that.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_303_normal_1
text: Now that I've done a bunch of work, I'm hungry.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_303_normal_3
text: My coin pouch is gone... And so is my money...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_303_normal_4
text: What about the prize money? Is it all gone?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_303_talk_1
text: The village is in ruins thanks to the Holy Knights.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_304_normal_1
text: A Fight Festival, huh? Sounds like a great time.â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_305_normal_2
text: It ain't a festival without some booze. *hic*

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_305_talk_1
text: Are you guys here to participate in the festival too? *hic*

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_306_normal_2
text: An old man like me has lots of memories.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_306_normal_3
text: An old man like me has lots of memories.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_306_normal_4
text: How can they look so alike...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_306_talk_1
text: I miss more people the older I get.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_306_talk_2
text: There's no way around it. The resemblance is striking...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_307_talk_1
text: You don't have to go easy on me because I'm an old man. *hic*

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_308_normal_1
text: This is the Vaizel Fight Festival, the pride of Vaizel!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_308_normal_2
text: Anyone can participate if they wish!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_308_normal_3
text: The tryout signups will end soon, so be quick!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_308_normal_4
text: Who will defeat Taizoo, last year's champion?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_308_normal_6
text: You lose if you get knocked out of bounds!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_308_normal_7
text: You win if your opponent surrenders or gets knocked out!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_308_talk_1
text: So begins the Fight Festival, open to villagers and travelers alike!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_309_normal_1
text: A Fight Festival? How exciting is that?â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_309_talk_1
text: This is a great festival. Why only hold it once a year?â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_310_normal_1
text: I wonder when my turn's gonna come around.â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_310_normal_2
text: These other fights are so lame.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_310_normal_3
text: I'll beat you for sure this time, Captain.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_310_talk_1
text: You weaklings should withdraw from the fight while you still can.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_310_talk_2
text: I won't hold back this time, Captain, so get ready.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_311_normal_1
text: I want to fight in this festival next year too!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_311_normal_2
text: Ah, fighting is always so much fun!â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_311_talk_1
text: That girl in the dark clothes seems really skilled.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_312_talk_1
text: I don't want to participate in something so uncivilized.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_313_normal_1
text: I don't want to be a part of this!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_313_normal_2
text: Diane would be happy to get Gideon back, right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_313_normal_3
text: Maybe I can win and give Gideon to Diane as a gift...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_313_normal_4
text: I got to see a tiny Diane, my life is now complete...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_313_talk_1
text: Why did you sign me up for the Fight Festival?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_313_talk_2
text: If I say I'm gonna do something, I'll do it!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_315_talk_1
text: You toyed with my heart... I'll never forgive you!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_316_normal_1
text: This is the day I've been waiting for.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_316_normal_2
text: I can have all the fun I want today. Woo-hoo!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_316_normal_3
text: Man, there's nothing like the Vaizel Fight Festival!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_316_talk_1
text: I was always too busy with work to participate... but now I finally can!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_317_normal_2
text: That's odd. Why does it feel like I'm doing all of the work?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_317_normal_4
text: I feel like the festival will be disastrous this year... No. It's gonna be fine!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_317_normal_5
text: This event demands something special. Hmm. What can I do?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_317_talk_1
text: Gah, I'm so busy that I'd even take help from an oaf.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_317_talk_2
text: I'm going to make the Vaizel Fight Festival the best festival in Liones.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_318_normal_3
text: I'll definitely win next year! Well... maybe not.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_318_normal_4
text: Maybe I just wasn't skilled enough...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_318_talk_1
text: I trained my butt off every day to prepare!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_318_talk_2
text: Why are there so many strong fighters this year?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_319_normal_1
text: For the glory of the Gorra!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_319_normal_2
text: We will achieve our freedom one day.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_319_normal_3
text: I'd rather die than become a slave.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_319_normal_4
text: If I'm caught by a Walker, I'll be killed.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_319_talk_1
text: The Gorra warriors will fight to the death for their honor.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_320_normal_1
text: I'm looking for a short-term employee for the Fight Festival!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_320_normal_2
text: My wares are cheaper than anyone else's!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_320_normal_4
text: Now where did I put your order...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_320_talk_1
text: I'm gonna need way more hands to deal with everything on my plate.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_321_normal_1
text: Maybe I should open a bookstore...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_321_normal_2
text: I wonder which book would be good...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_321_talk_1
text: I don't see any books by my favorite author.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_322_normal_2
text: Some memories don't fade away, even with the passage of time.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_322_talk_1
text: I want to uncover the truth of the past so I can feel more at ease in the present.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_323_normal_2
text: Don't hold back, just knock 'em out right away!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_323_normal_3
text: We're the only ones left, Captain!â™¡

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_323_talk_1
text: Captain, meet me in the final round, okay?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_323_talk_2
text: You've already KO'd my heart, Captain.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_324_normal_1
text: Please, let me know if there's anything you need.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_324_normal_2
text: I have lots of good stuff here, so come take a look!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_325_normal_1
text: I need to get my clothes back...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_325_normal_2
text: I don't have anything to wear for my date...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_325_normal_3
text: But that guy is so scary...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_325_talk_1
text: That tall guy stole my clothes!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_326_normal_2
text: I have lots of new books, so why do you keep looking for old ones?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_326_normal_3
text: I have lots of good books in stock.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_326_talk_1
text: Tearjerkers, creepy horror, gut-busting comedies, I've got them all!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_329_talk_1
text: Enjoy a Friendly Match with a friend.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_334_normal_1
text: I have everything you need! Just take a look!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_334_normal_2
text: Discounts are available, but first you gotta convince me to give you one!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_334_talk_1
text: I have so many customers that I'm running out of things to sell.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_339_normal_1
text: The Holy Knights followed us all the way here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_339_talk_1
text: Is there some other reason the Holy Knights are chasing us?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_340_normal_1
text: It looks like you still don't know, Master.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_340_normal_2
text: Everyone's alive, so things aren't that bad, right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_340_normal_3
text: The Fight Festival ended on such a lame note!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_340_talk_1
text: Let's come back for next year's Fight Festival, Captain.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_341_normal_1
text: Helbram's alive. How is that possible?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_341_normal_2
text: The New Generation Knights are way stronger.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_341_talk_1
text: Why does the Captain look like that? I'm so confused...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_342_talk_1
text: Captain, you sensed it too, right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_343_normal_3
text: I can't just give up like this.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_343_talk_1
text: I'll gather [The Seven Deadly Sins] no matter what, and stop the Holy Knights.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_345_normal_2
text: Now that we're the same size, let's go on a date!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_345_normal_3
text: I got small! This is a dream come true!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_345_normal_4
text: I borrowed Elizabeth's clothes. What do you think?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_345_talk_2
text: Now that I'm small, I can do anything!â™¡

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_346_normal_1
text: A Fight Festival, huh? Wish I could participate.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_346_normal_2
text: The calluses on my hands are all gone now.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_346_normal_3
text: All my accomplishments are from my long-gone glory days...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_346_talk_1
text: Seeing this Fight Festival makes the Knight in me excited.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_347_normal_2
text: I can eat five meals a day!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_347_normal_3
text: A festival may be fun, but it doesn't matter if you're hungry!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_347_talk_1
text: If you know any good places to eat, please let me know!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_353_normal_1
text: Anyone can participate in the Vaizel Fight Festival!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_353_normal_2
text: People who want to prove their strength should come this way!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_353_talk_1
text: My competition is being held separately from the main event!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_357_normal_2
text: I wanted to see her happy...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_357_talk_1
text: It was the perfect opportunity to win her affection...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_358_normal_1
text: I don't particularly like fighting women.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_358_talk_1
text: I don't want to hurt women, no matter how strong they are.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_372_talk_1
text: It was an honor to fight you!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_377_normal_1
text: Come, I have everything you could ever want!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_377_talk_1
text: Come on over and take a look!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_378_normal_1
text: I have equipment you can't find anywhere else!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_378_normal_2
text: I've got lots of great equipment!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_378_talk_1
text: Welcome. If you know how to haggle, you might get something almost for free!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_379_normal_1
text: I wonder who'll win this upcoming Fight Festival.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_379_normal_2
text: The world is vast and there are a lot of skilled contenders!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_379_normal_pvp_1
text: Ehe, should I make some commemorative {0} victory coins and sell them?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_379_talk_1
text: Sales double during the Fight Festival, hehehe!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_379_talk_2
text: What could possibly make money during the Fight Festival?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_381_normal_1
text: Ahem, I would've won right away if I had participated!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_381_normal_2
text: Heh, is that all they're capable of?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_381_normal_pvp_1
text: A dummy like {0} was the victor? They don't even look like they can handle a punch!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_381_normal_pvp_2
text: To be honest, {0}'s last match was worth a watch...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_381_talk_1
text: You look like you'd put up a good fight! Why don't you try participating in the Fight Festival?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_381_talk_2
text: Hah, I'd probably be a favorite to win if I went out there... Don't you think so?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_384_normal_1
text: My goodness, look at all that brawling. Doesn't it hurt?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_384_normal_2
text: What's so fun about the Fight Festival...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_384_normal_pvp_1
text: Honestly, it was a bit of a thrill when {0} won.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_384_normal_pvp_2
text: I think the Fight Festival is starting to get enjoyable now that I've seen {0}'s victory.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_384_talk_1
text: Meaningless fights seem barbaric but the Fight Festival's pretty enjoyable, haha!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_384_talk_2
text: I'll cheer you on if you happen to participate in the festival!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_389_normal_1
text: Who knew watching other people fight would be this fun?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_389_normal_2
text: There seem to be a lot of skilled contenders. I wonder who's going to win?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_389_normal_pvp_2
text: Of course! You gotta be on {0}'s level to call yourself a Fight Festival champion!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_389_talk_1
text: The Vaizel Fighting Festival is our village's pride.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_389_talk_2
text: Isn't this Fight Festival really fun?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_396_normal_1
text: The current Fight Festival is so interesting.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_396_normal_2
text: I want to watch with a mug of delicious ale!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_396_normal_pvp_1
text: I knew it! I knew {0} would be the champion!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_396_talk_1
text: Isn't this current Fight Festival so entertaining?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_396_talk_2
text: There's nothing better to relieve stress than watching the Fight Festival! Hahaha!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_399_normal_1
text: There are a lot of pickpockets during the festival, so I better be watching like a hawk.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_399_normal_2
text: I would have participated if I weren't a knight... Ha...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_399_normal_pvp_1
text: {0}'s victory! I won the bet again, hehehe!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_399_normal_pvp_2
text: Just as I thought! I had a feeling {0} would win!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_399_talk_1
text: To be honest, I requested to be sent here just so I could watch the Fight Festival. Hehe.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_399_talk_2
text: My blood runs hot just by watching the festival! Don't you think so?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_401_normal_1
text: Leave the tavern promotion to me!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_401_normal_2
text: I know I can do a good job!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_401_talk_1
text: I've learned and grown a lot in this business! ...I think.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_402_normal_2
text: Do you think it'll be okay, Elizabeth?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_402_talk_1
text: Don't worry. I'll keep Elizabeth safe!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_403_normal_2
text: It'd be great I could take a leisurely nap.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_403_normal_3
text: I'll catch everything in the forest, animal or otherwise.â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_403_normal_4
text: I hope there are bears in this forest!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_403_talk_1
text: Captain, don't make me cause trouble.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_403_talk_2
text: I won't lose this time, Captain.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_404_normal_1
text: I want to wake up next to Diane...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_404_normal_2
text: Diane is cute even when she's asleep!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_404_normal_3
text: A competition? You and Ban can fight all you want, Captain.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_404_normal_4
text: You don't need me to be part of that.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_404_talk_1
text: A- are you saying I was peeping on Diane? N- no! It's a misunderstanding!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_404_talk_2
text: I loathe the whole fighting matches as a contest thing.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_405_normal_2
text: I'd believe it if someone told me that was Liz.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_405_talk_1
text: This goes beyond mere resemblance. She looks exactly like Liz!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_406_normal_1
text: Boar Hat? What a strange name.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_406_normal_2
text: A talking pig? Is it the captain's pet?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_406_talk_1
text: You haven't changed at all, Captain.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_407_normal_1
text: A Holy Knight became a Demon?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_407_normal_2
text: Huh? When did you get here, Gowther?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_407_normal_4
text: I'll throw you all the way to the capital!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_407_normal_5
text: Sorry if I'm a bit off!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_407_normal_6
text: Oof... I'm gonna take a little break...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_407_talk_1
text: What in the world happened while I was asleep?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_407_talk_3
text: Captain, you better rescue Elizabeth, you got that?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_408_normal_1
text: I already found five of [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_408_normal_2
text: Father, please wait for me a little bit longer.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_408_talk_1
text: You won't have to wait long!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_409_normal_1
text: That guy is [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b]?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_409_normal_2
text: Well, he doesn't look like a big eater, at least.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_409_talk_1
text: I better not be getting fewer food scraps...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_410_normal_2
text: I hope there are bears in this forest!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_410_talk_1
text: I won't lose this time, Captain.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_411_normal_1
text: The forest is trembling... in fear.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_411_normal_2
text: That's definitely not an animal's roar.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_411_talk_1
text: I should be careful so Diane doesn't wake up.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_412_normal_1
text: Boar Hat? What a strange name.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_412_normal_2
text: A talking pig? Is it the captain's pet?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_412_talk_1
text: There are no two people of the same race here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_413_normal_1
text: I already found five of [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_413_normal_2
text: Father, please wait for me a little bit longer.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_413_talk_1
text: You won't have to wait long!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_414_normal_1
text: That guy is [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b]?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_414_normal_2
text: Well, he doesn't look like a big eater, at least.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_414_talk_1
text: I better not be getting fewer food scraps...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_415_normal_1
text: I didn't expect that from you, princess.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_415_talk_1
text: I admit you have good taste in women, Captain. Not as good as mine, though.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_416_talk_1
text: I don't understand what you're saying at all!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_417_normal_1
text: The princess's heart rate has risen.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_417_normal_2
text: The princess's face is so red that she looks like she could explode.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_417_normal_3
text: That mage is capable of high-level transportation magic.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_417_normal_4
text: Do you plan on rescuing the princess, Captain?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_417_normal_5
text: Are you heading to the capital, Captain?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_417_talk_2
text: She appeared in the perfect spot, then disappeared.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_417_talk_3
text: I'll go with you and Ban to the capital, Captain.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_418_normal_1
text: We have a new member of the family, so maybe I should show off my cooking skills.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_418_normal_2
text: Let's take it easy for a day!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_418_talk_1
text: Captain, don't even think about coming into the kitchen.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_419_normal_1
text: Gowther, learn to read the room.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_419_normal_2
text: Don't look through someone else's memories without a reason.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_419_talk_1
text: Gowther still isn't perceptive at all.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_420_normal_2
text: That sounds tiring. I'm gonna pass.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_420_normal_3
text: I don't know who that was, but they must be fearless stealing the Captain's girl like that.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_420_normal_5
text: I take back what I said about not going to the capital.â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_420_talk_1
text: I'm sick of hearing about Demons.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_420_talk_2
text: Ooh, maybe I'll get to see the captain get angry again.â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_420_talk_3
text: I have a reason to go to the capital myself.â™¬

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_421_normal_1
text: It's your fault you lost the Dragon Handle, Captain.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_421_normal_2
text: You should take responsibility for it.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_421_normal_3
text: Everything happened so suddenly, and I'm confused...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_421_normal_4
text: Fly to the capital? Is that even possible?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_421_talk_1
text: I'll go if Diane is going...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_421_talk_2
text: They took the princess and disappeared.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_421_talk_3
text: How will we get to the capital?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_422_normal_1
text: My stomach's been hurting for a while...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_422_normal_2
text: Nngh, did I eat too much...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_422_talk_1
text: N- no! I can still eat more!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_423_normal_1
text: Today's the day my parents died...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_423_talk_1
text: I actually think about them a few times a day.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_424_normal_1
text: I'm just a sick old man.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_424_talk_1
text: I've lived for too long. It's time for me to go.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_425_normal_2
text: *sniff sniff* I smell something tasty around here...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_425_talk_1
text: I always worry about where I'll be sleeping and if I'll get anything to eat...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_426_normal_1
text: Do you want to hear something interesting?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_426_talk_1
text: If you want to keep something a secret, you better not tell me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_427_normal_1
text: There are things the eye can't perceive.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_427_normal_2
text: There seems to be a lot of new visitors in the village.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_427_talk_1
text: I know I'm a blind old man, but don't you make fun of me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_428_normal_2
text: I hope nothing's happened to my husband...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_428_talk_1
text: My husband's hard to contact, so I'm always worried when he goes to the capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_429_normal_1
text: Trustworthiness is of the utmost importance to merchants.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_429_normal_2
text: I vouch for all the items I sell.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_429_talk_1
text: Anyone who doesn't vouch for their wares is a con artist, not a merchant.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_430_normal_1
text: Women who are about to get married can be a little touchy.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_430_normal_2
text: I'm going to be the happiest bride in the world.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_430_talk_1
text: I'll have as many kids as I possibly can. It's my dream to have a big family!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_431_normal_1
text: I see it. I see your dark future...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_431_normal_2
text: Hey there, youngster. Aren't you curious about your future?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_431_talk_1
text: You can try all you want, but certain futures can't be changed.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_432_normal_1
text: Having a hard time eliminating monsters? That's because you don't have good equipment.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_432_normal_2
text: Keep losing fights? That's because you don't have good equipment.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_432_talk_1
text: Your equipment does most of the job! You need good equipment to secure victory!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_443_normal_1
text: Even just thinking about adventures makes my heart beat faster!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_443_normal_2
text: You only need one thing on an adventure: courage!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_443_talk_1
text: If you want comfort, go on a trip. It's not an adventure if you don't experience hardship!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_444_normal_2
text: My goal is to eat tasty dishes from all over the world!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_444_talk_1
text: Not all adventures need to have grandiose goals!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_451_normal_2
text: D- did Sir Gowther say anything...?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_454_talk_1
text: Looking for anything specific? I've got pretty much everything, so take your time.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_475_normal_1
text: I can't leave Leah. We love each other.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_475_talk_1
text: How do I get his approval? I can't imagine living without Leah.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_475_talk_2
text: Thank you for all the help you've given me. We'll do our best to live a happy life.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_476_normal_1
text: I have everything you could want. Don't hesitate to let me know if you need anything.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_476_talk_1
text: It may not seem it, but my stock is the best in the village. Let me know if you need anything.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_501_talk_1
text: I hope His Majesty is safe.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_501_talk_2
text: We need to get rid of the traitors, but we need to rescue the king and Elizabeth first.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_501_talk_4
text: I've been working with him all this time but never had a clue...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_502_normal_1
text: Long time no see, captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_502_talk_1
text: You're a wanted criminal and yet you've come to the castle. What nerve.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_503_normal_2
text: Don't think that I'm not playing fair.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_503_talk_1
text: Now isn't the time for you to be so careless.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_503_talk_2
text: You're a fool for coming alone without any allies.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_503_talk_3
text: I'll dispose of you before you do anything foolish.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_503_talk_4
text: Have you been deceiving me this whole time?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_504_talk_2
text: I am now more powerful than any of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_506_normal_2
text: I'd been hoping to meet you one day!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_506_talk_1
text: You're Meliodas, captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins], right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_506_talk_2
text: It's an honor to meet you!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_506_talk_4
text: I'm sorry I couldn't be of much help to you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_506_talk_5
text: I'll keep her safe, so please don't worry!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_508_normal_1
text: Is this all [The Seven Deadly Sins] are capable of?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_508_talk_1
text: I can take care of this myself.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_509_talk_2
text: It feels like I'm in a dream.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_510_talk_1
text: Who in the world would do something like this?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_511_talk_2
text: I'll just watch from the sidelines.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_512_talk_1
text: I'm so glad I was able to protect Margaret.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_514_normal_1
text: It's my duty to protect His Majesty, the king, and I'll let nothing get in my way.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_514_normal_2
text: I'm so relieved. If the king had been harmed, I would've...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_514_talk_1
text: Why didn't I realize what was truly going on when my king was so obviously suffering?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_514_talk_2
text: That lady broke a powerful spell like it was nothing. She's unbelievable...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_515_normal_1
text: You can't win this fight. Why not just surrender?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_515_talk_1
text: You've always been so carefree. Let's see how long that lasts!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_516_normal_1
text: Merlin is the best mage in the world!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_516_normal_3
text: I'll get out of your hair now.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_516_talk_1
text: I got all the way to Liones, thanks to Merlin's guidance.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_516_talk_3
text: Call me up anytime you need my help!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_517_talk_1
text: I've advised you time and time again to not lose composure when you get angry...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_517_talk_2
text: Hmm, I don't think I'll be able to teleport into the room right now.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_518_normal_2
text: Someone must be here to assist the king.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_518_talk_1
text: I'll join you when you need my help.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_519_normal_1
text: We must rescue the king from confinement!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_519_normal_2
text: I'm worried about the West District.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_519_normal_3
text: Diane is in danger. Sir Helbram attacked her...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_519_talk_1
text: Vivian is the one who imprisoned His Majesty!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_520_normal_2
text: I'm so relieved my father is safe.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_520_talk_1
text: He'd been imprisoned so long that I don't know if he's physically well...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_520_talk_2
text: It's all thanks to you that everything turned out alright.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_521_normal_2
text: I've only myself to blame for everything that's happened.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_521_normal_3
text: I'm fine, so please don't worry about me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_521_normal_5
text: You're the true heroes of this kingdom.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_521_talk_1
text: I can't believe ten years have gone by so quick...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_521_talk_3
text: Go forth and save the kingdom. No, save the world.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_521_talk_4
text: Work hard to restore the capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_521_talk_5
text: The royal family will spare no expense to restore the capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_522_normal_1
text: Hendrickson is dead... Is this true?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_522_talk_1
text: It's all my fault. I was blinded by envy.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_523_normal_1
text: I missed you so, so much!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_523_normal_3
text: Lady Diane... Sir Gowther... Sir Ban...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_523_talk_1
text: We haven't even been apart for one whole day... I'm a bit ashamed...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_523_talk_2
text: I have a bad feeling for some reason...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_523_talk_3
text: I hope everyone is all right...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_524_normal_2
text: Get rid of [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_524_talk_2
text: Help! I don't want to die like this!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_532_normal_3
text: Ah, Gowther decided to show up.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_532_talk_1
text: A Giant, destroying the streets as she walks through them. What a wonderful spectacle!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_532_talk_2
text: Things are unfolding in the most exciting way.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_532_talk_3
text: It seems things have gone slightly wrong.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_533_talk_2
text: I'm so glad Zeal is safe...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_533_talk_3
text: If it weren't for Diane, Zeal would've...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_534_talk_1
text: I'll become a high-ranking Knight if I get rid of Diane!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_534_talk_2
text: Our enemy is [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_535_normal_1
text: Diane, [b]The Serpent Sin of Envy[/b]. How foolish...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_535_normal_2
text: You're holding on quite well, Diane, [b]The Serpent Sin of Envy[/b].

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_535_talk_1
text: You're a fool to have come here of your own volition.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_535_talk_3
text: [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b], what have you done?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_537_normal_1
text: This is the end for you, Diane.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_537_talk_1
text: I'll be sending the rest of [The Seven Deadly Sins] to their deaths as well.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_538_normal_1
text: So you've decided to side with the traitors? What a fool you are.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_538_talk_1
text: You will pay for your foolishness with your life.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_539_talk_2
text: You look nothing like the image on the wanted poster!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_539_talk_3
text: Hurry up and go protect Diane!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_541_talk_1
text: Take care of Guila and Howzer...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_542_normal_2
text: Are you really Gowther, [b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b]?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_542_normal_6
text: What in the world is happening right now?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_542_normal_7
text: I can't believe I'm so weak...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_542_talk_2
text: Ah... Thank you for your help.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_542_talk_4
text: Sir Helbram was actually a Fairy?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_543_talk_1
text: Aren't you ashamed of your Holy Knight title?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_543_talk_2
text: Are you here to rescue your friend?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_544_talk_1
text: Stop it! No, this isn't what I wanted!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_549_talk_1
text: Do you really want to protect the Giant that much?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_550_normal_1
text: You better fight with everything you've got.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_550_talk_1
text: If you don't, you'll lose your precious Giantess.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_552_talk_1
text: The pain from my injuries is going away...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_553_talk_2
text: As Merlin said, [The Seven Deadly Sins] truly are amazing.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_554_normal_1
text: Is this it? And you call yourself the Fairy King?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_555_normal_1
text: You used all your magic to protect that Giant?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_555_talk_1
text: Is the Giant that important to you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_556_normal_1
text: You're going to keep that 700-year-old promise...?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_556_normal_2
text: Why do you keep taking the Humans' side?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_556_talk_1
text: Do you even remember what happened?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_556_talk_2
text: Humans killed all of our kind! So why are you doing this?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_557_normal_2
text: Something strange is going on with Guila and Jericho!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_557_normal_4
text: I'll deal with the Berserk Holy Knights!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_557_normal_5
text: I'm big, so I can handle them!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_557_talk_2
text: What's happening to them? They're in so much pain!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_557_talk_3
text: People will get hurt if the Holy Knights go on a rampage! We have to stop them!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_558_talk_1
text: It feels like my entire body is on fire!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_559_normal_1
text: What the heck is going on?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_559_normal_2
text: Damn, I can't believe there's nothing I can do to help at a time like this...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_559_normal_3
text: Elizabeth's been kidnapped? Who did such a thing?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_559_talk_2
text: Who knew Helbram was actually a Fairy...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_559_talk_3
text: What in the world is going on? Dammit!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_561_talk_2
text: Ah, the start of something new.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_562_normal_2
text: Hendrickson has fully become a monster.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_562_talk_2
text: He drank the Demon blood himself...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_563_normal_1
text: So this is how it turned out.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_563_normal_2
text: Grandmaster Hendrickson, what in the world happened to you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_563_talk_1
text: We must get rid of them before any more harm comes to the villagers.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_564_talk_1
text: Where did all these monsters come from?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_565_normal_1
text: I'm sorry I didn't come sooner, Diane...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_565_talk_2
text: What happened to Guila and Jericho?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_568_normal_1
text: I finally have Elizabeth in my grasp.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_568_talk_1
text: All I have left to do now is to make the offering.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_569_talk_1
text: There was a time when I admired you. No longer.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_570_normal_1
text: All my research and experiments have paid off.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_572_talk_1
text: I don't want you to go through any unnecessary pain.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_573_normal_1
text: I thought you were going to die without resisting!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_573_talk_1
text: You said I could kill you! What are you doing?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_574_talk_1
text: Ban, come with me to rescue Elizabeth!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_574_talk_2
text: This is all because of that stupid horn!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_575_normal_1
text: I can't believe the castle collapsed...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_576_normal_1
text: I'm so glad everyone is safe...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_576_normal_2
text: It's a miracle that Hawk is alive!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_576_normal_3
text: Do I really have some kind of power?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_576_talk_1
text: I want to use my power to save as many people as I can.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_576_talk_2
text: You think the capital of Liones will soon regain peace?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_577_normal_1
text: It is I, a much cuter Hawk!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_577_talk_1
text: How am I alive? I don't really know.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_577_talk_2
text: I say it's all thanks to scraps!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_578_normal_1
text: The Knights of Liones will do everything they can to restore the capital!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_578_normal_2
text: We won't slack off on our training, either.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_578_normal_3
text: It's all thanks to you, Meliodas.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_578_talk_1
text: Most of all, I'm relieved Margaret is safe.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_578_talk_2
text: It's going to take a lot of time and effort to restore the capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_579_talk_2
text: I'm going to learn about love from her.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_581_normal_1
text: I feel like I forgot something important...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_581_normal_4
text: It seems things have ended well, anyway.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_581_talk_2
text: Will I remember if I hit my head again?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_581_talk_3
text: Diane likes the captain more than me, right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_582_normal_1
text: The Demon blood within me didn't go berserk.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_582_normal_2
text: I have him to thank for that.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_582_talk_1
text: I'm going on a date with him today.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_583_normal_1
text: All of my magic is gone...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_583_normal_2
text: It didn't happen to Guila, so why only me?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_583_normal_3
text: That's it for me... It's over!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_583_talk_1
text: I heard Ban saved me. Is that true?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_583_talk_2
text: Does this mean I'll never be a Holy Knight again?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_584_normal_1
text: Captain, you haven't forgotten your promise, have you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_584_normal_3
text: I have the most fun fighting against you, Captain!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_584_talk_1
text: It's been a while since we had a proper fight. I can't wait!â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_584_talk_2
text: Don't worry, I'll find a way to resurrect Elaine somehow.â™ª

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_586_normal_3
text: I'm gonna grow up fast and protect Guila!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_587_normal_3
text: Honestly, I thought I was dead myself.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_587_talk_1
text: The power within Elizabeth has finally awakened.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_587_talk_2
text: I'm alive right now because of Elizabeth's power.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_588_normal_1
text: I'm so glad everything was resolved!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_588_normal_2
text: Merlin decided to stay in Liones.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_588_normal_3
text: I'm saddened to see her go, but it's fine!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_588_talk_1
text: Merlin is the best mage in the world!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_588_talk_2
text: Merlin's been helping me out a great deal!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_589_normal_1
text: You guys were using me to play a game while I was out cold?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_589_normal_2
text: I'll be joining you for a while.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_589_normal_3
text: I'm one of [The Seven Deadly Sins], after all.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_589_talk_1
text: I'm tiny and cute, so you should treat me well!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_589_talk_2
text: We'll just have to hope that nothing worse happens.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_590_normal_1
text: I have so much stock left over this month too...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_590_normal_2
text: Have a gander at some good equipment. I only carry the sturdiest!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_590_normal_3
text: Having a hard time eliminating monsters? That's because you don't have good equipment.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_590_normal_4
text: Keep losing fights? That's because you don't have good equipment.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_590_talk_1
text: You can rest assured that I don't deal in stolen goods. Just let me know if you need anything.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_590_talk_2
text: Your equipment does most of the work! What I'm saying is you need good equipment to secure victory!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_607_normal_4
text: The royal family's actions from now on will be very important for the future.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_607_normal_5
text: Please do your best to restore the capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_607_talk_3
text: I'd like to offer you my sincerest thanks as the first princess of the Kingdom of Liones.
