name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_607_talk_4
text: The royal family of Liones is also doing their best to help restore the capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_617_normal_1
text: A Giant, destroying the streets as she walks through them. A wonderful spectacle, isn't it?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_617_talk_1
text: The Knights need villains so they appear honest and just. Villains like you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_619_normal_1
text: Is this an opportunity from the heavens?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_619_normal_2
text: If I can get recognized by eliminating her, it should be easy to become a high-ranking Knight.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_619_talk_1
text: I'll be the one to take your head.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_622_talk_2
text: I have a bad feeling about this...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_654_normal_1
text: So much of the capital has been damaged. Can it all be fixed?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_655_normal_1
text: I get exhausted just thinking about rebuilding the ruined capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_655_talk_1
text: I got to see your incredible performance from afar.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_656_normal_1
text: We Holy Knights are to blame for all that's happened. We must pay for our mistakes somehow.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_656_normal_2
text: As for my fellow Knights who changed...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_656_talk_1
text: The stories are true. I now understand why you're considered living legends.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_656_talk_2
text: Please help us restore the capital.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_657_normal_1
text: Your need a full stomach if you want to fight well in battle.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_657_talk_1
text: Is there anything you want to eat?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_658_normal_1
text: What's the best thing to can eat after sweating all day? Sweets!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_658_normal_2
text: Take home some freshly baked cookies today!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_659_normal_1
text: I'm gonna break my back trying to restore this ruined city.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_659_normal_2
text: Why the heck are those creatures still wandering around town?!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_659_normal_3
text: What if everything I fix gets broken again...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_659_talk_1
text: Gosh, it was so crazy. I know they've been talking about the Holy War for a while. I thought I was a goner.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_659_talk_2
text: The Holy Knights were so eager to start the Holy War, but couldn't even deal with any monsters!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_659_talk_3
text: If it does break, I might as well call it quits.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_664_talk_1
text: Save me... Please... I don't want to die!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_692_normal_1
text: After you all left Vaizel, Veronica suddenly opened her eyes.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_692_talk_1
text: I'm so relieved you're all safe.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_711_talk_1
text: Bring me some water... I feel like I'm about to die...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_712_normal_1
text: Bring out more ale... Ican still...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_712_talk_1
text: I can still drink way more...!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_713_normal_1
text: I still don't feel too good...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_713_talk_1
text: I'm sure it'll get better soon...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_714_talk_1
text: It feels like I've been drinking until a few moments ago.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_715_normal_1
text: You're planning on eating me, aren't you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_715_talk_1
text: You can't! I still have a mountain of scraps to eat!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_716_normal_1
text: You won't get me that easily!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_716_talk_1
text: I don't want to become roast pork!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_717_normal_1
text: D- didn't think he'd make his escape like that...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_718_talk_1
text: I almost had him, but he got away!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_719_talk_1
text: But if we get him, won't Diane and Meliodas go on a date?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_720_normal_1
text: I'm worried. I wonder where Hawk is.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_720_talk_1
text: He's so tiny. What if something bad happens to him?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_721_normal_1
text: When you catch Pork... Er, never mind.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_721_talk_1
text: Let's keep our motives a secret for now.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_722_normal_1
text: Hawk's a lot faster than I thought.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_722_talk_1
text: We need to get him before anything happens.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_723_normal_1
text: I'm gonna get you, Mr. Pork!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_723_talk_1
text: Don't run, just let me catch you!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_724_talk_1
text: It's pretty chaotic, but it's worth it to see everything under repair.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_725_talk_1
text: I thought I'd done a lot of work, but I'm nowhere near finished.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_726_talk_1
text: I think someone like you could fix this in one go.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_727_normal_1
text: I hope it doesn't get smashed again...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_727_talk_1
text: I never want to see a hard-earned home destroyed again.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_728_talk_1
text: If it breaks, I'll just fix it again!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_729_normal_1
text: This is pretty much all I can do...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_729_talk_1
text: I'd love to see this town back to normal. Wouldn't that make the residents happy?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_730_talk_1
text: Heh, you won't be able to catch me!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_733_normal_1
text: My love and I are finally married...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_733_talk_1
text: Please, congratulate me! It's a blessed day!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_734_normal_1
text: I can't believe it's really happening...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_735_talk_1
text: This brings me back to my youth. What a wonderful occasion.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_736_talk_1
text: The trouble from earlier had everyone on edge, but this wedding was a success.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_737_normal_1
text: I wonder when I'll get married...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_737_talk_1
text: My family keeps pressuring me, but how can I marry without a partner?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_738_talk_1
text: I've never seen her so pretty in my entire life. Weddings are amazing!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_739_normal_1
text: Hmm... I remember what they were like when they were kids...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_739_talk_1
text: I've known them so long, I never thought they'd get married.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_741_normal_1
text: I'm tired from all this clapping!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_741_talk_1
text: Well, don't stop now. You need to wish them well on this wonderful occasion!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_742_normal_1
text: Ah, I want to get married too...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_742_talk_1
text: I'll meet someone nice and get married one day, right?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_754_talk_1
text: Let's hurry up and stop this! We need to rescue everyone!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_758_normal_1
text: Hmm... I never thought a day like this would come.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_758_talk_1
text: Though I can see the future, I don't mind the occasional surprise.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_758_talk_2
text: I understand your dissatisfaction, but I didn't think you'd make a scene during the ceremony.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_759_normal_2
text: Sir Meliodas, you aren't hurt, are you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_759_talk_1
text: I'm glad we've been officially recognized for all our battles!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_759_talk_2
text: There was a brief disturbance, but it's over now. Congratulations!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_760_talk_1
text: It appears people perceive significance through the distribution of these tokens.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_761_normal_1
text: It reminds me of when we were gathering people for our team.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_761_talk_1
text: Of course, we weren't trying for a medal. I just happened to remember.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_762_normal_1
text: I'm the one and only Hawk, the captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_762_talk_1
text: All kneel before my Combat Class, 3,000!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_763_normal_1
text: I don't see King or Ban anywhere.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_763_talk_1
text: Where'd they go? I'm sure they knew we were getting medals today.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_764_talk_1
text: You seem to be talented at assuaging dissatisfaction.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_765_normal_1
text: I didn't mean to deceive Hawk.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_765_talk_1
text: I just felt conflicted knowing he thinks his Combat Class is 3,000.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_766_talk_1
text: I didn't think your Combat Class was higher than mine! Alright, you're pretty strong!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_767_talk_1
text: I thought you objected because you didn't want the medal, Captain.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_768_normal_1
text: I think it's only right that you all get medals.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_768_talk_1
text: If you don't get any medals, then no one should.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_768_talk_2
text: To be honest, my head's still swirling with thoughts...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_769_talk_1
text: It looks like there's greater opposition than I expected.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_769_talk_2
text: I'm well aware of your true power, and I'm sure the king is too.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_770_normal_2
text: Diane, it looks like you got a new outfit...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_770_talk_1
text: The fools who don't fight in battle tend to be the ones that complain the loudest.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_770_talk_2
text: You look good in anything, but particularly in this.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_771_normal_1
text: Well then, show me your skills.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_771_talk_1
text: I want to see just how great [The Seven Deadly Sins] really are.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_772_normal_1
text: So you guys are [The Seven Deadly Sins]...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_772_talk_1
text: Medals, huh? I have my reservations about the recipients.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_773_talk_1
text: I'm sure other Holy Knights are thinking the same thing.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_775_normal_1
text: If you don't mind, why don't you show us what you're made of.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_775_talk_1
text: Until you do, I won't accept that you're worthy of this honor.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_776_normal_1
text: There's nothing else for us to say.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_776_talk_1
text: If everyone else approves, then so be it.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_816_talk_1
text: There's a reason for everything, believable or otherwise.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_817_talk_1
text: Look at my shiny medal! Everyone is singing my praises!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_818_talk_1
text: Why didn't you say anything? You could've at least told me before you left.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_819_normal_1
text: The scraps captain is very happy.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_819_talk_1
text: You can tell him his true Combat Class, 30, but I don't think he'd listen.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_820_normal_1
text: I'm satisfied, now that I've seen it with my own eyes.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_824_talk_1
text: Anyone who looks at us or our memories would say we're lovers.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_825_talk_1
text: This man is precious to me, my only love.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_826_talk_1
text: I think something very strange is happening here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_826_talk_2
text: How could something like this happen?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_827_talk_1
text: I don't know what's going on... I'm scared...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_831_normal_1
text: Why are you trying to stop me?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_831_talk_1
text: I would've been in trouble if I didn't have my Sacred Treasure.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_836_talk_1
text: I want you to lock me up...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_837_normal_1
text: I wonder what happened to Gowther.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_837_talk_1
text: I don't think Diane or Gowther knew things would turn out like this.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_839_normal_1
text: I expected something like this, to an extent.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_839_talk_1
text: I expected an issue, but this happened sooner than I thought. I should've known.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_841_talk_1
text: I made a mess of this town, right after it was restored...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_843_normal_1
text: Oh, what do I do? Where's my child?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_843_normal_2
text: There's no way he could've gotten lost!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_843_normal_3
text: I hope it's smooth sailing from now on.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_843_normal_4
text: I'll never forget what you've done. I'll be sure to repay you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_843_talk_1
text: You don't think he's about to hurt himself, do you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_843_talk_2
text: My Samos has a great sense of direction. He never gets lost.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_843_talk_3
text: My son's looking much happier these days.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_normal_1
text: I want to carry out my task perfectly for big sister.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_normal_2
text: The king ordered me to help you anyway I can, so call me whenever I'm needed.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_normal_4
text: Hmm, I'd say something more beautiful would suit him.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_normal_6
text: This isn't the first time I've lost an ally.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_talk_1
text: I'll be working with you for the time being.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_talk_2
text: Would you say you have a well-developed sense of artistry?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_talk_3
text: I'll be able to carry out big sister's tasks more effectively with this.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_845_talk_4
text: I have my own way of mourning dead comrades.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_normal_1
text: King... Where would he have gone without telling anyone?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_normal_2
text: I've been zoning out a lot recently. Am I just tired?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_normal_3
text: I should've tried to talking to Gowther more while I had the chance.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_normal_4
text: When you're young, it feels like you can do anything...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_normal_5
text: What if I never get to see King again...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_normal_6
text: No, I can't think like that! I'll see King again!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_talk_2
text: You want to know about my childhood? That's a secret.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_846_talk_3
text: I have so many things I didn't get to tell him yet. If I'd known...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_847_normal_1
text: Oh, this is an absolute disaster. What do I do?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_847_normal_2
text: I thought I'd make a whole lot of money with the information I got...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_847_talk_1
text: But I'm completely penniless, I can't even go back home now!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_847_talk_2
text: I think I'm all out of luck.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_847_talk_3
text: Do you think if I try one more time, I'll make some money?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_normal_1
text: Merlin is a hero to mages like us.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_normal_2
text: One day, I'll become an exemplary mage.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_normal_3
text: Demon blood has a big impact on magical research. Probably more than you think.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_normal_4
text: Maybe Demon blood is too dangerous...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_normal_5
text: Do you think we can use Red-stained Stones for research?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_talk_2
text: If you're going to do research, you might as well have plenty of materials.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_talk_3
text: I'll have to be careful. There'd be no point getting hurt doing my research.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_848_talk_4
text: Hmm, I wonder if there's any material that's both safe and high-yield...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_849_normal_2
text: If you don't mind, could I please shake your hand?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_849_normal_3
text: I'll always treasure this, like a family heirloom...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_849_normal_4
text: I wish I could be like you. I'm serious!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_849_talk_1
text: I respect you immensely. It's true!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_849_talk_2
text: That merchant toys with people's emotions! He's an awful person!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_849_talk_3
text: Can I have a strand of your hair?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_850_normal_2
text: I didn't think I'd get caught... I mean, I regret what I did!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_850_normal_3
text: How can I make a living now?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_850_talk_1
text: I- I wasn't doing anything! Don't mind me!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_850_talk_2
text: I'm really not doing anything, please don't look at me like that! It's scary!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_850_talk_3
text: As long as we're here, how about we make a deal... Sorry, I shouldn't have said that! I didn't mean it!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_851_normal_1
text: What do I need to do to be strong?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_851_normal_2
text: I just wanted to be stronger...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_851_talk_1
text: At this rate, I'll be an old man by the time I'm a high-ranking Knight.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_851_talk_2
text: Nothing is free in this world. I learned that after I almost died.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_851_talk_3
text: It's thanks to you, Meliodas. If it weren't for you, I'd have no desire to live a productive life.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_852_normal_1
text: Me? I make and sell potions like a normal merchant these days!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_852_normal_2
text: Hmm, what should I do... Is there a problem?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_852_normal_4
text: Nngh... what do I do now?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_852_talk_1
text: Please believe me! I don't lie to people anymore!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_852_talk_2
text: N- no, of course not. I don't think so. Everything's fine. I think...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_852_talk_3
text: What are you talking about? I'm only selling legit potions from now on...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_852_talk_4
text: Maybe I should set up shop somewhere else... No, I'm not going to scam anyone!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_853_normal_1
text: Have you ever been in love?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_853_normal_2
text: I just wanted to love someone!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_853_normal_3
text: If I ever get my hands on that swindler, I'll tear him to pieces.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_853_normal_4
text: Do I need to find someone else to love now...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_853_talk_1
text: Do you have a lot of dating experience? How do you get your crush to fall for you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_853_talk_2
text: I didn't think a crush could end like this. I can't even get something out of this heartbreak...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_853_talk_3
text: I'm looking for a new love. Do you know any nice, good-looking ones?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_normal_1
text: ...I feel a bit hollow now that I'm alone.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_normal_2
text: I didn't know things would turn out like this.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_normal_3
text: I feel even worse thinking about him.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_normal_5
text: Did you say it was from me?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_talk_1
text: What? I'm fine, don't worry about me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_talk_2
text: I'm a Knight too, I know goodbyes come with the territory. I'm not being emotional.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_talk_3
text: No, I think he's fine. He doesn't even seem bothered, which makes me even more...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_854_talk_4
text: Slater came by and asked me how I was doing. He must've realized what was up...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_855_normal_1
text: I'm taking my patrol duty very seriously.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_855_normal_2
text: This is an uncertain period for everyone...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_855_normal_3
text: I can't believe people out there worship the Demons...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_855_talk_1
text: I'm trying to pay more attention to public safety after all that's happened.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_855_talk_2
text: A kidnapping? That shouldn't have happened. I need to ensure the people's safety.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_855_talk_3
text: There must be something wrong. I know times are tough, but how could they do such a thing?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_855_talk_5
text: I'd like every Holy Knight of Liones to walk a righteous path.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_859_talk_1
text: If it's not an order, I don't need to follow it.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_860_normal_1
text: The new laboratory isn't so bad.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_860_talk_1
text: It's a bit cramped compared to my old one, but it'll do.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_860_talk_2
text: Keep it a secret for now, Captain. He really believes his Combat Class is 3,000.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_860_talk_3
text: Just hearing that name agitates me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_862_normal_1
text: I didn't mean anything by it.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_862_talk_1
text: I do want to apologize if you're still upset.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_863_normal_1
text: I can't stop thinking about the incredible feat I saw in front of the king's chambers.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_871_normal_1
text: I planned this for three years, but...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_872_normal_1
text: I wonder if Margaret is well.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_872_normal_2
text: It seems we're not having much luck today.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_872_talk_1
text: I told Margaret that I needed to leave, and she quietly nodded.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_873_talk_1
text: Anyway, I think Gil and Margaret make a great couple.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_873_talk_2
text: What the heck is going on?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_874_normal_1
text: I think my father still sees me as a child.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_874_normal_2
text: Ah geez, I should go get some work done.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_874_talk_1
text: I'm a full-fledged Holy Knight, you know?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_876_talk_1
text: I can't believe all this happened...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_879_normal_1
text: Wait, are you who I think you are?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9003_1
text: Join the Knighthood, and combine your powers with other adventurers!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9003_2
text: Promoting the Knighthood is an important job!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9004_1
text: You need lots of people for a lively Knighthood!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9004_2
text: Stay on good terms with the other members of the Knighthood.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9004_3
text: A kingdom is only as strong as its knights!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9011_normal_1
text: There will be a major catastrophe if we don't hurry...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9011_normal_2
text: A great hero will surely appear in these perilous times.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9011_talk_1
text: Unfortunately, the Knighthood hasn't reached level 3, so you cannot participate.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9011_talk_2
text: I'm sorry, but you can't face him as you are now.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9012_normal_2
text: I can feel the powerful, ominous magic from here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9012_talk_1
text: If you're ready, then please hurry. Every second counts.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_9012_talk_2
text: I've been waiting for you. I hope you succeed!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_908_normal_1
text: Make sure to protect Camelot at all costs!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_927_normal_1
text: Hard to believe a monster like that could be stopped...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_927_talk_1
text: We will devote ourselves to thwarting any danger that comes our way!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_930131_talk_1
text: Find the "Lucky Marble" to be the lucky winner!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_930136_normal_1
text: Wanna know where the "Lucky Marble" is located?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_930141_normal_2
text: There's a purple flame inside the "Lucky Marble."

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_930153_normal_1
text: An actual evil spirit has appeared.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_1
text: It's been a long time, [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_11
text: You must become stronger so you can protect this world.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_12
text: I told you to train, not get into a fight!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_14
text: You're a real piece of work...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_15
text: I guess there's no sense in warning you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_17
text: You taunted [The Ten Commandments]. You're a real piece of work.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_18
text: Now go out there and save the world!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_19
text: You must continue to become stronger.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_2
text: We were aware of your arrival.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_3
text: Follow Zaneri to the Tower of Trials.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_4
text: I think you're ready to become more powerful.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_5
text: I'll babysit the others, so focus on your test.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_6
text: It's quite fun to make fun of that talking pig.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_normal_8
text: My, my. What a pitiful brat.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_1
text: I already know why you came to the sacred land.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_10
text: Go inside the Training Grotto if you wish to train.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_12
text: It was tough to fit the power in the Amber.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_13
text: I really want to tell you, "No way," but...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_16
text: Come back again when things are peaceful. Ban too.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_17
text: Istal will be safe as long as I'm here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_18
text: Hurry and get out of here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_2
text: I wanted to test your determination.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_3
text: I think it's good to save time for one another.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_5
text: Just to let you know, I went easy on you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_6
text: If you want your power back, accept the test.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_7
text: Up ahead is the Training Grotto.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_8
text: Can't you set aside your differences with Hendy?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_950_talk_9
text: [The Ten Commandments] probably don't care about how you feel.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_952_normal_2
text: As expected, you're strong, brother Meliodas.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_952_normal_3
text: I'm sure you can handle it just fine.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_952_talk_2
text: It's almost time for my nap.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_953_normal_4
text: Retrieving your power will depend on whether you pass the test.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_953_normal_5
text: Even you won't be able to take much more abuse.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_953_normal_6
text: If you continue, it won't be your emotions, but your soul that will perish!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_953_normal_9
text: So you got your power back...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_953_talk_1
text: It's nice to see you again...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_953_talk_2
text: I'm worried about whether you can endure it.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_normal_1
text: I can't believe a place like this exists! So dreamlike!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_normal_2
text: So this is the Tower of Trials!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_normal_3
text: If anyone can do it, it's you, Sir Meliodas!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_normal_5
text: I must make the flower bloom...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_normal_9
text: So this is Istal, the sacred land of the Druids.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_talk_1
text: Have you been to this place before, Sir Meliodas?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_talk_2
text: I can't see anything because it's too dark.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_talk_3
text: I was given a test as well.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_talk_4
text: It's all right. Nobody is blaming you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_talk_6
text: I was late because I changed my clothes.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_talk_8
text: I'm going to keep trying even after we leave this place.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_955_talk_9
text: Do you think these amazing stone pillars were created by the Druids?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_957_normal_3
text: You did such a useless thing!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_957_talk_2
text: I'm not in the mood to train.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_957_talk_3
text: Are you telling me to forgive him?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_957_talk_5
text: I'm going to keep an eye on you from now on, until I can make sure you're someone I can trust.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_957_talk_6
text: All you did was taunt them!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_957_talk_7
text: I don't want to talk to you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_normal_2
text: I can't believe they knew of our arrival and our purpose as well.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_normal_4
text: I can't believe we're at the training area of Druid warriors! Lucky!â™¡

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_normal_5
text: There, there. Such a good boy.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_normal_6
text: There, there. Such a good boy.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_talk_1
text: The leaders look worldly and wise for some reason.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_talk_2
text: The story is progressing too fast. I can't keep up.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_talk_4
text: What do you think of the words of the leaders of Druids?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_talk_5
text: I'm planning on going in. What about you, Fairy King?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_talk_6
text: Let's talk later. The crying baby comes first.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_958_talk_7
text: Do you have food at the tavern suitable for a baby?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_1
text: As expected of a leader of the Druids.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_10
text: These stone pillars are a gate.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_2
text: A test from the leaders of the Druids. How curious.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_3
text: Things are taking a strange turn.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_4
text: I don't have a physical form right now, so there's no reason for me to enter the Training Grotto.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_5
text: So now you'll be getting your power back...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_6
text: I can send you there, but...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_7
text: What happened in the Training Grotto?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_normal_9
text: Is it time to set out?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_1
text: Things are moving along quickly. How convenient.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_2
text: The reunion probably isn't very pleasant.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_3
text: It's a shame I can't go with you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_4
text: Are you ready to regain your power?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_5
text: You're on your own until I can bring you back. Are you sure you want to do this?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_6
text: I'm curious what the mysterious thing on Arthur's head is.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_7
text: I think an explanation is in order.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_8
text: It's a shame I couldn't go inside the Training Grotto, but it can't be helped.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_959_talk_9
text: It's been a while since we've been here, hasn't it, Captain?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_normal_1
text: It seems I need to read the room.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_normal_3
text: I heard there's a delicious smell coming from somewhere.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_normal_4
text: I didn't expect to see the Trio of Troublemakers here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_normal_5
text: It seems I should join the training too.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_normal_6
text: I am having difficulty making sense of the situation.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_talk_1
text: I'm trying to read the room.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_talk_2
text: It seems you're mad at me.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_960_talk_3
text: I also don't know about the thing on Arthur's head.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_normal_1
text: So this is the sacred land of the Druids...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_normal_2
text: I can't believe Hendrickson is still alive.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_normal_3
text: So this is where Druid warriors train...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_normal_4
text: Don't you smell something delicious coming from somewhere?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_normal_6
text: I don't want to be protected all the time.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_normal_8
text: It will climb down someday, I think.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_talk_2
text: Merlin's not coming in with us...?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_talk_3
text: I would like to train here as well!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_talk_6
text: Don't ask me about what's on my head, please.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_961_talk_7
text: This thing on my head, what does it look like?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_normal_1
text: I can't believe those brats are the leaders of the Druids!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_normal_3
text: I smell something slightly scorched that smells delicious!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_normal_4
text: It wasn't scraps from the Druids...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_normal_6
text: Hehe, all kinds of training are nothing but child's play to Sir Hawk!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_normal_8
text: Looks like everyone powered up nicely!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_talk_1
text: Shocking! Those brats are the leaders and that big one is only 15 years old!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_talk_2
text: Hehe, go on! I'll be waiting for you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_talk_3
text: Telling me to become stronger than I already am?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_talk_5
text: It could have been bad if I didn't discover them sooner.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_talk_6
text: I don't know if I need to be stronger, but let's try it out!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_962_talk_7
text: I'm done with my training too! *Snort*

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_normal_1
text: I pray you will succeed this time.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_normal_2
text: I can't believe those boys turned out to be fine young men.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_normal_3
text: Really... I'm glad I didn't end up killing you.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_normal_4
text: Using the Training Grotto seems to be an effective training method.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_normal_5
text: What happened in the Training Grotto...?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_talk_10
text: Who will guide the boys if something happens to you?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_talk_12
text: Istal should be fine as long as the two leaders are here.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_talk_2
text: ...I will atone for my sins one day.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_talk_4
text: Looks like I'm the odd man out. I'll sit this one out.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_talk_5
text: They are the hope of Liones.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_talk_6
text: Please go ahead. I'll be waiting.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_972_talk_8
text: Just how enormous is this power of yours that was sealed away?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_10
text: What's that big thing over there!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_11
text: Is it true you asked to be sent to [The Ten Commandments]?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_13
text: Elizabeth's new duds look good on her!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_2
text: I thought we would defeat it this time.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_3
text: I'd be fine if it weren't for that same bastard.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_5
text: There's no chance of winning using these sticks!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_8
text: Meliodas is strong, but King is no pushover either!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_normal_9
text: I want to go against him one day too.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_1
text: When did you get to Istal? Where's Diane?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_10
text: You wanna visit [The Ten Commandments] all of a sudden? Why?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_12
text: I feel the power flowing through me!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_2
text: I'm paired up with you again.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_3
text: You don't need to worry about Ban, right? Since he's immortal and all.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_5
text: What do we need to do in order to win?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_6
text: I wanna do that again once- no, ten more times!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_7
text: Did you hear? Our Combat Class changed.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_8
text: Is this a spar or a fight?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_974_talk_9
text: Could this also be a Goddess Amber?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_975_normal_1
text: Wow. I thought I was going to die! Hahaha!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_975_normal_2
text: I'm going to attempt it again.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_975_normal_3
text: You just need to choose an Amber once you're inside.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_975_talk_1
text: Pleasure to see you here. Where are the other Sins?

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_975_talk_2
text: I will take down whatever monster we come across.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_999_normal_3
text: So this is the Training Grotto...

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_999_talk_1
text: I'm gonna need my power back.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_999_talk_2
text: I want to warm up before I take back my power.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_guild_normal_1
text: For the glory of the knighthood!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_guild_normal_1st_2
text: The {0} Knighthood is the light of Britannia.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_guild_normal_2
text: There is only one knighthood worthy of being most powerful!

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_guild_talk_1
text: Only the most elite of knights can create the most powerful of knighthoods.

name: DB_basepoint_npc_talk_guild_talk_2
text: Where do you think the greatest knighthood of Liones is from?

name: DB_basepoint_talk_default_donation_1
text: Make a donation to the village to increase your Friendship level.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_default_donation_2
text: There are a lot of people here who need help.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_default_donation_4
text: I'll keep this short. Please help!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_default_donation_5
text: Hey, do you want to do a good deed?

name: DB_basepoint_talk_default_donation_6
text: Could you make a donation to help restore the capital?

name: DB_basepoint_talk_max_donation_1
text: You're here, my good warrior! I'll give you a special reward if you make a donation!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_max_donation_2
text: We still need plenty of help. If you make a donation, I'll give you a special gift this time.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_max_donation_3
text: (Make a donation and receive a special reward.)

name: DB_basepoint_talk_max_donation_4
text: Please help! I'll repay your generosity!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_max_donation_5
text: Want to do some more good deeds? I'll reward you this time.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_max_donation_6
text: I'll make sure you receive a reward if you decide to help.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_not_donation_1
text: Haha... You shouldn't get an old man's hopes up like that.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_not_donation_2
text: Goodness! Please take this a little more seriously!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_not_donation_3
text: (Please enter the correct amount you want to donate.)

name: DB_basepoint_talk_not_donation_4
text: Ooh! Thank you so m... Hey, don't mess around like that!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_not_donation_5
text: Tsk. You need to do right by others if you want good things to happen to you.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_not_donation_6
text: Oh, I'm a bit disappointed... I thought you were going to help...

name: DB_basepoint_talk_ok_donation_1
text: I'm always grateful for your contributions.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_ok_donation_2
text: Thank you! I'll make sure to put this to good use!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_ok_donation_4
text: You really are quite generous! Thank you!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_ok_donation_5
text: Good choice. Fate will smile upon you.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_ok_donation_6
text: I knew you'd help us. Thank you very much.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_upgrade_donation_1
text: There have been lots of positive changes to the village, all thanks to you.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_upgrade_donation_2
text: Wow! The village has changed so much!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_upgrade_donation_4
text: The village has become more robust thanks to you!

name: DB_basepoint_talk_upgrade_donation_5
text: Thank you. Your generosity has helped our village a great deal.

name: DB_basepoint_talk_upgrade_donation_6
text: Thanks. Look at how beautiful the capital is. It's all thanks to your donations.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_03
text: Oh, I didn't expect this at all... Thank you so much.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_04
text: Wow! Is this for me? This makes me so happy!â™¡

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_06
text: Fairies don't find birthdays that special... but thank you anyways.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_07
text: If I accept a birthday gift, am I obligated to return the favor?

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_08
text: Hmm, you've brought me something very interesting. A perfect birthday gift.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_09
text: Is this for me? Thank you.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_10
text: You got a birthday gift for someone like me? You're very considerate.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_11
text: Wow, I'm surprised you remembered my birthday! Did Dian... No, never mind!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_12
text: I wonder if Veronica knows when my birthday is?

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_13
text: Hmm, instead of this, how about you treat me to a meal at your tavern?

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_14
text: Well now. I'm surprised you got me a gift.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_16
text: Confirmed! I'll take the gift, as long as it's safe!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_17
text: I'm thrilled to receive a gift from a member of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_19
text: Hehehe. For me? Is it a new torture device?

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_20
text: Ooh, is it a new type of poisonous insect?

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_21
text: It's been a while since I got a gift like this...

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_22
text: Want to hear something I created to celebrate my own birthday? Boom boom, chick chicky boom!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_23
text: Oh, you really shouldn't have... Wait, did you want me to give this to someone else?

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_24
text: Oh my, a birthday gift for me? I'm touched!â™¡

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_25
text: Sorry, but I don't like you like that.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_26
text: An unexpected gift is always a nice surprise.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_28
text: Do you always give random women gifts like this? Then again, I'm no random woman.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_29
text: Did Gil ask you to do this? He did, right? I'm sure he did. Oh, Gil, thank you so much.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_30
text: It's been a long time since I got a gift from you. Thank you.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_31
text: Your birthday wishes are good enough for me.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_32
text: I'm honored to receive a gift from the best fighter out there.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_33
text: A present for me? Did Ban tell you my birthday? Thanks!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_34
text: I am honored to receive a birthday present from you!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_35
text: Y-you're wishing a happy birthday to a person like... me?

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_36
text: Hahaha! I guess I've aged yet again!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_37
text: How old am I? What a rude question.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_38
text: My birthday? I want this world to end as my present.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_39
text: A birthday song sounds nice on a day like today.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_40
text: I never really cared about a thing like this.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_42
text: I can't believe someone would celebrate the date of my birth!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_44
text: I wonder how many presents I'll get this year.

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_45
text: How about a cheer for me?

name: DB_branch_normal_matrona_01
text: I'm in my small form for a change, but...

name: DB_branch_normal_matrona_02
text: I was always jealous of Elizabeth!

name: DB_branch_normal_matrona_03

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_04_69

text: I want to say, Diane...? But I know that you're Ruin.

text: Great! As long as you don't hypnotize me.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_03
text: Sorry to disappoint you, but it's all volunteer work.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_05
text: I'd just make my own reality better.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_06
text: Haha! You're not the first to tell me that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_09
text: We're the furthest thing from dangerous.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_31
text: You're not gonna fool me more than once.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_32
text: You know that no one wants to hear that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_36
text: You think I'm the brat here?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_37
text: So you don't mind if I punch you?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_38
text: I don't think that's up to you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_40
text: I'll tell you if you show me how you use yours.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_61
text: Like someone I beat within an inch of their life once.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_63
text: I'm going to cut to the chase and tell you that you'll never be hired here.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_64
text: I never want to hear that bell ring again.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_66
text: Yeah, well if that's what you think, then that's what you think.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_68
text: I wonder what kind of retribution you deserve?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_69
text: I think your intuition may be right.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_06_70
text: I'm sure there's someone somewhere, right?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_01
text: Drinking some of our ale will help you forget about that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_04
text: It's not necessary to keep people from voicing the truth.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_05

text: Want me to introduce you to some people?

text: So that's why I've been so annoyed.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_31
text: Have you tried taking a bath?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_34

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_36

text: You can help Ban out in the kitchen.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_61
text: I know what that smells like.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_62

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_64

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_65

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_66
text: Only if you're prepared to deal with what comes next.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_69
text: Sorry I cost you your job.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_07_70
text: Ban, we got a weird one here.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_01

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_02
text: If nothing is wrong, that's good.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_03
text: You still have a lot to learn.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_06
text: There's a rumor that he turned on his allies.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_07
text: We're gonna win that one too.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_31

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_33
text: You taught me some new tricks as well.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_35
text: That day can't come fast enough.

text: He was a novice Knight whose daughter was the apple of his eye.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_39
text: I thought he betrayed his people and made a run for it?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_40
text: I think you're plenty powerful already.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_61

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_62

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_65
text: Do whatever you need to do.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_08_67

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_01
text: Don't you think you're powerful enough?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_03
text: That's right. He's our tavern chef.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_04
text: But you've been gazing towards the kitchen all day.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_05
text: You might make it big as a barber.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_08
text: I don't think there are bugs at the tavern.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_09
text: You sure it's not the other way around?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_10
text: Just drown it in some ale.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_31
text: So why is it that you want to be so powerful?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_32
text: I don't know. You sure you're not imagining things?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_33
text: Or I could do the cooking too.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_34
text: Why don't you just go up to Ban and talk to him?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_35
text: Why don't we test your skills on pig bristles?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_36
text: Ask him yourself if you want to know.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_37
text: Want some ale while you wait for her?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_38
text: I'll have the chef exterminate them.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_39
text: I'll pass that on to the chef.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_40
text: You can take your personal grudges somewhere else.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_61
text: Is your brother like your sworn enemy or something?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_63
text: What are you more interested in, the cooking or the cook?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_64
text: Want me to bring him out for you?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_66
text: Do you really want an answer?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_68
text: A Holy Knight who's afraid of bugs?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_69
text: So why do you keep coming here then?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_09_70
text: Ban really doesn't know how to treat women, huh.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_05
text: She seemed pretty bent out of shape.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_07
text: I thought Gilthunder was the strongest?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_31
text: Your loyalty seems a bit personal.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_33
text: It's not about being talented enough.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_34
text: You could try training some more instead of moping.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_35
text: I only had to mention your name for her to lose it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_36
text: Veronica worries about the weirdest things.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_37
text: The other two said the same thing.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_61
text: Yeah? Don't know what that has to do with me though.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_62
text: Hmm, I don't think that's for me to say.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_64
text: You're the furthest thing from helpless.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_66
text: And you're worried that Veronica is worried?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_67
text: I'll just have to judge that for myself.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_10_70
text: Yet the two of you look nothing like each other.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_04
text: Yeah. Let's forget our troubles with some ale.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_06
text: Isn't it? I never thought I'd run into you here.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_07
text: Would you like to try my food?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_10
text: There's no escaping the sands of time.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_33
text: I don't want to talk about it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_34
text: Let me treat my old friend to a drink.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_37
text: This tavern is armed with the best chef in the world, and some tasty ale too.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_38
text: For you, I'll knock half off.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_39
text: I know I lost Liz. That's the one thing I'm certain of.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_40
text: I can't really remember what you used to look like before...

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_62
text: I don't know what you're talking about.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_63
text: I tried to protect everyone, but I failed.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_64
text: Drinking too often isn't good for you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_65
text: Well, chalk it up to clean living, I guess.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_66
text: I'm happy to see you again.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_67
text: It's the best way to gather information while remaining mobile.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_68
text: We may be old friends, but there's no such thing as a free lunch.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_69
text: I'm sure you will know the truth one day.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_11_70
text: You're still young at heart, though.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_01
text: I guess the more the merrier.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_02
text: It's hefty. I like that in a weapon.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_04
text: Agreed. Must be why I always feel so tired and sluggish.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_05
text: There's nothing like a drink after a day of relaxation, either.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_06
text: You mean the captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_07
text: Because that's what you look like.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_08
text: There you go, liven things up a bit.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_09
text: I never thought about that before.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_10
text: This is the first I'm hearing of it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_32
text: It looks like it'll make a pleasant sound if you shake it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_34
text: That doesn't make you the most powerful person in the world.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_35
text: Why don't you order another one?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_36
text: Nah. He's quite good at taking care of scraps.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_37
text: Look at the man in the mirror.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_39
text: Perhaps, but you've got a great sense of rhythm. I'll give you that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_63
text: Both of you are a handful.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_64
text: The most powerful? Shall we put that to the test?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_65
text: Did you really put in a hard day's work?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_66
text: Pork jerky? Is that any good?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_67
text: Have you considered switching up your armor?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_69
text: I don't know about skills, but you're in a different class, for sure.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_12_70
text: Ooh, maybe I should get some.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_04
text: Can you even afford to foot that bill?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_07
text: It's a pretty gaudy name, more like.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_10
text: Believe in them. That's all there is to it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_31
text: I'm sure it was just a coincidence.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_33
text: Why do you insist on wearing it?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_36
text: You don't really think Hawk is cute, do you?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_38
text: No wonder you guys are so strong.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_40
text: Well, my comrades don't listen to me at all, actually.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_61
text: You guys put up a hell of a fight.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_62
text: What makes you so happy about it?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_64
text: Great, I'll give you a special discount!

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_65
text: Why don't you worry about yourself.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_66
text: He's a bit too big to be called a piglet.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_67
text: What about it is cool exactly?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_68
text: So what kind of stuff do the Knights of His Royal Majesty do?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_13_69
text: Yeah. In more ways than one.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_03
text: That's right, I'm the dashing proprietor.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_05
text: That's a brash thing to say with [The Seven Deadly Sins] right in front of you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_06
text: That's because he's so huge and you're so tiny.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_07
text: I'd say living to see another day is victory enough.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_08
text: It'll cost you... You sure you wanna know?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_10
text: He used to deal with the scraps. Now he takes care of the finances.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_31
text: Not in this lifetime. Try to be less of a baby face in your next life.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_32
text: Why don't you take some time to train?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_33
text: Why? Do you find it unbelievable?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_34
text: I think you need more practice.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_35
text: You have pretty strong sense of belonging.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_36
text: At least they mistake you for his son, right?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_39
text: I don't have time to entertain you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_40
text: Show some respect. That's the captain of the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_61
text: Does the baby want some candy?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_63
text: Come on over and find out.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_64
text: Sounds like you're already pretty confident.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_65
text: You guys are pretty skilled, I admit.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_66
text: Maybe it's a compliment, since you two get along so well.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_67
text: Maybe there's more than just winning and losing.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_14_70
text: He's not just an emergency food ration, he's a friend as well.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_04
text: I'd say we duked it out fine.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_06
text: Wow. Don't you feel even a little embarrassed saying that?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_07
text: It's just the taste that's bad. That's all.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_08
text: I hear you only take on missions where you get to kill your target.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_10
text: Wanna work for the tavern and hunt game meat?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_33
text: I thought it was just you guys.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_34
text: Wanna go again after I close up shop for the day?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_36
text: Eh, I don't care either way.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_38
text: You should enjoy your free time when you have it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_63
text: That's just what happens in a fight.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_64
text: It's almost like you can't wait to lose.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_65
text: I assumed that was a given for an order of Knights directly under the king.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_67
text: Hmm, it seems someone is spreading baseless rumors.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_68
text: You're the type who finds purpose in battle, huh?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_15_70
text: But is it enough to stand in between Hawk and his scraps?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_02
text: Being short has its disadvantages too.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_03
text: Because one's so big and one's so small?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_05
text: Work's over. Take some time to relax.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_06
text: Let's not forget about [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_09
text: I think you'd be the strongest.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_32
text: Doesn't it come handy in a fight?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_33
text: Ooh, I can definitely see it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_36
text: You are some of the most skilled fighters in the kingdom.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_39
text: Probably Slater since he's the captain.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_40
text: I'm guessing Slater got everyone together.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_62
text: But on the upside, you're also really strong.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_63
text: I guess you guys just seem that close.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_64
text: Want some ale on the house?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_65
text: No wonder you guys are so powerful.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_66
text: It's a good thing you guys are Knights for His Royal Majesty.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_68
text: Does Slater hit you if you misbehave?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_16_70
text: Why, is there some kind of secret origin story?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_01
text: And there's no better way to end the day than with ale.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_02
text: That's a great idea. I'll cook something special for you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_04
text: That's because Gowther isn't just anyone.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_08
text: I think you guys are pretty strong.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_09
text: That's because a lot of us are of races that age differently from Humans.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_31
text: That reminds me, I think Slater said there was a nighttime mission.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_34
text: Especially when they pack such a huge punch.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_36
text: I didn't think they were anything special.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_37
text: We have great ale at my tavern.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_39
text: You can see we've aged if you look close enough.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_61
text: Did you even do anything today?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_62
text: You should totally come and order way more than you could ever eat.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_63
text: Trying to take over the kingdom, of course.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_64
text: I know. I was pretty surprised too.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_66
text: You were too fast for me to see anything.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_67
text: It's even better with a tasty snack or two.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_68
text: Sorry, but I don't even have an opinion.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_69
text: We've actually changed quite a bit.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_17_70
text: To determine who foots the bill?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_04
text: Yeah, and I'm the [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b], Meliodas!

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_05
text: You work on your fitness all year?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_09
text: It's possible if you work harder.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_31
text: Oh yeah? I didn't know that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_33
text: Nope, not in a million years.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_34
text: That was a joke. You didn't actually buy that, did you?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_35
text: You could slim down a bit, though.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_62
text: You should send an invoice to the Knights of Liones for damages.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_64
text: Shhh! You'll be sorry if you spread that around.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_67
text: Matrona's probably the champion, I think.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_68
text: What an obvious trick to try and make sure you win year after year!

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_18_70
text: If I told ya, I'd have to kill ya.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_05
text: I'll bet Hawk doesn't even remember.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_07
text: Why are you looking for Margaret here?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_08
text: I didn't realize I was so popular.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_09
text: I'd say you've still got a lot of growing up to do.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_10
text: I'll bet you were the real prankster!

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_31
text: Have you really tasted horse piss?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_36
text: Eh, I guess Margaret's pretty cute.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_37
text: Margaret? No, but Elizabeth is here.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_39
text: Yeah, yeah. You're all grown up.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_40
text: I remember. Didn't you streak down an alleyway in your underwear once?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_61
text: That Mead kid was really ticked off.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_62
text: It's not a problem if you're good-looking.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_63
text: I suppose it appears that way.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_65
text: Yup, Hawk was pretty mad about that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_67
text: Why are you looking for her?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_69
text: Okay, then why don't the two of us have a friendly match?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_19_70
text: It's already been ten years. Time really flies.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_02
text: What? They look just fine together.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_03
text: Kind of like how you follow Diane around.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_04
text: I think you should be more like him.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_06
text: Then why don't you try blowing that guy's hat away?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_31
text: Why do you want to know?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_32
text: A Human and a Giant would look just as strange.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_33
text: He's her bodyguard, so that's not a surprise.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_35
text: So why not find yourself a girlfriend?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_62
text: I guess it's not the most common pairing.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_66
text: It must be handy when the weather gets hot.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_69
text: I thought you were all in on it together.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_20_70
text: King's the one who protected her.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_04
text: I'm sure he has his reasons.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_05
text: Once you're friends, you're friends forever.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_08
text: Don't kid yourself into thinking you're the only one.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_09
text: So I'll just have King pay the bill?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_34
text: You're his friend, give him a break.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_35
text: I think that friendship died a while ago.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_37
text: King will be sad to hear that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_38
text: King knows more than enough about that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_21_67
text: Why can't you try to get along?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_06
text: Want to work as the tavern fridge?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_09
text: I do, but I can't tell you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_34
text: She doesn't have the talent, that's for sure.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_36
text: I wouldn't mind hanging out with you in the summer.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_38
text: I don't see that at all.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_40
text: This is the first time you've seen a pig talk?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_63
text: Because she thinks she's gonna get in trouble.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_65
text: A brother she looks up to.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_69
text: It's unrequited, so it doesn't matter.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_22_70
text: Call him by his name, please, or he's gonna start sulking.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_06
text: I think that description applies more to you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_08
text: Good luck. I'm rooting for you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_10
text: It's because Gilthunder's a regular, right?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_34
text: You're into him because of his looks?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_36
text: Well, I agree with you, somewhat.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_37
text: Well, you get what you deserve.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_40
text: Only if you do magic shows.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_64
text: I know. He's just my type.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_66
text: Merlin's the nicest person in the world.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_23_70
text: I don't really have any use for you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_24_06
text: I don't think that's gonna sell.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_24_10
text: Why don't you take over this place?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_24_40
text: I guess the tavern will have some competition!

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_24_64
text: No, a lot of things are different now.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_24_69
text: Eh, I don't care either way.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_24_70
text: Do you have the capital to open one?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_25_06
text: He'll be branded the son of a traitor.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_25_08
text: That's not something to worry about.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_25_39
text: Then I'll make sure you get to see him more and more.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_25_40
text: You'll get your chance in the afterlife.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_25_63
text: If you ask for forgiveness, there's a chance you might get it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_25_69
text: He's not that bad once you get to know him.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_25_70
text: I'm sure Zaratras probably already knows how you feel.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_04
text: What matters is how Gil feels.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_05
text: I think she should be executed.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_10
text: I wouldn't worry too much about that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_33
text: Do you even know how to drink?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_34
text: She sure has a funny way of showing it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_35
text: I think she needs to be locked up.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_36
text: You both have the same personality.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_37
text: I think he can take care of himself.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_61
text: There isn't a day that she doesn't get into some kind of mess.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_63
text: Do you have the money to pay for it?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_64
text: Maybe you're wrong, maybe you're right.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_65
text: I think we should put her in exile.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_66
text: I thought you guys weren't related by blood at all.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_67
text: I'll make sure to work him real hard.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_26_68
text: You can start doing more going forward.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_01
text: I'll need to think about that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_03
text: I guess we better start getting ready.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_08
text: She's clumsy, but she gets the job done.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_33
text: I guess I better hurry and run away.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_34
text: I guess we'll have to go somewhere you can't see us.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_38
text: Yeah. Which means you need to pay for all the dishes she's broken.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_39
text: She gets hotter by the minute.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_63
text: That doesn't have anything to do with me.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_69
text: I'm taking good care of her, don't worry.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_27_70
text: It's good you're aware of that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_01
text: Since you put it that way, maybe I'll give it another thought.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_03
text: Everyone says the same about the Boar Hat.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_04
text: I have perfect taste buds. Don't believe every rumor you hear.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_08
text: I don't have one to tell.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_31
text: I don't feel up to it yet.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_32
text: It could come naturally with time.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_33
text: Hehe, that's the best thing about my tavern.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_34
text: Well, being a good cook isn't everything.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_35
text: Hmm, I guess she was always mysterious.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_36
text: I'm not sure. Would those qualities be the same for all kings?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_38
text: I'll tell you later over some ale.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_39
text: Sure. Merlin doesn't bet on things recklessly.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_40
text: Of course. We met you through fate.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_64
text: Why don't you try some of my food if you're curious?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_65
text: It's been ten years. I forgot what she was like.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_67
text: You'll have allies soon. Allies you can depend on.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_68
text: We're on an adventure right now, hehe.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_69
text: Don't think too much. It makes things harder.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_28_70
text: I don't know, but I won't comply if it exists.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_01
text: I don't need to prove anything to be me.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_02
text: Well, do your best, I guess.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_03
text: Don't go scheming to end the world with my cooking, you hear?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_05
text: Hmm, I'll give it a thought, sure.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_06
text: Merlin is a precious ally of mine.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_08
text: I don't know. Maybe it's all thanks to someone important to me.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_09
text: Yeah. I don't want the world to end.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_10
text: Oh! Let me know if you find one!

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_32
text: It'd be pretty hard, don't you think?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_34
text: Ale is best when it's strong.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_35
text: I don't know, it's not my thing.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_36
text: I'll think about it if you can defeat Merlin.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_39
text: I think that's going to happen, yeah.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_40
text: I wouldn't tell you even if I knew.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_63
text: Ban's cooking is pretty decent, though.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_29_67
text: How about changing things up a bit?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_01
text: He'll like anything you give him.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_02
text: He seems to be having fun.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_05
text: He'll like wherever you take him.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_06
text: There's no one for him except you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_10
text: You'll find out if you come with us.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_33
text: I find it fascinating that you're in love with someone like Ban.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_34
text: Because they have a short lifespan.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_35
text: How about the Fairy King's Forest?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_38
text: Because they have a short lifespan.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_40
text: Weren't you watching the whole time?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_61
text: Why don't you ask him yourself?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_30_62
text: I don't know what he does around here.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_01
text: Vanya Ale is much better than wine.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_02
text: Are you sure you want a suggestion from me?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_03
text: How high are you going to jump?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_05
text: Go ahead and defeat me if you can.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_07
text: Then why don't we duke it out? No tricks.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_09
text: I also have many things for you. Mainly pity.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_10
text: So whose soul do you want to eat?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_31
text: We do. Do you have the coin?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_32
text: How about on Hawk's Mama's back?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_33
text: I don't think I can win.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_34
text: Wanna get ingredients for the tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_36
text: Does silence count as a lie?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_37
text: You're a bit of a simpleton, huh?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_40
text: How about not eating souls from now on?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_61
text: You're trying to drink in my tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_62
text: I can send you there directly.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_65
text: Why don't we take this outside?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_31_70
text: You should take the opportunity and shed some weight.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_01
text: I believe in only one thing.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_03
text: Our tavern doesn't sell to just anyone.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_04
text: No, the present is more precious to me.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_05
text: I'm not letting you do what you want.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_06
text: There's a lot that's changed if you look closely.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_07
text: But you're not saying you won't fight.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_08
text: I have no idea, but I also don't want to find out.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_31
text: Whatever it is, it's nothing I wouldn't believe in.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_32
text: You'd never be able to swallow my soul.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_33
text: Our tavern's ale is pretty good...

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_34
text: Even if I did, I wouldn't ask you to do anything.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_37
text: Are you sure it's proper conversation?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_61
text: You want to see my eyes burn from my skull?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_63
text: What do I get if I give you ale?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_65
text: What a evil hobby you have.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_67
text: You're afraid you'd lose in a fight, aren't you?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_68
text: Would've been nice if you stayed sealed away.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_32_69
text: You're reacting to them like you've seen a feast.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_01
text: Interesting. It's a secret friend, then.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_02
text: You must be a good singer?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_03
text: No thanks, it's a pointless attempt at charming.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_04
text: Is that rascal from that incident alright?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_05
text: You looked like you were free. I guess not?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_06
text: They're a band of skilled Holy Knights that are one of the best in Liones.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_32
text: Keep it down in public areas, please.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_34
text: I'm up for another spar whenever, if you want one.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_35
text: Are you training as a group?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_36
text: They're a pitiful group that lost the power struggle.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_38
text: Someone who will be there with me for everything.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_39
text: I might be better at music than cooking.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_40
text: Prove it with your actions, not words!

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_61
text: They can't help but be special if only you can see them.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_62
text: Something put you in a good mood?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_65
