text: It must be hard working under Denzel.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_66
text: They're great colleagues with the same point of view.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_67
text: Nothing I can say with confidence.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_68
text: Someone who can understand who I am, all of me.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_69
text: Beats me, I'm not very interested.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_33_70
text: No need to get all serious by yourself. You need to know how to rely on others from time to time.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_02
text: I'm sorry about that time. It was nothing personal.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_05
text: You know many people were watching at the medal ceremony, right?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_07
text: How about a really big meat pie?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_08
text: All brawn and no brains wouldn't make you very popular.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_10
text: You might want to work a little harder.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_31
text: And how will you defend it?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_32
text: Yeah, I hope you win next time.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_33
text: How about finding work a Holy Knight should do?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_34
text: Beats me. I heard you lost a friend in the last battle.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_35
text: I never said that we were outstanding.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_36
text: It'll be a difficult fight... and a lot of sacrifice.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_37
text: Our chef's not here at the moment. Shall I cook for you?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_38
text: You enjoy ordering them around, huh?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_40
text: Why does rank matter? You're already part of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky].

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_62
text: How about changing your mindset first?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_63
text: Train harder and improve your skills.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_64
text: Yes. That's why I want to protect them at all costs.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_65
text: And who just lost to the leader of a not-so-special group?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_66
text: Will you be able to handle fighting against opponents as powerful as them?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_34_68
text: I guess powerful men are pretty charming.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_02
text: Well, I am curious about what other worlds are like...

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_03
text: Don't do it if you don't want to.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_04
text: Try drinking a lot of milk.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_05
text: I know a tavern with really good food.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_06
text: If you're only showing me, sure.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_10
text: Just because you can't see them doesn't mean they don't exist.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_32
text: Destroying the world is off limits.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_34
text: Ask someone to grab you and stretch.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_35
text: How spicy does it need to be?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_38
text: There's someone with an interest in research.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_65
text: You should stop, it'll make your stomach hurt.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_69
text: It's more likely that people have them.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_35_70
text: I've never really thought about it.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_07
text: I know. You're Holy Knights under Denzel.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_09
text: I think I know who you're talking about.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_10
text: Yeah, it lets people surpass their limits.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_33
text: You're not really my type either.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_34
text: I heard he's stopping by later.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_36
text: Yeah, gotta agree with you there. You're in [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky].

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_38
text: Because they want to be together forever.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_40
text: But it can also cause problems.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_66
text: Look forward to working with you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_67
text: Look forward to working with you.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_68
text: Because love needs to be blessed.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_69
text: Could turn out to be attractive.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_37_70
text: Are you talking about your magic?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_03
text: You just gotta do your best.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_06
text: How about changing your arrowheads instead?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_08
text: Well, there's someone out there for everyone, so...

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_32
text: How about on the roof of the Boar Hat?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_34
text: I'm sure it's not an age problem.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_62
text: You gotta go outdoors for that.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_63
text: It depends who we're talking about.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_66
text: What was that saying about blaming one's tools again?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_68
text: I don't know. It might not be easy.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_38_70
text: You gotta try to be okay.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_01
text: A traveling tavern, huh? That's pretty interesting.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_02
text: So what's the deal with that pig?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_03
text: That Griamore, he can be so annoying.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_04
text: Ellie's hanging out in this dirty place?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_05
text: Who even hires a princess as a waitress?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_06
text: Griamore was here? Hmph, whatever! I don't care one bit.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_07
text: These kinds of cheap meals don't agree with me.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_08
text: What's the tastiest thing at the tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_09
text: I was surprised when Ellie said she was going to find you guys.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_01_10
text: I wonder if I should go on a journey to become stronger.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_01
text: There's something suspicious about this tavern showing up out of nowhere...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_02
text: I had absolutely no idea who you were when we met.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_03
text: The [Beard of the Mountain Cat] is on the side of justice!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_04
text: So you're the infamous Meliodas, [b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b]!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_05
text: I'm gonna become a Holy Knight one day!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_06
text: Does the Knighthood of Scraps Disposal have other members?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_07
text: The next time I visit the tavern, it'll be as a customer.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_09
text: That pig's body slam packs a hell of a punch.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_02_10
text: I swear I'll repay you for saving my life one day.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_01
text: Confirmed! I'll be collecting that useful little piggy of yours!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_02
text: I don't have any money, so... dine-and-dash, confirmed!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_04
text: Confirmed! My apprenticeship ends next month! I'm a Holy Knight!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_06
text: Confirmed! I declare this establishment with its terrible food permanently closed!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_07
text: Confirmed! I'll be arresting all you wanted criminals!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_08
text: Confirmed! I'll have whatever that piggy's having!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_09
text: Are you trying to recruit me as an ally?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_03_10
text: Cooking? You'll be needing my knife skills.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_01
text: Whoa, whoa. I have no desire to go head-to-head with [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_02
text: Princess Elizabeth is your weakness, I see.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_04
text: If you could become invisible, what's the first thing you'd do?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_05
text: It's all over for the [Weird Fangs].

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_06
text: You were not like what I expected at all.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_07
text: Please don't be alarmed if I vanish all of a sudden.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_08
text: All means are justified in the aim of a noble purpose.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_09
text: Is my place in the darkness or in the light?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_04_10
text: I think I need to find a new Knighthood to join.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_05_01
text: I'd love to bring my precious insects to the village.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_05_02
text: It's tough work keeping an eye on criminals.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_05_03
text: I wonder, how honest of a person are you?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_05_04
text: I need meat to feed my adorable little insects.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_05_05
text: You're always putting up a front like you're so cool.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_05_08
text: You wanted to see my cute little insects?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_05_09
text: Insects are far more trustworthy than Humans.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_06_01
text: Who do I look like to you?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_06_02
text: What a broken-down hovel. How about if I play my bell?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_06_04
text: Should I put on a live performance here?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_06_05
text: Which would you choose... A dreamy illusion or a harsh reality?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_06_06
text: You may be part of [The Seven Deadly Sins], but you're still just a little brat to me.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_06_07
text: My body is stronger than steel!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_06_10
text: Know anyone who can craft a good bell?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_01
text: I can't scrub the stench of blood off me.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_02
text: Everyone tells me the truth in the end.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_03
text: What do you think I like?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_04
text: I can shut the mouths of customers who complain about the food here. Forever.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_05
text: I love having a mug of ale after a hard day's work.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_06
text: Would you like to experience what my hands are capable of?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_07
text: [b]The Fox Sin of Greed[/b] was captured by none other than myself.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_08
text: We just perform our duties the best we can.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_09
text: I guess it's time to find another line of work.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_07_10
text: All cannot help but feel weak before me.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_08_01
text: Have you heard of the ability, "Explosion"?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_08_04
text: I'm sure there will be a next time.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_08_05
text: I'm planning on returning to the capital soon.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_08_06
text: Do you remember my father, Dale?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_08_07
text: I may have lost this time, but the next battle...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_08_09
text: I'm searching for the reason behind my father's disappearance.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_08_10
text: I'm trying my best to become more powerful.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_01
text: I'm gonna become even more powerful than my brother.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_02
text: I'm a lot more powerful now!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_03
text: Is it true that Ban does the cooking here?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_04
text: I- I'm not here to see Ban. I swear!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_05
text: Could it really be that I have a talent for barbering?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_06
text: What kind of person is Ban, really?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_09
text: I like the food, but I don't like the chef.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_09_10
text: I haven't forgotten the humiliation I suffered at Baste!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_01
text: I swore my undying loyalty to Lady Veronica.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_03
text: I'm not talented enough to be a Guardian Knight...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_04
text: I'm sick and tired of being helpless.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_05
text: You say Lady Veronica is upset?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_06
text: Lady Veronica is worried about Lady Elizabeth.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_07
text: I'm the strongest of all my friends.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_08
text: Not even you can break through my "Wall," Meliodas.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_10_10
text: Gilthunder and I are actually cousins.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_11_02
text: Elizabeth reminds me of her back then.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_11_04
text: I could really go for some ale today.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_11_06
text: The world is as small as it is big!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_11_07
text: I'm surprised to see you running a tavern.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_11_08
text: Does your tavern offer a friends and family discount?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_11_10
text: I've grown quite old, wouldn't you agree?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_01
text: How about recruiting me as an associate?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_02
text: Instrument? The maraca is no instrument. It's the ultimate weapon.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_03
text: Tsk, that Howzer. He thinks he's all that.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_04
text: Gravity is the most powerful force in the world.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_05
text: There's nothing like having a drink after a hard day's work.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_06
text: Ever thought about making jerky out of that pig?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_07
text: I don't get why people keep calling me a roly-poly.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_08
text: Boom boom pow, chick chicky boom!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_09
text: Let's be honest. My skills don't compare to the likes of Jericho or Guila.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_12_10
text: I'm telling you, maracas are all the rage in Liones.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_01
text: I must say I was surprised by the unexpected encounter.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_02
text: I'm so happy I got to meet [The Seven Deadly Sins].â™¡

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_03
text: The mask? It can get in the way sometimes.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_04
text: All [Roars of Dawn] get-togethers will be held at the Boar Hat tavern from now on!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_05
text: Men without tact tend to be unpopular.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_07
text: [Roars of Dawn] is a pretty cool name, right?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_08
text: We are the [Roars of Dawn], the Knights of His Royal Majesty of Liones.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_09
text: Are [The Seven Deadly Sins] really that powerful?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_13_10
text: What's the best way to manage your comrades?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_01
text: Don't treat me like a child.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_03
text: Hey, do you really own a tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_04
text: What do you think about my swordsmanship?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_05
text: There's no other Knighthood like the [Roars of Dawn].

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_06
text: Everyone thinks I'm Hugo's son when I'm with him.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_07
text: There's nothing more pathetic than being defeated in battle.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_08
text: What's your secret to stay looking so young?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_09
text: I'm bored. What's there to do?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_14_10
text: Is that talking piggy your emergency food ration?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_01
text: Hey, what do you think you're looking at?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_02
text: Don't underestimate me for being a woman if you know what's good for you.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_03
text: Why does everyone fight so ruthlessly?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_04
text: I wish our fight went on a little longer.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_05
text: The teamwork of [Roars of Dawn] is perfect.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_06
text: Don't you think I'm the most beautiful of all Holy Knights?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_07
text: Hey, is it true that your cooking is terrible?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_08
text: I can't wait for my next mission.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_09
text: What's the vibe at your tavern like?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_15_10
text: Once my magic ensnares you, you're done for.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_01
text: Who's the strongest out of all of you?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_03
text: Everyone assumes Simon and I are father and son when they see us together.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_04
text: To be honest, I admire you.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_05
text: I only think about the next battle.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_06
text: The [Roars of Dawn] are the greatest Knights in the kingdom.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_07
text: Why do you run a tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_09
text: Of all of us, who looks the strongest?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_16_10
text: Aren't you curious how our order of Knights was assembled?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_01
text: An end to another productive day.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_02
text: I'm planning on paying your tavern a visit today.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_03
text: How is it you came to commit treason?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_04
text: I didn't think anyone could catch my arrows with their bare hands.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_05
text: What are you most confident about?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_06
text: What do you think of my bow skills?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_07
text: Ale is the best thing to help you unwind.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_08
text: What is your opinion of the [Roars of Dawn]?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_09
text: It's been a decade, and yet you all seem exactly the same.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_17_10
text: Do you have darts at your tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_01
text: I'm a three-time winning champion of the Fight Festival!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_02
text: This year's Fight Festival has been ruined!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_03
text: You gonna join the Fight Festival next year?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_04
text: Are you guys really [The Seven Deadly Sins]?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_05
text: I work on my fitness for the Fight Festival every year!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_06
text: How old do you think I look?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_07
text: So, we don't have a champion this year, right?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_08
text: Starting next year, I'm going to ban Holy Knights from entering the Fight Festival.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_09
text: You think I could become an Apprentice Holy Knight?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_18_10
text: If you're really the captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins]... How old are you?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_01
text: I've said some terrible things to the residents of Vanya...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_02
text: Is it true that anxious men aren't very popular?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_03
text: I'm now more powerful than any of [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_04
text: Was it truly Dreyfus who harmed my father?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_05
text: I've wronged Hawk in the Forest of White Dreams...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_06
text: Is there anyone in the world more beautiful than Margaret?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_07
text: Was Margaret here by any chance?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_08
text: Meliodas, I'd like to work with you!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_19_10
text: I used to get sucked into Griamore's and Howzer's pranks often as a child.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_01
text: Are King and Diane pretty close?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_02
text: A Fairy and a Giant? They don't go well together at all.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_03
text: All that Griamore does is follow Veronica around like a dog.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_04
text: Gil is way too serious and no fun at all.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_05
text: I'm the only one without a significant other...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_06
text: I can harness the power of the wind.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_07
text: I want to form my own order of Knights. Any good ideas for a name?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_09
text: I can't believe I've been tricked by Dreyfus and Hendrickson all this time!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_20_10
text: I wasn't able to protect Diane...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_02
text: What is the Human race like?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_03
text: Which appearance suits me the most?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_05
text: I wonder if Harlequin and I are still friends?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_06
text: I wonder if that Giant means more to Harlequin than I do?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_07
text: I don't like that Giant girl.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_08
text: Do you know how it feels to see your loved ones destroyed right before your eyes?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_09
text: Put my drinks on Harlequin's tab.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_21_10
text: I wanted to give Harlequin a helmet as a gift.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_01
text: I can't believe Jericho drank Demon blood... Why would she do that?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_02
text: Why does Jericho chase after Ban so hard?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_03
text: Why do you think Jericho is avoiding me?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_04
text: Jericho is lacking in too many ways to be a Holy Knight.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_05
text: What kind of brother am I to Jericho?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_06
text: I can use the power of ice.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_08
text: Jericho has moments when she can be quite adorable.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_09
text: I think Jericho has a crush on someone. Do you know who it is?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_22_10
text: I've never seen a talking pig before.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_01
text: Between me and Margaret, who do you think looks better with Gil?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_03
text: My feelings for Gil... what would you call them?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_05
text: After three painstaking years of experimentation, my Elixir of Love is finally complete!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_06
text: That woman Merlin is the devil!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_07
text: I just wanted to stay by Gil's side!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_08
text: I'm going to surpass my master as a mage one day!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_09
text: What does Margaret have that I don't?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_23_10
text: I want to work here too.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_01
text: What would happen if I drank your blood?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_02
text: Did I really make the wrong choice?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_03
text: Everything I did, I did for Liones.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_04
text: You're the same now as you were back then.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_06
text: What are your thoughts on brewing ale with Demon blood?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_07
text: The person I feel the most sorry towards is...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_08
text: Meliodas, are you truly a Demon?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_24_10
text: I'd like to have a tavern of my own when I retire.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_02
text: I wonder what kind of father I was to Griamore?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_03
text: Do you think... I could ever be forgiven?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_04
text: Who do you should be the next Grandmaster of the Holy Knights?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_05
text: Who do you think is stronger, me or Hendrickson?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_06
text: What will become of Griamore now?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_07
text: What kind of sentence will I receive?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_08
text: I'm worried that Griamore's too emotional when it comes to Veronica.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_09
text: I'd be fine with never running into Gowther ever again.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_25_10
text: I wish I could beg for Zaratras's forgiveness...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_01
text: Is Elizabeth doing well at her job?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_02
text: Is there anything I can help with?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_03
text: Would you please pour me a drink?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_04
text: I think Vivian loves Gil more than I do.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_05
text: What should we do about Vivian?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_06
text: Elizabeth and I are much alike, wouldn't you agree?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_08
text: I don't know if I've done enough as a Princess..

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_09
text: Can I come visit every once in awhile?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_26_10
text: I wonder what will happen to the Kingdom of Liones...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_01
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins]! Will you once again bear arms for Liones?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_02
text: What on earth happened between you and Elizabeth?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_04
text: You will not lay a finger on my daughter!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_05
text: I thank you, Meliodas of [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_06
text: I will grant you anything you wish. What is it you desire?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_07
text: To whom should I pass down the throne?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_08
text: I heard that Elizabeth waits tables at this tavern...

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_09
text: How is my Elizabeth doing lately?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_27_10
text: All of this is due to my shortcomings.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_01
text: Will you reconsider becoming the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights of Camelot?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_02
text: How can I learn to use magical abilities?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_03
text: A moving tavern... It's truly amazing.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_04
text: I heard many things of your cooking, Sir Meliodas.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_05
text: What kind of person was Merlin of [The Seven Deadly Sins]?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_06
text: What are the qualities of a great king?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_07
text: I envy your camaraderie with your allies.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_08
text: Please tell me a tale from one of your adventures!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_28_09
text: Will I live up to Merlin's expectations?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_01
text: What do you think proves your worth?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_02
text: Do you think I can surpass my master?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_03
text: Without a doubt, your cooking is the closest thing to the apocalypse.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_04
text: There are so many types of drinks. How about a recommendation?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_05
text: Would you like to join me in carrying out my plans?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_06
text: How about allying yourself with me instead of Merlin?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_07
text: I know I give off a gloomy vibe.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_08
text: Tell me, how did you become so powerful?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_29_09
text: You're plotting to eventually interfere with my plans, aren't you?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_01
text: I want to give Ban a gift. What should I give him?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_03
text: Falling in love is a fascinating thing.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_04
text: Why are humans always so greedy?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_05
text: Is there a nice place I can go with Ban?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_06
text: Do you think Ban will ever fall in love with someone else?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_07
text: Is it normal to feel anxious when I'm away from him for a long time?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_08
text: Why are humans always so greedy?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_30_10
text: Is it fun going on adventures?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_01
text: You don't serve wine in this tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_02
text: Hmm... I'm looking for a decent place for a nap.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_03
text: Wanna compete to see who can jump higher?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_04
text: I want you to participate in a hunt.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_05
text: I've dreamed of defeating you for a very long time.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_06
text: You better not lie in my presence.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_08
text: You haven't seen my true power yet.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_09
text: I have many things in store for you.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_31_10
text: Normal souls just don't fill me up.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_01
text: What do you believe? Where does your faith lie?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_03
text: I heard you sell ale? Give me some.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_04
text: Don't you have someone you'd like to bring back to life?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_05
text: I want to collect more Human souls!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_06
text: 3,000 years, and this place is still the same.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_07
text: Me, I prefer talking things out.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_08
text: Don't you want to know how it feels to be sealed away?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_09
text: There are a lot of strong and clear souls here.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_32_10
text: Not long until the Demon King arrives!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_33_01
text: I have a friend only I can see.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_33_03
text: Have you thought of growing out a mustache?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_33_04
text: I apologize for the trouble at the medal bestowment ceremony.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_33_05
text: There are a lot of things keeping me busy lately.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_33_06
text: What are your thoughts on [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky]?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_33_07
text: What do you think is your most appealing quality?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_33_10
text: We will defend Liones no matter what.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_01
text: We, [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky], will defend Liones!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_02
text: You caught me off-guard. I'll make sure to win next time.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_03
text: Ah, I'm so bored. So boring.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_04
text: Have you ever lost someone dear to you?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_05
text: Hmph. [The Seven Deadly Sins] weren't that special.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_06
text: I'll make sure to take out all the demon scoundrels!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_07
text: I want the tavern's most delicious dish, please.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_08
text: Strength is everything to a man!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_09
text: Who do you think is the coolest member of [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky]?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_34_10
text: I want to become a [Diamond] Holy Knight already!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_01
text: Have you been sealed away before?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_02
text: Do you want to go destroy the world I'm from?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_03
text: What's the best thing to do when you don't want to do what you're supposed to?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_04
text: Is there an exclusive method to growing taller in this world?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_05
text: I want to eat something spicy! Really spicy!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_06
text: Are you interested in my new invention?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_07
text: I found out a really fun truth! Wanna hear?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_08
text: I want to be introduced to a researcher who knows this world in detail!

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_09
text: Is it weird not to have any memories of your parents?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_35_10
text: Do you believe in things you can't see?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_37_04
text: If Waillo comes looking for me, tell him you never saw me.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_37_05
text: What should I do about the little brat?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_37_06
text: I'm a pretty powerful Holy Knight, you know.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_37_07
text: [The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] is strong.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_37_08
text: Why would people do something like get married?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_37_09
text: I'm tired of boys who are immature.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_37_10
text: Love can become a very powerful weapon.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_02
text: Is there a place to practice with my bow?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_03
text: What can I do to be more popular?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_04
text: Do women not like young guys?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_05
text: I want to be a better Holy Knight.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_06
text: Think there's a way to upgrade my bow?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_07
text: Sometimes, I can't understand my feelings.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_09
text: I wonder what it feels like to be in love.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_38_10
text: I wonder what it feels like to lose someone who'd been with you for a long time.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_03
text: Don't say it like that. That's so irritating.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_04
text: She really has weird taste. I don't get her.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_05
text: So don't let her. She's still a princess!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_07
text: In that case, pour me a glass.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_08
text: You think I'm gonna fall for that?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_33
text: What do you mean, "again?" Ugh, you're so irritating.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_34
text: Use your eyes, take a look around.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_36
text: I'm telling you: I don't care.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_37
text: That's your problem to figure out, not mine.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_39
text: What, you think you know her better than anybody?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_40
text: I'm sure Griamore will come with me... right?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_61
text: Could you please bring me something that's actually edible?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_63
text: I'll deal with him my own way.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_64
text: Don't you know anything about keeping a place clean?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_65
text: I could have you arrested for contempt of the royal family.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_66
text: Are you sure it was Griamore?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_01_70
text: I need to protect my two sisters.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_02
text: That wanted poster should be updated!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_03
text: We're going to become the best knighthood order in Liones someday!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_05
text: I'm confident that I can put in the work!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_06
text: What? So where do members get their meal?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_09
text: You think eating scraps is what's giving him that power?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_10
text: W- what do you mean by repayment for my life...?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_32
text: Seriously... Just seeing you now is enough to make be tremble.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_35
text: It's been my dream for a long time.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_36
text: No... I didn't mean I wanted to join...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_37
text: Th- there's a rule like that?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_39
text: N- no! I'm not saying I want to eat him...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_40
text: That time on the cliff... Actually, forget it.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_61
text: I think most people would think so...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_62
text: Who would've thought you were the captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins]...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_63
text: You have a point... But the people in the order are all good people!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_64
text: N- no, I won't tell anyone!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_66
text: No one would sign up to do that!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_67
text: Th- that hurts my feelings, but you're right.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_68
text: I'm the best dishwasher there is!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_69
text: That's not something I'd like to experience.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_02_70
text: W- well, I'm definitely going to pay it back someday.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_01
text: Excellent, it'll be coming with me then.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_02
text: I don't have any money, so I'll be eating for free today.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_04
text: Confirmed! I will be a Grandmaster of the Holy Knights by next year!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_06
text: Only I get to make the confirmations!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_07
text: Are you trying to get me drunk?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_09
text: I'm a very busy man, but I might consider it if you beg.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_10
text: I confirm myself as the tavern chef!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_33
text: In that case, bring me a mug.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_35
text: I'll just be having the ale, thanks.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_36
text: Too bad. You just lost it all.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_37
text: Confirmed, I'll start considering how to do that now.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_38
text: This looks delicious. Why aren't you guys eating?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_39
text: Confirmed! And I appoint myself as the captain!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_40
text: I'll handle whatever ingredients I want!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_61
text: It's not so I can eat him!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_62
text: Confirmed! I'll be retreating for now!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_63
text: Then I'll throw out all your customers!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_64
text: Don't mock my confirmations! Confirmed, you are a traitor!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_66
text: Confirmed... I'll be heading back now...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_68
text: I've never heard of such a Knighthood. Are they under the direct order of His Majesty?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_03_70
text: Uh, no... No need for that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_01
text: How scary. Let's just say that was expected.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_02
text: Then what is her weakness, I wonder?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_06
text: I guess we both didn't know much about each other.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_31
text: That's what I'm planning to do.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_32
text: Heehee... Okay, now I'm frightened. I'll leave her alone.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_33
text: Don't even think about trying to fool me!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_36
text: I'm Holy Knight Golgius... You don't remember me, do you.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_37
text: My magic is not for parlor tricks.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_38
text: It's not an excuse, its an ideology.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_39
text: I know for certain it's not darkness.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_64
text: My ability is not a parlor trick!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_65
text: Aw, you could pretend to care a little.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_67
text: But I'm not invisible right now.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_04_69
text: I don't think I have the answer either.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_01
text: Hmm, I'm not so sure that I do!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_02
text: What the hell do you know?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_04
text: The finest of beef sirloin steak will do.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_05
text: You're not my type, not one bit.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_08
text: Oh my, I would have never expected that from you.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_10
text: The pain is the best part.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_32
text: And trust them not to screw up?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_33
text: Don't talk about this like it's a joke!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_34
text: Aw. But of course I am.â™¡

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_35
text: I'm not saying you're cool at all!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_36
text: Are you telling me to leave?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_37
text: Making women swoon is a different story.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_38
text: Can't you see how cute they are?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_39
text: I barely have enough time to spend with my insects.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_40
text: It's not the easiest thing to master.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_61
text: You know the more you're told not to do something, the more you want to do it!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_63
text: You want to know how honest I am?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_64
text: Does that mean the food's so good there's never any leftover?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_65
text: Women can sense when it's all for show!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_66
text: Oh, what was that all about...?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_68
text: Pretend all you want, but I know that you want to see.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_05_70
text: Aw, would you like one as a gift?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_01
text: I see my hypnosis has failed.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_02
text: But why else would I play it?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_03
text: Is everyone here really working for free?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_04
text: You need some quality sound equipment.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_06
text: So you admit you're a brat?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_08
text: You're someone in dire need of retribution.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_09
text: You're the very definition of danger!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_31
text: Anyone who's been tricked once can be tricked again.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_32
text: You're just going to have to deal with it and listen.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_33
text: How much would someone get for a performance with bells?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_34
text: Whether they like it or not is up to me.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_35
text: And that's why you're just a little twerp.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_37
text: Wait! I'm still drinking my ale!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_38
text: I am a Holy Knight! I am the law!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_39
text: No, the real danger is you.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_61
text: You insolent fool! My name is Ruin!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_65
text: I can see to it that you never wake from that beautiful illusion.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_67
text: That's right! Steel has nothing on me!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_68
text: I'm the one who exacts retribution!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_06_70
text: And where is this "somewhere" supposed to be?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_01
text: Well, if you say so. One mug, please.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_02
text: It's not a skill I use on just anyone.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_04
text: With such a soft-hearted tavern master, this place is screwed.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_05
text: There's never a bad time for a drink.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_06
text: Haha, you'll come to enjoy the pain.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_09
text: I'd rather not take your help.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_31
text: Shut up. I bathe every day.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_32
text: Want to experience it for yourself?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_36
text: I guarantee that you'll like mine better.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_38
text: Nothing at all. Another ale, please.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_40
text: I guess there are some exceptions.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_62
text: It's a little different from beating the truth out of someone.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_63
text: Correct. Now bring me some ale.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_67
text: Memories can be distorted. Especially by torture.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_68
text: Well, it's also partially for fun.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_07_69
text: It was the best job I ever had.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_01
text: So you have heard of it.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_04
text: When that day comes, I swear...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_05
text: There's something I must do there.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_06
text: My father would never do that!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_10
text: No, but I must. For Zeal.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_32
text: Even if things aren't okay, I have to be.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_35
text: Hearing you say that makes me want to stay longer.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_38
text: Zeal... can know nothing of this.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_39
text: You don't believe in that slanderous gossip like everyone else, do you?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_63
text: Are you saying my attacks weren't even worth remembering?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_65
text: I hope to see you at the capital again soon.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_66
text: So you don't remember my father at all...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_08_68
text: He's my one and only brother.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_01
text: No. This is nowhere near enough.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_02
text: Now I need to get even stronger.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_03
text: Er, I'll try a dish then. Chef's choice.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_04
text: Th- that's not what I was doing!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_05
text: Then maybe I'll quit being a Holy Knight... Not!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_06
text: Wh- who said anything about liking anyone?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_07
text: Where did she go off to now.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_08
text: What are you on about? I just saw one earlier.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_09
text: I really don't like him, I'm telling you!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_10
text: You think ale will solve all my problems?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_31
text: Everyone has their reasons for doing something.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_32
text: I- I'm not doing this for your approval.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_34
text: I'm gonna leave if you keep spouting this nonsense!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_38
text: B- Ban is going to exterminate bugs for me?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_39
text: W- wait. There's no need for that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_40
text: I'm going to get my revenge someday.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_62
text: That's a really rude way to respond.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_67
text: I- I'm just here to meet Guila!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_68
text: I'm not scared of them. I just hate them.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_69
text: It's only because I like the ale! Don't get the wrong idea!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_09_70
text: Right? So you see what I mean?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_01
text: I'd do anything if Lady Veronica asked it of me.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_05
text: Now I'm worried something may have happened.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_08
text: I've trained every day so I could protect Lady Veronica.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_09
text: Because Veronica entrusted Elizabeth's well-being to me.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_10
text: A lot of people don't know that...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_31
text: I serve Lady Veronica, and the royal family of Liones by doing so!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_32
text: So that's how you see me too...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_35
text: I must have screwed something up again.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_36
text: Don't insult Lady Veronica like that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_38
text: Veronica doesn't like me making bets.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_39
text: Veronica won't be happy about that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_40
text: Oh. I was hoping for a bigger reaction than that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_61
text: It might not matter to you, but the oath I swore is true.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_62
text: I'd rather you just call me a pathetic oaf.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_64
text: You have no idea how helpless I actually am...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_65
text: Please don't kid around like that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_66
text: O- obviously, it's my duty as her Guardian Knight to worry...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_67
text: There's really no need for that...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_68
text: Would you like to test it?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_10_70
text: You can tell we're related if you look close enough.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_01
text: I can remember it all like it was yesterday.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_02
text: Of course I do. She was so kind and sweet.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_04
text: Okay. But there are a lot of things I'd like to forget.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_06
text: We have a lot to talk about, don't we?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_07
text: I may be old, but my taste buds still work just fine, Meliodas.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_08
text: Hahaha, I'm joking. Of course I'll pay.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_09
text: You'll tell me someday. Won't you, Meliodas?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_10
text: Somehow you've managed to stay untouched by time. Lucky, haha.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_31
text: No need to work up a sweat trying to remember.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_34
text: Well, I won't say no. Haha.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_36
text: Perhaps it was fate, not coincidence.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_37
text: Indeed. It's a great little tavern.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_39
text: That... I know no words will ever be enough to comfort you.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_40
text: That's because I always wore my helmet.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_61
text: Why don't we talk about it over some ale.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_62
text: Don't pretend like you don't know.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_63
text: You'll succeed in protecting the things dear to you this time.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_65
text: I'm sure it was more than just clean living.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_11_70
text: Hahaha, yes. My joints may be aching but I've still got a youthful heart.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_01
text: I expect nothing but the highest level of compensation.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_02
text: One blow will wreck you beyond recognition.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_03
text: I guess that makes the two of you quite the pair!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_04
text: I don't think that's because of gravity...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_05
text: True, any time is a good time for a drink.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_07
text: How could they say such a thing about my magnificent armor!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_08
text: What, you think I'm a clown?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_09
text: Do you have no sense of compassion?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_31
text: You're not even going to pretend to consider it?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_32
text: It's a weapon that makes a sound.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_33
text: It's not stuck up when you have the skills to back it.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_34
text: How dare you! How about I give you a taste of my gravity?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_35
text: I guess I can have just one more...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_36
text: I guess I can't argue with that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_37
text: But I do that multiple times a day.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_38
text: This one alone was hard enough to get down...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_39
text: Sure, but I'm talking about combat skills, not rhythm.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_40
text: Yeah! That's not a bad way to put it.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_61
text: Did you just compare me to the pig?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_62
text: What, do I look like a musician to you?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_63
text: Don't treat me like I'm on the same level as Howzer.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_64
text: Uh, I don't think there's any need for that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_65
text: Of course I did! I worked really hard today!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_67
text: No way, this is my armor and I'm sticking to it.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_68
text: I'm practicing my maraca battle moves.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_69
text: That's right. I'm a class apart from the New Generation.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_12_70
text: I can show you where to get a good deal!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_03
text: No way. This mask is part of my soul.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_04
text: We're Knights of His Royal Majesty of Liones. What do you take us for?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_08
text: We simply act under the king's orders. We're not mercenaries.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_09
text: Oh, I like the sound of that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_10
text: That's a pretty great answer, for a captain.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_34
text: Of course we do. Once a month.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_36
text: Absolutely, I've never seen a cuter pig!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_37
text: It's got a ton of meaning behind it, that's why.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_40
text: Yet somehow you have no trouble banding everyone together.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_61
text: Of course we did. Our Knighthood is directly affiliated with the king of Liones.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_63
text: No matter how uncomfortable it is, I never take it off while I'm on duty.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_64
text: Ooh, I like the sound of that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_65
text: Because I actually do quite well for myself.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_66
text: Not all babies have to be small, you know.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_67
text: Each and every letter of it is utterly gorgeous!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_68
text: Anything, if it's for the king.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_13_70
text: Sometimes I can't believe you're a captain.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_02
text: Uh... Wanna play a game or something?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_03
text: I guess running a tavern is the perfect Holy Knight retirement plan.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_05
text: Hmph. Aren't you guys a bunch of fugitive has-beens?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_06
text: Who are you calling tiny? I'm average.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_07
text: You can tell yourself that, sure.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_08
text: Hmm, I'll pass. I'm not that curious.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_09
text: I'm not old enough to drink.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_10
text: Oh yeah? That's quite a useful piggy you got there.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_31
text: That's a pretty harsh thing to say.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_32
text: Ugh, you sound just like the captain.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_33
text: Well yeah. You look too much like a kid.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_35
text: That's not the point. We really are the best, I'm telling you.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_37
text: Excuse me, but I like to think of it as confidence.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_38
text: Still, a whole decade has passed.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_39
text: You don't look busy to me.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_61
text: I said I'm not a child!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_62
text: Maybe I should open a tavern myself?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_63
text: You trying to drum up some business?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_64
text: Of course I am. You can't win in a fight if you don't believe in yourself.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_66
text: We're just always together because of work.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_67
text: A battle you can't win is meaningless.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_14_68
text: But why is it that you don't age!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_04
text: But we never had a clear winner.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_08
text: I just take the missions that are the hardest.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_10
text: Why would I work in this shabby tavern?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_32
text: You'll learn to regret underestimating me.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_33
text: Hey, this applies to you guys too.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_34
text: We'll finally be able to settle this.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_35
text: Jealousy isn't a good look on anyone.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_36
text: Take a good look. It's undeniable.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_38
text: R&R is good, but I can't wait to fight again.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_39
text: So you're aware but you don't feel like changing anything, huh?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_40
text: I'm flattered to hear you say that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_61
text: I've heard that a million times now.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_63
text: Well... You do have a point.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_64
text: My, aren't you the confident one.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_65
text: I'll take that as a compliment.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_15_70
text: Tie down a pig? No thanks.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_03
text: Even so, mistaking us for father and son is a bit much.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_05
text: The moment you become complacent is the moment you get weak.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_06
text: You can't compare to us, though.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_07
text: I didn't realize it was a practical decision.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_08
text: Isn't it like that for [The Seven Deadly Sins]?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_09
text: That's nice of you to say.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_31
text: That's exactly what I just asked.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_34
text: To hear someone like you say you're honored...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_35
text: For a Holy Knight, that goes without saying.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_36
text: I admit, it does feel good.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_37
text: I don't think you're doing a very good job.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_38
text: The consequences for insubordination are immediate.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_40
text: I guess you could assume that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_61
text: And how strong is that Sin?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_64
text: I didn't it say it to get something out of you, but thanks.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_66
text: Indeed. I'd lay my life down to protect His Majesty.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_68
text: I've never been insubordinate... But I think he might.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_16_69
text: Who, Jillian? She's very strong, it's true.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_01
text: Alright then. A mug of ale, please!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_02
text: I'd like to fill up without risking my life.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_04
text: I would expect nothing less from a member of [The Seven Deadly Sins].

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_05
text: I'll have to try your cooking sometime.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_07
text: In the spirit of that, one mug of ale, please!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_08
text: I admit, it feels good to be complimented.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_09
text: True, Fairies and Giants do have longer lifespans than Humans.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_10
text: It's a necessity for taverns these days.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_32
text: That's too bad. Maybe next time.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_33
text: It's not polite to answer a question with a question.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_34
text: I put everything I had into that attack, yet it was blocked...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_35
text: Haha, I have to agree with you there.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_36
text: Is that right? I guess I need more practice.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_37
text: All the more reason for me to visit your tavern soon.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_40
text: Can you even call it a tavern if it doesn't have darts?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_61
text: Each day lived is productive in itself.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_62
text: My motto is waste not, want not.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_64
text: You didn't look that surprised to me.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_66
text: That's because my arrows can't be seen with the naked eye.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_69
text: Perhaps I've only seen everyone from a distance.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_17_70
text: Haha, then I would never have to pay for a drink.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_01
text: You know, yet this is how you treat me?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_02
text: This happened because of you, [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_03
text: I guess that means it's time for me to retire.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_04
text: There's no way a runt like you is a member of [The Seven Deadly Sins]!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_05
text: Is there something wrong with the way I look?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_06
text: Ahem. True, I've taken great care of my looks.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_07
text: Then that means I'm still the titleholder!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_08
text: It's unfair for a Holy Knight to join the Fight Festival in the first place!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_09
text: Alright, then I'm gonna train, train, and train some more!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_31
text: You know now, so you better treat me with some respect!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_32
text: You don't sound the least bit sincere.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_33
text: Then I'll be crowned champion next year for sure!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_35
text: A real man's body has heft!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_36
text: That's weird. I'm pretty sure I look like a teenager.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_37
text: You can't say that! Nobody won! I don't accept it!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_38
text: Right? I don't know why we didn't make this rule sooner...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_39
text: Y- you! Did you really have to say it like that?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_40
text: Then how old were you when you became a member of [The Seven Deadly Sins]?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_61
text: I'm not telling you how to act around me, but...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_62
text: Oh, that's not a bad idea.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_63
text: I think you should definitely sit it out.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_64
text: I- I'll never tell a soul, I swear!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_65
text: I knew all that hard work would be worth it!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_66
text: The hell I do! No way I look that old!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_69
text: Then I'm gonna apply when they recruit for new Holy Knights next year!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_18_70
text: O- okay. I shouldn't have asked...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_01
text: Yes, I'm planning on going right now.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_02
text: I guess I'm not very popular with Giants...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_03
text: I just like saying it, haha.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_04
text: Whoever it was, I will never forgive them.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_06
text: I think that's just your preference.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_07
text: She's not at the castle... Where else could she be?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_08
text: You're the captain of [The Seven Deadly Sins], of course you are!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_09
text: You know I'm taller than you, right...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_31
text: That was just a figure of speech.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_32
text: I guess I'll have to work on my composure then.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_33
text: It's true. I've got a long way to go.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_34
text: How could he betray his own brother...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_35
text: Do you think Hawk will accept?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_37
text: I'm talking about Margaret, not Elizabeth.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_38
text: E- even if I say I'll work for free?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_40
text: D- did I really do that?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_61
text: I know. I almost drank maggot ale because of him.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_65
text: I'd better give him a sincere apology.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_67
text: I get anxious when I haven't seen here...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_69
text: I accept! I'll gladly face you in a duel!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_19_70
text: Ten years is enough time for many things to change.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_01
text: Hm, I wonder how he's so close to her.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_03
text: W- when have I ever done that?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_04
text: My lack of seriousness is part of my appeal!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_05
text: That doesn't cheer me up at all...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_06
text: I'm not looking to start a fight!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_07
text: Ahem, doesn't that sound a little too self-centered?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_09
text: If it's true, then yes... I am dumb.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_10
text: Augh, I'm so upset. To think that my strength wasn't enough...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_32
text: It would still be a million times better than a Fairy!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_33
text: He's not acting that way because he's her bodyguard. He's... Ugh, never mind.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_35
text: Don't you think I would if I could?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_40
text: What if I really did disappoint Diane? What am I gonna do?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_62
text: I knew it! You agree with me, right?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_65
text: I wasn't even thinking about her.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_66
text: It doesn't blow cold, so not really...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_67
text: Ooh, I like how that sounds.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_69
text: I swear on my honor as a Holy Knight, it's not true!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_20_70
text: That's what I hate most about the situation!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_01
text: Why, so you can do what?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_02
text: Yeah, they tend to repeat the same mistakes.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_03
text: That is my original form, after all.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_05
text: You sure? Even after what I did?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_08
text: You've been through it too, I take it.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_31
text: What, so you can trample me to death?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_32
text: I don't agree with that at all.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_33
text: You're a fan of cute looks, I gather?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_34
text: It's annoying because I'm his friend.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_36
text: I reject such an ambiguous answer.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_37
text: I want him to feel sad.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_61
text: My transformation will be like looking into a mirror!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_62
text: I guess Humans are just born evil.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_63
text: I feel like this is my actual form now.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_64
text: He'll pay the price for keeping me waiting.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_65
text: To be honest, I don't really want to ask.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_21_68
text: It was incredibly painful. Like my heart was being torn out.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_01
text: Could it be that I undermined her too much...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_02
text: Do you think this could be Jericho's new career path?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_03
text: I just want the best for her, that's all...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_05
text: She was always envious of my powers.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_07
text: You mean I shouldn't do anything...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_08
text: Haha, you don't believe me I see.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_09
text: He's not a married man, is he?!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_31
text: As if being a Holy Knight is such a big deal...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_33
text: Do you really think she's sorry?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_35
text: I knew it. She really hates me, doesn't she?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_36
text: Does that mean you'll cut ties come winter...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_37
text: A bouquet of flowers... Or is that not the right idea?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_39
text: She's not the type to tell just because I asked.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_40
text: It's not that common, is it?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_61
text: I- is it really that good?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_62
text: But why would she do something so reckless...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_63
text: I mean it's true I'm planning on scolding her, but...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_64
text: I just want to keep her from doing something she regrets.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_66
text: It's only cold when I use my magic!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_22_67
text: What if she turns me down?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_01
text: Haha, you've got quite the eye!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_02
text: Then I'll turn Margaret into a monster!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_05
text: You bet! Now all I have to do is get Gil to take this, and...!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_06
text: My only flaw is that I fight to keep my love!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_08
text: Hmph, I don't need your support!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_09
text: All she has is her looks!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_10
text: That goes without saying! Why else would I work in a shabby hole like this?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_32
text: That shrew is only pretending to be kind!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_33
text: How dare you call it an obsession? My interest is completely innocent!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_34
text: Th- thats...! It's not just because of his looks!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_40
text: I-I want to be a hostess too!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_61
text: I'd hate to add another rival!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_62
text: Fate? I don't believe in that crap!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_63
text: Hmph, I don't care what you think!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_65
text: I don't care as long as I can have Gil to myself!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_66
text: You fool! She's tricked you all!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_67
text: You get it? Then bring me Gil!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_23_70
text: But magic is useful for so many things!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_02
text: I never expected you to approve.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_03
text: An excuse... I understand why you might think that.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_04
text: Haha, I've aged over the years.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_05
text: Regret? What use is that? It's too late to change anything.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_06
text: It'll sell very well with the New Generation of Holy Knights.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_07
text: I owe Dreyfus an insurmountable debt.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_08
text: You've said all I need to know.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_09
text: Hah, it's hard to identify a Druid from just looking.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_10
text: I have my sights set on running a tavern that's a little more upscale...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_34
text: What a difference the corpses of Demons can make.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_35
text: He got in the way of my plans.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_36
text: Then I'll start manufacturing and delivering the goods.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_37
text: I betrayed His Royal Majesty's trust.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_38
text: To be frank, I always sort of knew.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_40
text: I'll show you the quality of my business acumen.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_62
text: I suppose we'll find out soon enough.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_64
text: I can't tell from just looking at you.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_65
text: Many people have died by my hand. I am beyond a murderer.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_67
text: I'm sorry for framing you for treason.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_68
text: Is there a reason for your deception?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_69
text: I guess it's really not that important.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_24_70
text: I forgot exactly how much Grandmasters of the Holy Knights get as pension.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_02
text: I wanted to be the best father I could be...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_03
text: I know it's shameless... but yes.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_04
text: Gilthunder is a straightforward and honest lad.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_05
text: I'm way ahead of him when it comes to my battle record...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_06
text: I never wanted this to happen...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_08
text: You think so? As a father, I tend to worry.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_09
text: He showed me a terrible nightmare...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_10
text: It's too late... But I want to make amends before it gets any later.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_31
text: My actions have put my boy at risk...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_32
text: He would've been better off forgetting I existed...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_33
text: I figured. There's no forgiving the things I've done...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_34
text: I know he's my son, but I have no doubt he can perform his duties as Grandmaster of the Holy Knights.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_35
text: So you think so too, Meliodas?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_61
text: Poor Griamore has suffered so much because I was a terrible father...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_63
text: Even asking for forgiveness feels unforgivable at this point.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_64
text: He can get worked up at times, but it's true that he's highly skilled.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_65
text: I admit, there were many times the score wasn't able to be settled.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_68
text: I know for a fact he'd rather die than be apart from Princess Veronica.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_25_69
text: Hmm, I can't say I feel the same.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_02
text: Oh my, you think I can do the job?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_03
text: Yes, please. The stronger the better.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_06
text: Haha, I guess that's why we're sisters.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_07
text: Because he looks up to you, Sir Meliodas.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_08
text: I just quietly withstood what I could.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_10
text: My worries about this keep me up most nights...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_31
text: She's a smart kid. I knew she'd be okay.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_32
text: I have no talent in cooking...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_33
text: Of course I can. I can hold my liquor.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_34
text: She's going about it totally wrong.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_35
text: But the underground prison is such an awful place...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_36
text: It might surprise you to know that our personalities are like night and day.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_37
text: I know that... But I still can't help worrying.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_39
text: I wouldn't dream of eating for free.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_61
text: She can be quite clumsy at times.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_63
text: Think I could get it on credit?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_64
text: I'm going to love Gil even harder.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_65
text: I don't know if she'll stay away just because she's in exile...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_66
text: Blood doesn't matter. We're family either way.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_67
text: Haha, do what you will, Sir Meliodas.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_68
text: I will do everything in my power as a princess.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_69
text: I'll make sure to stop by when it's slow.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_26_70
text: Haha, thank you for your words of comfort.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_01
text: I hope you decide in our favor.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_03
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] will come to play an even bigger role than ever before.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_04
text: I've got my eye on you!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_05
text: As both a king and as a father, I am deeply grateful.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_06
text: This kingdom? Go ahead and take it from me, haha.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_07
text: Yes. Elizabeth has a firm tenacity towards her purpose.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_08
text: After the sheltered upbringing I've given her, that's admirable.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_09
text: I see. As long as she's happy.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_10
text: So you see it that way too?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_32
text: You dare try to fool me?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_33
text: I will mobilize all of my forces in order to recapture you first!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_35
text: You've gotten greedier since I last saw you.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_37
text: So you think it would be best to leave it to my eldest?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_38
text: Ahem... So how much for the dishes?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_39
text: Don't you dare look at her that way!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_40
text: Your words bring me some small comfort.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_61
text: I wish I could convince you otherwise, but perhaps that's my hubris...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_63
text: Is that truly how you feel?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_64
text: Insolence! I will not forgive you!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_65
text: What, is there something you want?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_67
text: ...What do you have to do with this?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_68
text: A hostess? What does she do?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_27_70
text: There's no way I couldn't be aware...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_01
text: R- really?! I am excited to hear that!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_02
text: Of course. If I try hard, then maybe one day!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_03
text: I would love to see a place like this in Camelot.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_04
text: So you HAVE heard the rumors...

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_05
text: I see. I guess Merlin will always be Merlin.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_06
