text: Putting the citizens first... I see. That must be the most fundamental thing.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_08
text: I've already heard a few stories of you from Merlin.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_09
text: Okay! I will become a great king for Merlin.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_10
text: I believe in fate! After all, it brought us together, hahaha!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_31
text: Haha, don't worry, I can wait.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_32
text: Haha, I would like to know when that time will be.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_33
text: Everything about this tavern is great, including Sir Ban's amazing cooking.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_34
text: Haha, one can't be good at everything, I guess.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_35
text: That's true. I, too, think she is quite unknowable.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_36
text: I see. Those qualities cannot be predetermined, I guess.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_37
text: Hahaha, Merlin is more like a teacher than an ally.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_39
text: Then I must try harder. I do not want to disappoint her.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_40
text: I'm glad you see it as I do.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_61
text: I cannot. You are the only person fitting of the title.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_62
text: Merlin always tells me that as well. Thank you!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_63
text: Oh! You hold many secrets! Please tell me!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_64
text: No, thank you. I would rather not.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_65
text: I was hoping you'd talk about events from ten years ago.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_66
text: Maybe I, too, can be an honored king if I try my best.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_67
text: Then I'll train harder so I don't hold anyone back.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_68
text: But I would like to hear it directly from everyone here.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_69
text: I wasn't thinking about it too much. I only think about doing my best, haha.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_28_70
text: Of course! Heroes are not shackled by fate!

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_29_02
text: I will become stronger than her one day.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_29_03
text: That's not a bad idea, actually.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_29_04
text: That sounds good. Give me lots of it.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_29_05

text: You won't be able to take that back when it happens.

text: So you're saying we'll be enemies some day.

text: I'm not too keen on that suggestion.

text: There are so many places I want to visit.

name: DB_lobby_hendrickson_hello_01
text: I haven't seen you in ten years, but you haven't changed at all.

name: DB_lobby_hendrickson_talk_02
text: I'm here for some tasty Vanya Ale.

name: DB_lobby_hendrickson_talk_05
text: I hope this will be enough to express my gratitude.

name: DB_lobby_howzer_hello_01
text: By any chance, is Dia... N- never mind.

name: DB_lobby_howzer_talk_02
text: It finally feels like a capital now. Don't you think so?

name: DB_lobby_howzer_talk_04
text: I've never gotten a gift from a guy before. It's a little weird!

name: DB_lobby_hugo_talk_02
text: There's nothing going on right now.

name: DB_lobby_jericho_hello_01
text: I- I'm only here because I'm hungry!

name: DB_lobby_jericho_talk_01
text: I like the food, but I don't like the chef.

name: DB_lobby_jericho_talk_02
text: I- I heard Ban is here... Ahem!

name: DB_lobby_jericho_talk_04
text: I don't like this, but I'll take it for now.

name: DB_lobby_jericho_talk_05
text: This is purely reciprocal. Don't think it means anything.

name: DB_lobby_jillian_talk_01
text: Do you have something to say to me?

name: DB_lobby_jillian_talk_02
text: I'd like a proper duel against you sometime.

name: DB_lobby_jillian_talk_03
text: You want to give me a gift?

name: DB_lobby_jude_talk_01
text: What kind of food do you have?

name: DB_lobby_jude_talk_02
text: Is this the tavern Ban works at?

name: DB_lobby_jude_talk_05
text: I think we can call things even now.

name: DB_lobby_liliah_talk_01
text: A moving tavern? Maybe I should consider arranging a mobile hideout too.

name: DB_lobby_liliah_talk_02
text: I want to have a delicious, sweet dessert. Where should I go?

name: DB_lobby_liliah_talk_03
text: Hmm... I don't understand why you're doing that.

name: DB_lobby_liliah_talk_04
text: So you agree to help with my plan?

name: DB_lobby_margaret_talk_01
text: Do you have something to tell me?

name: DB_lobby_margaret_talk_05
text: I'd like to give you a small gift, not as a princess, but as Elizabeth's sister.

name: DB_lobby_marmas_hello_01
text: Don't you give out any freebies?

name: DB_lobby_marmas_talk_02
text: Boom boom pow! I'm gonna make some music as I drink this ale!

name: DB_lobby_marmas_talk_03
text: Oooh! Are you giving me a gift?

name: DB_lobby_marmas_talk_04
text: This is my dance of gratitude! Chick chicky boom!

name: DB_lobby_marmas_talk_05
text: This is my way of saying thanks! Enjoy it!

name: DB_lobby_merlin_hello_01
text: How are you feeling today, Captain?

name: DB_lobby_merlin_hello_02
text: I like this tavern quite a bit.

name: DB_lobby_merlin_hello_04
text: You look like you've got something to say.

name: DB_lobby_merlin_talk_02
text: I quite like what you've given me.

name: DB_lobby_merlin_talk_03
text: I'd rather not have you as my enemy, Captain.

name: DB_lobby_merlin_talk_04
text: I'm not sure if I've told you this before, but you're pretty trustworthy, Captain.

name: DB_lobby_merlin_talk_05
text: It's only proper that I express my gratitude with a gift of my own.

name: DB_lobby_merlin_talk_06
text: I really hate clothes that restrict me.

name: DB_lobby_ruin_hello_01
text: You better treat me well, I'm a customer.

name: DB_lobby_ruin_talk_01
text: The rumors were true, this ale's pretty good.

name: DB_lobby_ruin_talk_02
text: I've heard good things about the ale here. Are they true?

name: DB_lobby_ruin_talk_03
text: Why are you giving me this?

name: DB_lobby_ruin_talk_04
text: I won't take it if you have something nefarious in mind.

name: DB_lobby_ruin_talk_05
text: This is to say thanks, nothing more.

name: DB_lobby_simon_hello_01
text: I can't believe a little guy like you is an amazing hero...

name: DB_lobby_simon_talk_02
text: I suggest you don't approach me from behind.

name: DB_lobby_simon_talk_05
text: I don't have much to give, but here, take this.

name: DB_lobby_slader_talk_02
text: I like that Gowther a lot.

name: DB_lobby_slader_talk_03
text: Oh, are you giving me a gift? Wonderful!

name: DB_lobby_taizoo_hello_01
text: You might not know it, but I'm last year's Fight Festival champion!

name: DB_lobby_taizoo_talk_01
text: Why are so many ridiculously strong people participating this year?

name: DB_lobby_taizoo_talk_02
text: I wonder if it's time for me to retire...

name: DB_lobby_taizoo_talk_04
text: Oh, you didn't have to... Ahem!

name: DB_lobby_taizoo_talk_05
text: An honorable man always repays what he receives!

name: DB_lobby_twigo_hello_01
text: Confirmed! This is now my favorite tavern!

name: DB_lobby_twigo_talk_01
text: Confirmed! I will never eat a nasty dish ever again!

name: DB_lobby_twigo_talk_02
text: Confirmed! I'll have a mug of ice-cold ale!

name: DB_lobby_twigo_talk_03
text: Is this your way of expressing sincerity?

name: DB_lobby_twigo_talk_04
text: Confirmed! I am moved by your thoughtfulness!

name: DB_lobby_twigo_talk_05
text: Confirmed! It's only fair that I repay you!

name: DB_lobby_veronica_hello_01
text: What do you want? Don't bother me.

name: DB_lobby_veronica_talk_01
text: Do you have something to say?

name: DB_lobby_veronica_talk_04
text: Are you trying to curry favor with me?

name: DB_lobby_veronica_talk_05
text: I'm only giving you this so you can use it to keep my sister happy.

name: DB_lobby_vivian_hello_01
text: I heard Gil goes to that weird tavern often. There aren't any women there, right?

name: DB_lobby_vivian_talk_01
text: Have you seen Gil by any chance?

name: DB_lobby_vivian_talk_02
text: The Boar Hat... What a terrible name.

name: DB_lobby_vivian_talk_04
text: Hmph. Okay, I'll take it for now.

name: DB_lobby_weinheidt_hello_01
text: Do you want to learn archery?

name: DB_lobby_weinheidt_talk_01
text: I'm sure another opportunity will arise.

name: DB_lobby_weinheidt_talk_02
text: When that day comes, I hope we can have a proper fight.

name: DB_lobby_weinheidt_talk_03
text: Oh, are you giving this to me?

name: DB_lobby_weinheidt_talk_04
text: Are you sure I can have this?

name: DB_lobby_weinheidt_talk_05
text: It's not much, but it's my way of saying thanks.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_01_1
text: I'll think about it after everything else is taken care of.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_01_2
text: What kind of bizarre experiments are you planning on running?

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_02_1
text: I just said I'd think about it.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_02_2
text: Can't I cross that bridge when I come to it?

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_04_1
text: I just told her to wake up.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_04_2
text: That secret stays with me and Elizabeth.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_05_1
text: I thought he was a good kid.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_05_2
text: He struck me as a little peculiar.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_06_1
text: It must have happened for a reason.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_06_2
text: I want to hear why it happened before I decide how I feel.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_06_3
text: I'm still mad about it, to be honest.

name: DB_merlin_player_storyanswer_10_1
text: Someone I'd prefer to not have as an enemy.

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_01
text: Captain, will you let me do some research on you?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_02
text: Arthur still believes what you said about becoming the Grandmaster of the Holy Knights of Camelot.

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_03
text: Do I really look that suspicious when I smile?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_04
text: Can you tell me how you managed to wake Princess Elizabeth up?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_05
text: What was your impression of Arthur, captain?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_06
text: That thing from ten years ago, does it still weigh on your mind?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_07
text: I'd like to try some more magical experiments on the king. Any ideas?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_08
text: Captain, what do you think my best trait is?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_09
text: The laboratory still feels a little bare. What should I add?

name: DB_merlin_storyquestion_10
text: What am I to you, captain?

name: DB_shop_package_category_notice_01
text: Do not miss out on limited-time items. Ka-ping!â˜†

name: DB_shop_package_category_notice_02
text: Various special items are available for sale!

name: DB_shop_package_category_notice_03
text: Recommended for those who need equipment!

name: DB_shop_package_category_notice_04
text: Take a look around if you want to be strong like me!

name: DB_birthday_event_talk_47
text: I don't place much importance in birthdays.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301411
text: Escanor observes the rest of the group fighting ferociously. However, a word from Merlin inspires him to join the battle.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301430
text: Ban and Escanor have reached their goals. They meet a suspicious chef selling food by the village entrance.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301440
text: The suspicious chef Beth runs away, and Ban and Escanor go after her. However, the village chief, Ed, stops them. He tells them that Beth is the daughter of a witch, and seeks vengeance for her mother.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301450
text: Beth's mother, Illa, was a skilled fortuneteller. When she lost her husband in an accident, she turned her anger on the village and cursed it. Ed explains that the villagers had no choice but to kill Illa and Beth. According to Ed, when Beth later returned as a specter to get revenge for her mother, she sold cursed food to the villagers to torment them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301460
text: Ban says that Beth and Illa wouldn't be so hot for revenge if the father really died by accident. Village chief Ed stands by his claim that it was, in fact, an accidental death.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301470
text: Hungry for vengeance, Beth declares that she will reduce the village to nothing. Ban and Escanor try to convince her that there must be a misunderstanding, but Beth is having none of it.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301480
text: Beth retreats, warning Ban and Escanor that they too will perish if they keep getting in her way. Ban and Escanor wonder if Beth's father really died by accident.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301510
text: Gowther and Escanor finally get some downtime, so they head to the shopping district for some new books. While they were happily looking for new reads, a suspicious woman appears and asks Escanor to accompany her.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301520
text: Escanor is kidnapped by the suspicious woman despite Gowther's efforts to stop her. Gowther returns to the tavern to let the others know.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301530
text: Gowther suspects that the one who took Escanor is none other than the rumored "Noblewoman of the Night." Unlike Ban, who thinks Escanor will return on his own, Meliodas invokes the fourth rule of [The Seven Deadly Sins] and declares that the group must go rescue him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301540
text: The group arrives at the rumored place, only to find themselves in a gloomy forest instead of a large mansion. As they contemplate the ways to find their missing ally, the group hears Escanor's screams.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301550
text: Escanor is being forced to recite poems in front of the Noblewoman of the Night. Meliodas appears before them and requests to take Escanor back. The Noblewoman of the Night doesn't seem too fond of that idea, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301560
text: Meanwhile, Merlin finds her way to the tavern and asks Hawk where everyone went. As if on cue, Gowther returns to the tavern to request reinforcements.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301570
text: Meliodas and Ban are unable to avoid a fierce battle against the Noblewoman of the Night. Right on time, Gowther and Merlin join them.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301571
text: Merlin suggests destroying the entire forest because they are outnumbered. She uses her ability, "Object Transference," to bring Escanor his Sacred Axe Rhitta.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301572
text: Escanor releases the energy of the sun contained within Sacred Axe Rhitta and turns into his daytime form. Escanor uses his power on the Noblewoman of the Night without mercy.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301580
text: The group safely returns to the tavern. Escanor wants to recite a poem to commemorate this joyous occasion, but the only one who will listen is Merlin. This makes Escanor incredibly happy.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301710
text: Meliodas asks Escanor for some tips on running a tavern. Escanor remembers a past episode which took place at his bar, My Sweet Gluttony.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301720
text: Escanor has prepared the ingredients for bar snacks using the chickens that suddenly appeared. He enters the kitchen to organize the ingredients when he finds a leak in the corner.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301730
text: While making chicken soup with the ingredients he found, Escanor suddenly hears a scream and runs outside. He ends up saving some people who were ambushed by barbarians.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301740
text: Escanor defeats the barbarians and helps one of the ambushed people find his family.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301750
text: Escanor arrives at the barbarian stronghold and begins clearing out its occupants.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301760
text: The man whom Escanor helped find his missing family visits My Sweet Gluttony to thank his savior, but is unable to meet him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301810
text: Valenti is studying the existence of specters when she ends up helping a stranger who came screaming.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301820
text: Valenti learns that magical attacks can effectively damage specters. In order to find more specters, she learns of a mysterious place within Britannia from the wandering storyteller, Melvin.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301830
text: The mysterious place Melvin mentioned is a giant chessboard! Valenti meets a specter with the appearance of a queen chess piece.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301840
text: Valenti is disappointed that she couldn't find any research on neuroscience. She asks Melvin to tell her about another place in Britannia.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301850
text: Valenti arrives in the ancient ruins with Melvin. Specters suddenly appear and capture Melvin. Instead of saving Melvin right away, Valenti comes up with another hypothesis.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301860
text: Valenti barely saves Melvin in time. He is beyond shocked when he hears what Valenti's endgame is.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302070
text: This time, mages have come to find the "Headless Knight" to solve the problem.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302080
text: The royal mages successfully rescue the children and uncover the identity of the "Headless Knight."

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302090
text: The "Headless Knight" turned out to be a father who died while mourning for his son.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302100
text: Hawk bawls after hearing the conclusion of the story. Elizabeth wishes that the father and son were reunited.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302110
text: It's not easy to ask Beth about her past. At that moment, Gowther, whom Meliodas sent as reinforcement, arrives on the scene.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302120
text: Gowther reads Beth's memories. According to him, Beth's father had found out the embezzlement of tax funds perpetrated by village chief Ed and the villagers, who then murdered him and made it look like an accident to silence him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302121
text: Gowther uses "Searchlight" to read Beth's memories from her past.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302130
text: Escanor realizes that they have already met the village chief in Beth's memory: Ed. At that moment, Ed shows up with villagers in tow.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302140
text: Ban asks Ed whether Beth's memory is true, but he won't give a straight answer. Ban and Escanor are sure that Beth and her mother were killed in cold blood because of an unconfirmed rumor.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302150
text: The villagers claim that Beth is evil for terrorizing the village for something that happened in the past, but Ban and Escanor say that they brought it upon themselves. Escanor suggests clearing things up since it's not right to leave people to die. Beth is already out of control with her thirst for vengeance, however.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302160
text: Ban and Escanor fight ferociously to stop Beth from hurting any more people. She seems to reconsider her actions after seeing the two try to stop her, but suddenly changes her tune.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302170
text: The one who appeared was not Beth, but her mother, Illa. She unleashes her wrath caused by the village.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302180
text: The villagers don't seem to want to change their ways even after a serious disturbance. Ban and Escanor tell the villagers to deal with it on their own. The two return to the capital of Liones.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302200
text: Guila and Jericho are training hard even on their day off. Holy Knight Anton begins complimenting the two, especially Jericho, and tells them to let him know if they need a training buddy. Guila takes him up on the offer and lunges at Anton.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302210
text: The three have finished their training. Holy Knight Anton asks the two of them, especially Jericho, to join him for some chicken and ale. It looks like Anton wants to have a meal with Jericho, but she storms off to the Boar Hat, saying she wants to drink some ale.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302220
text: Holy Knight Vili finds Jericho, who had been training. He challenges Jericho, betting theater tickets on the line as a prize.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302230
text: Jericho easily wins against Holy Knight Vili and snatches the tickets away from him. Vili's plan to watch a show with Jericho using the bet as an excuse completely fails.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302240
text: Jericho goes out on a mission with a rookie Holy Knight. Jericho wonders why a new recruit would be deployed on a mission to take out a Tyrant Dragon. The rookie tells Jericho that he requested to be sent on a mission with her.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1302250
text: The rookie Holy Knight is very forward about expressing his feelings for Jericho, but she is unaffected by his advances and leaves to meet up with Ban.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_40_62
text: What do you think? Suits me perfectly, huh?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_40_63
text: Where's a good place to settle?

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_40_65
text: Well, I can take care of that on my own.

name: DB_guest_talk_answer_40_68
text: You guys should come out more often.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_40_02
text: A moving tavern. I never would have imagined it.

name: DB_guest_talk_question_40_03
text: Have you thought about settling down?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_40_04
text: Will I have a chance too?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_40_05
text: You aren't having bouts of anger again, are you?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_40_07
text: Do you prefer younger or older women?

name: DB_guest_talk_question_40_08
text: Come visit Istal from time to time.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_01
text: I can't tell by your appearance, I guess.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_04
text: Do you even know what you're sorry about?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_06
text: Should we go through the test one more time?

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_09
text: Still, the most important thing is that you're alive.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_61
text: Yeah. You haven't changed a bit.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_63
text: I see... You should think about settling down.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_64
text: Don't answer if you didn't understand the question.

name: DB_guest_talk_reaction_40_66
text: No, you've heard the spell before.

name: DB_lobby_zaneri_talk_03
text: Thank you. I wasn't expecting this.

name: DB_lobby_zaneri_talk_04
text: Will I have a chance too?

name: DB_monster_desc_2410106
text: Galland of [b]Truth[/b] of [The Ten Commandments]. Those who tell a lie in his presence turn to stone.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410107
text: [The Ten Commandments] Melascula of [b]Faith[/b].\nThose who show faithlessness in her presence will have their eyes set ablaze.

name: DB_monster_desc_2410339

name: DB_monster_desc_2410340

name: DB_monster_desc_2760107

name: DB_monster_desc_2810508
text: The alpha of flying dragons which live deep in the forest.

name: DB_monster_desc_2810509

name: DB_monster_desc_2810510
text: A flying dragon which lives deep in the forest in a pack.

name: DB_monster_desc_2810511
text: It used to be a normal bat that inhabited a nearby area, but became the medium of a curse due to someone's foul intentions.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301410
text: Bartra gives [The Seven Deadly Sins] another mission to prove their strength. Meliodas returns to the group and tells them that vacation days will be given when this mission is complete, then suggests to choose the ones who will carry it out.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_1301420
text: Ban and Escanor were chosen to carry out the mission after a battle within the group. Escanor is just dead weight because the mission must take place at night. Will the two be able to complete the mission?

name: GB_COPY_DB_guild_boss_rule_03
text: 2. Progressing in Knighthood Boss Battles, Knighthood ranks will be determined by factors such as Check-Ins and Contributions to the Knighthood.\nBe advised, you will not be able to participate while ranks are being determined (for 30 minutes on Sunday 12:00 AM). (UTC - 7)

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71011
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] believes [FFE809][b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b] Demon Meliodas[-] has gotten weaker compared to 3,000 years ago.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71013
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] can never forgive the betrayal of the group's leader, [FFE809][Knight of Wrath] Demon Meliodas[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71021
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] has never seen a Human like [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71022
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] unknowingly begins to feel terrified by the superhuman strength of [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71031
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] and [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Melascula of [b]Faith[/b][-] both love good booze, enough to go on drinking all night.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71111
text: [FFE809][Fairy King's Forest] Guardian Elaine[-] was revived by [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Melascula of [b]Faith[/b][-] in a scheme to gather souls using the resentment of the dead. Elaine isn't so easily controlled, however.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71121
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Melascula of [b]Faith[/b][-] thinks [FFE809][b]The Lion Sin of Pride[/b] Holy Knight Escanor[-] is annoyingly arrogant for a Human.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71122
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Melascula of [b]Faith[/b][-] was greedy for [FFE809]"Sunshine" Holy Knight Escanor[-]'s soul, but this caused her to burn to a crisp.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71131
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Melascula of [b]Faith[/b][-] is annoyed by [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] who keeps stealing from her hard-earned pile of souls.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71211
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b][-] is surprised by the fact that [FFE809]"Disaster" Old Fart King[-] is the Fairy King.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71212
text: The first Fairy King, [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b][-], and the current Fairy King, [FFE809][Protector of Dolls] Old Fart King[-] meet each other at the Great Fight Festival by chance.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71213
text: The first Fairy King, [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b][-], and the current Fairy King, [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Old Fart King[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71221
text: [FFE809][b]The Goat Sin of Lust[/b] Holy Knight Gowther[-] is one of the participants in the Great Fight Festival hosted by [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b][-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71222
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b][-] has never seen [FFE809][Wanted Man] Young Villager Gowther[-] disguised as Alan.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71223
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b][-] was happy to see [FFE809][Liones's Hero] Holy Knight Gowther[-] betray his allies for his own gains in the Great Fight Festival.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71231
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Gloxinia of [b]Repose[/b][-] wants [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Drole of [b]Patience[/b][-] to host the Great Vaizel Fight Festival with him.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71311
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b][-] tried to eat [FFE809][Heart of the Land] Mercenary Diane[-]'s soul - a large soul from a Giant.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71312
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b][-] was interrupted as he was about to consume [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Holy Knight Diane[-]'s soul.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71313
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b][-] ran into [FFE809][b]The Serpent Sin of Envy[/b] Holy Knight Diane[-] when she lost her memories and was wandering around.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71321
text: [FFE809][Liones] Princess Elizabeth[-] was hugely shocked by the "Hell's Phoenix" sent by [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b][-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71322
text: Hawk's Mama, who was carrying [FFE809][A New Adventure] Princess Elizabeth[-], swallowed the "Hell's Phoenix" sent by [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b][-] whole.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71323
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b][-] believes that Meliodas, someone precious to [FFE809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-], is a traitor.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71331
text: [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Monspeet of [b]Reticence[/b][-] looks after [FFE809][The Ten Commandments] Derieri of [b]Purity[/b][-] in more ways than one.

name: DB_fate_skill_name_71231
text: Host of the Great Fight Festival

text: Removes [FFAE00]Freeze[-] effect on the boss at the start of every turn.

name: DB_cutscene_replay_list_91550010
text: Hendrickson, who had been ignoring Jenna's orders to visit, finally visits Istal, the sacred land of the druids. Jenna begins thoroughly questioning Hendrickson, who brought the Trio of Troublemakers with him.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91550010
text: Hendrickson had been ignoring Jenna's orders to visit, but he eventually stops by Druid Sacred Lands, Istal, with the Trio of Troublemakers. Jenna tells Hendrickson to show her his skills.

name: DB_cutscene_summary_91550020
text: Jenna, who had been already aware of Hendrickson's actions, gives him one more chance.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71711
text: [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-] wants to invite [FFE809][Halloween] Captain Meliodas[-] to the festival in Camelot.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71712
text: To [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-], [FFE809][The Seven Deadly Sins] Captain Meliodas[-] is a great hero of legend.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71713
text: [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-] wants to learn many things from [FFE809][Boar Hat] Tavern Master Meliodas[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71721
text: [FFE809][Collector] Great Mage Merlin[-] always tells [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-] that he will rule Britannia one day.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71722
text: [FFE809][b]The Boar Sin of Gluttony[/b] Great Mage Merlin[-] is doing her best to make [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-] the next ruler of Britannia.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71723
text: [FFE809]"Infinity" Great Mage Merlin[-] guides [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-] on his path of destiny.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71731
text: Both [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-] and [FFE809][Roars of Dawn] Captain Slater[-] admire and cherish Merlin.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71732
text: [FFE809]"Overpower" Hunter Slater[-] and [FFE809][Destined Heir] New King Arthur[-] always make an effort to protect Britannia.

name: DB_fate_skill_name_71713
text: I Want to Learn from You

name: DB_hero_skill_atk_desc_10241
text: Inflicts [00D5FF]Excruciation[-] damage equal to {melee_val} of Attack on {target_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Excruciation: Decreases Crit Resistance and Crit Defense by {opt_1_val} for [FFAE00]2 turns[-] upon successful critical strike.[-]

name: DB_hero_skill_buff_desc_40202
text: Increases basic stats by {buff_1_val} for {turn_1_val} and gains [00D5FF]Evasion[-] for {turn_4_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Evasion: Immune to damage from Attack Skills.[-]

name: DB_hero_skill_buff_desc_40211
text: [00D5FF]Taunts[-] enemies and increases HP-related stats by {buff_1_val} for {turn_1_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Taunt: Directs all attacks to self.[-]

name: DB_hero_skill_pose_desc_50121
text: Assumes a Stance for {turn_1_val} which [00D5FF]Taunts[-] enemies and inflicts damage equal to {buff_1_val} of Attack when taking attacks.\n\n[00D5FF]*Taunt: Directs all attacks to self.[-]

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700152
text: Increases the hero's Crit Damage by [FFAE00]{buff_1_val}[-] when Ultimate Move Gauge is depleted.\n[00D5FF](Limit {pass_max_stack_val} times, excludes depletion from Ultimate Move use.)[-]

name: DB_activeskill_desc_213091
text: Inflicts damage equal to {melee_val} of Attack on {target_val}. Applies [FFAE00]5[-] [00D5FF]Ignite[-] effects for {turn_1_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Ignite: Damage taken by target(s) [FFAE00]+[-]{buff_1_val} (Can be stacked).[-]

name: DB_activeskill_desc_213111
text: Inflicts damage equal to {melee_val} of Attack on {target_val} and inflicts [00D5FF]Corrosion[-] damage equal to {buff_1_val} of remaining HP for {turn_1_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Corrosion: Additional damage at the end of every turn.[-]

name: DB_activeskill_desc_213113
text: Inflicts damage equal to {melee_val} of Attack on {target_val} and inflicts [00D5FF]Corrosion[-] damage equal to {buff_1_val} of max HP for {turn_1_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Corrosion: Additional damage at the end of every turn.[-]

name: DB_activeskill_desc_213191
text: Inflicts [00D5FF]Ruin[-] damage equal to {melee_val} of Attack on {target_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Ruin: Increases damage dealt by {opt_1_val} per Debuff on the target and removes Debuffs[-].

name: DB_activeskill_desc_213212
text: [00D5FF]Removes Debuffs[-] from {target_val}. Increases [00D5FF]Defense-related stats[-] by {buff_1_val} for {turn_1_val}.

name: DB_activeskill_desc_213213
text: [00D5FF]Removes Debuffs[-] from {target_val}. Grants [00D5FF]Debuff Immunity[-] and increases [00D5FF]Defense-related stats[-] by {buff_1_val} for {turn_1_val}.

name: DB_activeskill_desc_213291
text: Heals HP of {target_val} equal to {melee_val} of Attack. For {turn_1_val}, [00D5FF]Rejuvenates[-] while [00D5FF]filling[-] the Ultimate Move Gauge by {opt_1_val} [FFAE00]orb(s)[-].\n\n[00D5FF]*Rejuvenate: Additional Recovery equal to {buff_1_val} of recovered HP at the start of every turn.[-]

name: DB_cutscene_summary_2005010
text: [The Seven Deadly Sins] have come to defeat the massive crab-like demonic beast, Lamek. The ocean-dwelling creature has come onto land after failing to mate and is enraged at the couples that stand before him. [The Seven Deadly Sins], on the other hand, think of the bountiful birthday feast that Bartra is about to have.

text:
Inflicts damage equal to {melee_val} of Attack on {target_val}. Applies [00D5FF]Ignite[-] and [00D5FF]Corrode[-] effects for {turn_1_val}.

[00D5FF]*Ignite: Damage taken by target(s) [FFAE00]+[-]{buff_1_val} (Can be stacked).[-]
[00D5FF]*Corrode: Additional damage equal to {buff_2_val} of remaining HP at the end of every turn (Can be stacked).[-]

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_200713
text: The combined powers of [FFE809][Outlaw] Brawler Ban[-] and [FFE809][Forest Guardian] King the Fairy King[-] allow for devastating attacks.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71811
text: [FF809][Omen of Chaos] Grandmaster Dreyfus[-], under the control of Fraudrin, had influenced [FF809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky][-] Captain Denzel to be dispatched to a different location.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71812
text: [FF809][The The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Captain Denzel[-] believes that the real [FF809]"Break" Grandmaster Dreyfus[-] would put his own life on the line for the good of all.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71821
text: [FF809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Captain Denzel[-] and [FF809][Liones] Princess Elizabeth[-] are both from the royal family of Liones.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71822
text: [FF809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Captain Denzel[-] and [FF809][A New Adventure] Princess Elizabeth[-] lived under the same roof in Liones at one point.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_71823
text: [FF809][The Pleiades of the Azure Sky] Captain Denzel[-] is [FF809][New Legend] Princess Elizabeth[-]'s uncle.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_72211
text: There is an overwhelming difference in power between [FFE809][Elite Demon] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] and his old acquaintance, [FFE809][b]The Dragon Sin of Wrath[/b] Demon Meliodas[-].

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_72212
text: [FFE809][Elite Demon] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] and [FFE809][New Legend] Demon Meliodas[-] once knew each other. He already knows how Galland's Commandment works.

name: DB_fate_skill_desc_72213
text: [FFE809][Elite Demon] Galland of [b]Truth[/b][-] went to attack [FFE809][Knight of Wrath] Demon Meliodas[-] and crew as a morning exercise.

name: DB_guset_talk_answer_40_36

name: DB_guset_talk_answer_40_38

name: DB_hero_desc_1405002
text: The young king of Camelot who inherited the Holy Sword Excalibur passed down since the time of ancient heroes.

name: DB_hero_desc_1505002
text: A Demon associated with [The Ten Commandments], a group under the direct orders of the Demon King. He is bestowed with the commandment of [b]Truth[/b]. He enjoys playing the life-or-death Galland Game.

name: DB_hero_desc_1515002
text: A Demon of [The Ten Commandments], a group under the direct orders of the Demon King. She is bestowed with the commandment of [b]Faith[/b]. She hates Humans, but loves their booze.

name: DB_hero_skill_atk_desc_10221
text: Inflicts [00D5FF]Co-destruction[-] damage equal to {melee_val} of Attack on {target_val}.\n\n[00D5FF]*Co-destruction: {opt_1_val} increased damage [FFAE00]per Debuff[-] on the target.[-]

name: DB_hero_skill_buff_desc_213211
text: Increases [00D5FF]Defense-related stats[-] of {target_val} by {buff_1_val} for {turn_1_val} and [00D5FF]generates[-] {opt_1_val} Ultimate Move Gauge [FFAE00]orb(s)[-].

name: DB_hero_skill_buff_desc_213213

name: DB_hero_skill_buff_desc_40131
text: Creates a barrier around {target_val} equal to {buff_1_val} of Attack and increases HP-related stats by {buff_2_val}.

name: DB_hero_skill_pose_desc_50029
text: Assumes a stance for {turn_1_val} which performs a [00D5FF]Preemptive Strike[-] before an ally is attacked, inflicting {melee_val} of Attack and [00D5FF]disabling all skills[-].\n\n[00D5FF]*Preemptive Strike: Becomes immune to Ultimate Move Gauge depletion effects and attacks before the enemy does.[-]

name: DB_monster_desc_2340508

name: DB_monster_desc_2340509

name: DB_pvp_mode_desc_001
text: Increases HP-related stats of allies who used [FFAE00]2[-] or more skills during your turn by [FFAE00]20%[-] for [FFAE00]3 turns[-].

name: DB_pvp_mode_desc_002
text: Increases damage from [00D5FF]Shock, Bleed, Poison[-] Debuffs by [FFAE00]50%[-].

name: DB_pvp_mode_desc_004
text: No Unique skills for all heroes.

name: DB_pvp_mode_desc_005
text: Decreases max HP of the hero who took down a target by [FFAE00]20%[-].\n[00D5FF](Can be stacked)[-]

name: DB_pvp_mode_desc_008
text: All heroes set to the team will participate from the start of the battle.

name: DB_pvp_mode_desc_009
text: Remaining HP decreased by [FFAE00]10%[-] every turn, starting in [FFAE00]2 turns[-]. After that, the effect increases by [FFAE00]10%[-] at the end of every turn.

name: DB_skill_buff_desc_60502
text: Inflicts damage equal to {buff_1_val}% of Attack when attacked.

name: DB_skill_buff_desc_60606
text: Increases Ultimate Move Gauge by {buff_1_val} orb(s) at the end of every turn.

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_610708
text: Immune to HP Decrease / HP-related Stats Decrease / Coerce / Corrode.

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_650021
text: Increases HP-related stats of allies who used [FFAE00]{buff_1_val}[-] or more skills during your turn by [FFAE00]20%[-] for [FFAE00]3 turns[-].

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_650031
text: Increases damage dealt with [00D5FF]Shock, Bleed, and Poison[-] Debuffs by [FFAE00]{buff_1_val}[-].

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_650051
text: Decreases max HP of the hero who took down a target by [FFAE00]20%[-].\n[00D5FF](Can be stacked)[-]

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_650072
text: Decreases damage dealt with all-target skills for all heroes by [FFAE00]50%[-].

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700145
text: Allies and enemies are [00D5FF]Solidified[-] for [FFAE00]3 turns[-] when attacked in PVP.

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700147
text: Decreases damage dealt by [FFAE00]{buff_1_val}[-] when allies or enemies use ranged attack skills in PVP.\n[00D5FF](Excludes Ultimate Moves)[-]

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700148
text: Increases Attack by [FFAE00]{buff_1_val}%[-] at the end of the turn if the hero uses a skill. The effect is removed on the turn a skill is not used.

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700149
text: When attacked, allies and enemies apply an effect on the attacker which decreases Attack-related stats by [FFAE00]20%[-] for [FFAE00]3 turns[-].\n[00D5FF](Does not apply to Death Match. Applies when entering battle)[-]

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700150
text: Increases Attack by [FFAE00]{buff_1_val}[-] for [FFAE00]each[-] Debuff on the hero.

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700151
text: For both allies and enemies, depletes [FFAE00]{buff_1_val} orb(s)[-] from the Ultimate Move Gauge and removes Debuffs when moving skills in PVP.

name: DB_skill_passive_desc_700164
